story:
We are Status Audio. We build premium-quality, minimalist-inspired headphones that deliver audiophile sound for an honest price.

We've been hard at work at the Between Pro for over two years. There is no other wireless earbud quite like it - in design, technology, and most dramatically, sound.

Some details:

  • Update: We have started shipping backer units. Please see the "updates" section for dispatch information for all outstanding orders. 
  • We have a six-year track record of designing and manufacturing award-winning headphones
  • We ship worldwide 
  • All backers are protected with our 30-day performance guarantee + 1-year warranty

 

I 

 

A major leap forward for wireless earbuds. 

Over two years in development, Status Audio's Between Pro earbuds are a leader in acoustics and technology, with a completely reimagined approach to design. 

  • Triple Speaker Drivers - Two Balanced Armature Drivers + a 10mm dynamic driver inside each earbud - for a total of Six components producing sound

  • Four microphones with cVc ambient noise reduction,  ensuring stellar call quality
  • Industry-leading battery life: 12 hours of continuous playback from the earbuds, plus another 36 hours in the charging case

 

See the Between Pro make its way through Brooklyn, NY:

Unboxing the Between Pro:

We put a great deal of effort into designing simple, elegant packaging that gets the product in your ears and playing music as quickly and easily as possible.

We find a lot of product packaging is overengineered and fussy - with dense and hieroglyphic instruction manuals that leave you scratching your head. We aim to put simplicity and usability first, always. 

Slide off the white sleeve, and you'll see a simple black gift-box. Pretty clean, right? Our logo and typeface are embossed in a reflective silver finish. We think you'll end up keeping this :) 

Separate the gift-box and you get to the good stuff: 

 

See that squiggly line? Below that is where you'll find all the accessories - replacement ear-tips, silicone fit-wings, and a USB-C charging cable. 

So where are we at?

As you can see from recent campaign updates, we have already started shipping product to our supporters. Several reviews have surfaced from publications such as PC Magazine and TechRadar, as well as a bunch of Youtube technology reviewers. 

 

For shipping updates, please click over to the "updates" tab for recent developments.

About Us

At Status Audio, we are committed to delivering audiophile-caliber sound,  minimalist design, and superior technology at accessible price points. 

We've had the privilege of serving customers of all types: audiophiles, professional music-makers, and everyday listeners. 

We kicked off in 2014. Our Founder James Bertuzzi leads product development and splits time between New York City and our manufacturing partners overseas. 

 

Thank you.

If you have any questions about the Between Pro or backing this product on Indiegogo, feel free to email our Founder directly - jamesbertuzzi@status.co

story:
Hate distracting background noises while you're on a business call, working out, or just trying to enjoy a little peace and quiet? Us too! NuFlo Wireless Earphones with Active Noise Cancellation allow you to hear only what you want to hear whether you're traveling, working, or taking a much needed coffee break. 

 

 

 

 

"These truly wireless earbuds provide active noise cancelation that blocks out noises up to 30 decibels. By filtering out everything unnecessary, you can completely focus on the task at hand. Whether you’re studying for exams, creating an important project for work, or reading a novel, it’s important to stay on task. With immersive sound, these let you experience clear bass and treble notes, allowing you to fully appreciate all the acoustics."

 

"The Vibes Lab Nuflo Wireless ANC Earbuds are an innovative solution that’s capable of blocking out distracting background noises that prevent you from enjoying your favorite playlist, taking an important phone call, or even appreciating simple silence."

 

 

 

 

NuFlo Wireless Earphones with Active Noise Cancellation soundproof your life. The ANC features allows you to block any sounds created outside the earphones, so you can enjoy complete silence or listen to what you want uninterrupted. NuFlo is a premium product that rivals the biggest titans in the audio tech industry because we have created the all-in-one solution for users' audio needs at an affordable price. The NuFlo Wireless Earphones are integrated with Active Noise Cancellation and so much more!

NuFlo earphones use a custom-constructed microphone array and advanced algorithms for a hybrid noise-cancelling performance. It creates an average 30 dB active cancellation on top of the optimized isolation from the gel ear tips. Operating the device is easy and effortless- the ANC feature can be activated and deactivated by one touch on either earphone. Within the range of 20Hz~20kHz, NuFlo adapts the ANC performance from 28~32 dB (average 30dB) for an optimal audio experience. You can adjust the ANC feature to enjoy a uniquely quiet environment with or without music.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Intuitive touch technology that allows you to easily control your listening devices through simple gestures. 

 

 

NuFlo wireless earphones are ready for anything because they are integrated with IPX6 waterproof technology. These earphones are capable of resisting high-pressure, heavy sprays of water making them sweat-proof and splash-proof. They are built to withstand whatever life throws at you whether that’s a marathon in the middle of summer or a torrential downpour. NuFlo wireless earphones are the listening devices you can depend on even in the most unexpected circumstances. 


 

 

Premium sleek and powerful design, integrating a lightweight experience for modern appearance and comfort. They fit right in to your personal style and taste so you can enjoy wearing them all day long.

 

The hybrid design is created to reduce discomfort. Focusing only on enhancing performance while you enjoy music, movies, and calls with ease using earbuds that perfectly fit your ears.

 


 

We constructed the battery for NuFlo wireless earphones to support portability and durability, so you can take your devices on-the-go without worrying about their dependability. NuFlo wireless earphones are conveniently charged in a portable battery case that can store up 30 hours of battery life with the ANC OFF and up to 22 hours with the ANC ON.

 

 

 

The portable charging container can be fully charged in only 2 hours, so you can enjoy up to 30 hours of playtime. NuFlo’s portable charger also has a quick-charge feature that allows you to store enough battery for an hour of playtime in only 10 minutes.

 

 

NuFlo’s USB-C connector allows you to connect with multiple devices and maximizes NuFlo’s compatibility allowing the device to be more adaptable, functional, and universal. The USB-C also increases NuFlo's connection and charging speed overall.

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

1. Concept Sketches
2. CAD Drawings
3. 3D-printed Prototypes
4. CNC-machined Samples


 

 

 

 

Impedance: 23 Ohm +-15% at 1KHz
Speaker sensitivity: 103.5 +-1.5dB at 1KHz
Output: 12 mW RMS (with level limit)
Output Total: Harmonic Distortion <3% (1KHz, 1mW)
Response Bandwidth: 20Hz - 20kHz
Driver size: 6 mm

Play Time:

  • 7 Hours* + 24 Hours in the case (ANC Off + Music On)
  • 5 Hours* + 15 Hours in the case (ANC On + Music On)
  • 12 Hours* + 50 Hours in the case (ANC On + Music Off)

Charging time: 2 Hours
Quick charge: 10 minutes = 1 hour playtime
Charging: Via charge case with USB connector
Input power: DC 5V 1A
Type: Lithium-ion
Battery voltage: 3.7V
*May vary dependent on usage, device & music

Case Width: 52mm
Case Height: 58mm
Case Depth: 36mm
Earbud Width: 9mm
Earbud Height: 42.6mm

Bluetooth version: 5.0
Frequency band: 2.4 GHz
Profiles: Handsfree , Headset , A2DP , AVCRP
Wireless Range: 50 ft

 

At this special and hard time, with the extremely tough international travel restrictions and reduced business activities caused by COVID-19 impact, we temporarily minimized our operations and keep our focus in Shenzhen on completing fulfillment and picking up support. We hope it is temporary and we will be able to get back to normal business in a later time. 

Our background includes senior acoustic-engineering lead and consultants for leading OEM manufacturers. We are making our brand’s debut with NuFlo Wireless Earphones, which combine industry-leading wireless earphone solutions integrated with active noise cancellation technology. At Vibes Lab, we strive to create revolutionary sound by leading the way in acoustic innovation and premium sound design. We are constantly looking for new ways to improve users’ listening experience through expert audio engineering and problem solving. With the NuFlo Wireless Earphones, we are delivering users an all-in-one solution by creating a premium listening device that contains multifaceted features to address every users’ audio tech needs.

We contract with the top-tier laboratories and factories with advanced testing and production equipment, in order to achieve industry-leading products and quality. We also have a team in Shenzhen, China to supervise mass production, inspect quality, and coordinate logistics.

All our products are inspected 100% in the production line: PCBA inspection, RF inspection, Bluetooth protocol & connectivity inspection, audio inspection, battery aging inspection, and final package inspection. 

Most orders made in this campaign will be shipped from Shenzhen and Hong Kong. For some countries with a bulk volume of orders, such as the United States, we are also seeking local distribution to assist shipping in order to cut down the fulfillment lead time.

 

We are confident about our engineering, production, and logistics ability. We guarantee customer order fulfillment post-production. However, unpredictable things, like natural disaster, could introduce complications; if that happens, we will keep every backer in transparent communication.

story:
Light Speaker

The Light Speaker is a portable bluetooth speaker inspired by a traditional lantern. It has a simple and functional form. The light feels like a real flame, glowing together with your music.

It is designed to be easy to carry, so you be inspired by music and podcasts through out the day. 


Livingroom podcasts


Bathroom Spa experience


Outdoor adventure

Transparent Sound 

The Light Speaker has a big, open, omnidirectional sound delivering rich bass, stable mid tones and crisp high notes. The solid borosilicate glass cylinder creates a sealed valve for the passive 3” woofer sitting in the bottom. The dome shaped enclosure on the top holds a powerful 2.5” full range driver sending out 360 degree sound. 


Exploded view of drivers

The Light Speaker features our signature ‘Transparent sound’ meaning it's tuned to channel the true intention of the artist. It gives natural and immersive sound typically not found in portable speakers.  


The 2.5 inch full range driver

Natural glowing light

People have gathered around campfires since the beginning of time. Even now, the soft glowing warmth of campfires, fireplaces and open candles still bring us together and make us feel good. We figured if we can make a light that comes anywhere close to that we would be on to something.  


Turn the light knob just like a dimmer

The Light Speaker has two separate knobs, one for light, one for sound. As you turn up the brightness, the light appearance goes from a dark glowing ember, to a living candle, and all the way up to a bright natural light – with a light temperature of around 3500 kelvin.



Dancing after sunset

Double up

The Light Speaker features the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology, which includes ‘True Wireless’ dual speaker wireless streaming. That means you can easily connect two speakers together and set them to be the left and right (stereo) channels of your music. 

We also made the Light Speaker so it can work as a satellite together with our two previous stationary Transparent speakers models. 



Use two speakers together for an even bigger stereo experience.
 

Modular electronics for circular economy

We aim for our loudspeakers to transcend trends and potentially live forever. They are completely modular, designed so that any component can be removed, repaired or upgraded over time.

This circular design approach goes for the Light Speaker and for all our loudspeaker models. 


Crowdfunding 1: Large Speaker, Crowdfunding 2: Small Speaker, Crowdfunding 3: Light Speaker!

The Light Element

Inventing the light element

We spent many hours analyzing the properties of real flames. The light temperature, the brightness, the characteristic movements... Our aim was to make the light glow with your music like a natural flame, creating a unified mood setting experience of light and sound. 



Turning the light knob changes both the temperature, behavior and brightness of the element

To achieve this goal we invented a glowing, vibrating bass-and-light element that sits in the bottom of the device. The color variations and the subtle flicker that follows the music has been carefully tuned to give the atmosphere of a glowing flame. The harmonious vibrations and flickering creates a natural, living light experience. 

Example of how the light reacts to music (shot on an Iphone)   

Easy to handle

The light speaker only weights 0.6 kg (1.3 lb) and comes with an elegant handle accessory. In true Swedish tradition we include an Ikea-style wrench for attaching the handle to the light speaker.

Simple use and setup 

We believe that less is more. So we have focused on making the setup as simple as possible. You will be playing your music in no time after you unbox. No app, no voice control and definitely no hidden microphones recording you.   

What you get 

When we are successfully backed from you here on kickstarter you will get the product as a reward as fast as we can make it. The amount you back with will be a much lower price than you would be paying later in retail. You will also be part of our bigger mission and journey to take on wear and tear tech and you will get behind-the-scenes updates directly from us founders and the key staff that will help us turn this into reality.   





 

Bluetooth 5 Module — optional upgrade for our older transparent speakers

We designed a Bluetooth 5 Module to our old customers and Kickstarter backers. An upgrade to make their old speaker become top modern. With this module you are able to stream True Wireless Audio to a Light Speaker and an older Transparent Speaker model together at the same time. If you’re an original Transparent Speaker backer — awesome! Do check out the special pledge level including a BT5 Module.


Transparent Bluetooth 5 Dongel - An optional add on, if you want to upgrade your current speaker with Bluetooth and play it together with the light speaker.

Built to last

The single most important thing that an electronics product can do to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and save natural resources is to extend its lifespan. That’s why we have invested so much time in making a completely modular design that can be repaired and upgraded over time. 

Our mission is that Transparent products will actually get better with age and we will do what we can to remove electronic waste from the world. 

Our vision is to be the first circular tech brand.

Our environmental work has been recognized in China as Grand Finalist in Global IEIC Environmental Innovation Competition. We have been featured in the European Commission's report on Circular Economy case studies, and listed as Green Heroes by Kevin McCloud from Grand Designs in the UK. After our first two projects we have also advised Kickstarter in New York on these topics and influenced the creation of the their Environmental commitments section.

The printed circuit board (PCB)

How is it made?

To make this product a reality in scale we work with our great partner in China. It’s a company founded by a woman. She later married a Danish man that then also became a partner in the business. It’s a truly unique company, well known internationally for its quality. We have worked together with them since our first kickstarter. 

Finding all the right parts and suppliers for this product has taken our combined efforts for more than a year.

Why we need your support

We’re a small team with big ambitions. And taking on an entire industry is definitely a big undertaking. To make the Light Speaker come to life we now need your help.

Transparent was born on kickstarter and has grown from this community. But making hardware is tough – even more so if you are breaking the mold of the tech goliaths, and investing in the tools necessary to make complex aluminum parts and newly innovated vibrating light elements. 

Basically have three reasons for returning to Kickstarted for our third campaign:

  • Investing in upfront manufacturing costs like aluminum tooling
  • Getting people involved in the final stages of product development
  • Scoping out how many we should make  
 

Founders Martin & Per 
 

We are Transparent

Being transparent means stopping corporate bullshit and talking honestly, at eye level, with our users, backers and extended creative community. Being born on kickstarter we shared our journey openly and frequently with our backers from day one.

Founders Per and Martin were part of the renowned Stockholm design studio People People for almost ten years. In between projects for major international consumer electronics brands, they envisioned the Transparent Speaker in a blog post. In the post they outlined sustainable design philosophy and a solution to the war going on in the living rooms decor – the never ending battle between home electronics and interior design. The post went viral, people in the comments literally asked them to put it on Kickstarter, this led to completing a successful crowdfunding campaign 2013 that has led us back here today.

Since our first kickstarter we have shipped thousands of units to over 60 countries. Our speakers can be found at design shops like Conran Shop and music stores like Turntable Labs. They have been used in music videos from artists such as Robyn and Snoop Dogg, and frequently get celebrity love on social media.

  • What Hi-Fi? Calls us the best HiFi from Kickstarter with “high quality components designed for ‘any space’”
  • The Independent (UK) says the Small Transparent Speaker is "the best buy.. and the best bluetooth speaker on the market"
  • Stuff gave us a ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐  review and called us a “Scandi Supermodell”.  
  • Elle Interior fulle page luxe list feature 

 

After Per & Martin sold their part in People People to work on Transparent full time, the core founding team of Transparent was joined by Magnus last year to help with the international expansion. Today our core team is 5 people sitting in central Stockholm. 

Big thanks to these behind the scenes backers

  • Our supporting families
  • Noel Edling for shooting the video
  • Magnus Wiberg for being the best possible co-founder and communicator
  • Julio & Daniel from Launch Studio for coaching
  • Mira & Thilda for photos & campfire
  • Joanna for taking care of our insta plus doubling as an extra in the shoot
  • Grand Relations for letting us use their incredible showroom
  • Gustav & Josefine for helping getting our web & emails in order
  • Vic, Emma and the crew at Little Red for making the impossible PR situation more possible
  • itradephoto for fast turnaround on flat shots
  • Heather from Kickstarter
  • Jake from Indiegogo
  • Oskar K for jumping on last minute 
  • Alex from Sieo


And all the previous backers that got us to where we are today! 

 

Follow us

Transparent on Instagram

Risks and challenges

This is Transparent’s third Kickstarter campaign. Both our previous campaigns were delayed but finally delivered to great praise. It has really taught us about transparency and the bottlenecks of producing something great (without compromising anything) at scale.
We have now established a solid relationship with our experienced contract manufacturer partner and we work together to set all the high standard protocols and processes for material suppliers to remove risks in the supply chain. We have built the prototypes you see in this campaign together with our pre-selected partners – so they fully understand our specifications and timeline. We can still not anticipate unexpected issues but we can guarantee that we are going to be fully transparent and keep you updated if anything affects our plans.

Ship Date: We are confident we can follow our schedule. But big outbreaks of Corona or other “force majeure” events arising from geopolitics or extreme weather (global warming) etc will off course potentially have effects on the shipping date. We will of course keep you fully up to date.

No app, no voice control and definitely no hidden microphones recording you.   What you get When we are successfully backed from you here on kickstarter you will get the product as a reward as fast as we can make it. The amount you back with will be a much lower price than you would be paying later in retail. You will also be part of our bigger mission and journey to take on wear and tear tech and you will get behind-the-scenes updates directly from us founders and the key staff that will help us turn this into reality.    Bluetooth 5 Module — optional upgrade for our older transparent speakersWe designed a Bluetooth 5 Module to our old customers and Kickstarter backers. An upgrade to make their old speaker become top modern. With this module you are able to stream True Wireless Audio to a Light Speaker and an older Transparent Speaker model together at the same time. If you’re an original Transparent Speaker backer — awesome! Do check out the special pledge level including a BT5 Module.Transparent Bluetooth 5 Dongel - An optional add on, if you want to upgrade your current speaker with Bluetooth and play it together with the light speaker.Built to lastThe single most important thing that an electronics product can do to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and save natural resources is to extend its lifespan. That’s why we have invested so much time in making a completely modular design that can be repaired and upgraded over time. Our mission is that Transparent products will actually get better with age and we will do what we can to remove electronic waste from the world. Our vision is to be the first circular tech brand.Our environmental work has been recognized in China as Grand Finalist in Global IEIC Environmental Innovation Competition. We have been featured in the European Commission's report on Circular Economy case studies, and listed as Green Heroes by Kevin McCloud from Grand Designs in the UK. After our first two projects we have also advised Kickstarter in New York on these topics and influenced the creation of the their Environmental commitments section.The printed circuit board (PCB)How is it made?To make this product a reality in scale we work with our great partner in China. It’s a company founded by a woman. She later married a Danish man that then also became a partner in the business. It’s a truly unique company, well known internationally for its quality. We have worked together with them since our first kickstarter. Finding all the right parts and suppliers for this product has taken our combined efforts for more than a year.Why we need your supportWe’re a small team with big ambitions. And taking on an entire industry is definitely a big undertaking. To make the Light Speaker come to life we now need your help.Transparent was born on kickstarter and has grown from this community. But making hardware is tough – even more so if you are breaking the mold of the tech goliaths, and investing in the tools necessary to make complex aluminum parts and newly innovated vibrating light elements. Basically have three reasons for returning to Kickstarted for our third campaign:
Investing in upfront manufacturing costs like aluminum tooling
Getting people involved in the final stages of product development
Scoping out how many we should make  
 
Founders Martin & Per  We are TransparentBeing transparent means stopping corporate bullshit and talking honestly, at eye level, with our users, backers and extended creative community. Being born on kickstarter we shared our journey openly and frequently with our backers from day one.Founders Per and Martin were part of the renowned Stockholm design studio People People for almost ten years. In between projects for major international consumer electronics brands, they envisioned the Transparent Speaker in a blog post. In the post they outlined sustainable design philosophy and a solution to the war going on in the living rooms decor – the never ending battle between home electronics and interior design. The post went viral, people in the comments literally asked them to put it on Kickstarter, this led to completing a successful crowdfunding campaign 2013 that has led us back here today.Since our first kickstarter we have shipped thousands of units to over 60 countries. Our speakers can be found at design shops like Conran Shop and music stores like Turntable Labs. They have been used in music videos from artists such as Robyn and Snoop Dogg, and frequently get celebrity love on social media.
What Hi-Fi? Calls us the best HiFi from Kickstarter with “high quality components designed for ‘any space’”
The Independent (UK) says the Small Transparent Speaker is "the best buy.. and the best bluetooth speaker on the market"
Stuff gave us a ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐  review and called us a “Scandi Supermodell”.  
Elle Interior fulle page luxe list feature 
 After Per & Martin sold their part in People People to work on Transparent full time, the core founding team of Transparent was joined by Magnus last year to help with the international expansion. Today our core team is 5 people sitting in central Stockholm. Big thanks to these behind the scenes backers
Our supporting families
Noel Edling for shooting the video
Magnus Wiberg for being the best possible co-founder and communicator
Julio & Daniel from Launch Studio for coaching
Mira & Thilda for photos & campfire
Joanna for taking care of our insta plus doubling as an extra in the shoot
Grand Relations for letting us use their incredible showroom
Gustav & Josefine for helping getting our web & emails in order
Vic, Emma and the crew at Little Red for making the impossible PR situation more possible
itradephoto for fast turnaround on flat shots
Heather from Kickstarter
Jake from Indiegogo
Oskar K for jumping on last minute 
Alex from Sieo
And all the previous backers that got us to where we are today!  Follow usTransparent on InstagramRisks and challengesThis is Transparent’s third Kickstarter campaign. Both our previous campaigns were delayed but finally delivered to great praise. It has really taught us about transparency and the bottlenecks of producing something great (without compromising anything) at scale.We have now established a solid relationship with our experienced contract manufacturer partner and we work together to set all the high standard protocols and processes for material suppliers to remove risks in the supply chain. We have built the prototypes you see in this campaign together with our pre-selected partners – so they fully understand our specifications and timeline. We can still not anticipate unexpected issues but we can guarantee that we are going to be fully transparent and keep you updated if anything affects our plans.Ship Date: We are confident we can follow our schedule. But big outbreaks of Corona or other “force majeure” events arising from geopolitics or extreme weather (global warming) etc will off course potentially have effects on the shipping date. We will of course keep you fully up to date.

story:
The GTRS Intelligent Guitar is a brand-new electric guitar brand powered by MOOER Audio. Over the past 10 years, MOOER Audio have been hard at work creating state of the art digital effects algorithms and sampling technology for guitar, amp, and cabinet simulations.  In October of 2019, we started collaborating with instrument designer Kenji Wong on developing the GTRS line as MOOER’s first fully integrated electric guitar effects system.
 
With GTRS, it is our mission to bring the latest audio technology to musicians while honoring a long guitar tradition. We believe that with the GTRS series, passionate musicians can play more often at home or on the road without sacrificing their tone (or their back).
 

The GTRS ecosystem starts off with the one-of-a-kind guitar equipped with the GTRS Intelligent Processor System. This guitar is designed to function with and be controlled by its dedicated mobile application to offer seamless integration of traditional guitar features and modern digital simulation technology. The GWF4 Wireless Footswitch is also available to provide complete control of your tone during live performance, recording, or practice sessions.

 

 

The GTRS Intelligent Guitar is designed to adapt to a variety of situations for a variety of guitar players. No matter if you're new to guitar or a seasoned professional, the GTRS Intelligent Guitar can meet your needs.

The GTRS Team has been hard at work on balancing traditional electric guitar sensibilities and modern simulation technology. As a result, GTRS was designed by experienced instrument builders and built with high-quality materials. Working with the built-in Intelligent Processor System makes the GTRS guitar more practical for guitar players to use anywhere, anytime.

The GTRS Intelligent Processor System includes 9 classic guitar simulations, 126 guitar effects, 40 drum grooves, 10 metronome variations, and an 80-second looper. All settings can be quickly edited through the GTRS app with more simulation files and effects planned to be released in the future. The Super-Knob and GWF4 wireless footswitch enable quick preset changes during live performance and the built-in chargeable & replaceable battery frees you from low battery anxiety. Guitarists can even use a single OTG cable to set up a live stream while performing.

 

All-in-one GTRS Intelligent Processor System

The GTRS Intelligent Processor System is the key difference from traditional guitars. This small black box includes MOOER's top tech for samples, simulations, and effects algorithms. Everything is built-in to the GTRS Intelligent Processor System to work smoothly while playing your guitar and switching between presets and settings. You can use the Super-Knob to change your saved presets directly or you can connect the Intelligent Guitar System to your Android/iOS/iPad OS devices for more detailed tweaking.

The Intelligent Guitar System includes guitar amp modelling, cab simulation, a variety of guitar effects, and guitar simulation. Multiple output options make it easy to use GTRS in a variety of playing situations.

 

Say Goodbye to Traditional Effects Boards

GTRS has inherited years of audio algorithms from previous MOOER multi-effects pedals. We have chosen 126 high quality effects that can be accessed through the GTRS Intelligent Processor System.  With the GTRS APP, all the effects parameters can be easily edited and saved as presets. Individual effects in the effects chain can also be rearranged for maximum customization.

 

GTRS Guitar Simulation

GTRS Intelligent guitar also includes the latest MNRS technology for guitar simulation.  There are 9 classic guitar sims built-in to the GTRS Intelligent Processor System. Each guitar sim will be downloaded automatically when selected from inside the app. The initial release will feature 9 guitar sim choices such as a '58 Les Paul, a '52 Tele, a 60s Strat, and others with several more planned for future updates.

 

For Guitar Beginners and Pros

GTRS includes multiple categorized presets for quickly selecting different tones. Beginners can simply select a preset in their favorite style without having to worry about creating their own custom tones. By using the GTRS app,  presets can be easily downloaded from other users or artists. the GTRS app also has a built-in guitar chord dictionary, drum machine, and tuner so theres no need to switch between apps. You can also use another mobile device to play tracks when you practice. 

For guitar beginners, it can be discouraging to spend hours trying to recreate the same tones as your guitar heroes. We believe the easier it is to recreate your favorite sound, the more motivated you will be to learn. Over time, beginners can learn more about different guitar effects without having to invest tons of money on different pedals and guitars just to find out what they like.

It's quite big task for guitarists on tour - all the pedalboard, amps, equipment and set up become increasingly difficult to haul and distract from the enjoyment of the tour and the music. GTRS aims to solve this problem by providing a product that can be setup and controlled by a mobile application, but doesn’t solely rely on while playing. After setting all presets in the GTRS guitar and/or Footswitch, players can quickly switch between all presets on the fly without fiddling with their phone or tablet.

 

 

About the Guitar

The first Standard 800 model features an American basswood body, roasted Canadian maple neck, and a rosewood fingerboard that feels great in the hand. The Custom S-S-H alnico pickup configuration was specifically chosen to provide the maximum amount of tonal flexibility while adhering to tried-and-true guitar designs. With the GTRS system turned off, all the functionality of a "normal" guitar remains and your Standard 800 can still be plugged in to your favorite amp, pedals, or effects unit.

 

 

About GTRS Intelligent Processor System

The GTRS system starts off with a one-of-a-kind guitar equipped with the GTRS Intelligent Processor System. Designed in conjunction with master guitar builders and MOOER’s digital sound engineers, the GTRS guitar is designed to function with its dedicated mobile application to offer seamless integration of traditional guitar stylings and modern digital simulation technology. 

 

How to replace a new battery for your GTRS Intelligent Guitar

 

About Super-Knob

The Super-Knob is a specialized interface for the GTRS Intelligent Guitar. With the combination pot and push knob, you can easily control the main signal output of the guitar, change between saved presets, access the tuner, or turn on/off the guitar simulator. The LED light color indicates which preset is currently selected.

 

About GTRS APP

The free GTRS APP offers a wide variety of tools to shape guitar tones and aid in live streaming, recording, and practice. After connecting the GTRS guitar via Bluetooth, these presets can be customized and shaped through the app, saved to the GTRS guitar, and even uploaded to the cloud to share with other users. The app is available for free and can be downloaded now for Android, iOS, and iPad OS. Using the app is not required to use the GTRS guitar, only to edit and create presets or access cloud functions to share and download presets.

 

How to connect the GTRS APP to your GTRS Guitar

Connecting your guitar to the application is simple! Turn on the Super-Knob on your GTRS guitar and follow the on-screen instructions. First-time users will need to scan the QR code for your guitar. After first-time setup, connecting the guitar to the app is as easy as connecting any other Bluetooth device.

 

What you can do with the GTRS APP

With the GTRS APP, all the effects parameters can be easily edited and saved as presets. Individual effects in the effects chain can also be rearranged for maximum customization. The GTRS app also has a built-in guitar chord dictionary, drum machine, and you can monitor when tuning your guitar with the GTRS Intelligent Processor System, so there's no need to switch between apps. You can also use another mobile device to play tracks when you practice. 

 

The GTRS APP Cloud

Presets can be easily downloaded from other users or artists from the GTRS APP Cloud. You can also easily backup all your customer presets to the Cloud and download them to your other GTRS Intelligent Guitars in the future.

 

About GWF4 Wireless Footswitch

GWF4 Wireless Footswitch is a four-channel footswitch for switching between presets and toggling effects when using the GTRS Intelligent guitar, the footswitch LEDs will also indicate current status,  and the LED display screen shows the currently selected preset name.
 

 

How to connect GWF4 with your mobile device

 

About Output & Connections

3 different outputs to choose

 

OTG connection for quick live stream anytime anywhere

 

How to play tracks when practicing guitar

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

GTRS Intelligent Guitar

4 colors to choose

 

GWF4 Wireless Footswitch

 

 

For over a decade, MOOER Audio have been constantly developing and refining their advanced digital guitar simulation technology in the form of micro pedals, preamp pedals, GE Series effects pedals, the GE labs mobile application, and several other products while always trying to make them as cost-effective and reliable as possible. 

Since the inception of GTRS in 2019, we have been focusing our efforts heavily on research and development to provide a light, seamless, guitar experience of the future. We truly believe that our digital technology in its current state has finally reached a point where guitarists will be able to invest in a GTRS guitar and enjoy it for many years to come. Because of the already overwhelming support from MOOER artists and GTRS backers, we anticipate continuous expansion of the GTRS ecosystem as its user base grows.

The entire MOOER Team is extremely grateful to all of our backers and for those that share our vision for the future of guitar and musical instruments!

 

 

 

 

We have chosen to launch GTRS on Indiegogo because we believe the crowdfunding platform is a great channel to communicate with our customers before launching a new product. We listen to our customer's voices to optimize our products and services accordingly. The value we place on your feedback is why we are providing significant discounts in return for your early support, as we bring this product to market. In addition to collecting feedback from our customers, we know that going to directly to our international customers ensures faster shipping and wider availability across the globe.

MOOER Audio is extremely proud of the GTRS brand and the powerful technology behind it. We guarantee 100% high quality and on-time shipping for crowdfunding customers.

story:
It's meant to be shared at sound levels that stir the soul. With massive output and a portable design, Kube4 is made to move you.

After our wild success with the original Kube, shipping to over 40 countries and completely selling out last summer, we're back with a redesigned, next gen speaker.

 

 

An ergonomic handle and a lightness of just 21 pounds make Kube4 the most portable - and frankly, the only practical - device in its class.

 

 

 

 

 

Just how high can Kube4 turn it up?

 

With the most cutting-edge mesh WiFi technology, use our advanced multi-room or multi-stream features to play music in sync across the whole house - or choose different songs for different spaces.

 

Enjoy over 10 times the range you’d get with a traditional bluetooth speaker with mesh WiFi technology. With a range of up to 300 feet, the party doesn’t stop until you say so.

 

With up to 40 hours of battery life, Kube4 keeps the party going all weekend long, day and night.

 

With water resistance rated at IPX5, Kube4 is not only perfect indoors, but in the great outdoors too - rain or shine.

 

With deep bass and true highs, Kube4 delivers balanced sound without clipping or distortion - even when you crank it all the way up.

 

Turn it on and press play. No wires, cables, or outlets needed.

 

Seamlessly syncs with Wifi instead of just Bluetooth, so your device’s notifications won’t crash the party.

 

Connect a microphone to Kube, and you have an instant PA system right at your fingertips.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Elegant design doesn’t stand out like other party box speakers, no more tacky LED lights necessary

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Nathan George and his friends noticed that music has become small, convenient, and personal. Although music is intimate, it has become very isolated and constrained. They wanted to create a product that lets music be big, bold, and shared — a product that sets music free. The Kube Sound team shares a simple but meaningful idea that music should complement space, not compete with it. To bring this vision to life, they called upon the best in engineering, design, and manufacturing. Audio experts united not only by their drive for perfection but also by their love for music. The result is Kube4, a portable speaker designed for the outside world. The team likes the sound of it, and they think you will too.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in October 2021 We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of Kube4.

 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

The Kube Sound team shares a simple but meaningful idea that music should complement space, not compete with it. To bring this vision to life, they called upon the best in engineering, design, and manufacturing. Audio experts united not only by their drive for perfection but also by their love for music. The result is Kube4, a portable speaker designed for the outside world. The team likes the sound of it, and they think you will too.
 


 
 

 
 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.
 

We plan to ship starting in October 2021 We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.
 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of Kube4.
 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

 


 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
Order more PaMu Earphones on               https://padmate-tech.com

 

 

We aren’t your run-of-the-mill new AirPods alternative. We’re better than that. Way better. Think of PaMu slide as an apple earbuds upgrade with better sound and longer battery life.

We’ve retained all those elements that have made PaMu such as success, including:

  • Perfect sound quality
  • Long battery life
  • Signal stability
  • Awesome comfort levels

Now we’re back with PaMu Slide, an awesome product that will redefine Bluetooth earphones.

 

 
 

The quality of any earphone depends on the power of its core processing chip. Ours is amazing, which means:

  • The most stable signal connection
  • Better sound quality
  • Lower power consumption

The chip we use in PaMu Slide is the Qualcomm QCC3020. It’s the most advanced TWS (True Wireless Stereo) earphone chip there is. Bose, Sony, and Jabra are all still using the old Qualcomm CSR86Xx, while Apple’s Airpods 2 use the H1 chip.

We've partnered up with Intel and Qualcomm to develop PaMu Slide and outperform all other earphones. Have we achieved our goal? We think so, but ultimately, you will decide.

In a flooded market of the true wireless earbud, it is really hard to stand out. You have to bring some unique features to the table. What is it for PaMu Slide? Check out what professional reviewers said about PaMu Slide

 

Musician and writer Luke Leighfield recommends PaMu Slide
 

Reviewed and Tested by top tech web Craving Tech, check the details here

Reviewed and Tested by TechGuySmartBuy, check the details here

The 1889 founded top English newspaper Express & Star reviews and highly recommends PaMu Slide, check the details here

 

Bass Magazine is the top professional music magazine for bassists and music lovers. Check the full article here

 

 

 

 

PaMu fans from all over the world shared their stories and showed just how much they loved our previous earphones. We’re hoping to get just as great a reaction from our fans to the PaMu Slide.

 

​

PaMu Slide Carry Bag

Storage and protect your PaMu Slide with this little carry bag! 

Note: You MUST buy a PaMu Slide/Slide plus with the carry bag. We WON'T SHIP if you only purchase a carry bag.

 

Smart and stylish as well as delivering awesome sound – that’s PaMu Slide. It’s unlikely you will ever be able to buy earphones this good for such a low price again. So seize the moment and back our Indiegogo campaign. Choose from white, black or green and place your order now. You can then be the envy of your friends by being one of the first to own a set of PaMu Slide earphones.

 

 

The Padmate team has worked with Qualcomm engineers to enhance the performance of PaMu Slide. And such is the quality of the result, we can proudly claim that the chip in our earphones performs better than the chip in AirPods.

Even better, many of the smart functions that are present in PaMu Slide are supported with technology from our partners at Intel.

PaMu Slide is unquestionably one of the best products to come out of the Padmate - Intel partnership. 

We sincerely hope to be picking up more awards to go with the Best Industry Innovation Accelerator gong we picked up in 2018.

Want even more evidence that the amazing work of the Padmate team is getting the tech world to sit up and take notice?

Padmate CEO and product leader, Mr. Mao, was recently invited to deliver a presentation about PaMu Slide tech at the Bluetooth SIG conference. This is the official Bluetooth organization that sets the worldwide standards in Bluetooth, and we’re justifiably proud to have been invited to take part.

We were also delighted by how well the technology in PaMu Slide was received by delegates at the conference.

story:
Production Updates :

Driver

Wood:

Magnet Stators:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Better FR Graph link :

https://photos.app.goo.gl/AZ7DCbEkzCL8oWKV6

Short Summary

I'm currently a senior in high-school 

I have always been fascinated by audiophile headphones, and this is my first step to enter the audiophile community and share my project. I want some challenge for myself and also to see if I'm capable of becoming an entrepreneur. 

I want everyone to know that someone like me, a student, can start a business and follow their dreams. So I highly encourage every student to step out of their comfort zoom and challenge themselves. 

Everyone who funds my project will help me start my company and introduce more headphones in the future that I have so many ideas. 

What We Need & What You Get

I know many people will be scared to fund me since I have no history with any campaign. But I would like everyone to trust me that I will deliver everything.  

There aren't many handcrafted wood planar headphones in the market. Even if there is, it will cost thousands of dollars. I want to make affordable headphones that can compete with the thousand-dollar price range.

If I don't reach my goal, I will promise everyone who funded me that you will receive the product.

The Impact

I have been researching for years now, from watching YouTube videos about headphones to teardown. I also made friends with entrepreneurs that also started headphone campaigns. I have invested thousands of dollars into my project. I use 3D printers to make prototypes, CNC to make the final product, and a laser cutter to make the driver. Everything was possible because my parents supported my project. 

Risks & Challenges

Since I'm a senior in high school, there is a lot of pressure on college and grades. So I will do my best to ship all the orders. There will be risks for me to finish every single order on time. Since I'm the only one working on this. Also, handcrafted planar drivers extremely hard to make, do to the precision the driver will require 

I will need some manufacturers to make parts for me, like the headband, gimbal, but the driver will be 100% made by myself to ensure no cutting corners. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can share this campaign with other people, I will be very glad.

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
FinaLace, the world‘s first 3-channel binaural Bluetooth earphones with realtime mixing & monitoring and sound FXs for content creators. Providing real-time mixing and monitoring of any audio source from mobile phone, 3-channel sound pick-up, making it a studio-free tool to record podcasts, music, videos and calls anywhere, anytime. 

The way we work and create has changed, our lives have shifted from offices to online working, learning and creating, and FinaLace is here to help you thrive.

Noise suppression, a unique mic-array, and powerful app that does things like phone call transcribing have been purposefully designed to help you do your best work anywhere.

You no longer need a voice over mic, mixing panel, high-fidelity headphones and other bulky equipment, at home or on the go. FinaLace replaces all of that and more.

 

But that's not all that makes FinaLace so special, FinaLace has a 3D binaural microphone array built into the earbuds. That means that you can record or share audio around you as it would be naturally perceived by your ears in 3D.

If you haven't experienced binaural audio before, listen to this demo with headphones on to understand the power of FinaLace!

 

 

 

When you create with FinaLace, the person listening to your audio hears sounds exactly as they would if they were you. This gives a whole new dimension to content creation, but also to teleconferencing and teaching. People can experience what you're saying and where you are in an immersive new way. 

Are you honing your musical skills by singing covers and sharing them with your community? FinaLace is the perfect way to capture creativity in every form. Combined with the app, FinaLace gives you all the tools you need, putting the power of a recording studio in your hands. It simplifies the content creation process and takes it from industry level to consumer level. 

Don't be that person that has to mute on calls because of the background noise. FinaLace has a unique noise-suppression algorithm, using all three microphones to make sure you sound crystal clear anytime, anywhere.

The dedicated voice mic is tiny but mighty. It is custom-developed by our in-house audio researchers to deliver the highest signal ratio and sensitivity ever built in such a small package.

 

Listen to this real demo filmed with the woman in red wearing FinaLace, which completely suppresses the noise of a motorbike:

 

 

 

If you or your kids are following online classes, or if you're a teacher yourself, you'll love using FinaLace.  As an educator you can rest assured your students will hear every word you say, without the hum of an AC unit in the background. And if you're teaching an interactive class, like only dance classes, yoga or a field trip, you can switch on the binaural microphones so your students are immersed in your environment.

And best of all, the FinaLace app can transcribe your class automatically, so you can send out class notes with one tap on the app when you record a video or audio class.

Since launching this campaign, we've been overwhelmed with how many of our backers from the previous two Sabinetek campaigns came back to support us again. We are so grateful for your continued support and glowing reviews.

Reviews of our previous products which use some of the same technology including super low latency Bluetooth stereo, noise suppression, wireless mixing, real-time monitoring and AI transcription.

 

When you listen to something that's recorded with FinaLace, you'll hear what happens to your right on the right, and what happens to your left on the left. The central lead vocal microphone is a breakthrough application in immersive 3D recording. It provides an excellent experience when you're recording vlogs, or when you're in calls or live streaming.

 

What makes FinaLace unique in the world of binaural audio, is that it doesn't just have two binaural microphones, but it has a third microphone dedicated to voice pickup. This 3-channel setup allows you to create both immersive content with a clear voice track which you can toggle on or off.

At Sabinetek we're no strangers to this technology. In fact we pioneered wearable binaural recording, and we've been producing full-size binaural microphones that have been a community favorite for years.

The difference between one mic on your phone and FinaLace is huge. Listen to the difference between recording the same scene on your phone, and the recording made with FinaLace. The difference is incredible!

Last year we launched AudioWow on Kickstarter, and over 2,500 backers brought it to life. AudioWoW was our first portable audio product with a built-in sound card bringing audio to life like never before. FinaLace also has a built-in sound card, integrated with digital sound effects, plus the benefits of great-sounding earbuds and binaural audio recording.

 

Transparency mode is another new feature on FinaLace. With transparency mode, you decide how much or how little you want to hear from the outside world. If you're in the zone with your music, simply shut off the world outside, but if you need to hear ambient sound such as traffic and talking to people without taking off the FinaLace, the binaural mics lets sound pass through the earbuds.

Unlike the transparency mode of other sport headphones, our technology is based on the real time monitoring of microphone and built-in digital sound effects. You can adjust the volume of the ambient sound you want to hear and add 3 levels of noise suppression to ensure safety without too much noise.

 

Use the SmartMike+ as receiver for any device with a 3.5mm jack audio input. FinaLace and SmartMike+ share a proprietary Bluetooth protocol giving you quality wireless audio recording. For live streaming you can use T/R mode, but note that phones and computer only work with a stereo input, and not 3D audio.

Using FinaLace is really as simple as downloading our app, connecting FinaLace with Bluetooth and being ready to rock ’n roll. It simplifies the process for content creators. No post-editing is needed unless you want to. Traditional processes to create content may take 5 to 10 hours in post editing. With our app it just takes 10 minutes for content to be ready to share.  Also, to make life easier for our backers, we've decided to merge the apps for SmartMike+, AudioWoW, and FinaLace into one. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SabineTek was founded in June 2014 by a group of acoustics, telecommunications, and electronic engineering experts with a commitment to connecting the world through sound. The company has been leading the way in cutting edge wireless digital audio transmission technology research and development. 

SabineTek creates and builds innovative products that equip content creators in the music, entertainment, education, live streaming, health and many other industries with powerful, out-of-the-box audio recording solutions. SabineTek’s proprietary acoustic communication technology can be widely used in headset, microphone, sound card, and speaker equipment by connecting to mainstream smart systems. Its own branded products such as SMIC, SOLO KTV earphones, FMike, SmartMike+, AudioWow, and Finalace are consistent winners at CES—the world’s leading consumer electronics event—winning CES Innovation Awards in 2018, 2019, 2020, and 2021.

 

 

Innovators and rigorous engineers by day, but avid musicians by night. Can you guess who wins the annual karaoke contest during the office Christmas party?

 

 

With impeccable R&D, supply chain, and e-commerce in Asia and marketing teams in China, Europe, and the US, SabineTek has positioned itself as a global leader that seamlessly commercializes innovative technology into consumer products that meet emerging global trends and sell directly to customers.

 

This is our third crowdfunding campaign, after SmartMike+ and Audiowow have successfully shipped to backers across the world. We've already made pre-production samples and our factory is ready to roll as soon as the campaign is over.

story:
Remember when as a little kid you loved playing in ponds? Now you can listen to the strange creatures that are there.

 

You probably didn't know that many of these critters make amazing sounds. And that 90% of these sounds remain unknown to science.

They sound like weird electronic music, or aliens from another world. With the new Aquabeat Hydrophone you can listen in on this fabulous underwater world.

Most commercially available hydrophones are expensive and designed for deep sea use. They are not all that great in picking up tiny, localized higher frequency freshwater sounds.

 

You'll hear sounds no one can explain.

 

When I heard that people only know 10% of the sounds audible in your average pond, I decided to figure out how to manufacture a less expensive, contact-based hydrophone that the little kid in all of us could use to explore this nearby audible world.

I would like to see hundreds of citizen science explorers out there collecting these sounds, isolating the best ones and sharing them online with each other, making music out of them, enjoying the mysteries in our backyards.

The Aquabeat is priced reasonably enough so many people can afford them. All you need to use it is a small audio recorder (TASCAM DR-05 or Zoom H2N for example), and headphones or a portable speaker to enjoy.

 

Where Are These Hydrophones Made?

 

These hydrophones are being manufactured in China with the assistance of Gejing Jiang, who has made the ESunPride underwater speakers I have used to make music with whales for years. He graduated from Tsinghua University, Beijing, China, and previously worked as an engineer of the South China Sea Institute of Oceanography, the Chinese Academy of Sciences. 

The hydrophones are being manufactured by Shenzhen Xinyatu Sound Electronics Co., Ltd. in Guangdong Province, China . Their major products are piezoelectric elements, and they have 140 employees.

The first shipment of Aquabeats has already arrived, here's what they look like:


 

Here is a box of them in my basement in case you doubt our ability to follow through:

 

Here are some examples of recordings made with the Aquabeat:

https://soundcloud.com/david-rothenberg-5309813...

story:
Model X is the world's best-sounding true wireless earbuds developed from the ground-up to deliver the most incredible hi-fi audio in the rock-solid wireless connection.  Each details, from intuitive touch-control, IPX-5 sweat-proofing, all-day battery life, noise cancellation to smart assistant compatibility has been carefully considered and put together in a fluid user-experience package.  These earbuds will revolutionize the way you listen to music.

 

 

 

Model X automatically turns on, enters pairing mode and turns off when you are done using it.

  • When Model X is taken out of the charging case, it turns on automatically.
  • Model X then automatically enters pairing mode, discoverable from Bluetooth source device around.
  • When Model X is put back inside the charging case, it automatically disconnects from the source device and turns off.

 

We have been developing some of the highest quality audio for more than 4 years, ranging from full-range dynamic drivers, balanced armatures to planar magnetic drivers.  10mm dynamic driver used in the Model X is a pinnacle of driver efficiency tuned specifically to work with its true wireless Bluetooth module at its maximum capability.  The driver inside Model X stands out largely for the following reasons:

  • Its circumference is 10mm, making it one of the biggest driver size fitted into a compact and ergonomic true wireless earbuds.
  • 10mm is the ideal size of transducer to achieve high-fidelity both in terms of the sonic quality and volume output.
  • Its driver diaphragm is coated in graphene material, which markedly increases rigidity of the diaphragm while keeping its weight at the minimum resulting in an ultra-low distortion and a fast, transient response throughout the frequency range.

 

 

Intuitive touch gesture control allows seamless operation of Model X and provide fluid and unobstructed user-experience.

  • Tap Once : Play / pause music, answer / end phone calls
  • Tap Twice : Previous / skip music track
  • Tap and Hold : Volume control
  • Tap Three times : Activate voice control (Siri / Google Assistant)

 

True wireless solutions have been going through turbulent changes for the last 3 years.  Initial solutions have been plagued with severe drawbacks in the basic functions.  We've developed and scrapped over 10 different solutions in the course of 3 years, and finally reached the level of connection stability we were targeting with the Model X via matured Bluetooth 5.0 protocol.

With Bluetooth 5.0, you get the strongest, most reliable connection and seamless connectivity between your devices. Strong connection and speed allows more detailed and robust audio fidelity transmission and zero audio-video lag.

Beyond speed and strength of connectivity, Bluetooth 5.0 provides enhanced security compared to its previous versions to keep your personal information secure.

 

Model X is a byproduct of countless designs to ensure universal fitment for various ear shapes and sizes.  The nozzle length is purposely elongated to be inserted deep into the ear canal and the round and compact earbud body allows it to fit ergonomically in the concha.

Universal and ergonomic design provides numerous unique benefits that improve the user experience of Model X.  Such benefits are as followed:

  • Universal fitment without needing additional ear hooks or guide.
  • Maximum noise isolation up to 23dB from deep insertion of nozzle.

Model X is rated at IPX-5 sweatproof, ideal for most sports application.  Its ergonomic / secure-fit design combined with sweatproof capability makes Model X your perfect work-out companion.

Being truly wireless means that the Model X never gets in your way, but helps you get to where you want to be. We developed Model X to have strong and secure connectivity to your device with a working distance of 35 ft, so you never drop a call, lose connection, or miss a moment.

Model X uses a custom-made LDS antenna to increase bandwidth and signal reception while reducing interference and unwanted noise.  Additionally, pocket connectivity test has been performed using iPhone XS / Pixel 3 / Galaxy S9 / V40 in the front-left, front-right, back-left, back-right pockets over an extended period of time to ensure no connectivity loss occurred during normal commute.

 

Built-in, low-noise, high sensitivity microphone with cVc noise-cancellation allows clear stereo phone calls on-the go.

Sound
Driver Diaphragm: Graphene
Driver Unit: 10mm Custom-Tuned Dynamic Transducer
Frequency Response: 20Hz - 20kHz
Impedance: 32 Ohms
Sensitivity: 90dB @ 1kHz
Proprietary Digital Signal Processing (DSP)
High-Fidelity Sound
Passive Noise Isolation up to 20dB

Connections
Bluetooth Version: 5.0
Bluetooth Protocol: HFP 1.7 / HSP 1.2 / A2DP 1.3 / AVRCP 1.6 / SPP1.2 / PBAP 1.0
Supported Codec: AAC-LC / AAC / SBC
True Wireless Stereo Bluetooth

User-Interface
Capacitive Touch Gesture Control
Supports Volume Control, Music Playback, Answer / End Call, Control Voice Assistant (Siri / Google Assistant)
IPX5 Sweatproof

Microphones
cVc Noise Cancellation for Clear Call
Dual Omni-Directional Microphones

Battery and Power
Model X with Charging Case: Up to 25 Hours Listening Time
Model X (single charge): Up to 5 Hours Listening Time @ 70% Volume

Model X has already gone through prototype stage of development and is in a pilot production stage and securing raw material.  The fund from Indiegogo will allow us to scale our production to speed up delivery lead-time of Model X.

 

It was the respect for all musicians of the past, present and future. It was for the struggling instrumental buried under the heavy bass line. It was for the audiophiles craving that crystal clear and mind-blowing detail.

ADVANCED SOUND GROUP began as a small Kickstarter campaign in 2015 and naturally grew into a bigger body that thrives on the enthusiasm and passion for music. We design, develop and produce ground-breaking audio products that span widely from earphones, headphones, DAC / amp to musical instruments. We are focusing on staying forefront with the latest proprietary audio technology, while continuing to explore creative ways to allow everyone to experience the audiophile-grade sound.

 

 

In our core principle, there lies respect for all musicians as creators and facilitators of content so deeply rooted in human emotion. We recognize the importance of music and the impact it could have in everyone's life, and we actively collaborate and support those who are practicing, creating or performing it around the globe.

We have an open mind and open doors for new ways to collaborate with musicians, audio engineers, manufacturers and brands - as we strive to mature into a platform where the advanced sound converge.

story:
M5-TWS is the world's first 3D-printed true wireless earbuds made with the next-generation audio and wireless technology.  Each details from totally ergonomic 3D-printed housing, proprietary PHPC high-fidelity driver, 9-hour single charge battery life to APTX / AAC codec compatibility has been carefully considered and put together in a TOTL (top of the line) - level package.  M5-TWS is the pinnacle of true wireless earbuds.

 

 

M5-TWS the world's first true wireless earbuds that are crafted using the latest 3D-printing technology - which is the same technology we use for our high-fidelity M5-1D in-ear monitors and Eartune™ Fidelity custom-fit ear tips.

 

 

Its totally ergonomic housing is designed based on 50,000+ actual ear impression data our partners and we collected over the years to ensure maximum compatibility and comfort.  Its complex contours that resemble the actual in-ear shape could only be achieved by implementing the 3D-printing technique.  Thus, we have decided to take the high way and bring it into the true wireless format.

 

The proprietary PHPC (Pressurized High-Purity Carbon) driver used in the M5-TWS consists of the ultra-thin pressurized diamond-like carbon layer diaphragm which is both extremely rigid and light-weight, combined with the high-mass pure copper moving coil that maximizes the vibration stroke of the diaphragm.  This unique pairing results in an improved overall resolution of the audio output from its 6.1mm diameter driver.

M5-TWS is then delicately tuned to resemble Harman target curve using our proprietary acoustic filters and precise driver placement relative to your eardrum.  Resulting audio is high-fidelity unlike any true wireless earbuds that came before it.

 

 

 

True wireless solutions have been going through turbulent changes in the recent years.  Initial solutions have been plagued with severe drawbacks in the basic functions.  We've developed and scrapped over 10 different solutions in the course of 3 years, and finally reached the level of connection stability we were targeting with the Model X earlier this year via matured Bluetooth 5.0 protocol.

We've taken 1 more step further with M5-TWS by utilizing the latest Qualcomm QCC3020 chipset, enabling APTX codec, and streamlining the pairing protocol that eliminates the need to reset the device for connection issues.

With Bluetooth 5.0, you get the strongest, most reliable connection and seamless connectivity between your devices. Strong connection and speed allows more detailed and robust audio fidelity transmission and zero audio-video lag.

Beyond speed and strength of connectivity, Bluetooth 5.0 provides enhanced security compared to its previous versions to keep your personal information secure.

 

M5-TWS is rated at IPX-5 sweatproof, ideal for most sports application.  Its ergonomic / secure-fit design combined with sweatproof capability makes M5-TWS your perfect work-out companion.

 

M5-TWS automatically turns on, enters pairing mode and turns off when you are done using it.

  • When M5-TWS is taken out of the charging case, it turns on automatically.
  • M5-TWS then automatically enters pairing mode, discoverable from Bluetooth source device around.
  • When M5-TWS is put back inside the charging case, it automatically disconnects from the source device and turns off.

 

 

 

Intuitive touch gesture control allows seamless operation of M5-TWS and provide fluid and unobstructed user-experience.

  • Tap Twice : Play / pause music, answer / end phone calls
  • Tap Three Times : Previous / skip music track, reject incoming calls

 

 

 

 

Sound
Driver Diaphragm: Pressurized High-Purity Carbon
Driver Unit: 6.1mm Custom-Tuned Dynamic Transducer
Frequency Response: 20Hz - 20kHz
Impedance: 16 Ohms
Sensitivity: 95dB @ 1kHz
Proprietary Digital Signal Processing (DSP)
True High-Fidelity Sound
Passive Noise Isolation up to 23dB

Connections
Bluetooth Version: 5.0
Bluetooth Protocol: HFP 1.7 / HSP 1.2 / A2DP 1.3 / AVRCP 1.6 / SPP1.2 / PBAP 1.0
Supported Codec: APTX / AAC-LC / AAC / SBC
True Wireless Stereo Bluetooth

User-Interface
Capacitive Touch Gesture Control
Supports Music Playback, Answer / End Call
IPX5 Sweatproof

Microphones
cVc Noise Cancellation for Clear Call
Dual Omni-Directional Microphones

Battery and Power
M5-TWS with Charging Case: Up to 32 Hours Listening Time
M5-TWS (single charge): Up to 9 Hours Listening Time @ 70% Volume

 

M5-TWS has already gone through prototype stage of development and is in a pilot production stage and securing raw material.  The fund from Indiegogo will allow us to scale our production to speed up delivery lead-time of M5-TWS.

 

It was the respect for all musicians of the past, present and future. It was for the struggling instrumental buried under the heavy bass line. It was for the audiophiles craving that crystal clear and mind-blowing detail.

ADVANCED SOUND GROUP began as a small Kickstarter campaign in 2015 and naturally grew into a bigger body that thrives on the enthusiasm and passion for music. We design, develop and produce ground-breaking audio products that span widely from earphones, headphones, DAC / amp to musical instruments. We are focusing on staying forefront with the latest proprietary audio technology, while continuing to explore creative ways to allow everyone to experience the audiophile-grade sound.

 

 

In our core principle, there lies respect for all musicians as creators and facilitators of content so deeply rooted in human emotion. We recognize the importance of music and the impact it could have in everyone's life, and we actively collaborate and support those who are practicing, creating or performing it around the globe.

We have an open mind and open doors for new ways to collaborate with musicians, audio engineers, manufacturers and brands - as we strive to mature into a platform where the advanced sound converge.

story:
Overview

From power banks to travel adapters, Zendure has always worked to make your mobile life simpler and more comfortable.

The right music can go a long way toward easing your day and putting yourself in the right mood for work, exercise, or a day of travel. And nothing should get between you and your favorite music. Not tangled cables, environmental noise, or long-wear discomfort.

Introducing ZenPods, ultralight noise-canceling earbuds with True Wireless Stereo technology, bringing high-quality music and voice into your ears, no matter where you are.


When it comes to earbuds, every gram counts. ZenPods are designed for all-day comfort. Each earbud weighs just 4.2g, 22% lighter than Apple AirPods Pro. Feel the music, not the earbuds.

Some earbuds start to hurt after you wear them for a while. We went through thousands of iterations to come up with a premium ergonomic design that comfortably fits in most people’s ears. Whether you’re commuting, Zooming, or working out, ZenPods were designed to stay in place with less fatigue.

In a noisy environment, it can be tempting to turn up the volume on your earbuds. Experts say that this can result in discomfort and even hearing loss. ZenPods have Active Noise Cancellation technology (ANC), which can reduce ambient noise by up to 30dB. ANC is the smart way to hear what you want to hear.

The built-in microphone detects and picks up the ambient sound, the advanced ANC algorithm then counters it with accurate anti-noise wave, cancelling the ambient sound by combining the ambient sound wave and anti-noise wave.

Hearing is believing. ZenPods deliver a deep bass, warm midrange, and crystal-clear treble thanks to a 13mm composite dynamic driver. Fine-tuned by acoustic engineers for Hi-Fi performance, ZenPods let you hear your music the way it was meant to be heard.

 “Can you hear me now?” ZenPods’ noise cancellation technology works both ways. With Environment Noise Cancellation (ENC), the ambient noise from your surroundings is greatly reduced. Planes, trains, and office noise won’t stand between you and your conversation.

ENC function will be activated automatically when you are having a phone call. The microphone will recognize your voice from ambient sound. Then the ENC algorithm will cancel these ambient noises and enhance your voice during your call.

Active Noise Cancellation can be a little too immersive sometimes. In situations where you’re crossing a busy street or waiting for announcements at the airport, you probably don’t want to “cancel” your environment. Snap back to reality with Transparency Mode. The built-in environmental microphone will let sounds from the outside flow right in.

ZenPods use Bluetooth 5.0 for a stable connection and high-speed communication. Designed for high-performance gaming and video streaming, ZenPods will lower latency to industry-leading 80ms latency when you enter mobile game, by increasing the bandwidth performance and enhancing the signal reception. You can enjoy your game or movie without the annoying latency of other wireless earbuds.

 

ZenPods will automatically pair with your phone when you take them out of the case, another perk of using Bluetooth 5.0. No need to navigate the Bluetooth menu on your phone every time you want to use your ZenPods.

Want to pair with Apple Watch? No problem. You can connect ZenPods with Apple Watch.

ZenPods are  rated IPX5 for dust and water resistance. Whether you’re sweating from a workout or walking in the rain, ZenPods can handle it.

Navigate your music, manage calls, and adjust your listening mode with intuitive touch controls. 

Triple-tap on your ZenPods to activate your phone’s voice assistant to get directions, play music, make a call, and much more. ZenPods are compatible with Siri and Google Assistant.
