story:
In early 2018, after testing as many wireless earbuds as we could, we found that the low priced ones had only basic features and the premium ones were very expensive.

That's when we decided to set a new standard in the wireless earbuds market, developing the most thoroughly designed product, at an affordable price. 

Rather than focusing on a single feature and ignoring the rest, we undertook a deep development of every detail of HYPHEN.

 

 

Initially, we analysed the market to isolate the features that users cared about the most. We identified the 9 main factors and their solutions.  

  • Pairing and connection
  • Control
  • Sound quality
  • Listening distance
  • Ergonomic Fit
  • Battery Life and Portability
  • Design
  • Water Resistance
  • Integrated Wireless Charging

Once we made sure we could fit every feature in such a small budget, we set out to find the best suppliers for each component.

We then focused on creating a team of developers composed of the most experienced engineers in the fields of bluetooth, audio quality and battery life.

The following table speaks for itself:


 

 

Still absent from 99% of models on the market, wireless charging is the future of portable devices. In a product that is meant to be used everyday, we couldn’t ignore its convenience. No need to buy clumsy adaptors, Hyphen features integrated wireless charging.

 

Of course a long battery life and portability of the device are inversely proportional. Some users value more a tiny EDC product, others prefer a longer battery life at the expense of portability. 

HYPHEN will let you listen for up to 28 hours in one of the smallest cases on the market. 

Thanks to Hyphen's fast charging technology, you will be ready to play in just 15 minutes.

 

Right now, most wireless earbuds only offer limited control, such as play/pause or waking up a virtual assistant. 

HYPHEN will give you a level of control over your phone never seen before. Use our Advanced Touch Control to stay off your device. 

 

Double tap on right earbud for next song, double tap on left earbud for previous song.

 

Tap to answer or hang up calls.

 

Hold on right earbud to increase volume, hold on left earbud to decrease it.

 

Triple tap on any earbud while music is off to activate your device's virtual assistant.

 

 

 

In a product that sits in your ears most of the day, an awesome design is essential. After all, nobody wants to look like an alien!

Our team worked on tens of different designs, taking inspiration from Swiss details care and precision, and Italian research for the relationship between man and object.

We settled on a combination of organic lines and acute edges, for earbuds that are perfect from a business meeting to a run in the rain.

 

 

Being able to move and exercise without the earbuds falling off is crucial for a worry less experience. 

HYPHEN's shape is based on the analysis of dozens of different ear shapes, to achieve the best comfort and grip in every situation. We chose a mix of soft touch plastic and a glass like surface for a pleasant feel in the ear and in the hand. 

 

 

What immediately sets cheap earbuds apart from premium ones is the quality of the audio.

Thanks to the Advanced Audio Distribution Profile support, HYPHEN delivers precision-tuned sound. Our high quality speaker provides for a full-range listening experience, satisfying even at lower volumes.

Hyphen’s noise isolating ergonomic tips will give you the silence needed for a crisp and clear audio delivery.

 

 

A complex pairing process is typical in earbuds that were designed with only hardware in mind. This is a common issue to both low and high priced products, and it's one of the most frustrating usability issues.

With Bluetooth 5, HYPHEN will have the most reliable connection possible, for instant pairing and a seamless communication with your smartphone. This means extremely detailed sound dimensions and zero audio-video lag.

Being able to freely move around the house while listening to music without carrying your smartphone is important for many users. That's why we have designed Hyphen to work flawlessly even at a distance of 15 meters (49 ft).

 

 

 

Never worry about damaging your HYPHEN, with an IPX5 waterproof rating you will be able to face even the worst weather conditions. There are no more excuses to skip that workout.

 

 

 

As this is our fourth crowdfunding campaign, here are some feedbacks from our previous backers:

 

 

 

Get free upgrades simply by sharing HYPHEN with your friends! With just 1 referral, you will get a free wireless charger! With 5 referrals, you will get a free pair of HYPHEN!

How to share:

  1. First, back HYPHEN
  2. Once you are a backer, log in your Indiegogo account
  3. Copy HYPHEN's campaign link
  4. Share your unique link with your friends!

 

How to check your referrals:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page
  3. Select the “My Profile” option
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
  5. Count the number of funders

 

 

 

 

Our ultra thin wireless charger is designed to perfectly match HYPHEN, but it can charge all of your devices. Thanks to its Qi certification, it even supports fast charging! It will be available in Night Black and Pure White.

Get it for free by referring one friend to HYPHEN!

 

 

 

 

In HYPHEN's box you will find the earbuds, the charging case, a MicroUSB cable, the instruction manual, 3 pairs of ergonomic silicone tips and one pair of foam tips. 

 

Lost one earbud? Fear not! Simply buy a replacement unit and save money while helping the environment.

 

Plastic injections of cases' and earbuds' housings

 

Components: case batteries (top left), antennas and mics (top right), touch sensors

(bottom left), earbuds batteries (bottom right)

 

Assembly of trial run

Shipping! Our warehouse and logistics center
story_txt:
In early 2018, after testing as many wireless earbuds as we could, we found that the low priced ones had only basic features and the premium ones were very expensive.That's when we decided to set a new standard in the wireless earbuds market, developing the most thoroughly designed product, at an affordable price. Rather than focusing on a single feature and ignoring the rest, we undertook a deep development of every detail of HYPHEN.  Initially, we analysed the market to isolate the features that users cared about the most. We identified the 9 main factors and their solutions.  

Pairing and connection
Control

Sound quality
Listening distance

Ergonomic Fit


Battery Life and Portability

Design
Water Resistance
Integrated Wireless Charging

Once we made sure we could fit every feature in such a small budget, we set out to find the best suppliers for each component.We then focused on creating a team of developers composed of the most experienced engineers in the fields of bluetooth, audio quality and battery life.The following table speaks for itself:  Still absent from 99% of models on the market, wireless charging is the future of portable devices. In a product that is meant to be used everyday, we couldn’t ignore its convenience. No need to buy clumsy adaptors, Hyphen features integrated wireless charging. Of course a long battery life and portability of the device are inversely proportional. Some users value more a tiny EDC product, others prefer a longer battery life at the expense of portability. HYPHEN will let you listen for up to 28 hours in one of the smallest cases on the market. Thanks to Hyphen's fast charging technology, you will be ready to play in just 15 minutes. Right now, most wireless earbuds only offer limited control, such as play/pause or waking up a virtual assistant. HYPHEN will give you a level of control over your phone never seen before. Use our Advanced Touch Control to stay off your device.  Double tap on right earbud for next song, double tap on left earbud for previous song. Tap to answer or hang up calls. Hold on right earbud to increase volume, hold on left earbud to decrease it. Triple tap on any earbud while music is off to activate your device's virtual assistant.   In a product that sits in your ears most of the day, an awesome design is essential. After all, nobody wants to look like an alien!Our team worked on tens of different designs, taking inspiration from Swiss details care and precision, and Italian research for the relationship between man and object.We settled on a combination of organic lines and acute edges, for earbuds that are perfect from a business meeting to a run in the rain.  Being able to move and exercise without the earbuds falling off is crucial for a worry less experience. HYPHEN's shape is based on the analysis of dozens of different ear shapes, to achieve the best comfort and grip in every situation. We chose a mix of soft touch plastic and a glass like surface for a pleasant feel in the ear and in the hand.   What immediately sets cheap earbuds apart from premium ones is the quality of the audio.Thanks to the Advanced Audio Distribution Profile support, HYPHEN delivers precision-tuned sound. Our high quality speaker provides for a full-range listening experience, satisfying even at lower volumes.Hyphen’s noise isolating ergonomic tips will give you the silence needed for a crisp and clear audio delivery.  A complex pairing process is typical in earbuds that were designed with only hardware in mind. This is a common issue to both low and high priced products, and it's one of the most frustrating usability issues.With Bluetooth 5, HYPHEN will have the most reliable connection possible, for instant pairing and a seamless communication with your smartphone. This means extremely detailed sound dimensions and zero audio-video lag.Being able to freely move around the house while listening to music without carrying your smartphone is important for many users. That's why we have designed Hyphen to work flawlessly even at a distance of 15 meters (49 ft).   Never worry about damaging your HYPHEN, with an IPX5 waterproof rating you will be able to face even the worst weather conditions. There are no more excuses to skip that workout.   As this is our fourth crowdfunding campaign, here are some feedbacks from our previous backers:   Get free upgrades simply by sharing HYPHEN with your friends! With just 1 referral, you will get a free wireless charger! With 5 referrals, you will get a free pair of HYPHEN!How to share:
First, back HYPHEN
Once you are a backer, log in your Indiegogo account
Copy HYPHEN's campaign link
Share your unique link with your friends!
 How to check your referrals:
Log into your Indiegogo account
Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page
Select the “My Profile” option
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
Count the number of funders
    Our ultra thin wireless charger is designed to perfectly match HYPHEN, but it can charge all of your devices. Thanks to its Qi certification, it even supports fast charging! It will be available in Night Black and Pure White.Get it for free by referring one friend to HYPHEN!    In HYPHEN's box you will find the earbuds, the charging case, a MicroUSB cable, the instruction manual, 3 pairs of ergonomic silicone tips and one pair of foam tips.  Lost one earbud? Fear not! Simply buy a replacement unit and save money while helping the environment. Plastic injections of cases' and earbuds' housings Components: case batteries (top left), antennas and mics (top right), touch sensors(bottom left), earbuds batteries (bottom right) Assembly of trial runShipping! Our warehouse and logistics center

story:
We Out Here!

Allison Jones and I (Alexi Grousis) are scientific communicators and performers who have spent years sharing our passion about wildlife with audiences around the US. As Black communicators in the sciences we've seen few folks like ourselves in both the lab, the field, and in nature; that is, until 2020 when the Hashtag #BlackInNature popped off showing Black faces in outdoor spaces. Now we want to meet all y'all and many more!

We Out Here is a nine episode (per season) podcast, where we are joined by a guest and explore their work or passion, learning about their experiences in the wild. Guests will range from Black nonbinary rock climbers to Native scientists. WOH (We Out Here) paints a multi-faceted picture of the American experience, from the remote North American wilds to the urban backyard through story-telling. The program uses the personal experiences of their guests as a vehicle for connecting their audience to those whose work or passion center around nature. This is the ever-present diversity among those devoted to our planet.

What We Need & What You Get

Where your money goes:

Compensating guests and our production personnel. As Black folks who are often asked to do work for free, compensating those who work with and around us is important. 

The ability to send equipment to guests who may be in more remote locations or who don't have access to high quality recording equipment needed to tell their story in full.

In situ production and associated travel costs.

 

What you get

The ability to hear stories like yours shared with people like you.

The knowledge that you've created yet more equal footing in the sciences and in nature; that you have raised up voices often ignored.

 

Where do the funds go if we don't reach our goal

Funds will go first towards taxes and fees; then covering primary essential equipment (mics, etc); next towards guest and sound design compensation; towards secondary essential equipment (audio interfaces, etc.); and lastly funds will go towards software, accounts, etc.

 

The Impact

The outdoors and the sciences are often represented by folks who look like Steve Irwin (RIP) and Jeff Corwin. They are the models that many of us grew up with. Now that we're out here we want to show all kinds of kids that they belong out here too; that this world is theirs to experience, enjoy, and protect. 

You have the opportunity to make that happen, while also havin' a good time as we vibe with some of the dopest individuals in nature.

 

Risks & Challenges

Everyone and their mother's father has a podcast. We get it.

This one is built different.

Allison Jones and I have a history of being colleagues in the sciences and close friends for 7+ years; we're irreverent scientific communicators who enjoy sharing knowledge in an unpretentious fashion.

The structure and premise of this podcast is grossly under represented among podcasts, which are often just two dudes talking endlessly.

The guest catalogue is FIRE.

We won't stop developing our skill in this medium. We expect to start a little rough around the edges, and will continue polishing nonstop til our ENTIRE audience can see themselves reflected in our program.

 

Times Are Tough and Many Of Us Are Strapped

If you can't contribute a significant amount you can still help the mission by spreading the good word!

Tell anyone and everyone about the podcast

Share our baby online

Join our Patreon as a Reed Patron at as low as $5

 

WE OUT HERE!

How bout you?

story:
We are Domio Sports, the company behind Domio, the top-rated helmet audio system that delivers the most powerful surround sound experience for your helmet, from the outside in.

After having launched and shipped thousands of units worldwide, we’re here with our second product, the all-new Domio Pro.

Domio Pro builds on the awesome performance of the original product, but we’ve now added voice communications with our wireless noise cancelling Air Mic™, in addition to enhanced audio electronics! Imagine a bigger sound, now with voice capability (phone and rider to rider intercom).

Domio mounts to the outside of your helmet to create an insane audio experience on the inside. Traditional speakers work by transferring sound energy through air. 

Domio is engineered to transfer sound energy through solid materials (the helmet shell). Our proprietary Vibro-Audio™ technology sends micro-vibration pulses into the shell of the helmet creating a dome of audio on the inside. 

Don't worry, you won't actually feel any vibration!

 

The Domio & Domio Pro product lines are powered by our patent-pending micro-vibration audio system: Vibro-Audio™.

The Domio & Domio Pro product lines are powered by our patent-pending micro-vibration audio system: Vibro-Audio™.

Vibro-Audio™ works by using an alternative medium to transmit sound waves. Sounds typically travel through the air and then enter our ear canal and cause tiny vibrations in our eardrum. Sounds can also be transmitted through other media, such as water or solids.

Domio's Vibro-Audio™ uses special components, technologies, and materials that transmit sound directly to the helmet. The rigid, dome structure of the helmet ends up being a really awesome medium, and as a result allows for a truly impressive listening experience.

While Domio Pro works with any helmet we highly recommend the following styles for optimal audio performance.

You can mount your Domio Pro on the top, side or back of your helmet. It’s entirely up to you and how you want to ride! However, the Air Mic™ should be mounted closer to the mouth, either on the front side or inside the chin guard of your helmet.

Mounting Domio Pro

 

Open Face Helmet - Side Mounting

 

Full Face Helmet - Internal Mounting

 

 

Domio started in a basement in January 2016. Since that time, we’ve spent the last two and a half years developing, tweaking and launching our first product Domio, and then developing our second product the Domio Pro:

Domio Sports was founded with a mission to completely rethink how audio and communications are enjoyed during sports and outdoor activities. The two co-founders, Bart and Seb, have been long-time friends and involved in everything from motorcycling, snowboarding, and kitesurfing since an early age.

The two friends loved music and outdoor sports but struggled to find an audio (and comms) solution that worked well when wearing a helmet. The available products were either uncomfortable, sounded very poor, and came with cumbersome assembly and wires. Most of all, they were all unsafe - blocking the outside sound with earbuds or speaker inserts, and cutting off a vital sense when you needed it most.

So in early 2016 the journey began to build something better. After two years of development with a great team of engineers and designers, countless hours testing the product themselves, Domio Sports launched its first product - the Domio in 2017.  

Domio proved to be a huge hit with the company quickly selling thousands of units worldwide across dozens of key retailers. However, a good number of users came back asking for one important addition to the Domio: voice communication. So we are here today launching the second version of the Domio, the Domio Pro now with voice communication capability!

 

We are extremely grateful for the support we’ve received from our crowdfunding community. We love what we do, and it's you that make it all possible.

We'd also like to announce the Domio Pro referral program. Help spread the word and we'll reward you with a free Domio Pro!

The Rules are Simple:

  • Log into your Indiegogo account and copy your unique sharing referral link.
  • Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends via email, social media, or word-of-mouth, and ask them to join us by placing an order on Indiegogo. A successful referral is only counted if someone pre-orders a Domio Pro perk via your link.  
  • You’ll receive a FREE Domio Pro when you collect 5 successful referrals!

WHO:

You must be a backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

HOW:

Log in to Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools.

How to Track Your Results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your username beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.

  5. See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.

story:
Mine S is a cleverly designed, intuitive modular controller that puts the power to create efficiency in your hands. Using an easy swap-in/swap-out design, you can create the controller that you need to best use the software for your music, light show, visual effects, video editing, and more. Don’t let cumbersome controllers disrupt your creative workflow, get a seamless, customized experience with Mine S.

  • Pick and choose which modules you need, how many, and how you want them to be configured for the perfect layout.
  • Designed in Italy
  • Self-recognition of modules (Type, orientation and position)
  • Protocols available: MIDI, HID, OSC, DMX, Art-Net
  • 6 types of modules

Mine S is able to recognize the position, orientation and type of module inserted. That means it can more easily map the controller and get you started on your creative endeavor faster. Our company, Specialwaves, will also send updates for firmware and software so you’ll have the opportunity to add new features, keeping you as up to date as possible.

 

 

There are a lot of reasons why you may need a customizable and reconfigurable modular controller.

  • Need the perfect setup that makes sense for you
  • Your software works best with a particular layout
  • Need to switch quickly from one configuration to another
  • Working with a new piece or upgraded software
  • Changed up your workflow

Other  controllers on the market aren’t versatile enough to meet user needs. With Mine S you don’t need to buy new controllers for new tasks, simply reconfigure and you’re back to work!

 

 

Mine S is the perfect tool to work within the studio, as well as live events. It’s so compact and easy to switch up on the fly, so you’re ready to go in minutes. Want to use multiple pieces of software at the same time? No problem! Mine S can handle it with an easy interface. Mine S can even configure the module features in an advanced and precise way (i.e. linear or logarithmic curve), saving that particular configuration so you can use it later when you need it again.

 

 

Many of you are multi-talented and need diverse applications for various jobs - even for different kinds of software. Luckily the Mine S can accommodate you, controlling lights today, and your VJ set tomorrow!  

 

 

Mine S is versatile enough for all preprogrammed and last minute requests. For example, you can control a music or video track before a theatre or arena event, or add one or more channels for controlling a new effect - like a fog machine -  in a live set. Your creativity knows no bounds!

 

 

With Mine S you can create a unique control surface that matches perfectly with the layout of the software are you using, eliminating user error that comes from switching back and forth from device to screen!

 

 

Mine S comes with its own proprietary, intuitive Controller Editor software, which is compatible with most music, VJing, laser show, lighting software, and video/photo editing programs, providing for advanced control of connected modules and protocols.

 

 

Users often require an advanced setup in order to fulfill complex tasks. Many controllers on the market are hard to personalize because they are pre-programmed to work in only one way, but often users need different workflow features compared to the one installed by the manufacturer.

 

With Mine S you can quickly and efficiently configure each module and its functions. For example, you can set up the brightness and colors of the LEDs, the speed and incremental value of the encoders, and the curve of action of the slider and pots.


 

Mine S can communicate via different protocols: MIDI, HID, OSC, DMX, and the Art-net protocol. You can even control more than one software and/or protocol at a time for maximum flexibility and fluid transition from one task to the next.

 

 

Mine S is powered by a USB connection, so it’s easy to use with any computer. You can also use the Mine S external power supply if you’re using a lot of high-power consumption modules, which will also make the LED lights on the modules brighter. Otherwise, Mine S will automatically reduce the brightness of LEDs, saving energy.

 

 

Since the Mine S is compact and designed for the most efficiency in the smallest amount of space, you don’t need a lot of room to use it, making it perfect for any size professional or home studio. Live event spaces can also sometimes be cramped depending on what other equipment is there and how many people you’re working with, but Mine S seamlessly fits in with your workspace whether that’s a play in a church basement or a big game in an arena filled with thousands of people.


 

Since you can swap out and in any modules you want, it also means that you can replace broken ones on the fly when needs be. That’s a “lifesaver” at a live event.

 

The Mine S is fully compatible with many pieces of software on the market since it speaks to a lot of protocols. Here are some examples of the most popular:

 

MIDI software:

Ableton Live

Pro Tools

Logic Pro

Sonar Cakewalk

FL Studio

Bitwig

Reaper

Cubase

Traktor

Serato

Virtual DJ

Acid Pro

Digital Performer

Reason

Final Scratch

Garage Band

Samplitude

Sequoia

Studio One

Mixxx

GarageBand

Finale

QLAB

Resolume Arena

ArKaos Grand VJ

Modul8

MadMapper

Pangolin Beyond

 

We are also developing advanced integrations with software such as Ableton, Bitwig, Virtual Dj, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Pro Tools, and more.

 

MIDI Hardware (MIDI IN & OUT Ports)

All devices that accept a MIDI Input & Output (Synths, Keyboards, Expanders, Fireworks, etc.)

 

DMX:

All pieces of software that support an open DMX USB device (at the moment, we've tested on ENTEC OPEN DMX USB). Through this system, you can control LED PARs, moving heads, lasers, fog machines, dimmers, and all devices that have a DMX input.

 

HID:

Potentially, any software you have on your PC or Mac.

 

You can use Mine S to speed up your work (e.g. CAD, sketching, drawing, text editing, browsing, etc.) by inserting frequently used shortcuts such as "copy," "paste," "undo," redo," and more complex functions that require a combination of more than two keys.

We are also developing advanced integrations with software such as Adobe programs (Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom, After Effect)

 

OSC:

All devices and software that accept OSC protocol.

 

Art-Net:

All devices and software that handle this protocol.

 

 

 

 

We designed Mine S according to DFA (design for all), it’s especially useful as an aid for people with disabilities. In fact, the flexibility and the possibility of configuring a layout according to their specific needs is a great benefit because they can use the module with more efficiency and in most cases avoid errors.  

 

 

Mine S is patent pending and Specialwaves has already obtained the ornamental design patent.

 

 

 

 

 

We are a small and creative Italian team who share a passion for tech products and innovation. The Team designed and developed every piece of the Mine S and has the expertise and experience to bring tech products like this into production.

 

Specialwaves is an Italian tech startup. Our goal is to create new and innovative devices with unique interface designs, user-friendly appeal,  and customizable, updatable options that fit the needs of a large and growing community.

 

The idea was born, as the best ideas are,  from our shared passion for music. One of our founders enjoyed DJing and producing music at home, but he soon realized that there were no controllers on the market that satisfied his unique needs. Many controllers didn’t include the potentiometers and encoders that he needed or the arrangement of those controls were not formatted in a user-friendly way. He knew that others like him were probably experiencing the same problems and would benefit from a tailored human interface for controlling their favorite software. Not only would a fully customizable controller help DJs, but it would also be essential for producers, VJs, lighting technicians, musicians, broadcasters, video/photo editors and more. Thus the Mine S was born! We know you’re going to love it as much as we do.

Mine S can even configure the module features in an advanced and precise way (i.e. linear or logarithmic curve), saving that particular configuration so you can use it later when you need it again.  Many of you are multi-talented and need diverse applications for various jobs - even for different kinds of software. Luckily the Mine S can accommodate you, controlling lights today, and your VJ set tomorrow!    Mine S is versatile enough for all preprogrammed and last minute requests. For example, you can control a music or video track before a theatre or arena event, or add one or more channels for controlling a new effect - like a fog machine -  in a live set. Your creativity knows no bounds!  With Mine S you can create a unique control surface that matches perfectly with the layout of the software are you using, eliminating user error that comes from switching back and forth from device to screen! 
 
Mine S comes with its own proprietary, intuitive Controller Editor software, which is compatible with most music, VJing, laser show, lighting software, and video/photo editing programs, providing for advanced control of connected modules and protocols. 
 
Users often require an advanced setup in order to fulfill complex tasks. Many controllers on the market are hard to personalize because they are pre-programmed to work in only one way, but often users need different workflow features compared to the one installed by the manufacturer.
 
With Mine S you can quickly and efficiently configure each module and its functions. For example, you can set up the brightness and colors of the LEDs, the speed and incremental value of the encoders, and the curve of action of the slider and pots.

 
Mine S can communicate via different protocols: MIDI, HID, OSC, DMX, and the Art-net protocol. You can even control more than one software and/or protocol at a time for maximum flexibility and fluid transition from one task to the next. 
 
Mine S is powered by a USB connection, so it’s easy to use with any computer. You can also use the Mine S external power supply if you’re using a lot of high-power consumption modules, which will also make the LED lights on the modules brighter. Otherwise, Mine S will automatically reduce the brightness of LEDs, saving energy. 
 
Since the Mine S is compact and designed for the most efficiency in the smallest amount of space, you don’t need a lot of room to use it, making it perfect for any size professional or home studio. Live event spaces can also sometimes be cramped depending on what other equipment is there and how many people you’re working with, but Mine S seamlessly fits in with your workspace whether that’s a play in a church basement or a big game in an arena filled with thousands of people.

 
Since you can swap out and in any modules you want, it also means that you can replace broken ones on the fly when needs be. That’s a “lifesaver” at a live event.
 
The Mine S is fully compatible with many pieces of software on the market since it speaks to a lot of protocols. Here are some examples of the most popular: MIDI software:
Ableton Live
Pro Tools
Logic Pro
Sonar Cakewalk
FL Studio
Bitwig
Reaper
Cubase
Traktor
Serato
Virtual DJ
Acid Pro
Digital Performer
Reason
Final Scratch
Garage Band
Samplitude
Sequoia
Studio One
Mixxx
GarageBand
Finale
QLAB
Resolume Arena
ArKaos Grand VJ
Modul8
MadMapper
Pangolin Beyond We are also developing advanced integrations with software such as Ableton, Bitwig, Virtual Dj, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Pro Tools, and more. MIDI Hardware (MIDI IN & OUT Ports)
All devices that accept a MIDI Input & Output (Synths, Keyboards, Expanders, Fireworks, etc.) DMX:
All pieces of software that support an open DMX USB device (at the moment, we've tested on ENTEC OPEN DMX USB). Through this system, you can control LED PARs, moving heads, lasers, fog machines, dimmers, and all devices that have a DMX input. HID:
Potentially, any software you have on your PC or Mac. You can use Mine S to speed up your work (e.g. CAD, sketching, drawing, text editing, browsing, etc.) by inserting frequently used shortcuts such as "copy," "paste," "undo," redo," and more complex functions that require a combination of more than two keys.
We are also developing advanced integrations with software such as Adobe programs (Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom, After Effect) OSC:
All devices and software that accept OSC protocol. Art-Net:
All devices and software that handle this protocol.
 
 
 
 We designed Mine S according to DFA (design for all), it’s especially useful as an aid for people with disabilities. In fact, the flexibility and the possibility of configuring a layout according to their specific needs is a great benefit because they can use the module with more efficiency and in most cases avoid errors.   








 
Mine S is patent pending and Specialwaves has already obtained the ornamental design patent.
 
 
 

  We are a small and creative Italian team who share a passion for tech products and innovation. The Team designed and developed every piece of the Mine S and has the expertise and experience to bring tech products like this into production.
 

Specialwaves is an Italian tech startup. Our goal is to create new and innovative devices with unique interface designs, user-friendly appeal,  and customizable, updatable options that fit the needs of a large and growing community. The idea was born, as the best ideas are,  from our shared passion for music. One of our founders enjoyed DJing and producing music at home, but he soon realized that there were no controllers on the market that satisfied his unique needs. Many controllers didn’t include the potentiometers and encoders that he needed or the arrangement of those controls were not formatted in a user-friendly way. He knew that others like him were probably experiencing the same problems and would benefit from a tailored human interface for controlling their favorite software. Not only would a fully customizable controller help DJs, but it would also be essential for producers, VJs, lighting technicians, musicians, broadcasters, video/photo editors and more. Thus the Mine S was born! We know you’re going to love it as much as we do.

story:
The Timekettle Team announced that it has been named a CES® 2021 Innovation Awards Honoree for its Timekettle M2 Translator Earbuds in the Wearable Technologies category.

Back in 2017, our WT2 campaign launched with tremendous success - the world's most intelligent live translator that enthralled nearly 300K users across the globe. It's currently one of the best-selling translators on Amazon to date.

We listened to our user's experiences to see if we could up our game. After some fine-tuning, we are back with a fully immersive and highly sophisticated pair of earbuds capable of pumping out Hi-Fi music and interpreting many different languages offline. It is a complete answer to your translation needs - the Timekettle M2.

Using WiFi or a cellular network, M2 can translate up to 40 languages, including 93 unique accents. Why 93 accents, you may ask? We understand that not one country has one generalized accent (you'll already know this if you've met a Newyorker in Cali!). To bridge the gap between dialects, Timekettle M2 ensures recognition accuracy is high, allowing you to converse effortlessly wherever you are.

 

Another exciting feature is our Offline Speech Translation technology, which allows you to translate between English and Spanish, French, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, and Russian:

No longer will you be traveling abroad, scrambling for WiFi to ask a simple question in the train station to the airport. With Offline Speech Translation, you’ll be fully prepared to get the answers you need to make your journey hassle-free!

 

Scroll to "HOW TO ENABLE OFFLINE TRANSLATION" at the bottom of the page.

 

Advanced Engineering

The Timekettle M2 embraces the most advanced technology, and did we mention its highly fashionable style designed for extended wear and comfort?

40 Supported Languages and 93 Accents with WiFi/Data Access

Find out the entire language list in alphabetical order at the bottom of the page.

 

Multifunctional

Our versatile translator is also a fully immersive lifestyle product that can be used to take phone calls and listen to music too!

User Friendly

Turn on the M2 to instantly reconnect to your smartphone in the blink of an eye with Bluetooth 5.0. Play your favorite style of music, or conveniently switch to our app whenever you need to translate with ease.

Touch Mode

For two-way conversations, simply tap the force sensor to activate voice pick-up to simultaneously translate all your spoken sentences. At the tap of a button, feel the freedom to have a natural conversation with friends or business partners from different nationalities.

Lesson Mode

Can you imagine being able to understand instantly what is being said during a lecture or presentation in another language? The M2 captures speech from your surroundings with astonishing clarity so you can quietly listen to translations without disturbing other attendees.

In another country and want to understand the local news? Use the M2 to understand what is being said instantly. It can also be used for movies and general TV!

 

Speaker Mode

A perfect addition as a travel essential - M2 makes you feel safe and confident when communicating in a foreign language. Need to ask for directions, the M2 has you covered. Want to order food or purchase a product, the M2 can translate your questions directly through your phone speaker!

Reviews

Don't just take our word for it. Find out what others say about us!

Powered By Qualcomm

The Timekettle M2 delivers an intelligent, high-responsive playback while delivering a consistent and reliable connection to any device with Qualcomm Bluetooth 5.0 chip.

The aptX Audio Codec Compression offers incredible sound transmission to make sure you get the very most from your music.

We've all been there. The audio just lacks quality and clarity on some Bluetooth headphones or speakers—even those times while watching Netflix. The Bluetooth speaker seems out of sync with the movie.
  Well, With aptX audio technology, you'll never miss a moment as it provides clear, crisp and perfectly in sync audio direct to your earbuds.

 

Ergonomic Design For The Perfect Fit

The most universally appealing ergonomic curvature that fits securely and comfortably in the ear - even when you are singing. Check out "Rain On Me" - Macy Kate Cover.

 

Outstanding Longlasting Performance

The M2 supports up to 6 hours of listening and translating on a single charge - plus a whopping 24 hours of extra battery with our wireless charging case. That's longer than any translator out there!

Sweatproof

The Timekettle M2 features an IPX4 sweat- and water-resistant rating for the unpredictables, including the rain.

 

Impressively Superior

iOS & Android Compatible

*Supporting systems: Android 7.0 and above / iOS 11.0 and above

Tech Specs

General

Qualcomm Bluetooth 5.0

IPX4 Waterproof

Temperature - 68°F to 113°F (-20°C to 45°C)

Connections

Timekettle M2: Bluetooth 4.2 and above, Up to 20m (free space)

Charging Case: Type-C charging cable

Audio

Qualcomm aptX Audio Codec

Battery Life

With Charging Case: around 30 hours of listening and translating

Single charge: Up to 6 hours of listening and translating, or up to 5 hours of calling

Recharge: 90 minutes for both Charging Case and Earbuds

ALL Stretch Goals Unlocked

Offline translation between English and Spanish is now available for FREE (For backers who placed their order before 10th of August, 2020 ONLY).

We will include an extra Timekettle Custom Design T-shirt in your package. (For backers who placed their order before 10th of August, 2020 ONLY).

And a Timekettle brandard carrying bag TOO! (For backers who placed their order before 10th of August, 2020 ONLY).

Share With Your Friends

Production Ready

We are excited to share with you that our trial production has already begun; all we need now is your support and funding to get it to mass production!

Development & Delivery

Timekettle History

Our first launch of the WT2 in-ear translator campaign on Kickstarter in September 2017 was fully funded and managed to rack up a total of $276,869 from 1640 backers. Then came our second campaign - ZERO: Reinventing the Translator - For Everyone. Before we knew it, the ZERO was the most-backed translator in the world.

Next, we continued to use our expertise from creating the WT2 Plus and ZERO, to offer a truly intelligent device like never before, the TimeKettle M2.

A device that allows you to translate 40 languages instantaneously with unique technology to decode 93 accents, ensuring you receive perfect translation every time. Our latest model will enable you to take phone calls and listen to high-quality music, and now with the added option to translate six languages offline. Not to mention the irresistible, super-affordable price is just a bonus.

 

Award-Winning Design Team

With Best-in-Class designers and engineers at the helm of our product - the WT2 Plus won the coveted 2018 iF Design award, CES 2019 Innovation Award, 2019 Japan Good Design award, and the 2019 IDEA award.

 

How To Enable Offline Translation

All Timekettle M2 translator earbuds support the online translation of 40 languages and 93 accents. To access the offline translation, you need to purchase the separate Offline Speech Translation (50% OFF) offered during checkout as Add-On Perk. 

Step 1. Select a perk

Step 2. Add Offline Speech Translation​

Step 3.  You can then proceed to the checkout to complete the payment after selecting the Early Bird perk and the Offline Speech Translation.​

 

Contact Us

If you have any further questions about the Timekettle M2 

feel free to reach out to us:

For General Inquiries: support@timekettle.co

Timekettle Website: www.timekettle.co

Join our Facebook group for the most updated news!

Timekettle M2 Language Supported

story:
==============================================================

Thank you all for your overwhelming support in the past 2 months!! We could never be this far without all your support! 

Even though our campaign has ended, you can still get your PocketDrum set at InDemand and we are working with many other channels to make sure you can always get your most portable drum set in the future. 

We are working on fulfillment right now, and we will ship your PocketDrum in November!

Again, great thanks for all your support！

Don't forget to follow us on Facebook and get the newest update for your PocketRing!!!!

==============================================================

The PocketDrum is your personal, portable drumkit! Bluetooth-enabled drumsticks connect to our AeroBand App and allow you to add rhythm to your life, anywhere you go. Learn the basics of rhythm, jam freely, or play along with the app, all without the burden of a full drumkit.

 

 

The PocketDrum is the perfect solution of professionals and amateurs alike. A Portable, Noiseless, practical pair of drumsticks that allow you to play and practice the drums anywhere you go. The Bluetooth enabled sticks to connect wirelessly to your AeroBand App, which gives you access to a CRASH CYMBAL, CLOSED HI-HAT, BASS DRUM, SNARE, and HIGH TOM, ( Cowbell and more Cymbals to come!).

 

PocketDrum is extremely easy to set up, with no camera or surface setup needed.

The highly reactive PocketDrum (latency of only 6ms) vibrates with each hit, with different vibrations based on the bounce of drum and force of the hit. The drums also deliver different sounds based on the force of the hit, allowing you to better control your dynamics.

 

 

Enjoy 10 hours of continuous play, with one battery charge, using three modes on your PocketDrum app including Tutorial, Free Mode, and Game Mode. Increase your skill anywhere, anytime with PocketDrum!

 

When PocketDrum meets the professional!
 

By learning and working with the musical and technological professionals, we want to provide you the most realistic sound & drumming experience when you use PocketDrum

 

 

A rhythmic LED beam corresponds with your playing and lights up each time your PocketDrum hits a drum. Like the vibrations, the lights will dynamically reflect the intensity of your drumming, glowing brighter when hit harder and less bright when played softly.

 

The PocketDrum vibrates differently for each drum and varies its intensity based on how hard you are playing. The harder or softer you play, the PocketDrum responds with a corresponding vibration, which allows you to better focus on the dynamics of your drumming.

 

Each drum is set to a different sound, CRASH CYMBAL, CLOSED HI-HAT, BASS DRUM, SNARE, and HIGH TOM, (Cowbell and more Cymbal to come!), so you know which drum you’re hitting and when. Each drum will also respond to the intensity at which you hit the drum.
 

PocketDrum only has a 6ms latency from when you hit the drum to when the sound is triggered. This is 76.6% lower than all other competitors. What this means is that PocketDrum feels like the real thing!

 

 

Check out the professional drumming starting at TIME[4:03]!
 
 

 

 

We achieve our technology though our specific Inertial AI chip and our unique space calculating algorithm. These core technologies make PocketDrum be able to capture your movement in 3-dimensional space with accuracy and know exactly which drum you are drumming at and how hard you drum so that PocketDrum could bring you the real and instant vibration feedback that boosts your virtual drumming experience to the next level!

 

 

 

Follow the rhythms provided to get comfortable with drumming. The perfect start point for non-drummers, find the rhythm that's in us all!

 

Create your own rhythms and play to the beat of your own drum!

 

Game time! Test your ability to follow the beat, challenge your friends in a vs. mode, and share your score online.

Game time, beat your friends on speed and accuracy!

 

 

 

 

 

 

A whole set comes with:
✔ 2 PocketDrum Sticks | ✔ Charger | ✔ Wrist Lanyard | ✔ Stick Case
| ✔ Instruction Manual | ✔ Medal card

The team includes 3 full-time hardware developers, one hardware project manager who has 10 years experience, four software developers, and one product manager who strictly controls the product quality. Besides our team, we have thousands of fans who were attracted by our first product, PocketGuitar, who provide useful suggestions from the users’ aspect, helping the PocketDrum become better.

 

 

 

 

PocketGuitar takes air guitar to the next level! A Bluetooth-enabled guitar pick allows you to play and invisible guitar while connected to the AeroBand app. Strum or pick using PocketGuitar with your phone as your fretboard. Just like PocketDrum, you can play in three different modes, learn songs, play freehand, or challenge yourself and friends in-game mode!

Learn, play, and sing along with your PocketGuitar with EASE!!!!

ONLY Available in Aeroband Classic Set

Check out how to play and sing along with your PocketGuitar!

PocketRing, currently in development, will be the third instrument as part of the AeroBand family. PocketRing is a ring you put on your finger to play the piano in the air. Similar to the PocketDrum and PocketGuitar, you'll seamlessly be able to learn piano, play your favorite songs, and challenge yourself and friends all through the AeroBand app!

 

 

To catch on our schedule shipping starting in this following November, we have finished our product validation and the Mould Production has been completed, We are stepping into our Mass Production Stage!!

 

If you like PocketDrum,

join us and help us spread PocketDrum to your family, friends and the rest of the world!

​

 

All backers are automatically in！

All you need to do is to simply SHARE our campaign!

 

The following two methods will automatically generate your unique Referral Link within your facebook/twitter post!

  • Whenever someone pledges using your link you will get +1 point!!

  • The more you share, the higher points you will get, and the higher the chance you are gonna win!!

 

Simply Copy and paste the link to your facebook, twitter, reddit or anywhere with large views

 

 Whenever someone pledges you, will you get +1 point that gives you a higher chance of winning the Prizes! 

To be fair, we will use a third-party service provider Random Picker (https://randompicker.com) to draw our 14 lucky winners with ONE(1) first prize, THREE(3) second prizes, and TEN(10) third prizes.

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We sincerely thanks for all the support you have given to us.

 

Cheers.

Aeroband Team

PocketGuitar takes air guitar to the next level! A Bluetooth-enabled guitar pick allows you to play and invisible guitar while connected to the AeroBand app. Strum or pick using PocketGuitar with your phone as your fretboard. Just like PocketDrum, you can play in three different modes, learn songs, play freehand, or challenge yourself and friends in-game mode!
Learn, play, and sing along with your PocketGuitar with EASE!!!! 


ONLY Available in Aeroband Classic Set

Check out how to play and sing along with your PocketGuitar!

PocketRing, currently in development, will be the third instrument as part of the AeroBand family. PocketRing is a ring you put on your finger to play the piano in the air. Similar to the PocketDrum and PocketGuitar, you'll seamlessly be able to learn piano, play your favorite songs, and challenge yourself and friends all through the AeroBand app!
 


 

To catch on our schedule shipping starting in this following November, we have finished our product validation and the Mould Production has been completed, We are stepping into our Mass Production Stage!!


 


If you like PocketDrum,
join us and help us spread PocketDrum to your family, friends and the rest of the world!
​
 

All backers are automatically in！
All you need to do is to simply SHARE our campaign!
 
The following two methods will automatically generate your unique Referral Link within your facebook/twitter post!

Whenever someone pledges using your link you will get +1 point!!

The more you share, the higher points you will get, and the higher the chance you are gonna win!!




 

Simply Copy and paste the link to your facebook, twitter, reddit or anywhere with large views
 
 Whenever someone pledges you, will you get +1 point that gives you a higher chance of winning the Prizes! 
To be fair, we will use a third-party service provider Random Picker (https://randompicker.com) to draw our 14 lucky winners with ONE(1) first prize, THREE(3) second prizes, and TEN(10) third prizes.
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We sincerely thanks for all the support you have given to us.
 
Cheers.
Aeroband Team

story:
After a successful Kickstarter, we now continue our campaign on Indiegogo!

 

alter.audio are proud to announce their first machine for DJs and musicians - "We want to merge live performing with the DJ artform."

Timetosser enables you to playfully reorder any kind of musical input in real-time. The power is at your fingertips to instantly add variety to your tracks and loops. Just connect any audio source and you're good to go!  

 

 

Timetosser is for everyone who is interested in finger drumming and performing live with electronic gear. Because it works as a standalone device, it's just plug and play.
 

Audio input can come from any source, making Timetosser integrate well in any situation. Use it in a DJ-setup, in the studio or on stage in a live set.

 

 

The novelty of Timetosser lies in the way it is used: the user is not simply enabling an effect, but has to actively and skillfully play the instrument. Although it takes some practice to master, the live-performance aspect of Timetosser ultimately gives artists greater expression in their performances. 

 

Features

  • Dimensions: 200mm x 120mm x 25mm
  • Weight: 380 grams 
  • Powder coated aluminium hardtop casing
  • 16x full colour LED backlit key switches 
  • 60 FPS smooth animation feedback CPU
  • 180 MHz 32-bit ARM micro controller for real-time audio analysis and smooth visual feedback 
  • Digital audio: Up to 24-bit / 192 KHz low noise, high quality codec
  • USB connection for use as controller and audio interface 
  • Dual purpose sync input: Tempo sync to MIDI and analog gear
  • MIDI OUT: Send detected tempo or external sync as midi clock

Tempo sync

 

In order to let Timetosser be aware of the tempo of the incoming music, you have different options. The first option is to use the tap-tempo key to tap along with the beat. Timetosser will actively listen to the music and track the tempo, making sure that it stays in sync with the beat.

Another option is to sync to MIDI-clock. By connecting the supplied mini-jack to DIN-5 adapter cable to the MIDI/Sync IN input, Timetosser is able to synchronise to an incoming MIDI-clock signal.

The sync input also supports analog gate voltages. Just connect your gate signal to the sync input directly.

Having both a MIDI-input and output means these will be usable from within your DAW software when Timetosser is connected to your computer. But the true advantage comes when Timetosser is used in standalone-mode. Since Timetosser detects the tempo of the incoming audio, the MIDI-output can be used to send out that tempo. This means you can synchronise your MIDI-gear and have them play in time with anything you feed into Timetosser. We’re very excited about the possibilities this brings: blur the lines between DJing and live performing by having synths and drum machines play alongside your tracks!

 

 

Timetosser audio plugin / USB connectivity

 

Besides being a standalone device, Timetosser can also be connected to your computer. This way, it becomes a USB audio interface and controller for the Timetosser audio plugin (VST & AU). 

The audio plugin is a virtual Timetosser that can be dropped as an effect on an audio track in your DAW. One of up to eight plugin instances can be selected and controlled from the hardware unit. 

 

 

Timetosser's firmware can be upgraded through USB with the application that will be downloadable from the alter.audio website.

What's in the box?

 

1 x alter.audio Timetosser

1 x Quickstart guide

1 x USB cable (Timetosser is USB powered)

2 x DIN-5 to mini jack MIDI adapter cable (type B)

1 x Custom Timetosser travel case

 

 

Who's talking about Timetosser?

 

 

Product Development

 

Aww yeah!! Hard work pays off! We still have some tweaking to do, but after months of coding, soldering, blood, sweat and tears we are ready to present the new prototype along with its powder coated aluminum top casing and full colour interface! Here's how it all went down... 

 

2007 - Proof of concept

 

Watch one of many preliminary jams in the video below :) If you listen closely, you can hear some clicks in the audio. Of course they have all been fixed and the design has been completely updated, both inside and out!

 

 

2011 - First sketch and mock-up on model concept
 
 
 
2016 - 3D concept rendering and testing
 
 
 
 
 
 
2017 - 2019 Further development of PCB and Timetosser casing
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Timeline

You can find our current project timeline estimate below. Of course this may be subject to change, especially due to the long lead times on some electronics components.

 

July/August 2020

  • Finalise Timetosser housing design
  • Finalise Timetosser firmware and hardware
  • Order electronics components 
  • Order plastic and aluminium tooling

September/October 2020

  • Finalise and test PCB infrastructure
  • Finalise packaging design
  • Testing and start manufacturing of Timetosser casings 

November/December 2020

  • Start electronic production and assembly 
  • Setup production and QC checks

January 2021

  • Submit Timetosser audio plugin to platform 
  • Ship alter.audio Timetosser to backers

 

 

About alter.audio

The idea came to Tim back in his student days when he was fiddling around with the music software package “Reason”. After developing a VST-plugin incorporating this concept, he decided to build a standalone hardware prototype for his graduation project at the HKU in 2007. His (Dutch) thesis about the underlying principle can be found here. 

Although it more or less worked, it was a very basic and crude device. Oscar, being an industrial designer and a flatmate of Tim at the time, was playing a lot with it and became enthusiastic about developing it further.  Years later, the idea was still very much alive between the two of us and with the advent of things like crowdfunding and 3D-printing, we decided that building an improved, more sleeker prototype was something we should definitely do. After spending many evenings after work, we managed to produce two prototypes that were more up to date. Because we were still experimenting, one had RCA-connectors, while the other had jack-plugs.

 

 

Why crowdfunding?

In October 2017 we went on our first public show at Amsterdam Dance Event. This festival turned out to be a turning point for us, as it was our true introduction to a growing worldwide music scene. Because we received so much positive response, we grew a lot more confident in Timetosser's potential. It's features were still open for discussion, so meeting people involved in the music industry proved to be very useful as a resource for new ideas and further improvements. 

After ADE, things really picked up and alter.audio was getting official. Timetosser traveled the world to get reviewed by several renowned DJ's and musicians, from who we received terrific feedback. Multiple parties took an interest in Timetosser, but after our experiences at the Sonar 2018 Startup Garden we became certain that launching a crowdfunding campaign was the way to go. We have collected all feedback,  implemented many ideas for improvement and created a production-ready prototype. Now we are ready. It is time to get Timetosser made! 

 

 

 

 
 

We Would Love Your Support

The alter.audio Timetosser is almost a reality! Please support alter.audio and join us in the most exciting project of our lives :)

 

Follow us on Instagram

Follow us on Facebook

Follow us on Twitter

Join our mailing list

 

 

Partners

Made in Belgium, designed and engineered in the Netherlands. 

Timetosser is being made with European quality by working with JTC Micro Electronics as our production partner. JTC has over 20 years of experience in PCB assembly for heavy duty appliances, including military guidance systems and public traffic control. As such, JTC is able to deliver top-notch reliable systems with excellent durability. 

 

Risks and challenges

While we have years of professional experience designing and creating products, setting up our own company is a new endeavour for us. We are well-informed and have great people helping us, including people who have successfully delivered a crowdfunding project before. The delivery date mentioned with each of the rewards is an indication, not a promise. Every Timetosser consists of many components. If any of these components becomes unavailable or has stocking issues, we might have to push back the delivery date. We have a list of alternative distributors for most of the components to avoid this issue, but there are still parts for which we rely on one source. We endeavour to make Timetosser a high-quality product that meets (and hopefully exceeds) your expectations and we will do our best to get it to you on time. 

 

Environmental commitments

 

Long-lasting design

Timetosser is built to last. All components are handpicked and designed to withstand extensive use and time.

Green banking

Triodos is our bank. Triodos finances progressive entrepreneurs and influences the banking sector to become more transparent, diverse and sustainable. By buying a Timetosser you are sure to not indirectly finance any sketchy projects. Triodos: "Our financial and banking services are for savers, investors and organisations who want to change the world for the better. Our customers are already playing their part in our positive movement, making us one of the world’s most sustainable banks."
