story:
World's Smallest, Mobile Mixer and USB-C Audio Interface

PortCaster™ is the World's Smallest, Mobile Mixer and USB-C Audio Interface. It's designed for content creators, who record or live-stream to Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitch, and other platforms. It makes it easy to add music, sound effects and guests to your podcast or stream.

About the size of a passport, this product is very portable, so it's great for any type of recording, especially when traveling. It's Made in USA and for a limited time it's very affordable!

 

 

PortCaster offers four channels of audio mixing and easy connections to professional XLR microphones, smartphones and other sources; it uses advanced technology that allows the user to control the podcast, add live vocal sources and sound effects through a comprehensive set of production controls. PortCaster easily connects to most cameras for video work.

 

Focus on Sound Quality

There are over a million podcasts today and that number is constantly growing. With this much competition, how are you supposed to stand out from the crowd? The answer is simple — improve what really matters — the sound quality.

 

Most podcasters use their phone to record and stream, but you know better. Let's face it, your phone has a great camera, but its built-in microphone leaves much to be desired. That's because the mic in the smartphone is designed primarily for phone calls and not for pristine quality recordings. The resulting audio can have drop-outs,  sound muddy and lack clarity.  None of this helps when you are trying to get your point across!

 

Same with USB Mics. They try to be the jack of all trades. They pack features and gimmicks for at a low price. Designers have to use cost reduction and that results in extra noise in the recordings. The best way to achive great sound quality is to use a professional mic and a great preamp with A/D converter. That's where PortCaster comes in.

 

Managing a live show is stressful enough. PortCaster is designed to improve sound quality and bring that stress way down. It is loaded with features to make your job easier. And that lets you focus on what matters -- your content, your guests and your audience.

 

Connect Like Never Before

PortCaster helps you connect online with higher audio quality. Core applications of the product are Livestreaming, Storytelling, Web meetings and Worship. We already have customers in all of these areas and they are very happy with the existing product called MixerFace. PortCaster takes that a step forward.

 

 

 

 

 

Core Features

PortCaster is loaded with professional features that make your job easier as a podcaster, VO or a live streamer. From our amazingly quiet Jasmine mic preamps, to Mix-minus for remote calls, to the long lasting, rechargeable battery, to the built-in SD card recorder, you simply won't find this much value anywhere else! Here is quick glance at the core features. 

 

Mix-Minus Feature

PortCaster includes a special feature call-in radio hosts use when taking phone calls. It's called Mix-Minus and it works to prevent annoying audio feedback from traveling back to the caller through the phone line. Mix-Minus is available in big radio station equipment, but until now, was unheard of in this price range.

 

The best part of PortCaster is that you don't need to be a recording engineer to use this feature. Just connect your phone to via a 3.5mm TRRS cable, and you're all set!

 

Remote Guests

Now you can have a remote guest join you over the phone! You can use iPhone, iPad or Android devices to connect remote guests. They can also join you over Facetime, Zoom, Webex, etc.

 

 

PortCaster employs sophisticated electronics to handle the mixing for a phone call, letting you relax and focus on delivering your best performance as a podcast host!

 

Local Guests

Of course, if your guest is local, you can have them join you in person. Stream live together, and take advantage of both XLR inputs and 48V phantom, to power your favorite mics.

 

 

PortCaster features the improved version of our acclaimed Jasmine Mic Preamp, which now delivers 65 dB of clean, low-noise gain and handles the most demanding microphones with ease!

 

Instagram Knob

Let's face it, Instagram™ is a great streaming platform, but there is one drawback — the sound is mono. Until now this has been very frustrating, because most people are accustomed to creating programs in stereo. When you stream a stereo program to Instagram, it only takes the left channel, so anything on the right channel is lost forever. If you had your guest on the right channel, they will not make it to your Instagram stream. 

 

 

PortCaster fixes all that! It has a special MONO knob that takes your Left and Right outputs and sums them to perfect MONO, so that nothing is lost and all of your audio makes it to its final destination. What a relief!

 

Music Knob

PortCaster makes it easy to add music of sound effects to any podcast. We've built-in a line-level input jack and a conveniently located MUSIC knob. This lets you mix in background music or effects from another device.

 

 

Let's say you have an MP3 player laying around. Use it to play your jingle as you introduce the podcast or to play the background music for the entire duration! Use it to play applause, or any other sound effects — the possibilities are endless!

 

Follow the Pros

From Broadway to Hollywood, entertainment professionals rely on CEntrance for sound quality and innovation. What makes a radio station sound good? Consistently clear audio. After years of making recording and broadcast equipment for the pros, we know what it takes to give you that special edge. We know what it means to cut through the noise and make your podcast stand out. These are the few of the radio stations, which use CEntrance equipment:

 

 

CEntrance is well-known in the Voiceover world. Who-is-who of the VO narration community uses our products. Here are some of the top VO artists, who endorse CEntrance:

 

Sound like a professional with PortCaster. Its high-quality circuitry and uncompromising design  will elevate your sound to broadcast studio-level, dramatically improving your production values! Caution: Not a plastic toy! PortCaster delivers solid results!

 

Built on the Acclaimed MixerFace

Our own MixerFace™ took the audio recording world by storm when it  launched in 2017.  It sold thousands of units and was reviewed in the best music publications. It's used at CNN, ESPN an other stations around the world. We received dozens of unsolicited endorsements from the biggest musicians and broadcasters. Just look at the happy faces below!

 

 

MixerFace™ features a rechargeable battery. It turns any smartphone into a portable live-streaming device, with 24-bit/192 kHz audio quality.  It is popular for on-the-go content creation and is often called "The Swiss Army Knife of Audio". As more customers began using MixerFace to create talk shows, they requested an easy way to add a live caller to the podcast. With PortCaster, CEntrance made it easy for a caller to join you on the phone.

 

Special Unveiling!

The first-ever live stream using PortCaster was a very special event. Legendary Musician and Artist, George Clinton of Parliament-Funkadelic, premiered his new art collection in a conversation with Perez Art Museum Miami! The show was streamed live on Youtube and we are very proud to say that George Clinton, who likes our products, chose the PortCaster to handle the sound for the event! A prominent Video producer, DJ and Tech Wizard, DJ Ace was working this live stream. Kudos to him for making it sound so great with PortCaster.

 

George Clinton is regarded as one of the foremost innovators of funk music. In 1997, he and Parliament-Funkadelic were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and then, in 2019, were honored with the pinnacle Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.

 

 

Here is the link if you want to watch the livestream:  George Clinton Livestream.

 

But Wait, There is More!

Here is a truly special opportunity that comes around once in a lifetime. George Clinton has graciously agreed to paint a pair of CEntrance headphones (which he likes), for a special giveaway! We've seen the end result, it's a work of art! Here is George, actually painting the headphones:

 

So here is the connection to our campaign. We will be giving away these one-of-a-kind, museum piece headphones to one lucky winner among the first 200 people who back the campaign, so hurry to get your name in the hat*! You have to act fast in order to be among the first 200 people to sign up. We will announce the winner once we have 200 backers.

 

We are so jealous! Some R&B and Hip-hop music fan out there is about to get very lucky!

 

Amazing Perks

We have prepared amazing perks for you! Enjoy great savings on PortCaster, but act quick, because the best deals won't last. Each price tier has only 50 pcs available and the price will go up as soon as 50 pcs are depleted. We are offering two models in this campaign:

 

 

- PortCaster R4M (Mobile Broadcasting Interface) model offers great analog and digital technology and also, a rechargeable battery, so you can record anywhere. Retail price of this model is set at $299.99

 

 

- PortCaster R4D (Digital Broadcasting Interface) model  offers all that, plus a built-in micro SD Card recorder, so you don't even need a phone to record. Retail price of this model is set at $399.99

 

 

But wait, there is more! We have also prepared matching headphones and microphones! Our acclaimed Cerene dB headphones are in demand by audiophiles and musicians alike. They are very comfortable to wear and feature transparent, natural sound — great for working on audio or just kicking back and enjoying the tunes.

 

 

Our custom PivotMic XY stereo microphones come in a precision-matched pair. They feature low-noise, cardioid, directional capsules with Japanese technology, and 20Hz...30kHz frequency response. Both are available for immediate shipment.

 

We designed our headphones and microphones to be compatible with both MixerFace and PortCaster. If you decide to choose PortCaster with headphones,  you can start enjoying the headphones right away, while you wait for the fulfillment of the main perk.

 

Full Feature List

All PortCaster models make it easy to record a high-quality remote interview using any cell phone or tablet. Just connect the USB-C audio jack and use the phone to record or stream!

 

In the R4D model, the interview can also be recorded onto the SD-card. The built-in 24-bit/48kHz stereo recorder in the R4D model offers “One-Touch Record”.  Capture the program locally, while simultaneously streaming online, for an unmatched level of flexibility.

 

 

All this functionality is available in a portable unit, no larger than a passport. PortCaster measures  only 121 mm (4.76″) (L), 70 mm (2.76″) (W), 36 mm (1.42″) (H).

 

An internal, rechargeable battery (R4M, R4D models) charges from any USB jack and this sets PortCaster apart from other portable audio interfaces. Two built-in boutique mic preamps allow connecting up to two microphones or one mic plus a remote guest over the phone.

 

The updated Jasmine™ mic preamps feature 48V Phantom and 65dB of clean gain, making it easy to connect any microphone, including the acclaimed Shure SM7B. To help better control recording levels, PortCaster offers soft-knee, analog, optical limiters for both Host and the Guest, for a truly professional sound. Analog limiters right at the inputs are superior to their digital counterparts, because they can catch the audio peaks before they get to the A/D converter. If distortion comes through all the way to the A/D converter, it will be recorded this way and no digital processor can fix that.

PortCaster is designed for live broadcasting and features easy and intuitive operation. It uses tactile analog controls, which are laid out logically and can be accessed without looking, which is important for a busy host, who is running the show and managing the guest at the same time.

 

Built Tough

To help survive the stress of a live show, PortCaster is made of aircraft aluminum and purposely avoids any distracting screens or complicated menus. You can run over it with a car (we did) and your PortCaster will continue to work! You cannot do this with cheap plastic imitations! Professional-grade reliability means your product will deliver many years of quality service. 

 

 

Goes Anywhere You Go

PortCaster fits in the pocket, allowing you to travel light and have the piece of mind that you can create content anywhere inspiration strikes you.

 

 

PortCaster vs. Alternatives

As far as specs are concerned, PortCaster is superior in pretty much every dimension. It can work with any microphone and has less noise than devices costing twice as much. It's smaller than a typical field recorder and features a rechargeable battery, so you can stop spending on AA's. It features easy tactile controls, so you can keep your eyes on the action, not hunting through the menus. Finally, it fits in your pocket, so you can take it anywhere you go. Try doing that with a large mixer!

 

Full Specifications

 

What the Artists Say

Here are some quotes we received from famous artists who use the MixerFace. PortCaster takes that product to next level, by adding features requested by podcasters and live streamers.

 

"What a great little device!" - George Clinton, P-Funk

 

"The Vaccine that fixes bad audio on the Internet!" - Don Lewis, synthesizer pioneer

 

"I love the versatility of this little device!" - Jermaine Bryson, Kool and the Gang

 

"Everything sounded so much better!" - Paul Boutin, Grammy Award-winning recording Engineer, Kenny "BabyFace" Edwards

 

"It solves pretty much every issue on a location shoot" - Michael Moritz, Broadway Producer

 

"Light and easy to travel with, with electronics that doesn't comprise the clarity of sound" - Bluey, Founder, Incognito

"My go-to for practicing and recording on the road" - Will Lee, David Letterman Show, Fab Faux

 

5-Star Reviews

See the kinds of reviews MixerFace has been gathering. PortCaster is based on the MixerFace and it will be even better.

 

In the Press

CEntrance makes products for  recording professionals and audiophile customers. This dual focus allows us to keep our eye on sound quality, while ensuring professional-grade reliability.  Here are some publications, which profiled us over the years:

 

About the Brand

CEntrance develops portable audio devices with exceptional performance and sound quality. The name is pronounced “sentrance” and means “at the core”. Our product line is focused on personal audio, inspiring the tagline: “Making Audio Personal™” and reflecting our dedication to serving customers, quality and perfection. Stereophile Magazine suitably dubbed CEntrance products “Affordable Digital Excellence,” a sign of approval from the renowned "golden ears."

 

Made in USA

CEntrance was born in Chicago  and still makes its products in the USA. Dozens of famous recording artists, producers, sound designers, and broadcasters endorse our products. With our passion for sound rooted in pro audio, we continue doing what we do best – delivering innovative recording and playback products that delight customers with their sound quality and ease-of-use.

 

Development and Delivery

We anticipate the following delivery schedule. PortCaster is based on an existing MixerFace product. All the tooling is already done. Main technology, such as audio and battery charging circuitry, two optical limiters, USB-C interfacing, etc., has already been proven in other products and therefore we don't expect any issues, since there is a lot of reuse.

 

 

R&D is complete and we have prototypes. Campaign funds will go towards purchasing components and mass production.

 

Risks and Challenges

  • This is our 8th crowdfunding project, so we've been through this process before and have thousands of satisfied customers. We have sufficient staff to see things through and ensure customer satisfaction.
  • We build our product in the USA, but like many companies, we source some parts from Asia. This year is special because of travel restrictions, so we have worked extra hard to secure the most reliable suppliers for this project. We have known these partners for over 10 years, so our relationships are strong — this helps to overcome adversity.
  • We are always transparent in our communication with our customers. Expect regular status updates, in which we will share project progress, all the way to shipping date. We like crowdfunding because of the special connection we develop with our customers and this project is not an exception. It will be fun!

 

Other Ways you Can Help

Even if you aren't planning to contribute, we still need your help. Please share about this project with your friends. The more people know about it, the faster we will bring this product to you. Please make some noise on Social media by posting about us on Facebook, Instagram, Linked In, etc.

Indiegogo has some amazing sharing tools, so please use those as well!
story_txt:
World's Smallest, Mobile Mixer and USB-C Audio Interface

PortCaster™ is the World's Smallest, Mobile Mixer and USB-C Audio Interface. It's designed for content creators, who record or live-stream to Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitch, and other platforms. It makes it easy to add music, sound effects and guests to your podcast or stream.
About the size of a passport, this product is very portable, so it's great for any type of recording, especially when traveling. It's Made in USA and for a limited time it's very affordable!
 

 
PortCaster offers four channels of audio mixing and easy connections to professional XLR microphones, smartphones and other sources; it uses advanced technology that allows the user to control the podcast, add live vocal sources and sound effects through a comprehensive set of production controls. PortCaster easily connects to most cameras for video work.
 

Focus on Sound Quality

There are over a million podcasts today and that number is constantly growing. With this much competition, how are you supposed to stand out from the crowd? The answer is simple — improve what really matters — the sound quality.
 
Most podcasters use their phone to record and stream, but you know better. Let's face it, your phone has a great camera, but its built-in microphone leaves much to be desired. That's because the mic in the smartphone is designed primarily for phone calls and not for pristine quality recordings. The resulting audio can have drop-outs,  sound muddy and lack clarity.  None of this helps when you are trying to get your point across!
 
Same with USB Mics. They try to be the jack of all trades. They pack features and gimmicks for at a low price. Designers have to use cost reduction and that results in extra noise in the recordings. The best way to achive great sound quality is to use a professional mic and a great preamp with A/D converter. That's where PortCaster comes in.
 
Managing a live show is stressful enough. PortCaster is designed to improve sound quality and bring that stress way down. It is loaded with features to make your job easier. And that lets you focus on what matters -- your content, your guests and your audience.
 

Connect Like Never Before

PortCaster helps you connect online with higher audio quality. Core applications of the product are Livestreaming, Storytelling, Web meetings and Worship. We already have customers in all of these areas and they are very happy with the existing product called MixerFace. PortCaster takes that a step forward.
 

 

 

 

 

Core Features

PortCaster is loaded with professional features that make your job easier as a podcaster, VO or a live streamer. From our amazingly quiet Jasmine mic preamps, to Mix-minus for remote calls, to the long lasting, rechargeable battery, to the built-in SD card recorder, you simply won't find this much value anywhere else! Here is quick glance at the core features. 


 

Mix-Minus Feature

PortCaster includes a special feature call-in radio hosts use when taking phone calls. It's called Mix-Minus and it works to prevent annoying audio feedback from traveling back to the caller through the phone line. Mix-Minus is available in big radio station equipment, but until now, was unheard of in this price range.

 
The best part of PortCaster is that you don't need to be a recording engineer to use this feature. Just connect your phone to via a 3.5mm TRRS cable, and you're all set!
 

Remote Guests

Now you can have a remote guest join you over the phone! You can use iPhone, iPad or Android devices to connect remote guests. They can also join you over Facetime, Zoom, Webex, etc.
 

 
PortCaster employs sophisticated electronics to handle the mixing for a phone call, letting you relax and focus on delivering your best performance as a podcast host!
 

Local Guests

Of course, if your guest is local, you can have them join you in person. Stream live together, and take advantage of both XLR inputs and 48V phantom, to power your favorite mics.
 

 
PortCaster features the improved version of our acclaimed Jasmine Mic Preamp, which now delivers 65 dB of clean, low-noise gain and handles the most demanding microphones with ease!
 

Instagram Knob

Let's face it, Instagram™ is a great streaming platform, but there is one drawback — the sound is mono. Until now this has been very frustrating, because most people are accustomed to creating programs in stereo. When you stream a stereo program to Instagram, it only takes the left channel, so anything on the right channel is lost forever. If you had your guest on the right channel, they will not make it to your Instagram stream. 
 

 
PortCaster fixes all that! It has a special MONO knob that takes your Left and Right outputs and sums them to perfect MONO, so that nothing is lost and all of your audio makes it to its final destination. What a relief!
 

Music Knob

PortCaster makes it easy to add music of sound effects to any podcast. We've built-in a line-level input jack and a conveniently located MUSIC knob. This lets you mix in background music or effects from another device.
 

 
Let's say you have an MP3 player laying around. Use it to play your jingle as you introduce the podcast or to play the background music for the entire duration! Use it to play applause, or any other sound effects — the possibilities are endless!
 

Follow the Pros

From Broadway to Hollywood, entertainment professionals rely on CEntrance for sound quality and innovation. What makes a radio station sound good? Consistently clear audio. After years of making recording and broadcast equipment for the pros, we know what it takes to give you that special edge. We know what it means to cut through the noise and make your podcast stand out. These are the few of the radio stations, which use CEntrance equipment:
 

 
CEntrance is well-known in the Voiceover world. Who-is-who of the VO narration community uses our products. Here are some of the top VO artists, who endorse CEntrance:

 
Sound like a professional with PortCaster. Its high-quality circuitry and uncompromising design  will elevate your sound to broadcast studio-level, dramatically improving your production values! Caution: Not a plastic toy! PortCaster delivers solid results!
 

Built on the Acclaimed MixerFace

Our own MixerFace™ took the audio recording world by storm when it  launched in 2017.  It sold thousands of units and was reviewed in the best music publications. It's used at CNN, ESPN an other stations around the world. We received dozens of unsolicited endorsements from the biggest musicians and broadcasters. Just look at the happy faces below!
 

 
MixerFace™ features a rechargeable battery. It turns any smartphone into a portable live-streaming device, with 24-bit/192 kHz audio quality.  It is popular for on-the-go content creation and is often called "The Swiss Army Knife of Audio". As more customers began using MixerFace to create talk shows, they requested an easy way to add a live caller to the podcast. With PortCaster, CEntrance made it easy for a caller to join you on the phone.
 

Special Unveiling!

The first-ever live stream using PortCaster was a very special event. Legendary Musician and Artist, George Clinton of Parliament-Funkadelic, premiered his new art collection in a conversation with Perez Art Museum Miami! The show was streamed live on Youtube and we are very proud to say that George Clinton, who likes our products, chose the PortCaster to handle the sound for the event! A prominent Video producer, DJ and Tech Wizard, DJ Ace was working this live stream. Kudos to him for making it sound so great with PortCaster.
 
George Clinton is regarded as one of the foremost innovators of funk music. In 1997, he and Parliament-Funkadelic were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and then, in 2019, were honored with the pinnacle Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award.
 

 
Here is the link if you want to watch the livestream:  George Clinton Livestream.
 

But Wait, There is More!

Here is a truly special opportunity that comes around once in a lifetime. George Clinton has graciously agreed to paint a pair of CEntrance headphones (which he likes), for a special giveaway! We've seen the end result, it's a work of art! Here is George, actually painting the headphones:

 
So here is the connection to our campaign. We will be giving away these one-of-a-kind, museum piece headphones to one lucky winner among the first 200 people who back the campaign, so hurry to get your name in the hat*! You have to act fast in order to be among the first 200 people to sign up. We will announce the winner once we have 200 backers.
 
We are so jealous! Some R&B and Hip-hop music fan out there is about to get very lucky!
 

Amazing Perks

We have prepared amazing perks for you! Enjoy great savings on PortCaster, but act quick, because the best deals won't last. Each price tier has only 50 pcs available and the price will go up as soon as 50 pcs are depleted. We are offering two models in this campaign:
 

 
- PortCaster R4M (Mobile Broadcasting Interface) model offers great analog and digital technology and also, a rechargeable battery, so you can record anywhere. Retail price of this model is set at $299.99
 

 
- PortCaster R4D (Digital Broadcasting Interface) model  offers all that, plus a built-in micro SD Card recorder, so you don't even need a phone to record. Retail price of this model is set at $399.99
 

 
But wait, there is more! We have also prepared matching headphones and microphones! Our acclaimed Cerene dB headphones are in demand by audiophiles and musicians alike. They are very comfortable to wear and feature transparent, natural sound — great for working on audio or just kicking back and enjoying the tunes.
 

 
Our custom PivotMic XY stereo microphones come in a precision-matched pair. They feature low-noise, cardioid, directional capsules with Japanese technology, and 20Hz...30kHz frequency response. Both are available for immediate shipment.
 
We designed our headphones and microphones to be compatible with both MixerFace and PortCaster. If you decide to choose PortCaster with headphones,  you can start enjoying the headphones right away, while you wait for the fulfillment of the main perk.
 

Full Feature List

All PortCaster models make it easy to record a high-quality remote interview using any cell phone or tablet. Just connect the USB-C audio jack and use the phone to record or stream!
 
In the R4D model, the interview can also be recorded onto the SD-card. The built-in 24-bit/48kHz stereo recorder in the R4D model offers “One-Touch Record”.  Capture the program locally, while simultaneously streaming online, for an unmatched level of flexibility.
 

 
All this functionality is available in a portable unit, no larger than a passport. PortCaster measures  only 121 mm (4.76″) (L), 70 mm (2.76″) (W), 36 mm (1.42″) (H).

 
An internal, rechargeable battery (R4M, R4D models) charges from any USB jack and this sets PortCaster apart from other portable audio interfaces. Two built-in boutique mic preamps allow connecting up to two microphones or one mic plus a remote guest over the phone.
 
The updated Jasmine™ mic preamps feature 48V Phantom and 65dB of clean gain, making it easy to connect any microphone, including the acclaimed Shure SM7B. To help better control recording levels, PortCaster offers soft-knee, analog, optical limiters for both Host and the Guest, for a truly professional sound. Analog limiters right at the inputs are superior to their digital counterparts, because they can catch the audio peaks before they get to the A/D converter. If distortion comes through all the way to the A/D converter, it will be recorded this way and no digital processor can fix that.

PortCaster is designed for live broadcasting and features easy and intuitive operation. It uses tactile analog controls, which are laid out logically and can be accessed without looking, which is important for a busy host, who is running the show and managing the guest at the same time.
 

Built Tough

To help survive the stress of a live show, PortCaster is made of aircraft aluminum and purposely avoids any distracting screens or complicated menus. You can run over it with a car (we did) and your PortCaster will continue to work! You cannot do this with cheap plastic imitations! Professional-grade reliability means your product will deliver many years of quality service. 
 

 

Goes Anywhere You Go

PortCaster fits in the pocket, allowing you to travel light and have the piece of mind that you can create content anywhere inspiration strikes you.
 

 

PortCaster vs. Alternatives

As far as specs are concerned, PortCaster is superior in pretty much every dimension. It can work with any microphone and has less noise than devices costing twice as much. It's smaller than a typical field recorder and features a rechargeable battery, so you can stop spending on AA's. It features easy tactile controls, so you can keep your eyes on the action, not hunting through the menus. Finally, it fits in your pocket, so you can take it anywhere you go. Try doing that with a large mixer!

 

Full Specifications

Here are some quotes we received from famous artists who use the MixerFace. PortCaster takes that product to next level, by adding features requested by podcasters and live streamers.

"I love the versatility of this little device!" - Jermaine Bryson, Kool and the Gang

Yes! PaMu, the legend of Indiegogo, is back-upgrade with new features! With $4 Million+ raised and 80,000+ backers recommended, PaMu Slide perfect the sound quality, battery life, signal stability, comfort level and everything you're looking for. It will redefine what Bluetooth earphone should be. There has never been a better time to upgrade your listening gears! 

Are you ready to rock again?

Psst... if you are reading this, you may still have a shot at the super discount up to 70% off. Limited offer!

Check it out at

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pamu-slide-b...

 

Inquiry Logistics:http://padmatetracking.com  Live Chat:https://padmate-tech.com/

The NBA LA Lakers star player, member of NBA All-Rookie First Team 2018, Kyle Kuzma loves PaMu Scroll and use Padmate’products everyday!

​

 

Reviews by Major Medias and Audio Industry Players

 

 

I4U News is a top daily News site for latest technology news, breaking science discoveries. They reviewed PaMu 1.0, now thought PaMu Scroll is much better! Read more details here.

9to5 Toys, the top tech and gadget review media gave PaMu Scroll thumb up! Read more details here

Top runner, cyclist or triathlete Magazine Chicago Athlete reviewed PaMu Scroll in the professional athlete using angle, and they recommend PaMu Scroll. Read more details here

Padmate won the Best Industry Innovation Accelerator 2018 certified by Intel. PaMu Scroll is one of the best products from Padmate-Intel joint innovation accelerator. Padmate is partnership with many major brands all over the world!

 

 

Two Ways of Charging

1. Micro-USB Cable Charging (Micro-USB Cable is included in the PaMu package)

2.Wireless charging with PaMu Wireless charging receiver. You can purchase PaMu wireless charging receiver as optional accessory in our perk and connect it right with PaMu Scroll. Then you will get a wireless charging combo! Just put it on your own wireless charging pads/sockets (Not for Sale), and you can charge your PaMu Scroll headphones cable-free!

Audio expert Pirate FM also gave a thumb up to PaMu Scroll! Pirate FM was born in 1992, a top audio station using state-of-the-art audio tech. Read more details here

Read the full review article here

The Cross-Eyed Pianist is one of the UK’s leading blogs on classical music. The reviewer, Frances Wilson, from Cross-Eyed Pianist is UK top-tier pianist and musician. She gave 100% positive feedback about PaMu Scroll. Read more details here

Click here to read the full review article

 

PaMu Scroll's big upgrade from Bluetooth 4.2, Bluetooth 5.0 offers Higher Speed, Longer Range, and Powerful Sound.

The PaMu Scroll sounds similar to Apple's Airpods, but with deeper bass and crisper highs, which sounds richer and clearer.

Connect to any of your devices that use Bluetooth technology:

·       Android phones, tablets, and other mobile devices

·       Apple iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Macbook

·       Any other devices with Bluetooth technology

Its mini ergonomic design comes with different sized ear tips (S/M/L) to best fit your ears.  Simply place the PaMu Scroll and twist into your ears.   They will never fall out, even when running, working, exercising , or engaging in any other activities.

Don't worry about hiding the PaMu Scroll when running on a rainy day because the PaMu Scroll has been given an IPX6 rating.  This means that the PaMu Scroll can get wet, whether it’s a light spray or exposure to heavy rain. They are also dust resistant, which makes them perfect for when riding bikes, ATV’s, motorcycles and other powersports vehicles.

Activate Siri through the PaMu Scroll. Two taps lets you talk to Siri without taking your phone out from your pocket.
 
 

Never worry about losing power when you go out! Enjoy the PaMu Scroll with non-stop music for up to 3.5 hours on every charge. The portable charging case provides 3 full charges giving you up to 10.5 hours of music.  One full charge gives you 5 hours of hands-free calling, 3.5 hours of music, or 100 hours in standby.

PaMu Scroll was reviewed by award winning musician and artist Nik Thakkar, read more details here

Click here to read the full review article

Click here to read the full review article

Click here to read the full review articles

PaMu Scroll wireless earphones are not a prototype. It is a product under mass production, we have participated two major exhibitions: IFA Berlin and The 86th TOKYO INTERNATIONAL Gift Show! Many people and tried PaMu Scroll and they just love PaMu Scroll so much!

FAQ

1) When is the expected delivery?
We planned to start shipping in November. We are already in the process of production. We will ship in batches.

For those of you who have backed us in our PaMu 1.0 campaign, you might be familiar with our shipping process. In the last crowdfunding campaign, we shipped bathes before campaign ended. This time we will also try to fulfill the orders before campaign ends.Please follow up in our updates.

Friendly Reminder:

In our last Indiegogo campaign, we have encountered some delivery difficulties in some countries. We even had sent out multiple shipments for some missing orders. So please make sure that you provide the correct and valid address.

 

2) Is PaMu Scroll wireless receiver included in PaMu Scroll Earphone package? Can it connect to my other devices?

PaMu Scroll wireless receiver is NOT included in PaMu Scroll Earphone package. You have to purchase it as accessory. You can choose the quantity option in our perks. It can connect to any of your devices with micro-USB.


3）What’s the IP rating of these earphones? Can I take a shower with your earbuds?
Pamu Scroll is supported by IPX6 featuring with powerful water and sweat resistance, which means you get intact PaMu Scroll from water jets at different directions or immerse it in water for 30 minutes as we’ve proved it. PaMu Scroll IPX6 exempts you from worrying sweat damage on your earbuds while you get aggressive workout or wearing it in shower，so, of course, you can take shower with your earbuds. Let alone the rain drops, doing no harm to them, yet we do not advise you to submerge earbuds in water for a long time, cause it may damage inner component, resulting to weak performance to some extent. In general, if you use them properly, you’ll find them durable and worn-resistant.

IPX6 is a little highlight of PaMu Scroll, there’re a lot of wonderful things for you to explore, surely will surprise you!!!

4) What version Bluetooth does PaMu Scroll adopt?

Bluetooth 5.0

Compared with Bluetooth 4.2, Bluetooth 5.0 gets more advantages in a few aspects.

Bluetooth 5.0 doubles data transmission speed of v4.2, no delay; and it covers much farther distance than v4.2; more importantly, it consumes lower energy and is compatible with previous version, so Bluetooth 5.0 is widely used in medical, body-shaping, outdoors and sport.

All of which means PaMu Scroll Bluetooth 5.0 will be a good company with you when you use it to listen to music, to run or other violent workout. s 
5) What is the warranty policy if I receive a defective set?

We value our users, and we believe in our products. If there is a problem due to manufacturer's defect, we will replace your PaMu Scrolls within one year of purchase.

6) How do I get my Order ID?

You can find your Order ID by logging into your Indiegogo account and clicking on ‘My Contribution’.

7) What type of antenna do you use?

We use LDS, and we chose the only mobile device that uses typical vmlinux. Although the cost of the LDS antenna is higher, it is of better quality, performance, and stability for the Bluetooth connection.

8) Can you hear calls through both earpieces, and can one be used at a time while the other can charge?

When you answer a phone call, both earphones will hear it. s

9) How can I change the color？

Indiegogo does not allow you to change the selected color - please email us with your Order ID and color choice and we will update the color for your order.


10) Does it have charging cables and other appendix?

This item includes one pair PaMu Scroll earbuds with a charging case and one charging cable, an instructions book and 3 pair ear-tips of S, M, L size. Thanks!

Audio expert Pirate FM also gave a thumb up to PaMu Scroll! Pirate FM was born in 1992, a top audio station using state-of-the-art audio tech. Read more details here



Read the full review article here

The Cross-Eyed Pianist is one of the UK’s leading blogs on classical music. The reviewer, Frances Wilson, from Cross-Eyed Pianist is UK top-tier pianist and musician. She gave 100% positive feedback about PaMu Scroll. Read more details here



Click here to read the full review article
 

PaMu Scroll's big upgrade from Bluetooth 4.2, Bluetooth 5.0 offers Higher Speed, Longer Range, and Powerful Sound.


The PaMu Scroll sounds similar to Apple's Airpods, but with deeper bass and crisper highs, which sounds richer and clearer.


Connect to any of your devices that use Bluetooth technology:
·       Android phones, tablets, and other mobile devices
·       Apple iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Macbook
·       Any other devices with Bluetooth technology

Its mini ergonomic design comes with different sized ear tips (S/M/L) to best fit your ears.  Simply place the PaMu Scroll and twist into your ears.   They will never fall out, even when running, working, exercising , or engaging in any other activities.




Don't worry about hiding the PaMu Scroll when running on a rainy day because the PaMu Scroll has been given an IPX6 rating.  This means that the PaMu Scroll can get wet, whether it’s a light spray or exposure to heavy rain. They are also dust resistant, which makes them perfect for when riding bikes, ATV’s, motorcycles and other powersports vehicles.



Activate Siri through the PaMu Scroll. Two taps lets you talk to Siri without taking your phone out from your pocket.
 
 



Never worry about losing power when you go out! Enjoy the PaMu Scroll with non-stop music for up to 3.5 hours on every charge. The portable charging case provides 3 full charges giving you up to 10.5 hours of music.  One full charge gives you 5 hours of hands-free calling, 3.5 hours of music, or 100 hours in standby.

PaMu Scroll was reviewed by award winning musician and artist Nik Thakkar, read more details here

Click here to read the full review article


Click here to read the full review article

Click here to read the full review articles





PaMu Scroll wireless earphones are not a prototype. It is a product under mass production, we have participated two major exhibitions: IFA Berlin and The 86th TOKYO INTERNATIONAL Gift Show! Many people and tried PaMu Scroll and they just love PaMu Scroll so much!




FAQ
1) When is the expected delivery?We planned to start shipping in November. We are already in the process of production. We will ship in batches.
For those of you who have backed us in our PaMu 1.0 campaign, you might be familiar with our shipping process. In the last crowdfunding campaign, we shipped bathes before campaign ended. This time we will also try to fulfill the orders before campaign ends.Please follow up in our updates.
Friendly Reminder:
In our last Indiegogo campaign, we have encountered some delivery difficulties in some countries. We even had sent out multiple shipments for some missing orders. So please make sure that you provide the correct and valid address.
 
2) Is PaMu Scroll wireless receiver included in PaMu Scroll Earphone package? Can it connect to my other devices?
PaMu Scroll wireless receiver is NOT included in PaMu Scroll Earphone package. You have to purchase it as accessory. You can choose the quantity option in our perks. It can connect to any of your devices with micro-USB.
3）What’s the IP rating of these earphones? Can I take a shower with your earbuds?Pamu Scroll is supported by IPX6 featuring with powerful water and sweat resistance, which means you get intact PaMu Scroll from water jets at different directions or immerse it in water for 30 minutes as we’ve proved it. PaMu Scroll IPX6 exempts you from worrying sweat damage on your earbuds while you get aggressive workout or wearing it in shower，so, of course, you can take shower with your earbuds. Let alone the rain drops, doing no harm to them, yet we do not advise you to submerge earbuds in water for a long time, cause it may damage inner component, resulting to weak performance to some extent. In general, if you use them properly, you’ll find them durable and worn-resistant.
IPX6 is a little highlight of PaMu Scroll, there’re a lot of wonderful things for you to explore, surely will surprise you!!!4) What version Bluetooth does PaMu Scroll adopt?
Bluetooth 5.0Compared with Bluetooth 4.2, Bluetooth 5.0 gets more advantages in a few aspects.
Bluetooth 5.0 doubles data transmission speed of v4.2, no delay; and it covers much farther distance than v4.2; more importantly, it consumes lower energy and is compatible with previous version, so Bluetooth 5.0 is widely used in medical, body-shaping, outdoors and sport.
All of which means PaMu Scroll Bluetooth 5.0 will be a good company with you when you use it to listen to music, to run or other violent workout. s 5) What is the warranty policy if I receive a defective set?We value our users, and we believe in our products. If there is a problem due to manufacturer's defect, we will replace your PaMu Scrolls within one year of purchase.6) How do I get my Order ID?You can find your Order ID by logging into your Indiegogo account and clicking on ‘My Contribution’.7) What type of antenna do you use?We use LDS, and we chose the only mobile device that uses typical vmlinux. Although the cost of the LDS antenna is higher, it is of better quality, performance, and stability for the Bluetooth connection.8) Can you hear calls through both earpieces, and can one be used at a time while the other can charge?When you answer a phone call, both earphones will hear it. s9) How can I change the color？Indiegogo does not allow you to change the selected color - please email us with your Order ID and color choice and we will update the color for your order.10) Does it have charging cables and other appendix?This item includes one pair PaMu Scroll earbuds with a charging case and one charging cable, an instructions book and 3 pair ear-tips of S, M, L size. Thanks!

story:
✔ Active Noise Cancelation ✔ Smart Ambient Sound Mode

✔ 360-hours of Playtime     ✔ IPX7 Water-resistant

✔ Smart Touch Controls      ✔Bluetooth 5.0

✔ Secure fit                             ✔100ft listening distance

Thinking of cutting the cord for your next earbuds purchase?Cancelling significant  noise across almost all frequencies but also use less power?DSI Supersonic earbud is the solution.

There are quite a few factors to consider when buying wireless earbuds, things like sound quality, battery life, and fit. Well, we’ve thought of all those factors and then some. This is why we at DSI are proud to bring our newest product, the Supersonic Noise Cancelling earbuds to Indiegogo.

We use Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation to significantly reduce low-frequency sound by up to 95%. We’ve achieved this by integrating dual microphones—one feed-forward and one feed-back—into the body of our design to catch more of the ambient sounds around you. Once those ambient sounds are detected, the noise cancelling feature goes into effect. On its own, the result of this feature is impressive. The quality of whatever you’re listening to will be virtually untarnished by the sounds of the outside world. The sound is isolated up to 35dB which makes these one of the top wireless earbuds portable design you can easily use on loud public transport when you want to have some “yourself time”.And just as impressive is the energy saving design inherent to our noise cancelling technology. You’ll get a superior noise cancelling effect at a fraction of the energy expenditure of many similar products. 

Our earbuds are packed with advanced audio technology. The 6mm driver inside each earbud is incredibly small, yet unbelievably powerful. Our  Noise Cancelling Processor  combines Digital Noise Cancelling, 24-bit Audio Signal Processing, and a Digital-to-Analogue Converter with a headphone amplifier. For those who might not know what to make of these specs, just be prepared to expect stunning sound with minimal distortion.DSI achieves high resolution sound by employing aptX technology.We used Qualcomm aptX HD  to answer the growing demand for high resolution audio. This enhanced codec supports 24-bit music quality over Bluetooth. This means listeners can hear even the smallest details in their music.

With our powerful noise cancelling technology, you may find yourself getting lost in the richness and depth of a song, or in the engrossing voice of a podcaster, or in the high-end sound design of an action-packed Hollywood production. That’s great! But sometimes it’s helpful or even important to hear what’s going on in the outside world.And we’ve got you covered with Ambient Sound Mode (ASM), a feature that channels the sounds of the outside world back into your ears. With our simple and intuitive touch controls, activating or deactivating ASM is a cinch.

To activate Ambient sound mode,Touch and hold the touchpad until you hear "Turn on ambient sound." Next, you will hear "Ambient sound turned on" that means the feature is activated.

To disable Ambient sound mode, touch and hold the touchpad until you hear "Turn off ambient sound." When you hear "Ambient sound turned off," that means the feature is deactivated.

Ambient Sound Mode turns off automatically during a call . The mode comes back to its previous state after the call.

DSI Supersonic noise cancelling wireless earbuds offer true wireless freedom thanks to our bluetooth 5.0 Q chipset wireless technology.It’s especially unbearable when you are watching a movie or playing games. DSI features Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity to transmit sound faster in a stable and secured way.

 DSI Supersonic noise cancellation earbuds  can reach a maximum of 100ft without any interruptions.

Ready to charge your earbuds? Simply snap them into place inside of the included charging case and the charging process will begin immediately. On a full charge, the earbuds offer 12 hours of power, plus the case itself carries an additional 360 hours of charge time. For 3 to 4 hours of daily use, a fully charged case will let you enjoy wireless music for up to a month between charges. When it’s time to finally charge the case, you can use a USB-C cable or wireless charger.

DSI Supersonic also supports wireless charging.You can power up your charging case case without worrying about usb cables.Our ultra thin wireless charger is designed to perfectly match DSI, but it can charge all of your devices. Thanks to its Qi certification, it even supports fast charging!

With  IPX7 water resistance , DSI Supersonic noise cancellation earbud can be immersed in water up to 1 meter for a maximum time of  30 minutes without any breakages. This implies that taking a shower,a dive in the pool or been caught in the rain  won't cause any harm.

Form truly does meet function with the Supersonic earbuds.From the clean, minimalist look of the headphones themselves, to the tactile, high-end finish of the charging case, the Supersonic earbuds are all about elegant, understated style.

In terms of comfort, the Supersonic earbuds come with a selection of ear tips, that enhances the noise cancelling capabilities of the product. 

Refer 1 person and  get a free wireless charger! With 3 referrals, you will get a free pair of DSI SUPERSONIC plus Wireless charger!

How to share:

First, back DSI

Once you are a backer, log in your Indiegogo account

Copy DSI's campaign link

Share your unique link with your friends!

How to check your referrals:

Log into your Indiegogo account

Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page

Select the “My Profile” option

Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions

Count the number of funders

 The Supersonic headphones are the result of years of rigorous research and development, working with designers, technicians, and even consumers to deliver a superior product. We’ve determined, by looking across the entire spectrum of headphones design, what works, and we’ve improved upon those features. We’ve also taken what doesn’t work and thrown it out. When you listen to a song, watch a film, or take a call on the DSI Supersonic headphones, you’ll notice the quality immediately.

Unlike other crowdfunding campaigns, we've already spent months developing a manufacturing-ready model and only need funding for the initial batch order. Purchase yours today and you won’t need to wait long to get the DSI in your hands.Thanks for your time and consideration.

  

      

                               

  RISK AND CHALLENGES

As with all technology manufacturing projects, there are a number of risks and challenges which could hold up the production process.The common risks are potential delays in , packaging, and shipping. While we feel like we have reduced these variables as much as possible, they can never be completely eliminated. That being said, our team has lots of experience producing consumer electronics and we are confident we will deliver an outstanding product as we proceed to manufacturing.We are sure to update you along the way whenever we face any problems we cant handle.

story:
Enter the Wireless Future with Funcl

The wireless future is nothing less than true wireless stereo sound, a lightweight, comfortable fit, and easy touch controls without having to worry about water or sweat, all at an unbelievably affordable price. Enjoy music like never before.

Thank You for the Support!

Withing only 8 hours, we raised $50,000 dollars and reached 100% funding goal. It's so exciting to see so many backers joining the Funcl community! Also, we'd like to share the feedback from some product reviewers after testing the Funcl products.

  

$49?!? Yes, Forty-Nine Bucks

The Funcl W1 Bluetooth 5.0 wireless headphones are priced at only $49, with various features available otherwise only at $100 or more.

A Comfortable, Stable Fit in Every Ear

Designed by our award-winning team with 20+ years of experience in the industry, Funcl W1 offers a comfortable fit and a good look for any occasion. 

Lightweight Acoustic Engineering

Equipped with the latest Realtek® chip, Funcl W1 delivers great sound quality and low power consumption, bringing a 4.5-hour battery life (and up to 18 hours total with the charging case). At only 4.4 grams, Funcl W1 will make you feel nothing but music in your ears.

Touch for Easy Control

Funcl W1 gives you full control with the onboard touch buttons. The touch buttons on the headphones allow you to control the music and answer/reject calls with a simple touch.

Sweat and Rain? No problem!

With an IPX5 waterproof rating, Funcl W1 is a good companion while you workout at the gym or exercise outdoors. 

 

And More:

  • All the specifications are based on the latest batch of Funcl W1 produced and tested on the production line in early November.

Built for Mobile Gamers and More

Funcl AI are among the most affordable aptX headphones ($79) on the market, while offering all the features you need for a perfect wireless experience. The Funcl AI is the best choice for those who love to watch movies or play games on their mobile devices.

Extremely Low Latency

Powered by the Qualcomm® smart audio chip, Funcl AI delivers extremely low latency (60ms) when working with devices supporting aptX, which makes Funcl AI the best companion for mobile gamers.

Premium Sound Quality

The convenience of wireless doesn’t mean you should comprise on sound quality. Funcl AI offers Hi-Fi sound.

Long, Long, Long Battery Life

Funcl AI’s battery lasts 6.5 hours after fully charged. The charging case offers 3 extra charges, bringing the total battery life of Funcl AI to 24 hours, providing the same level of performance as the $159 AirPods.

Smart Headphones with Smart App

The free Funcl AI app makes working with the AI assistants on your device more intuitive, making everyday life more convenient. Besides the built-in voice assistants, you can also select more AI assistants in preferences on the Funcl AI app.

  • The Funcl AI app will support Amazon Alexa later this year. This feature is currently under development. 

 

And More:

  • All the specifications are based on the latest batch of Funcl AI produced and tested on the production line in early November.

 

Product Benchmark

Perk Details

Funcl W1 - Technical Specifications

Funcl AI - Technical Specifications

What is Funcl [fʌnkəl]?

Funcl is a hardware startup devoted to making wireless headphones accessible to everyone. Based in Hong Kong and Shenzhen, we have gathered a group of professionals with 20+ years of experience at world-class audio companies and manufacturers, including Harman Audio, Foxconn, Xiaomi, and Goertek.

Directly transliterated from Mandarin Chinese, Funcl [fʌnkəl] means that we are crazy enough to work assiduously to build great products at great prices. Starting with Funcl W1 and Funcl AI, we hope to bring FUN to ConnectionLess activities for everyone around the globe.

“That Price – Too Good to be True!”

I hear you. There are two reasons why we can—and are—offering this great price:

(1) Our product design and manufacturing team is based in Shenzhen. Described as “the Silicon Valley of hardware” by WIRED, Shenzhen is home to one of the strongest ecosystems in the world for hardware manufacturing using best practices, from supply chain optimization and quality control to competitive cost management. With all the expertise in industrial design, mechanical engineering, electronics engineering, quality control, and supply chain management on the Funcl team, we have an added edge in creating amazing products at unbelievably low prices.

(2) More importantly, our goal for this Indiegogo campaign is not profit as much as it is to get the word out. We decided on this pricing package with you—our backers—in mind. Frankly, the pricing strategy for this campaign offers only a break-even financial position for our team. But that’s worth it to us to share the vision of Funcl with as many people as possible around the world.

 

What is the Product Status?

We have produced and shipped a batch of Funcl W1 and Funcl AI in Asia. We are using the feedback collected from this first community of users to further improve the product design (including hardware, software, and firmware) for the global version. 

Since we have already manufactured tens of thousands of units of both products, we are confident we can ramp up the fulfillment for Indiegogo orders very fast, even in the middle of the campaign.

 

Timeline

 

 

Special Thanks: formlabs

With all the expertise in industrial design, mechanical engineering, electronics engineering, quality control, and supply chain management on the Funcl team, we have an added edge in creating amazing products at unbelievably low prices.(2) More importantly, our goal for this Indiegogo campaign is not profit as much as it is to get the word out. But that’s worth it to us to share the vision of Funcl with as many people as possible around the world. What is the Product Status?We have produced and shipped a batch of Funcl W1 and Funcl AI in Asia. story:
You no longer have to choose between your hearing and your music

Famous rockers with hearing loss who have tested our prototypes include: Brian Johnson of AC/DC, Paul Stanley of KISS, and Bob Weir of the Grateful Dead.  But just because you're not on stage doesn't mean you are not at risk.  Earbuds cause permanent hearing loss.  In fact, according to the World Health Organization, "some 1.1 billion teenagers and young adults are at risk of hearing loss due to the unsafe use of personal audio devices, including smartphones," and the proportion of teens with mild or worse hearing loss has increased 77% since the 1990s.

If we reach up to $75,000 before the campaign ends, we will give each backer the option of including articulating ear tips on their ADEL™ Drum Earbuds.  These"swivel" tips  will facilitate more of a "custom" fit.  And what if we reach $100,000?  Go ahead, make your day...

 

THE CATCH-22 OF HEARING

With more than $2 million in grants from the National Science Foundation and National Institutes of Health, we discovered a Catch-22 right inside everyone's ears:

  • Earbuds seal the ear canal, stiffening the air inside which turns sound pressure into damaging pneumatic pressure.
  • The trapped air then acts like a battering ram, causing the eardrum to tighten and dampen the sound in self-defense, resulting in less sound registering at the brain.
  • Listeners then inadvertently turns up the volume, which delivers even more dangerous pneumatic pressure and further tightens the eardrum.

ADEL™ Drum earbuds are the only earbuds that break this cycle.

 

    Refer your friends and family and win an extra set of ADEL™ Drum Earbuds as a reward!  The conditions are simple:

    1. Be a Backer of this Indiegogo campaign.
    2. Promote this campaign with your share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account.
    3. Your contacts must back this campaign by either selecting a "perk" or making a donation.
    4. You  can check how your referrals are doing through your Indiegogo profile.


    Earbud Features/Choices

    Each earbud comes with the Ambrose Diaphonic Ear Lens (ADEL™), one for each ear.  The lens is a thin, patented membrane that absorbs the harmful pneumatic pressures that cause hearing loss and prevent the speaker and eardrum from working optimally.  

    The benefits of this include the following:

    • You will also find you have reduced audio fatigue, which comes from discomfort when the tiny muscles in your ear ache from protecting the eardrum and resisting pneumatic pressure for too long.  
    • You will have less occlusion effect - the distorted booming or echo-like sound of your own voice when speaking.  
    • Finally, you will be able to "score your life to music" - go about your day with sealed ears yet be able to carry on a conversation while enjoying your music or maintaining awareness in an office or other busy environment with external sounds as far in the background or foreground as you desire.

     


    Speaker

    • 10mm Drum - Single 10mm moving coil speaker. Delivers bass that exceeds top-of-the-line over ear headphones. Still capable of clear mids and highs, with adjustable bass that is focused with the tensioner.

    • 11mm Drum - Features a Cardas Audio moving coil speaker. This allows for very crisp and cohesive sound.  The Cardas speaker incorporates a powerful Neodymium magnet, a patented technique that prevents performance degrading eddy-currents.

    • 11mm Drum Hybrid - Features the Cardas speaker, paired with a balanced armature speaker.  The result:  great bottom end, smooth mids,  forward treble and very good top end extension.

     

    Tensioner

    • Hex Set - Tighten or loosen tensioner with a small Allen key that comes with this option, giving you the ability to match the match the impedance of each ear drum to maximize sound energy transfer, as well as achieving a desired sound signature.

    • Thumbscrew - allows user to adjust tensioner while earbuds are in your ears, giving you  the ability to match the impedance of each ear drum easier than with an external tool  to maximize sound energy transfer, as well as achieving a desired sound signature.

     

    Connector & Cord

    • Hardwired - 3' cord permanently attached to each earbud.

    • 2 Pin - Allows you to conveniently remove and customize the cord.

     

    Eartips

    Comply™ Foam Tip provides a more secure grip than silicone tips so the earbuds stay in your ear during workouts or other activity; Softer than silicone and more comfortable, eliminating canal fatigue, adding to the safety of your hearing.

     

    On-Cord Microphone

    • Allows users to use ADEL™ Drum Earbuds in conjunction with a cell phone to make & receive calls.

     

    Grille & Casing

    • High Impact Plastic - The grille is constructed of the same color high impact plastic as the horn (the part that the ear tip is attached to, and speaker casing). 

    • Aerospace Grade Aluminum - An option with higher perks, a machined aluminum grille adds a touch of aesthetics   Once you experience it you won’t want to listen any other way.  Once you experience it you won’t want to listen any other way.

     

     

     

     

     

    We have partnered with Vanderbilt University's Bill Wilkerson Center for Speech & Hearing to independently confirm that earbuds with ADEL™ second eardrum technology sound louder and better at lower volumes and therefore preserve your hearing.  Here is one example of clinical results which validates that.  

     

     

     

     


     

     

     

    Being a technology trailblazer is never easy.  It has meant ridicule from "experts," opposition from industry incumbents, but fortunately accolades from the people that matter - our delighted customers.  It takes money and confidence to develop solutions for difficult problems, especially health related ones. 

    Back in 2014, we successfully raised $650,000 for the first generation of ADEL™ technology, and delivered quality products to over 1,200 backers, with delivery starting just three months after launch!  We responded to thousands of comments and delivered nearly 100 updates to our happy backers.  Kickstarter chose us as a "Staff Pick" because our earlier product was so impactful.  And now, our next generation product is ready for manufacturing.

    Our prototypes have been validated by audiologists, performing artists, audiophiles, and just about anyone else that tries to listen with them.  We are already:

    • Securing a supply chain of quality materials
    • Working with precision manufacturers  
    • Partnering with best-in-class organizations

    Stephen Ambrose, our founder, has been at the leading edge of personal audio technology since he invented and commercialized the in-ear monitor decades ago.  He is driven to protecting, preserving, and even restoring the hearing of the artists he grew up with as well as preserving the hearing of younger generations who want to enjoy music without incurring earbud-induced hearing loss.  With your help, we can bring this disruptive technology to you and to all of those you care about. 

     

     

     

     

    About Hearing Loss

    • Q. Is hearing loss really that big an issue?
    • A.  Absolutely!  According to the Hearing Loss Association of America, about 20% of Americans, 48 million, report some degree of hearing loss.  At age 65, one out of three people has a hearing loss.  60 percent of the people with hearing loss are either in the work force or in educational settings.  While people in the workplace with the mildest hearing losses show little or no drop in income compared to their normal hearing peers, as the hearing loss increases, so does the reduction in compensation.  About 2-3 of every 1,000 children in the United States are born with a detectable hearing loss in one or both ears.  Almost 15% of school-age children (ages 6-19) have some degree of hearing loss.  Those are staggering numbers.

    About Traditional Earbuds and Hearing Aids

    • Q. Everyone seems to have earbuds for listening to music nowadays. What makes the  ADEL™ Drum Earbud different from the hundreds of brands out there?​
    • A.  Our patented ADEL™ technology does something no other earbud on the market does - it protects your ear from the effects of pneumatic pressure.  The problem with conventional earbuds is that when they plug up the ear canal, there is no where else for the pneumatic pressure to go except right up against your drum, and eventually you experience hearing loss.  We have tested our products at the world's top-ranked audiology research center - Vanderbilt University Medical Center, which determined that our earbuds do indeed allow people to listen to music at dramatically lower volumes that preserve hearing.  We have shared the results within this Indiegogo page and on our website.

    About the ADEL™ Drum Earbuds

    • Q. What exactly does a "second eardrum" do?​
    • A.  Our patented ADEL™ technology is effectively an artificial eardrum.  But instead of taking sound energy and transferring it to the ossicles, it acts as a protector, "taking the bullet" for the real ear drum when dangerous levels of pressure are exerted into the ear canal.  You could also think of it as a safety valve that takes the pressure off the ear drum.
    • Q. How can ADEL™ be both safe and have a better sound.  Isn't it one or the other?​
    • A.  Life is full of trade-offs but not in this case. We protect your ear by removing the stiff air that results from sealing the ear canal.  No more eardrum battering ram.  Now the speaker and the eardrum and move freely just like they would if you were in the free space of a concert hall.
    • Q. Are you coming out with a wireless earbud?​
    • A.  We have been approached by wireless earbud makers but at this time their devices all lack audio quality.  We chose to first establish a reputation for audiophile quality sound.  That is why top performing artists choose ADEL™ products.  We can, however, improve the audio quality of a wireless earbud.
    • Q. So is this hearing aid?​
    • A.  No it is not in the traditional sense- our earbuds do not have microphones.  We have demonstrated that ADEL™ technology has been able to restore hearing function, but not through brute force amplification the way those traditional hearing aids do (which ironically cause further hearing loss.
    • Q. What is a hybrid earbud?​
    • A.  Hybrid earbuds and In-Ear Monitors use a combination speakers.  Dynamic or moving coil speakers are combined with balanced armature speakers used in hearing aids.
    • Q. What is the benefit of a hybrid earbud?​
    • A.  A hybrid earbud uses dynamic speakers and balanced armatures. Dynamic drivers generally have larger diaphragms with much lower mass and therefore have a tendency to be faster and smoother with lower distortion and much better bass, midrange and transient response than balanced armatures.  Balanced armature drivers have the problematic property of producing nonlinear distortion at much lower driven levels than dynamic drivers.  However balanced armature speakers are very efficient producers of specific frequencies and therefore are useful for creating very loud higher frequency sounds.  While marrying dynamic drivers with balanced armatures commonly results in a wider audio spectrum, the high frequencies produced by balanced armatures have commonly been known to sound harsh or "brittle" - like breaking glass instead of brilliant silk.  That's where our elegant ADEL™ technology comes to the rescue: the normally harsher high frequencies produced by the more efficient balanced armature high frequency designs are beautifully smoothed and opened up by proper focusing of the ADEL™ Drum membrane (our second ear drum), resulting in an incomparable listening experience which is able to be heard distinctly at low volumes without needless environmental isolation.   Our Hybrid ADEL™ Drum is a breakthrough in in-ear audio fidelity featuring incomparable bass and midrange acoustics beautifully married with extremely open, smooth and silky balanced armature high frequencies, which are typically much harsher using other approaches.
    • Q. What level of isolation is provided by the ADEL™ Drum earbud?
    • A.  ADEL™ eliminates the harshness that normally accompanies the high frequency created by balanced armature speakers.  ADEL™ smooths, opens and focuses the sound.  This creates an incomparable listening experience which is heard distinctly at low volumes without needless environmental isolation. 

     

    About Asius Technologies

    Do you make other products for personal audio use?

    • Q. Do you make other audio products?
    • A.  Yes, we manufacturer a series of modules that work with the devices that you frequently see performing artists use on stage.  These are called In-Ear Monitors (IEMs). We are developing licensing agreements with IEM manufacturers to place our hearing-saving technology in their products.

    About this Particular Indiegogo Campaign

    • Q. I live in a Pacific Rim nation? Do you ship there?
    • A.  Yes, we ship internationally and through Indiegogo and our merchant bank can handle all international currencies. 
    • Q. Why did you not crowdfund again on Kickstarter?
    • A.  Kickstarter was a great experience for us and with it we reached nearly $650,000. for our initial attempt at crowd funding.  We believe Indiegogo has an even greater community of backers that would like to benefit from our most recent research.
