story:
Order more PaMu Earphones on               https://padmate-tech.com

The History-Making, Backer-Delighting Team Is Back And Better Than Ever

TOGETHER, WE’VE CREATED A WINNING FORMULA:

The PaMu Team + The Best Chip Company (Qualcomm) +The Best Noise Cancelling Tech Company (ams) + The Best Microphone Makers (Knowles)=PaMu Quiet, the best Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) earphones you can buy.

If your top priority is sound quality, you must try active noise canceling wireless earbuds. Because with active noise canceling, you can immerse yourself fully in music and hear every detail without distractions.  This next generation tech can not be found on normal TWS earphones in the market. Only a few big brands can make TRUE ANC earphones and they are all above $150. We've partnered up with Qualcomm and ams to develop PaMu Quiet. We promise this is  the most affordable and comfortable active noise canceling earphone you can find in the market.

Our 3 Indiegogo campaigns so far have raised an amazing $11 MILLION. Big thanks to 200,000+ backers who’s backed us so far…We’ve Set The Bar High, Now We’re Raising It. We’ve been working hard to develop a new product that continues the PaMu legacy. NOW LET’S MAKE MORE HISTORY! Introducing the world’s first active noise canceling (ANC) earphones created in partnership with PaMu, Qualcomm, AMS, & Knowles. 

We put PaMu Quiet in the slam-dunking, history-making hands of NBA stars to get their take on our new earphones. Success in the NBA is all about NO DISTRACTIONS and TOTAL FOCUS. Slip our ultra comfortable never fall out earphones into your ears and that’s what you’ll experience with PaMu Quiet.

If you participated our past 3 campaigns, you definitely know we offer the best price ONLY during our crowdfunding campaign. The price will go up and up as demand gets higher and higher. 

Wait any longer and you'll completely miss out. Don't regret it. Save big money today!

The buzz of crowds. The hum of traffic. The roar of airplanes. We live in a noisy world. When you’re on the move, ambient noise can creep in and spoil what you’re listening to.

  • PaMu Quiet cancels out crowd noise.
  • PaMu Quiet deletes distractions.

So you can focus on what you’re listening to.

MUSIC • AUDIO BOOKS • CALLS 

Let’s face it, BEFORE PaMu, earphones were ho-hum. So-so. And in some cases just plain bad. We saw the need to create better quality earphones. Cue the success of our first 3 Indiegogo campaigns. 

Now we’re back with a fourth. A new product that’s destined to take PaMu to a new level. And like our previous three products, we’ve been innovating, paying attention to details, testing, testing, testing, and delivering a product that’s worthy of the name PaMu.

Teams are better than individuals. Just like the left ear works with the right ear to deliver the best stereo sound, for PaMu Quiet, we’ve teamed-up with Qualcomm, ams, Knowles, GE, Murata, HRS etc to deliver enhanced sound chip performance. Only industry leading techniques for PaMu Quiet!

We’ve also worked with the best noise cancelling company in the world, AMS, and the creators of quality microphones, KNOWLES. One of their many claims to fame is sending microphones to the moon and back with Neil Armstrong in 1969..

 Huge active noise canceling Effects In A Small Package. When it comes to active noise cancelation, PaMu Quiet gets to work in a new way. PaMu Quiet is different than most other active noise canceling earphones that just use either FEEDBACK or FEED-FORWARD noise cancellation. PaMu Quiet uses BOTH, delivering a better active noise cancelation experience with Hybrid Noise Cancellation

Core Chip, speaker and sound cavity structure are the key parts to achieve better sound. PaMu Quiet offers all the best.

PaMu Quiet applies Qualcomm's flagship chip, QCC5124, supporing the best sound quality in the market. Qualcomm aptX Classic, SBC, AAC decoding, 48kHz/16-bit LPCM audio.

Ready For Multi-Frequency Brilliance?

PaMu Quiet Lets You Listen Loud to;

BONE-RATTLING BEATS from the super-deep sub woofer;

DEEP RICH BASSLINES thanks to outstanding elasticity;

FULL & BRIGHT MIDS for a textured sound;

CRYSTAL-CLEAR TREBLE so you hear every nuance

EXCLUSIVE CUSTOMISED SPEAKER

The combination of the following delivers an unprecedented sound experience and performance with beautiful balance across the full frequency range:

10mm LARGE DRIVER enhances the depth of the bass

AGILE PEN TITANIUM COMPOSITE DIAPHRAGM delivers good ductility

PRECIOUS TITANIUM METAL produces awesome sound quality at high frequencies

PRECISION-DESIGNED SOUND CAVITY

We designed over 10 iterations of PaMu Quiet’s sound cavity before hitting the sweet spot.

Our brilliant sound cavity delivers

              • AMAZING NOISE CANCELLATION

              • PERFECT SOUND QUALITY

              • A BIG REDUCTION IN EAR PRESSURE for more comfort

You never have to sacrifice comfort for sound quality with PaMu Quiet. Your ears get the best of both worlds.

              BEAUTIFUL SOUND

              INCREDIBLE COMFORT

How do we do it? We’ve conducted careful research into 2 key areas that cause discomfort to wearers of earbuds:

THE STETHOSCOPE EFFECT

This is a popping sound that can be heard in some earphones when walking or talking. It’s caused by completely sealing the in-ear silicon earplugs. We’ve eliminated the stethoscope effect by designing our earphones with precision vents to open the silicon and equalize the pressure. So you get the same brilliant bass, with better comfort.

EAR PRESSURE REDUCTION

Our precision designed sound cavity results in a big reduction in pressure for your enhanced listening comfort.

 

Our 3 previous Indiegogo campaigns have taught us how to deliver. PaMu Quiet is already in production in our factory, so you won’t have to wait long to hear and feel the brilliance of PaMu Quiet in your ears. And we’ve made sure all the features that made past PaMu campaigns such a success are back:

• THE BEST PRODUCTS AT UNBELIEVABLY LOW PRICES – Indiegogo is the only place you can buy PaMu Quiet at a never-to-be-repeated low price.

• FAST AND SAFE DELIVERY – we successfully delivered to over 80,000 backers last time so know how to ensure you get your perks safe and fast.

• REGULAR UPDATES – keep checking back so you know how things are going, and don’t miss the chance to benefit from special promotions and deals.

There’s MORE HISTORY TO BE MADE when you back us.

Transparency mode makes the earphones "transparent" in terms of audio, letting you hear outside noise. It allows you to be more aware of your surroundings, which is sometimes necessary, like when you are out for a run in a public area and want to be aware of vehicles or people around you. You can easily switch from ANC mode to Transparency mode whenever you want.

Whether you're working from home or you've made it into the office, whenever a socket is near you can charge PaMu Quiet using a Type C charger.
When you're away from the city and there's no socket in sight, or you left your charger at home (tut! tut!) no problem! You can wirelessly charge your PaMu Quiet earphones using the included charger case.

3.5 Hours Of Crisp Sound On One Charge

How many tunes is that – 50? On one charge in one go. That’s a long enough soundtrack to last most daily commutes there and back, or a whole morning’s work for you digital nomads!

10.5 Hours Battery Life

The PaMu Quiet battery case can charge your earphones twice and give 10.5 hours of playtime in total. That’s enough for a really busy day’s work, and two 7-hour sessions of tunes over the weekend. Plus plenty of call time.

In traditional PaMu style, you can operate your earbuds with a tap or two, giving you easy access to Siri, Alexa, and Google Assistant plus other features. So when you’re on the go, in a hurry, or your hands are full, just a tap is all it takes to do all this:

Personalize Your PaMu Quiet Via The App

Download the PaMu app for added functionality:

  • CHOOSE your earbud settings
  • Customize your touch control functions
  • UPGRADE the firmware for a better listening experience.

Who knows where you’ll be when an urgent call comes through? It’s likely to be somewhere with background noise. With PaMu Quiet, there’ll be no screwing up your face as you strain to hear. Our earphones use CVC 8.0 mic reduction to eliminate external noise, so you catch every word.

PaMu Quiet earphones are IPX4 water resistant, and sweat resistant too. So no matter what that weather app says, PaMu Quiet will be with you, so you can listen to your favourite tunes and enjoy brilliant sound quality.

PaMu Quiet is good to go with your other devices straight out of the box. So no more adjusting those settings. PaMu Auto Pairs with:

              • Android Phones

              • Android Laptops / Tablets

              • iPhone

              • iPad

              • Apple Watch

Here’s what’s in it…

We are SO READY and SO EXCITED to introduce the world to PaMu Quiet.

This is our 4th Indiegogo campaign, with the first 3 being a great success. With your support we hope to break more records!

The PaMu adventure started in 2018 with our first campaign. Of course, we have learned a lot, and bring you the benefit of all our solid experience.

The PadMate team behind PaMu Quiet was founded in 2010 and has Design, R&D, Lab Testing and Large Manufacturing facilities. We’re proud to bring you the PaMu Quiet earphones, in partnership with Qualcomm, ams, Knowles, GE, Murata, Hirose and many other leading edge companies to push TWS earphones to be better and better.
story_txt:
Order more PaMu Earphones on               https://padmate-tech.comThe History-Making, Backer-Delighting Team Is Back And Better Than EverTOGETHER, WE’VE CREATED A WINNING FORMULA:The PaMu Team + The Best Chip Company (Qualcomm) +The Best Noise Cancelling Tech Company (ams) + The Best Microphone Makers (Knowles)=PaMu Quiet, the best Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) earphones you can buy.If your top priority is sound quality, you must try active noise canceling wireless earbuds. Because with active noise canceling, you can immerse yourself fully in music and hear every detail without distractions.  This next generation tech can not be found on normal TWS earphones in the market. Only a few big brands can make TRUE ANC earphones and they are all above $150. We've partnered up with Qualcomm and ams to develop PaMu Quiet. We promise this is  the most affordable and comfortable active noise canceling earphone you can find in the market.Our 3 Indiegogo campaigns so far have raised an amazing $11 MILLION. Big thanks to 200,000+ backers who’s backed us so far…We’ve Set The Bar High, Now We’re Raising It. We’ve been working hard to develop a new product that continues the PaMu legacy. NOW LET’S MAKE MORE HISTORY! Introducing the world’s first active noise canceling (ANC) earphones created in partnership with PaMu, Qualcomm, AMS, & Knowles. We put PaMu Quiet in the slam-dunking, history-making hands of NBA stars to get their take on our new earphones. Success in the NBA is all about NO DISTRACTIONS and TOTAL FOCUS. Slip our ultra comfortable never fall out earphones into your ears and that’s what you’ll experience with PaMu Quiet.If you participated our past 3 campaigns, you definitely know we offer the best price ONLY during our crowdfunding campaign. The price will go up and up as demand gets higher and higher. Wait any longer and you'll completely miss out. Don't regret it. Save big money today!The buzz of crowds. The hum of traffic. The roar of airplanes. We live in a noisy world. When you’re on the move, ambient noise can creep in and spoil what you’re listening to.
PaMu Quiet cancels out crowd noise.
PaMu Quiet deletes distractions.
So you can focus on what you’re listening to.MUSIC • AUDIO BOOKS • CALLS Let’s face it, BEFORE PaMu, earphones were ho-hum. So-so. And in some cases just plain bad. We saw the need to create better quality earphones. Cue the success of our first 3 Indiegogo campaigns. Now we’re back with a fourth. A new product that’s destined to take PaMu to a new level. And like our previous three products, we’ve been innovating, paying attention to details, testing, testing, testing, and delivering a product that’s worthy of the name PaMu.Teams are better than individuals. Just like the left ear works with the right ear to deliver the best stereo sound, for PaMu Quiet, we’ve teamed-up with Qualcomm, ams, Knowles, GE, Murata, HRS etc to deliver enhanced sound chip performance. Only industry leading techniques for PaMu Quiet!We’ve also worked with the best noise cancelling company in the world, AMS, and the creators of quality microphones, KNOWLES. One of their many claims to fame is sending microphones to the moon and back with Neil Armstrong in 1969.. Huge active noise canceling Effects In A Small Package. When it comes to active noise cancelation, PaMu Quiet gets to work in a new way. PaMu Quiet is different than most other active noise canceling earphones that just use either FEEDBACK or FEED-FORWARD noise cancellation. PaMu Quiet uses BOTH, delivering a better active noise cancelation experience with Hybrid Noise CancellationCore Chip, speaker and sound cavity structure are the key parts to achieve better sound. PaMu Quiet offers all the best.PaMu Quiet applies Qualcomm's flagship chip, QCC5124, supporing the best sound quality in the market. Qualcomm aptX Classic, SBC, AAC decoding, 48kHz/16-bit LPCM audio.Ready For Multi-Frequency Brilliance?PaMu Quiet Lets You Listen Loud to;BONE-RATTLING BEATS from the super-deep sub woofer;DEEP RICH BASSLINES thanks to outstanding elasticity;FULL & BRIGHT MIDS for a textured sound;CRYSTAL-CLEAR TREBLE so you hear every nuanceEXCLUSIVE CUSTOMISED SPEAKERThe combination of the following delivers an unprecedented sound experience and performance with beautiful balance across the full frequency range:10mm LARGE DRIVER enhances the depth of the bassAGILE PEN TITANIUM COMPOSITE DIAPHRAGM delivers good ductilityPRECIOUS TITANIUM METAL produces awesome sound quality at high frequenciesPRECISION-DESIGNED SOUND CAVITYWe designed over 10 iterations of PaMu Quiet’s sound cavity before hitting the sweet spot.Our brilliant sound cavity delivers              • AMAZING NOISE CANCELLATION              • PERFECT SOUND QUALITY              • A BIG REDUCTION IN EAR PRESSURE for more comfortYou never have to sacrifice comfort for sound quality with PaMu Quiet. Your ears get the best of both worlds.              BEAUTIFUL SOUND              INCREDIBLE COMFORTHow do we do it? We’ve conducted careful research into 2 key areas that cause discomfort to wearers of earbuds:THE STETHOSCOPE EFFECTThis is a popping sound that can be heard in some earphones when walking or talking. It’s caused by completely sealing the in-ear silicon earplugs. We’ve eliminated the stethoscope effect by designing our earphones with precision vents to open the silicon and equalize the pressure. So you get the same brilliant bass, with better comfort.EAR PRESSURE REDUCTIONOur precision designed sound cavity results in a big reduction in pressure for your enhanced listening comfort.



 
Our 3 previous Indiegogo campaigns have taught us how to deliver. PaMu Quiet is already in production in our factory, so you won’t have to wait long to hear and feel the brilliance of PaMu Quiet in your ears. And we’ve made sure all the features that made past PaMu campaigns such a success are back:• THE BEST PRODUCTS AT UNBELIEVABLY LOW PRICES – Indiegogo is the only place you can buy PaMu Quiet at a never-to-be-repeated low price.• FAST AND SAFE DELIVERY – we successfully delivered to over 80,000 backers last time so know how to ensure you get your perks safe and fast.• REGULAR UPDATES – keep checking back so you know how things are going, and don’t miss the chance to benefit from special promotions and deals.There’s MORE HISTORY TO BE MADE when you back us.Transparency mode makes the earphones "transparent" in terms of audio, letting you hear outside noise. It allows you to be more aware of your surroundings, which is sometimes necessary, like when you are out for a run in a public area and want to be aware of vehicles or people around you. You can easily switch from ANC mode to Transparency mode whenever you want.Whether you're working from home or you've made it into the office, whenever a socket is near you can charge PaMu Quiet using a Type C charger.When you're away from the city and there's no socket in sight, or you left your charger at home (tut! tut!) no problem! You can wirelessly charge your PaMu Quiet earphones using the included charger case.3.5 Hours Of Crisp Sound On One ChargeHow many tunes is that – 50? On one charge in one go. That’s a long enough soundtrack to last most daily commutes there and back, or a whole morning’s work for you digital nomads!10.5 Hours Battery LifeThe PaMu Quiet battery case can charge your earphones twice and give 10.5 hours of playtime in total. That’s enough for a really busy day’s work, and two 7-hour sessions of tunes over the weekend. Plus plenty of call time.In traditional PaMu style, you can operate your earbuds with a tap or two, giving you easy access to Siri, Alexa, and Google Assistant plus other features. So when you’re on the go, in a hurry, or your hands are full, just a tap is all it takes to do all this:Personalize Your PaMu Quiet Via The AppDownload the PaMu app for added functionality:
CHOOSE your earbud settings
Customize your touch control functions
UPGRADE the firmware for a better listening experience.
Who knows where you’ll be when an urgent call comes through? It’s likely to be somewhere with background noise. With PaMu Quiet, there’ll be no screwing up your face as you strain to hear. Our earphones use CVC 8.0 mic reduction to eliminate external noise, so you catch every word.PaMu Quiet earphones are IPX4 water resistant, and sweat resistant too. So no matter what that weather app says, PaMu Quiet will be with you, so you can listen to your favourite tunes and enjoy brilliant sound quality.PaMu Quiet is good to go with your other devices straight out of the box. With your support we hope to break more records!The PaMu adventure started in 2018 with our first campaign. story:
16-channel Have you ever heard of it? Breaking the boundaries 16-channel DAC. 

All New High-End, MRz

Radically different sound by ES9038 totals 16-channel DAC Next Level performance with Rockchip multi-core A72 & A53 CPU and TPA6120A2 Audiophile Headphone Amplifier. MRz+ is the first step in your premium audio player.

MRz introduces an 8-channel DAC chip. 8-channel DACs have previously only been available for premium home audio systems, pro-audio workstations, and recording studio equipment. It is making a debut for the first time in an MRz DAP system. Your favorite tunes will now sound fundamentality different with even greater dynamic range and refined sound. There are many audio companies that talk about 'technologies', yet MRz is the only brand that talks about 'progress' in the audio experience.

Ultimate Sound Quality in Style - MRz Music Center Serves Build with ESS ES9038Q2M SABRE 32bit Reference DAC / DAP/ Audiophile Headphone Amplifier

A true flagship New Generation DAC Chips ESS 9038Q2M high-resolution music player. First  ES9038Q2M player to feature a Rockchip multi-core A72 & A53 processor CPU for outstanding response and performance High Definition TI TPA6120A2 Audiophile Headphone Amplifier out to create the best audio experience.

The MRz Music Center Serves as the digital hub in a high-end audio system providing the same audio performance regardless of the input source. Whether it’s a CD player via Coaxial to the built-in i2s to DAC held on a compact disc without expending effort in turning that digital signal into an analogue output, an uncompressed iTunes library stored on a Mac or Windows computer, or a dedicated music library on a network storage system (NAS), the MRz Music Center will play every note as if it were from the original CD.

 

To a host computer, the Music Center “looks” like a Wireless audio device which both Mac and Windows operating systems support natively. While WiFi connections are physically unlimited to anywhere, the Hi-Resolution Audio “Pont Neuf” creates a connection directly to the Music Center via ethernet cable or through your wired or wireless home network. In either case, no additional software or drivers are required.

 Because the Music Center utilizes your external computer-based music library, it doesn’t rely on a proprietary means of storing your CD data. Any software can be used for ripping and any software can be used for playback. The music library is safer since the storage can be easily backed up to a second drive or protected from loss using “RAID” technology, and capacity can be easily increased by adding off-the-shelf hard drives. With no hard drive located within the Music Center itself, the device remains completely silent and free of vibration. You choose where the library is stored, how it is backed-up, and what software is used to play it.

 

MRz Music Center

 

MRz OLED Info Display

 In addition to the supplied full function remote control App, the MRz Music Center is controllable from an iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch via the free Volumio App.

 Other digital sources such as a DVD player can be played through the external inputs.

Based on the MRz design has been further refined and optimized for the emergence of computer-based music libraries. Built for simple integration into popular sources, the MRz’s modular architecture will accommodate tomorrow’s formats and beyond. 

 

 Sample Configurations

There are a number of ways in which the MRz Music Center can connect with a source computer for playback of a digital library. Below are just a few sample configurations.

Volumio is meant to be a headless dap (digital audio player), just connect it to your home stereo system or active speakers. Then, connect it to your home network and control it just from a browser: Pc, Mac, Android or iOS. Volumio can take your music from USB, Network Storage, streaming services like Spotify and act as a DLNA Player or Airplay receiver.

 

MRz Multi-Devices

 

AT THE HEART OF YOUR DIGITAL HI-FI SYSTEM

MRz device places itself at the heart of a digital music system.

A streamer player: It can reproduce your digital music library from local USB drives or network mounts (NAS), and also plays any internet stream (web radios).

A headless player: It can be remotely controlled by multiple clients running on different devices.

MRz+ digital player: Staying at the top of the audio signal flow chain. It offers perfect and gapless playback of common audio formats.

Outstanding Sound Reproduction Capability That Supports Multiple High-resolution Formats

Here is a list of some of the main features that come as standard with MRz:

MRz not only supports MP3, WMA, OGG but also supports DFF, DSF, ISO(SACD) which is a DSD format and supports lossless formats such as WAV, AIFF, FLAC, ALAC, APE to offer the full spectrum of high-quality sound formats.

 THE SIMPLEST WAY TO ENJOY MUSIC

Control Volumio thanks to its slick Web-based control interface. Use it with any browser, with any device: Mac, Pc, Android, iOS or anything with a browser. Everything from configuration to Playback is just a fingertip away.

 In this configuration, the host computer is connected directly to the MRz Music Center over a Wireless network. Playback on the source computer can be controlled via the PC or through any WiFi-based remote control such as an Apple iPad. Note that a second input can also be used (in this case, a DVD player) and chosen with the supplied remote control or through the App with an iPad.

 

The party is on! When your friends show up, you can all DJ together.

Connect. Stream. Listen.

D.A. Hybrid Amplifier Circuit: a revolution in sound amplification

The non-feedback D.A. Hybrid Amplifier technology maintains the purity of digital sound. Our new D.A. Hybrid Amplifier Circuit takes this one step further, enhancing its precision and sound quality with an analog feed-forward amp. The analog amplifier corrects the conversion error caused by switching amplification.

TECHNOLOGIES

With its extensive Research and Development programme MRz has pioneered the development of a host of innovative audio technologies of which feature in today’s MRz+ products.

 

Powerful all in one Audiophile Headphone Amplifier Music Server and Media Center.

 

 

 

And remember that you can reach us in all our social platforms and website:

 

WEBSITE | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | INSTAGRAM | YOUTUBE

 

MRz is bringing innovative technology and imaginative ideas together to redefine the way we live our lives.

At MRz, our philosophy is about empowering our innovative creative streak to enhance user experience. We are a multicultural team with VOCAL SOUND skills and backgrounds, brought together by the common purpose to enrich your everyday life for better music and love for all music.

We are a team of friends, workmate, designers, engineers, audio lover, and operations experts bound together with one sole purpose in mind: creating audio solutions that MRz and enhance modern lifestyle for SOUND.

Our Team expert work at ST Microelectronics, Analog Devices and RockChip….

Tooling Production Already 

 

 
 

Press Release

One Signature Sound: MRz DAP Ai Pushes the Boundaries with the Ultimate Personal Audio and Home Entertainment Hub

• • Made up of pure audio out, connected any devices become music server with home music library

• • Delivering exceptional sound quality with High-Resolution Audio

• • Engineered with meticulous attention to detail using the highest quality materials

SMALL and Unlimited features, MRz: announces that its Next Generation Ai Smart Digital Audio Player, the “MRz DAP Ai”

The MRz DAP Ai is milled from an aluminium and boasts Ai Operation System and ESS SABRE 32bit Reference DAC (Digital to Analogue converters ES9028Q2M) as well as 16GB of internal memory that’s expandable to 512GB - nearly half a Terabyte.

MRz DAP Ai has placed a particular focus on tailoring and enhancing sound quality for this model. To that end, selected components – including high-quality film capacitors – have been employed after careful and extensive listening. The result is a DAP that conveys an uncommon level of rich musicality.

Remarkably at its lower price point (USD199 on IGG), the MRz DAP Ai also comes with a Music Hub connection input/output, allowing it to make convenience with a home entertainment system to popular for everyone.

As you’d expect, the MRz DAP Ai supports an extensive range of digital audio files including MQA. Formats that can be handled include DSD, FLAC, ALAC, WAV, AIFF (up to a maximum of 768 kHz/32-bit), AAC, and MP3. A dual digital clock arrangement (using independent 44.1kHz and 48kHz clocks) drastically reduces jitter noise. Upgrade your home stereo system to Hi-End HiFi with digital library system in time.

The MRz DAP Ai incorporates Wi-Fi to allow streaming from services such as Tidal and TuneIn (support for further streaming services – including Tidal MQA).

Totally Wireless Control Volumio thanks to its slick Web-based control interface. Use it with any browser, with any device: Mac, Pc, Android, iOS or anything with a browser. Everything from configuration to Playback is just a fingertip away. MRz DAP Ai as we as multi-room speaker system supported. simplifying day-to-day use and operation.

Expanding video options yet further, Thanks for Android Ai the Upgradeable operating system can become AV entertainment centre with 4K video and Hi-Res audio out. UHD 4K Video Player and Hi-Res Audio Player and Game console all in one.

Optional Qi wireless charging function on top, Never worried about batteries low while song playing.

Risks and challenges

The estimated delivery date for the MRz is in line with our production schedule for a first run. There is always a chance that we will encounter delays, as our production turnaround is tight (shipping in May 2019). If there are any delays along the way, we will be very transparent with our backers, addressing all issues with care and immediacy. Additionally, the parties are pending attendees' schedule. We will keep you very much in the loop, but do know that you will get your MRz this May.

More Info About Delivery.

While we are hoping that people in every country around the world join our movement and pledge for MRz there are regional licensing limitations. If this is the case, and we cannot send you a MRz due to your country's restrictions, we will immediately refund your pledge and keep you in the loop about when your country becomes available.

story:
Sound is all around us, all the time. Sometimes we ignore it, sometimes we cherish it. 

But why is sound so important?

We spend everyday hearing and listening, it is part of our lives.  Sound is influential, it can be informative, educational, conclusive, emotive, and many other things for us.

The problem is people remember only 30% of what they hear. Smartphones can do the ‘work’, they are certainly not built to be digital voice recorders. 

So why not try the better solution?

Born from a team of researchers and engineers who spend many hours in front of a computer, TileRec is our constant reminder to take a walk and "stop and smell the roses", so to speak.

We designed TileRec to exceed even our own extremely high personal standards.

  •  Thin: Only 1/4 inch thin. Fits easily in the slimmest wallets.
  •  Small: As small as a piece of a chocolate bar ( 2.48 square inch).
  •  Light:  The same weight as a US penny (0.5 oz).
  •  Simple: Simple everything! Easy to use, easy to recharge and easy to playback.
  •  Long-lasting Battery: 24 hours on one charge. Designed to be used the entire day.
  •  Surround Recording: 360 degrees recording in a 15 feet range. Meeting, lecture or simple discussion - all sounds are easily captured with HQ clarity.
  •  Resistant: 100% recycled aluminum casing. Sleek design that blends discreetly in the everyday setup.

When we say "World's Slimmest", we mean it! 

 

Measuring in at a staggering 1.6 inch in length, and 1/4 inch in height, weighing only 0.5 oz nothing else on the market comes close with the discreet portability offered by TileRec.  

TileRec is so slim and small than it can fit almost anywhere you can think of.

It blends discreetly with everyday objects - in your pocket or wallet, between the pages of an agenda, on your desk or even on your child's backpack.

Traditional voice recorders were bulky and uncomfortable, limiting day-to-day activities.   

The idea of a voice recorder so slim and thin that it can be used as a  personal assistant is to improve the daily productivity of its user. 

And is practically indestructible.

You can drop it, step on it, even run the car over and then resume recording.

Most smartphones have a built-in voice recorder app that you can use anytime, so they can do the ‘work’, but certainly are not built to be digital voice recorders. So, what makes TileRec so superior to smartphones when it comes to recording?  

TileRec is perfect for anyone that wants to work simpler, faster and better – without compromising quality. 

Small, discreet and efficient, Tilerec is the latest voice recorder designed by ATTO DIGITAL, created to encompass the ideal balance between form and function. 

TileRec is recording in MP3 format, using a 128 kbps bit rate. You can choose to set it to record in continuous mode or in voice-activated mode to capture sounds in a 15 feet range (360 degrees).

In voice-activated mode, the ultra-performant sensor of the microphone will initiate ad start recording only when sounds are detected in the range of the recorder (15 feet) thus avoiding recording long silent periods and saving memory time.

The built-in Li-Po 3.7 V battery (240 mAh) needs only 1.5 hours to fully charge (DC IN 5 V 500mA), even when connected to a computer and will be up and running for more than 24 hours.

Record the entire day then just plug & play all your recordings. 

 TileRec can also record while charging so you will not miss any information that matters to you.

 

Let’s get nostalgic for a hot second. Reflect on a childhood memory, recalling an exact time or event — what you were wearing, who you were with, the sights, smells, tastes. Try to remember how you felt, specific noises like, I don’t know, shrilling crickets layered under siblings’ laughter or, the sound of your mother's voice.

It’s difficult, right? Unless the event was recorded, the memory is likely pretty hazy.  You live in a fast-paced world where TIME is MONEY and you are searching for the best tool to improve productivity and save time?  

 Here are  some situations  TileRec can help you with:  

TileRec is designed to record your daily meetings, activities, and ideas in a non-intrusive way and carries our belief that “wear-ability” is the utmost goal in the design of everyday carry technology. 

Also, if you have family members that need assistance and constant surveillance (toddlers, non-verbal children or adults, elders with degenerative diseases), TileRec is the discreet solution that can help you keep track of their progress and care in your absence.

 

 

  

So why not take the leap into the digital era? Stop wasting time and paper trying to keep track of all the information. 

Just slide one button to record and enjoy the Tilerec experience.

Use the USB cord to connect your TileRec to any computer and select the audio file you need to playback.  It's just that simple: 

 

Check on Soundcloud the audio sample recorder with TileRec.

You can also check the LIVE demo of TileRec recording capacities:

 

The Li-Po built-in battery of TileRec is re-chargeable for more than 1000 charging cycles. It takes only 1.5 hours to fully charge the battery, then it can record continuously or in voice-activated mode, for more than 24 hours. 

Have you ever wondered how much paper we use yearly? 

Americans use 85,000,000 tons of paper a year; about 680 pounds per person. The average household throws away 13,000 separate pieces of paper each year. 

Using TileRec for your daily notes and meetings saves time, effort and also 1 tree/ person/ year from becoming paper. 

All this while increasing productivity, saving time and keeping all your information organized with time and date stamp!

 Find a reward that works for you and your family, office or team, there's something for everyone.  We are particularly excited to offer fast shipping in the US and EU.

 

 This is ATTO DIGITAL's  2nd product launched via crowdfunding.  

We always deliver. We've learned a ton over our first Kickstarter, helping develop a good sense of our capabilities and timeline.

The satisfaction of our users is paramount!

That is why we want to make sure that when you enter the ATTO  family you feel the care and support.

Our Customer Service team is  24/7 available to offer support in more than 5 languages. And because we really do believe in the manufacturing quality of our recorders, we offer lifetime warranty for TileRec backers.

We, the ATTO DIGITAL team, have more than 10 years of combined experience in designing, producing and selling sound recorders and surveillance equipment.

Our mission and passion are to listen, so it is also paramount for us to listen to our customers' feedback to better understand how the ideal mini voice recorder should be. 

Our team is ready - so is the manufacturing - now we just need you! 

It has been a long adventure. From brainstorming to product design, engineering, and branding, it has been a trying, monumental amount of time, conviction and expertise.

It has been a stressful, exciting and thrilling experience to design a product from scratch. We want YOU to be part of our experience! 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product! We can't do this without you.
story_txt:
Sound is all around us, all the time. Sometimes we ignore it, sometimes we cherish it. 
But why is sound so important?
We spend everyday hearing and listening, it is part of our lives.  Sound is influential, it can be informative, educational, conclusive, emotive, and many other things for us.
The problem is people remember only 30% of what they hear. Smartphones can do the ‘work’, they are certainly not built to be digital voice recorders. 
So why not try the better solution?


Born from a team of researchers and engineers who spend many hours in front of a computer, TileRec is our constant reminder to take a walk and "stop and smell the roses", so to speak.

We designed TileRec to exceed even our own extremely high personal standards.



 Thin: Only 1/4 inch thin. Fits easily in the slimmest wallets.
 Small: As small as a piece of a chocolate bar ( 2.48 square inch).

story:
Sports earphones are everywhere, but none live up to the likes of BLADE - the true combination of A.I. Fitness Technology and Music, designed with the technology of Personalized A.I. Voice Coaching, Smart Heart Rate Sensor and SOUL FIT App.

 
Real-time Personalized Voice Coaching, powered by BiomechEngine™, differentiates BLADE from other sports earphones. Unlike other products which only track and report the basic data, such as running time, cadence, speed, etc, BLADE offers more by capturing and analyzing your motion data to deliver real-time personalized coaching advice. 
 

With the BiomechEngine™ collecting all your training data and evaluating them in real-time, SOUL’s Personalized A.I. Voice Coaching is able to monitor your running form and provide instant feedback to correct your posture seamlessly. With a proper running posture, risk of different kinds of running injuries, such as Runner's knee, Hamstring issues and etc, would be greatly minimized.

A good running form minimizes the energy wasted from unnecessary motions and thereby maintains the running efficiency. With A.I. Voice Coaching, a better running form could be maintained to help you run faster and longer distance. 

For example, BLADE is able to monitor your step width to see if it is correct, as a narrower step width reduces unnecessary side movements, saving your energy.

In the past, to extract such a large amount of running form data, a high level of scientific equipment was a must; however, thanks to BiomechEngine™, the world’s first biomechanics solution developed by Beflex Inc., founded by a group of professional researchers from KAIST in Korea, we are now able to track and monitor our running form anytime and anywhere with just a pair of tiny earbuds.

 

 
 
 

Unlike other tracking devices, BLADE's built-in Smart Heart Rate Sensor does not only monitor your body condition during workout, but also provides you with instant coaching advice by alerting you once the target heart rate zone has been reached. When beginning a workout session, you may need to gradually build up to a level that is within your target heart rate zone. Such function enhances your training efficiency and avoids over-training. 

 

We understand that the accuracy of heart rate sensor is essential to your training, so we have teamed up with Valencell, the leading innovator in high-performance biometric sensor technology for wearables and hearables, to incorporate their HRM solutions into BLADE and bring the most reliable monitoring function to you.

 

Your effort is a waste if you do not have a set of right information to review and analyze. Running distance and pace are essential but these data do not tell you about the full picture of your training performance. With BLADE, data of your running form and heart rate condition will be collected in real-time and automatically synchronized into SOUL FIT app.

Other than that, all these data will be visualized into meaningful number and charts which enable you to monitor your training progress anytime. Not only basic tracking data is provided, but also information of running form and evaluation of injury risk, which both are not available from other sport earphones, or even other tracking wearable.

 

BLADE is designed with Bluetooth 5.0 technology to enable 2X faster data transfer speed and 4X range of data transmission. Simply speaking, BLADE provides not only a stronger connection, but also ultimate sound quality as a result of the minimum audio data loss in transmission.

Comes along with an USB Type-C Charging Case with fast charging function, BLADE delivers the best sound quality for up to 96 hours on-the-go, almost 24 times of full marathon races.

With the IPX7 waterproof design, BLADE can be fully submerged up to 1 meter in water for 30 minutes. BLADE is designed for every condition: From excess perspiration as a result of arduous training, to extreme climate during any outdoor activities.

 

Developed with a pair of 5.8mm powerful dynamic drivers, BLADE delivers superior sound quality with rich bass and balanced mids and highs seamlessly by the Advanced Audio Coding (AAC), which achieves better sound quality than MP3 format at the same bit rate.

We would like you to get indulged in the immersive sound quality from BLADE, but we do also concern about your safety when walking across busy junctions or during night run. So we design BLADE with Transparent Audio Mode which allows you to hear the surrounding whenever you need to.

 

BLADE is attached with Freebit™ C-shape Ear Hooks to guarantee a secure fit. The perfectly designed contours keep both earbuds securely in place at all times. In addition to the comforty factor, the build of BLADE produces a passive noise isolation effect, which is able to keep all extraneous audio interference to a minimum.

 

Stop pressing your old true wireless earphones inside your ears, just for changing a song. BLADE is designed with a Smart Touch Interface for you to control playlist, answer calls and activate your Siri or Google Assistant, simply with just a tap and most importantly, you don’t need to hurt your ears anymore.

No longer suffering from Mono Call (Output sound from only one side of earphones) with your existing true wireless earphones, BLADE is engineered for Stereo Call which means that both sides of earphones will output the voice from another side of your call.

What is more, thanks to the MEMS Mic, which featured with matched sensitivity, flat frequency response and a high signal to noise ratio, your friends can now hear you clearly wherever you are at home or crowded area.

No more hassle to connect your BLADE with smartphones. Simply take out the earbuds from charging case and they will be automatically paired up right away.

We do not only provide you with two color options for BLADE, but also the options of which leather cover to go along with the charging case. With magnetic design, you could easily change the leather cover with just a flip.

If you are an online influencer/ brand owner/ athlete/ etc., let us know as we would like to design the customized leather cover for you!

BLADE allows you to connect with the world anytime during your training, just a touch away to activate your Siri or Google Assistant.

 

We design BLADE as the Ultimate Solution to cater to the need of fitness enthusiasts and music lovers, but we won’t just stop from here. We have a long-term perspective to build a virtual community for our BLADE users which allows them to share their fitness record, training plan, playlist and more, to their connections via SOUL FIT App.

Besides, thanks to the BiomechEngine™, we will continue to extend the possibilities to track activities like biking, CrossFit training, golfing or even transforming into a sleeping motion device to provide you with all-rounded data, fits into your every lifestyle.

At SOUL we are a team of creative industrial designers and makers specialized in consumer electronics and manufacturing, with a rich history in delivering innovative technology and concepts including high quality audio, noise cancelling, and wireless products.  We represent a vision for innovative feature-driven designs with state-of-the-art acoustics, and stylish appearance that can be found in SOUL’s past and future products.

story:
You may have seen videos of handpan artists on YouTube and Facebook, and marveled at the incredible sound they produce.
(If you haven't, check out Yuki Koshimoto, Paul Boyter or Hang Massive - a few of the legends)


The Lumen is an electronic percussion instrument in the form of a handpan, which provides the unique playing experience of it's acoustic inspiration, with the added benefits that electronics bring. It features built-in amplified speakers, an advanced on-board audio processor and full velocity sensitivity.

We want artists around the world to be able to pick up the instrument, turn it on and play - no need to connect to any other equipment. Being an electronic instrument, you can of course output the audio signal or MIDI messages straight from the Lumen.



Why Make an Electronic Handpan?

Acoustic handpans, from their origins in Switzerland to the many varieties available today, all have a number of things in common:

  • A beautiful, vibrant sound
  • Distinctive playing style
  • Rare
  • Expensive
The last two are the key: artists around the world struggle to get hold of them. We want to change that.

A second hand Hang, the instrument which originally inspired the Lumen, has been seen on eBay for over $9000. Even modern acoustic alternatives sell for upward of $2000.




So, where to from here?

The prototype you see in our launch video is what we've managed to achieve on our own. In order to take it to the next level, we need to hand it over to an industrial design team - and we already have an award winning team standing by.

Once the project is funded, we'll work closely with them to work out all of the details, hopefully adding some extra features as we go.

Paul Boyter, a renowned percussionist (and star of our launch video), will be providing assistance from the performance side, while Soniccouture will be doing the instrument sampling and sound design.


Funding



What will it cost?

  • Super Early Birds: $499 / €440
  • Early Birds: $599 / €530
  • Crowd funding price: $699 / €615
  • Estimated retail: $799 / €699


Shipping

PLEASE NOTE: Shipping will be charged after the campaign is fully funded. This will allow us the opportunity to negotiate the best possible rate with our shipping partners based on expected volumes.

Frequently Asked Questions

Will it have a 1/4" jack?

Yes - a highly requested feature and it will be included.

How long will the battery last?

Our goal is to have it last 4 hours if using the built-in speaker system and considerably longer if only outputting audio/MIDI.

Is it polyphonic?

Yes - although we didn't highlight it, our prototype featured polyphony of 14 voices. This is obviously too limited, so we are now using a chip that handles polyphony up to 256 voices.

What are the dimensions and weight?

Our prototype is 450 x 450 x 250mm, but the final dimensions will be influenced by the size of the built-in speakers. The shell material is being experimented with so we don't have a fixed weight as yet.

Is shipping free?

No - as stated on the perks and on the campaign page, we will charge shipping only when it is time to ship.

Can we get a wood version, like the prototype?

At this point we don't plan to make the production version from wood. If sales go really well we'd like to explore a hand-carved shell but that will be further down the line.


Stretch Goals!

If we reach these targets we'll design the bag and travel case as below - but we need to reach them before we start. If we get to the $90,000 target we will make that bag available as an perk. Help us get there!


Risks & Challenges

As this is a new product, there is the chance that we could run into manufacturing and production delays which are beyond our control. We will be open and transparent in these cases, and keep all of our backers in the loop.

We want to make the Lumen from the highest quality components possible, which may take time to source and assemble. We believe we've given ourselves enough time to do that; and if there are any delays we will communicate those as well.


How can I help?

The best way is to back us, we need you!

If you can't, but think that the Lumen is a product that should be available to the world, please share this campaign with friends; every contribution helps.

So, where to from here?

 The prototype you see in our launch video is what we've managed to achieve on our own. In order to take it to the next level, we need to hand it over to an industrial design team - and we already have an award winning team standing by.
Once the project is funded, we'll work closely with them to work out all of the details, hopefully adding some extra features as we go.
Paul Boyter, a renowned percussionist (and star of our launch video), will be providing assistance from the performance side, while Soniccouture will be doing the instrument sampling and sound design.





Funding






What will it cost?

Super Early Birds: $499 / €440
Early Birds: $599 / €530
Crowd funding price: $699 / €615
Estimated retail: $799 / €699



Shipping
PLEASE NOTE: Shipping will be charged after the campaign is fully funded. This will allow us the opportunity to negotiate the best possible rate with our shipping partners based on expected volumes.
Frequently Asked Questions
Will it have a 1/4" jack?

Yes - a highly requested feature and it will be included.
How long will the battery last?
Our goal is to have it last 4 hours if using the built-in speaker system and considerably longer if only outputting audio/MIDI.
Is it polyphonic?
Yes - although we didn't highlight it, our prototype featured polyphony of 14 voices. This is obviously too limited, so we are now using a chip that handles polyphony up to 256 voices.
What are the dimensions and weight?
Our prototype is 450 x 450 x 250mm, but the final dimensions will be influenced by the size of the built-in speakers. The shell material is being experimented with so we don't have a fixed weight as yet.
Is shipping free?
No - as stated on the perks and on the campaign page, we will charge shipping only when it is time to ship.
Can we get a wood version, like the prototype?
At this point we don't plan to make the production version from wood. If sales go really well we'd like to explore a hand-carved shell but that will be further down the line.


Stretch Goals!
If we reach these targets we'll design the bag and travel case as below - but we need to reach them before we start. If we get to the $90,000 target we will make that bag available as an perk. Help us get there!






    Risks & Challenges As this is a new product, there is the chance that we could run into manufacturing and production delays which are beyond our control. We will be open and transparent in these cases, and keep all of our backers in the loop.
We want to make the Lumen from the highest quality components possible, which may take time to source and assemble. We believe we've given ourselves enough time to do that; and if there are any delays we will communicate those as well.

How can I help?
 The best way is to back us, we need you!
If you can't, but think that the Lumen is a product that should be available to the world, please share this campaign with friends; every contribution helps.

story:
HP BP5000 is manufactured and sold under the license of HP Inc in compliance with safety and regulatory certifications – FCC / CE / CB / CCC / SRRC / BSMI / NCC / RoHS.

 
 
 
 

 

Measured from the light source at a brightness of 6000 optical lumens (2000 ANSI lumens), the optical engine offers high dynamic contrast ratio. This enables impactful cinematic experiences that is effectively immune to the interference of ambient light.

 

Unlike traditional LCD TV, projected image diffusion technology does not generate direct light, thus providing visual comfort over long-term viewing, protecting the eyes of you and your loved ones.

 

An embedded eye protection motion sensor automatically switches off the laser light source when it detects those that may be too close to the projector, avoiding visual damage caused by laser light.

 

HP BP5000 uses a precision lens featuring a short focal length with an ultra-short throw projection ratio of 0.23:1. Just place it on a TV cabinet against the wall to instantly create a larger-than-life viewing experience of up to 150’’ – obstruction-free.

 

With a world-first advanced liquid cooling structure within, it enables efficient heat-dissipation. This ensures HP BP5000 runs completely silent, thus maximizing operational life and immersive entertainment experiences without any unnecessary noise.

 

Featuring a TI DLP (Digital Light Processor) chip, HP BP5000 displays in native 4K UHD image resolution. With more than four times the resolution of full HD, with 8.3 million pixels (3840 x 2160) in a single frame, that means hyper-realistic images with corner-to-corner sharpness at any angle, all within epic screen proportions.

ALPD®️  laser-phosphor fluorescent display technology ensures unsurpassed performance in color display, contrast ratio and brightness. It enables brighter and clearer character presentation, supporting DCI-P3 cinema-grade ultra-wide color gamut, delivering more realistic color rendition.

*ALPD®️ used in 17,000+ theatres worldwide.

 

HDR10 decoding dynamically enhances picture quality, frame-by-frame. Details are rendered with a full color spectrum from deep inky blacks, purer whites, through to vibrant reds, blues and greens. Shadows and highlights are all showcased in extreme realism to what is seen by human eyes.

 

With MEMC interpolation technology, motion blur and judder in fast-moving images is greatly reduced for dynamically fluid picture. Watching sports action and movie blockbusters become true-to-life immersion that feels like you're actually there.

 

Image warping correction utilizes 4 points trapezoid correction, plus 8 points + 2 axes curve correction adjustment. With built-in installation assist, uneven wall surfaces, improper placement and accidental nudges, are all instantly auto-focused to display an ultra-crisp picture with zero distortion from corner to corner.

 

ALPD®️ 3.0 patented projection technology is extremely efficient. With long-term reliability of more than 25,000 hours, it delivers consistent brightness performance throughout its entire lifespan –no replacement of the laser lamp required.

 

With the crystal-clear 4K display paired with a high-fidelity audio system, together, brings your entertainment to life. An integrated full range stereo 30W speaker set with subwoofer, is optimized to deliver smooth mid-range, clear vocals and deep bass. This is true audio-visual immersion.

 

Switch off the display for a true audio only experience. Load up your content, turn up the volume, sit back, close your eyes and focus on the richly-detailed 360 degree lifelike sound.

With Bluetooth-out, wirelessly connect your favorite set of earbuds or headphones for a more intimate listening experience.

 

With the EShare app, you can mirror the screen of your iOS / Android device wirelessly, to enjoy your content on the big screen.

Display photos, watch video and play games in supersized format for a larger-than-life experience.

 

The flagship TV chip MStar 6A848, features a quad-core 64-bit CPU, Mali-T820 MP2 GPU, dual DLP drivers. The dedicated 4K color processing chip Xilinx XC7K160T, delivers supreme color rendering. Together, ensuring smooth lag-free performance even while playing high-bit rate videos or graphic-intensive games.

 

The meticulously crafted seamless metal body, exemplifies a perfect blend of superior build and heightened visual appeal. With a timeless and minimalist design, HP BP5000 can easily harmonize with a variety of home interiors.

 

Elevate your experience with an optional FS100 UST ALR screen. Available for purchase, designed specifically for ultra-short throw projectors.

With a screen size of 100’’, a super-slim bezel of 8mm, at only 6mm in thickness, it utilizes cutting-edge Fresnel lens core technology with all axis rejection. This means ambient light from above and windows on the side is shielded, only accepting light from directly below, from the projector.

This delivers an overall razor-edged display with significantly better uniform brightness, spectacular contrast, vivid colors and consistent viewing experiences from - any angle, any time, in any lighting condition.

Screen Dimensions: 2234 x 1265 x 6mm

 

Bundled with HP BP5000, Roku® Express 4K gives you instant access to your favorite shows in 4K, HD and HDR, on free, subscription, live TV, rent-or-buy, music channels such as BBC, ABC, Netflix, Apple TV and Spotify just to name a few.

You’ll also be able to use it with popular voice assistants - Siri, Alexa and Hey Google.

 

Featuring S/PDIF, HDMI ARC, AUX and USB ports, HP BP5000 offers you limitless entertainment possibilities with gaming consoles, audio equipment, set-top, streaming stick, HDD player, microphone, USB hard-drive, just to name a few.

Instantly elevate your audio to theatre-grade level by connecting to HDMI ARC or S/PDIF compatible speaker sets and immerse yourself in captivating professional audio and visual bliss.

story:
SpeakEasy Stereo System | Sets Itself Apart

Designed for those who want to enjoy the highest quality sound of music, the ability to control compatible devices throughout the home, and manage every day tasks – all with the power of your voice.

You can listen to the SpeakEasy Stereo System on it's own, or connect it wirelessly to The Como Audio Bluetooth Turntable and enjoy your record collection.

Founding CEO Tom DeVesto started Como Audio with the single goal of creating beautiful music systems that allow simple and easy access to the myriad of music content available to today’s music enthusiast. SpeakEasy Stereo System takes this simplicity to the next level with the Google Assistant built-in. 

True High-Fidelity Stereo System

Unlike one-piece "stereo" smart speakers which offer little to no channel separation, or manipulate the sound in an attempt to simulate stereo sound, SpeakEasy Stereo System is a true two channel, Hi-Fi system. Once the wire from the SpeakEasy Speaker is connected, the two units provide an authentic stereo image and generous sound stage, just like music was meant to be heard.

Should your Wi-Fi network become unavailable, you'll continue to experience stereo sound from both units when streaming via Bluetooth from the Como Audio Turntable or your smart phone. Since the SpeakEasy Speaker takes its power from SpeakEasy's stereo amplifier, an external power supply is not needed. And since the SpeakEasy Speaker is wired, it won't take additional bandwidth from your network.

Sound Quality | Designed to Play Music 

Each unit features  a ¾” soft dome tweeter and 3” custom, dual voice coil woofer. Along with the custom DSP equalization, the result is great high-fidelity sound, reproducing your favorite music as it was recorded.

The rear port further enhances low bass frequencies while conveniently doubling as a carry handle.  A 25 watt per channel Class D digital amplifier supplies plenty of volume, while a nearly ½” thick MDF cabinet holds everything together with a distinguished look. Supported audio codecs include HE-AAC, LC-AAC, CELT/Opus, MP3, Vorbis, Wav, and FLAC.

Google Assistant

SpeakEasy Stereo System with the Google Assistant built in allows you to speak voice commands to play music “OK Google....play my favorite country song,” get information “What's the weather today?,” or control your home environment “Turn up the thermostat 5 degrees,” or “Dim the lights.” Set up and control is performed using the free Google Home app for iOS and Android with compatible devices.

 

Bluetooth 4.2

Should your Wi-Fi network become temporarily unavailable, or if you wish to access a source not available through Wi-Fi, Bluetooth is on-board to provide a CD-quality, wireless, stereo streaming alternative.

 

Portable

Take your Assistant with you thanks to the included custom 2200mAh Lithium-ion battery pack, providing an average 8 hours of playback on a full charge. A full charge typically takes less than 4 hours with the integrated charger, which also means you don't have to remove the battery pack every time you need to charge it.

 

Display | Clock & Alarm

A crisp, red LED display continually shows the time without you having to ask. Display icons indicate when the Alarm is set, when the Alarm is in Snooze mode, when the timer is active, and when the battery pack is charging. A front panel photocell sensor automatically adjusts the backlight based on ambient light conditions.

 

SpeakEasy pictured in walnut. Final production version may vary. 

 

Furniture Grade Cabinet

SpeakEasy Stereo System is made with a robust MDF cabinet, just like a home loudspeaker, wrapped in a real walnut wood veneer. The top and front panels and knobs are anodized aluminum and the speaker grilles are painted aluminum. Outside of the LED display and sensor, no plastic is used on the baffle. 

SpeakEasy's thick cabinet contributes to its great sound quality, just like a traditional home loudspeaker.

 

The Como Audio Bluetooth Turntable

NOT JUST A TURNTABLE 

The belt-driven Como Audio Turntable includes a nearly 12" diameter (300 mm) heavy steel platter, an Ortofon OM10 magnetic cartridge pre-mounted to an 8.6" (218 mm) aluminum tone arm, and a dedicated electronic speed control for 33 and 45 RPM. A removable transparent dust cover, Como Audio slip mat, and 100-240V external power supply are also included.

Connect Como Audio's Turntable via Bluetooth to SpeakEasy and stream the sound of your favorite records wirelessly to the SpeakEasy Stereo System. The Como Audio Turntable is available in the same walnut finish as the SpeakEasy Stereo System for a harmonious visual presentation.

✅ MRSP Como Audio Turntable: $399  (SAVE 37% with the Earlybird SpeakEasy Stereo + Turntable perk $499.) Normal MRSP of SpeakEasy Stereo + Como Audio Turntable: $798. 

About Tom DeVesto and Como Audio

Over the last 40 years, consumer electronics Hall of Fame Legend and visionary Tom DeVesto focused on consistently bringing new experiences to the consumer electronics market, enhancing and improving upon expectations.

Whether he was introducing the theater experience to the home audiences at Advent and with Kloss Video big screen TVs in the 1970’s, or selling stereo systems direct to the consumer at Cambridge SoundWorks in the 1980’s and 90’s, or making high performance radios with great design and sound reflective of another era at Tivoli Audio, Tom DeVesto never lost sight of the his goal: make a high quality product that supports the latest technology — is simple to operate – has distinctive design – takes up a small amount of space – and doesn’t become obsolete.

Millions of the products created by Tom DeVesto are used around the world today. He returns to the consumer electronics marketplace with a new Boston, Massachusetts based company “Como Audio”. Here he will continue his goal of bringing high performance, vision, design, and long-lasting products to the consumer. Products that will, hopefully, continue to raise the bar on their expectations.

Como Audio 's Boston, MA office.

 

In The News

CLICK HERE to see all Como Audio news from around the world. 

 

MORE ABOUT THE SPEAKEASY STEREO SYSTEM 

 

Multi-room Control | Google Chromecast

In addition to the Como Audio Turntable, SpeakEasy Stereo System has the ability to wirelessly link with other Como Audio music systems to create whole house multi-room streaming using the free Google Home app. This is great news for our existing Como Audio customers. Simply connect Google Chromecast Audio devices (not included) to other Como Audio units and ask SpeakyEasy with the Google Assistant built-in to play your favorite music in one room or all rooms in your home. 

A Google Chromecast device (not included) shown without its power supply connected (adhered to rear of Como Audio Solo with Velcro). 

 

Manual Control Knobs

We’ve also included something you don’t see much these days, especially on Assistant speakers- actual knobs when you prefer to do things the old-fashioned way and manually control Volume (and On/Off in battery mode), Play/Pause, Microphone mute, and Bluetooth.

Automatic Software Updates

Get free automatic software updates via Wi-Fi from Google and Como Audio whenever features are added or improved, so your SpeakEasy Stereo System always stays up to date.

Google Home App

Setting up your SpeakEasy Stereo System and linking your premium music streaming accounts, Chromecast Audio devices, and compatible home devices is made simple using the free Google Home app for iSO, Android, MAC, Windows, and Chromebook.

Smart Phone Charging

You’ll get a charge out of this: SpeakEasy's rear panel 5V/1A USB output will charge your smart device when it’s running low on juice (when the power supply is connected to SpeakEasy).

 

Risks and challenges

We expect to fulfill all orders by Fall 2019. However, it's possible that our production schedule may shift based on the number of orders we receive.

Como is staffed by a team of audio experts who have produced millions of music solutions over many decades. While we cannot confirm final production dates until our campaign ends, we have the knowledge and connections to execute the Speakeasy Stereo System quickly, beautifully, and with the highest audio quality.

story:
"Good morning, good afternoon or good evening, wherever you maybe, welcome to the PureSounds Headset Project!" 

(Inspired by the C2C host George Noory)


Background (Typical Scenario)

I am sure I am not the only one who came up with a burning desire to perfect the sound quality of both earphones and microphone of most headsets. Usually, it is so frustrating to find out that it just does not work, especially the microphone part. Sometimes, it barely works and is definitely not up to your satisfaction. It can be laden with all kinds of noises, hums, pops, clicks, statics and contact losses. After paying decently or sometimes dearly, you find that it offers very little value for your money.


Early Prototypes Success

So, I went a step further and created a prototype.


My early crude PureSounds prototype

As you rightly guess, yes, it failed fantastically! I believed in "first things must fail" motto, so it did not set me back at all. I kept on modifying and learning from mistakes until one day when I perfected it. So perfect that I was asked by a factory representative how I achieved it.

PureSounds' real performance on a PC with -47dBFS noise floor

Later, I sold a bunch of those early crude prototypes that I called SECM to people all over the world! I had to stop making them, as I went to study at the university. (SECM means Super Excellent Computer Microphone!)


Back on Track

(...... some miseries here ......) Then I got a few jobs, saved up a bit of money to continue what I enjoy doing; innovating. First thing that came to my mind was my PureSounds headset project.


What is a PureSounds Headset

If you are curious about what a PureSounds headset is or wonder if it is yet another mega sound headset project, please let me tell you that it has more to offer! In fact, it is a funky multipurpose headset. 


With a PureSounds headset, not only that you could enjoy great music whenever and wherever you want, you no longer need to scream into your microphone when you speak or bare the noise, clipping, cracking and statics. All these plus the best build quality materials and last, but not least, at a very reasonable price.

PureSounds headset description

PureSounds headset, a true value for money!

It’s a truly plug and play device that works on any computer or audio system. No software is needed. The electronic circuit board inside the headset processes the voice data in real-time with no alteration.

You can use the PureSounds headset to listen to music. It will be built with a pair of highest quality double rare earth magnet speakers for you to enjoy your great music in its purest and richest sounds; from the faintest tumbling bass to the loudest bursts.

You can use the PureSounds headset to talk to your loved ones via your computer. Thank to the noise cancelling ability of the embedded circuit, your voice will sound in the most natural way. Your love ones on the other side will not be able to differentiate whether you are talking via your computer or next to them!

You can use the PureSounds headsets to run a call centre or telesales business. Because of its superb microphone sound quality, no doubt you will save a lot of time and money looking for another one. In fact, you will never need to.

If you are a voice over artist or record an audio diary every now and then, you will find the PureSounds headset extremely useful. Moreover, it is also suitable for gaming, voice recognition, pod cast, audio/video conferencing, streaming, etc. The sky is the limit to your imagination.


dB or dBFS (Sorry, if it spins your head, it spins mine already!)

Manufacturers like to quote according to their best interests. Sometimes this translates to misleading, confusion or misunderstanding, especially when it comes to the use of dB which is a logarithmic unit to express performance of microphones and speakers.

On the dB scale, the electret condenser microphone used in my PureSounds headset would typically have the manufacturer's quote of S/N of 69dB and the sensitivity of -87dB. The formula to measure S/N is 20log(VS/VN), and the formula for sensitivity is V/Pa @ 1kHz.

While these values give you some technical details, you are left with no practical clue to how well your microphone or speaker will perform when you plug them into your computer or sound system that works on a different rules and principles.

On your computer, signals are represented by bit rate and depth. This makes sense because your computer works with bits of 0s and 1s, not dB! Computer programs such as Audacity or any sound recording program somehow has to translate this logarithmic ratio dB to something that your computer can cope with, i.e., dBFS which means decibel full scale. 

On a typical computer, it usually ranges from -60dBFS to 0dBFS. Your room noise such as your typing, breathing, clock ticking (if you have a rather loud one), people walking on the pavement outside of your house can range from -55dBFS to -47dBFS. When a human starts speaking, it can range from -43dBFS all the way to 0dBFS and beyond, but your computer can only cope to 0dBFS max, thus making your recorded voice clipped when you speak loudly into your microphone!


Microphone Performance and Specifications

I have carefully designed the circuit used in the PureSounds headset to faithfully capture and reproduce the whole audible spectrum from 20 to 20kHz. Its measured sensitivity ranges from faintest to bustling city traffic sounds (0 to 90dB or -60dBFS to 0dBFS). 

45dBFS (normal human voice to room noise)

-43dBFS (Faintest voice a human can make)

Having said that, electrical noise such as high frequency switching noise, statics, pops, clipping or cracking has no place in my PureSounds headset. This has been one of the most stringent design requirements from the start.

Frequency response : 20 - 20kHz

S/N : 69dB

Sensitivity : -87±3dB SPL @ 1kHz

To listen to a set of sample recordings, please download and play the following clips:

PureSounds Headset sample recording - male voice 1

PureSounds Headset sample recording - male voice 2

PureSounds Headset sample recording - female voice


Speakers Performance and Specifications

The speakers used in my PureSounds headset are the highest quality ones that I can possibly order. Each speaker will have a super thin 40mm diameter diaphragm and double rare earth magnets to faithfully reproduce any sound ranging from 20 to 20kHz in its purest and richest form.

The leather encased jell earmuffs are big (circumaural), they will not just sit on your ears and make you uncomfortable quickly, instead, they will surround your ears making them reasonably isolated from the incoming ambient noise.

Frequency response : 20 - 20kHz

Sensitivity : 103dB±5dB SPL @ 1kHz

Impedence: 32Ω

Speaker diameter : 40mm

Magnet type : Double rare earth


Cable and Connectors

Cable length : 1.8m

Microphone connector : 3.5mm red banana plug

Earphone connector : 3.5mm green banana plug

USB connector : USB A type (to power the microphone circuitry)


The Making of PureSounds Headsets

I will be making the circuit boards and final assembly of the headsets in my garage. I already have the bare PCBs, but soldering tiny SMDs takes time, believe me, it is the most time consuming part.

The half finished cables, headsets, high quality speakers, leather earmuffs, etc., will come from a quality factory in China, where else?!

Due to this 50/50 approach, you can be rest assured that your PureSounds headset will have the highest quality built materials, sounds and frequency response. I will hand make each and every one of my PureSounds headset, test and QC check it thoroughly, wrap and pack securely before shipping promptly to you.


Pricing Philosophy of PureSounds Headsets

As you can see, my pricing of the PureSounds headset is very reasonable. This does not mean it is crap! Please do not think that you have to pay dearly for a good headset, well if you know how to make one for yourself. Thank to my technical know how, ability to micromanage my time and money, and semi-reliance on the factory, I just manage to keep the price low. I would like to keep it that way, because it makes everyone happy. :)


Shipping Around the World

Shipping within the UK is FREE with Royal Mail Signed For 2nd Class.

Additionally, I will ship all over the world with Royal Mail International Signed For for an additional £13 small shipping fees. 

Thank you very much for your time. Please support the PureSounds headset project :)


Risks and challenges

I do not particularly have a big risk or challenge in successfully completing my PureSounds headset project. I mean, I had successfully done a similar one in the past, although at a much lower quantity. This time I truly want to give the fruit of my hardwork to those who are fed up with endless purchase of headsets.

The only real risk I can think of is either I get into a freak accident and could not use my hands to build the headsets or some of the semi-finished headsets from the good old factory in China arrive damaged or wrong, despite the DHL's top notch service, thus delaying the production to a few more weeks or a month at worst I guess!

To overcome myself from getting into a freak accident, I will well look after my health and safety in and around the house and my garage.

To overcome any potential shipping problem of the bulk shipment of my custom-made headsets from the good old factory in China, I will make sure, double check, if necessary, triple check everything is right. Despite these precautions from my side, should any unforeseeable mishap arrive, I will try my best to resolve it and I ask for your understanding to lend me some more time. Most importantly, I will keep my backers up to date with the progress on indiegogo.com.
story_txt:
"Good morning, good afternoon or good evening, wherever you maybe, welcome to the PureSounds Headset Project!" 
(Inspired by the C2C host George Noory)

Background (Typical Scenario)
I am sure I am not the only one who came up with a burning desire to perfect the sound quality of both earphones and microphone of most headsets. Usually, it is so frustrating to find out that it just does not work, especially the microphone part. Sometimes, it barely works and is definitely not up to your satisfaction. It can be laden with all kinds of noises, hums, pops, clicks, statics and contact losses. After paying decently or sometimes dearly, you find that it offers very little value for your money.

Early Prototypes Success
So, I went a step further and created a prototype.

My early crude PureSounds prototypeAs you rightly guess, yes, it failed fantastically! I believed in "first things must fail" motto, so it did not set me back at all. I kept on modifying and learning from mistakes until one day when I perfected it. So perfect that I was asked by a factory representative how I achieved it.



PureSounds' real performance on a PC with -47dBFS noise floor
Later, I sold a bunch of those early crude prototypes that I called SECM to people all over the world! I had to stop making them, as I went to study at the university. (SECM means Super Excellent Computer Microphone!)


Back on Track
(...... some miseries here ......) Then I got a few jobs, saved up a bit of money to continue what I enjoy doing; innovating. First thing that came to my mind was my PureSounds headset project.

What is a PureSounds Headset
If you are curious about what a PureSounds headset is or wonder if it is yet another mega sound headset project, please let me tell you that it has more to offer! In fact, it is a funky multipurpose headset. 



With a PureSounds headset, not only that you could enjoy great music whenever and wherever you want, you no longer need to scream into your microphone when you speak or bare the noise, clipping, cracking and statics. All these plus the best build quality materials and last, but not least, at a very reasonable price.

PureSounds headset description


PureSounds headset, a true value for money!
It’s a truly plug and play device that works on any computer or audio system. No software is needed. The electronic circuit board inside the headset processes the voice data in real-time with no alteration.





You can use the PureSounds headset to listen to music. It will be built with a pair of highest quality double rare earth magnet speakers for you to enjoy your great music in its purest and richest sounds; from the faintest tumbling bass to the loudest bursts.

PureSounds Headset sample recording - male voice 2
PureSounds Headset sample recording - female voice

story:
Hello! 

*Information to place a purchase under perks on right hand side.

A bit about the stereo amplifier:

The TDA7297 was initially a pet project that became a focus. For over a year different PCB boards and designs have come about. Ultimately it has landed on knowing that the chip works best when fed by a capacitor multiplier (a variation of the Kmultiplier by Keantoken).

-CFC (capacitor field cancellation)

-Intended for 12x 330uf high end OSCON Panasonic/Nichicon

-Capacitor multiplier w/ voltage regulation (By Keantoken)

-Various input cap rolling capability

-Ground planes

-*Requires 21-25v to operate correctly, which is regulated down to 17.8-18v by Kmultiplier to meet amplifier chip voltage safety. This can be attained with batteries, SMPS, or to match the performance of the demo the Antipole also by Folsom.

-**Obsolete high quality transistor included with PCB (amplifier can use other lower quality ones as well)

Reviews/Spottings:

The Perfect Storm by Vapor Audio, and a few amps including the DIY7297

S Clark's thoughts at AudioCircle
