story:
Langogo Summit Pro is the world’s first 4-in-1 handheld audio recorder, transcriber, translator and mobile WiFi hotspot with built-in eSIM specifically designed for an easier way of work, study, travel and much more.

It is perfect for use cases to…


 

 

Langogo Summit Pro listens and captures what happened at your meetings, lectures, conferences, interviews, presentations and much more for hours on end, so you are able to play back the conversation as many times as you need in order to grasp important information at a later time.

Better yet, it supports 104 languages and dialects covering 200+ countries and regions and transcribes in real time, meaning in multilingual scenarios, it identifies the correct language and you can see the transcript of the audio appear on the screen as people speak.

With a press on the button, it transcribes an hours-long speech to text and gives you the meeting minute draft in just a few minutes at a high accuracy.

It takes your productivity to the next level so you will have more spare time for your own tasks. And you can contribute to the cause of environmental protection by saving tons of papers produced by tree farms.

  

 Langogo Summit Pro also comes with a powerful software for collaboration and cloud storage - Notta, which will automatically sync and save your recorded audio. Notta app is available on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store for free download.

Sign up for a Notta account to play the audio, transcribe it into text, edit, export and share the text with your team members for more efficient communication and collaboration via either PC or smartphone. We give every Notta user 500 hours of audio storage for free.

While playing back audio in Notta, it will highlight each word as it is spoken in the corresponding audio being played. It also enables keyword search to quickly navigate to the information you want, so you could give your proof-reading eyes a break.

 

Langogo Summit Pro meets your security criteria especially when the recordings contain sensitive content. You can lock your device with a password, and the data is stored and encrypted on the Amazon AWS platform using a virtually unhackable algorithm. Notta supports login with Google and Microsoft for the highest level of data security.

Langogo Summit Pro acts as your personal translator to provide you with sifsdfsdmultaneous interpretation services during business meetings with people from around the world.

After setting up the languages for both meeting participants, the built-in microphones will be automatically grouped into two clusters and each assigned to a specific participant to pick up his voices for translation. Within seconds, the translated audio will be broadcasted almost immediately for the audience to hear, and meanwhile, be transcribed and displayed on the screen to see

Were the two participants to share a pair of True Wireless Stereo earbuds connected to Langogo Summit Pro via Bluetooth, they could hear the audio in their intended target language from their corresponding earbud for seamless and effective communication.

Understanding while hearing a foreign speech or lecture is as easy as pressing a button. Not only does Langogo Summit Pro faithfully record it, but also transcribes it in both native and translated languages to show on the screen for the listener to view in real-time. 

 

 

 

Getting a quality one-on-one interview or trying to communicate with a foreigner has never been easier. Superior to those less-smart translator devices which feature A/B keys and require the correct key to be pressed and held down while translating language A to B or B to A, Langogo Summit Pro intelligently detects the language for you and automatically translates it to the target language.

Simply press the talk button and talk into the microphone what you want translated. Releasing the button broadcasts the translated voice to your audience immediately who can then speak into the microphone, and Langogo Summit Pro will work vice versa. It’s so foolproof that anyone can use it straight out of the box.

Langogo Summit Pro is great for your on-the-go translation needs. Whether you are trying to read the menu at a restaurant, or the exhibit label in a museum when traveling overseas, you could snap a photo of it using Langogo Summit Pro, and promptly, the translated image will be visible on the screen and audible through the loudspeakers.

The 8MP rear camera with fast autofocus and OCR technology recognizes 46 different languages.

Langogo Summit Pro comes in handy when you need your ideas documented before they slip away. Pressing the button on the side while dictating your thoughts, it will automatically record it and convert it into a note or a to-do list. 

 

Langogo Summit Pro has 4 built-in omnidirectional microphones strategically arranged to offer full 360° coverage in huddle rooms, picking up voices of the talker 3 meters (10 feet) away and transforming any space into a conference room. The speech recognition is further enhanced through an AGC algorithm which significantly reduces background noise and automatically adjusts the volume to make up for the differences in distance from Langogo Summit Pro, so even the most subtle and faint voice sounds loud and clear.

The mic’s work distance can be further increased to as far as 9 meters (30 feet) by the deployment of Langogo mini, an external microphone integrating two Harman Kardon directional mic with cutting-edge noise-canceling algorithm, innovatively designed to be plugged in Langogo Summit Pro for crisp, crystal-clear audio recording with minimized background noise.

 Langogo mini mic also works remarkably well on other devices like your smartphone when used with a Type-C-to-Lightning converter to capture high-quality audio in classrooms and lecture halls.

What works magically behind the scenes to give the best quality translation is that Langogo Summit Pro incorporates 26 world-leading domain-specific translation engines designed to be invoked for languages and variants in different countries and regions.

Langogo Summit Pro requires Internet access when performing functions of recording, translating and transcribing. It supports three ways of Internet connection: WiFi, SIM card and e-SIM card, and then it can be used as a standalone device and also as a mobile WiFi hotspot to connect five devices at one time for international data when traveling overseas.

You can get WiFi in 60+ countries using Langogo’s virtual e-SIM tech that automatically connects to local carriers. Data is pay-as-you-go and paid-for online by clicking the “Global WiFi” icon and following the instructions. It saves you the hassle of buying and replacing the physical card if you are a frequent traveller.

*It is highly recommended to use “Intelligent Recording”, “Speech Translation” and “Simultaneous Interpretation” in WiFi mode to minimize data usage.

We offer every Langogo user the ONE-YEAR Notta membership privilege, that is a total of 3,000 minutes free per month of “Intelligent Recording”, “Speech Translation” and “Simultaneous Interpretation” under the same Notta account, whether it is conducted through the device, or Notta app on your smartphone or computer. Plus the following extra bonus:

  • Free transcription on the Notta app
  • 500 hours of audio stored in the cloud
  • Export files in formats of DOCX/PDF/SRT etc. from the Notta app
  • Play audio at double speed on the Notta app

 

Langogo, founded in 2018, an innovative technology company focusing on the development and application of AI speech recognition. It had its first product launched on Kickstarter in 2018 and was endorsed by 1,000+ backers. Now, its user community grows into 100,000+ worldwide.

More than 50% of the company‘s employees are R & D talents from top Internet enterprises who possess a deep understanding of both software and hardware in the technology industry.

Langogo is committed to shaping the future of AI speech technology. The company has been using its core technology for creating a series of intelligent devices, such as Genesis, Minutes, Summit, Mini, and Share, etc., providing intelligent voice translation and transcribing. Langogo never stops innovating.

Notta, a new SaaS system developed by Langogo, provides powerful transcribing services for companies and individuals to improve their working efficiency. Even without the Langogo devices, people are still able to enjoy the convenience brought by this passionate high-tech company.

  • This project is constructed and presented to you by OTO1Tech, the marketing expert who've helped make 250+ campaigns successful, risk-free.

Risks & Challenges

Challenges and unforeseen obstacles can always arise when trying to introduce a new product. There is simply so much to manage at times. However we are confident in our team's abilities, knowledge, and work ethic to get the job done right. We believe in being completely transparent with our backers and communicating updates as efficiently and effectively as possible. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile. Thank you so much for your support and for believing in us!

Play audio at double speed on the Notta app






 



Langogo, founded in 2018, an innovative technology company focusing on the development and application of AI speech recognition. It had its first product launched on Kickstarter in 2018 and was endorsed by 1,000+ backers. Now, its user community grows into 100,000+ worldwide.
More than 50% of the company‘s employees are R & D talents from top Internet enterprises who possess a deep understanding of both software and hardware in the technology industry.
Langogo is committed to shaping the future of AI speech technology. The company has been using its core technology for creating a series of intelligent devices, such as Genesis, Minutes, Summit, Mini, and Share, etc., providing intelligent voice translation and transcribing. Langogo never stops innovating.
Notta, a new SaaS system developed by Langogo, provides powerful transcribing services for companies and individuals to improve their working efficiency. Even without the Langogo devices, people are still able to enjoy the convenience brought by this passionate high-tech company.


This project is constructed and presented to you by OTO1Tech, the marketing expert who've helped make 250+ campaigns successful, risk-free.
Risks & Challenges
Challenges and unforeseen obstacles can always arise when trying to introduce a new product. There is simply so much to manage at times. However we are confident in our team's abilities, knowledge, and work ethic to get the job done right. We believe in being completely transparent with our backers and communicating updates as efficiently and effectively as possible. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile. Thank you so much for your support and for believing in us!

story:
Inspired by the many ideas from the TINHIFI community, and building upon the past innovation of the T-series lineup, we spent the last 12 months investing our passion into the ultimate True Wireless (TWS) Earphones.

 

 

While there has been a rise in the development of TWS earphones recently, we were unsatisfied with the compromise in sound quality, and the technical flaws that made these products frustrating to use. Our pursuit of excellence has finally led to the development of a TWS earbud that is unparalleled in sound quality - even against that of audiophile-grade wired in-ear monitors - and has the latest technological advancements that make it perfect for the active lifestyle. On top of this, the T2000 is the first of few TWS earbuds which implement ultraviolet lights within the charging case to ensure every listening session is clean and healthy.

 

The TINHIFI T2000 utilizes dual dynamic driver and crossover technology to combine the power and detail of a 9mm and 8mmm Nitinol Dynamic Diaphragm. The Nitinol diaphragm is a custom innovation that combines nickel and titanium to create the ultra-fast membrane response necessary for a clear and translucent sound. This technology provides an acoustic performance that normal dynamic drivers are simply incapable of, and even faster transient responses than that of special beryllium coated drivers. These drivers are implemented with our in-house passive crossover network that separates the sound frequencies to perfectly match the performance of each driver. The latest DAC and Bluetooth chipsets further ensure a seamless and coherent listen like never before. Add an ergonomic design and you’ve got an unparalleled sound quality in a perfect fit.

 

Now, whether you’re a Hi-Fi audiophile enthusiast or an on-the-go daily runner, you can enjoy the immersive world of high-fidelity audio anywhere, anytime! 

 

 
 

Our goal in creating the T2000 was not to make another average TWS earbud. It was to take high-fidelity musical listening to a whole new level, while also adding the comfort and freedom of a TWS system. The T2000 has the option to switch between wireless and wired modes to best fit the needs of the listeners. While the sonic performance of the T2000 is unparalleled in both modes, we understand that many audiophile enthusiasts enjoy a wired performance using their favorite music device. Hence, in the wired-mode with the included MMCX 4-core OCC copper cable, the T2000 performs passively, allowing the music device’s sound characteristic to power the earphone. This is also perfect for lower-battery situations. But don’t worry, the 650mAh battery of the T2000 with Quick Charge provides up to 3-4 hours of playback, ensuring it’s always ready for wireless listening. Enjoy your music anytime, anywhere, and anyhow you desire! The choice is yours.

 

 

We at TINHIFI have always been first and foremost focused on excellent sound quality. The history of our T-series lineup, with the T1,  T2, T2 Pro, T3, T4, and P1 audiophile-grade in-ear monitors, has always been praised worldwide, and we see the T2000 as a continuation of this legacy.  The T2000 features dual dynamic drivers composed of an industry breakthrough material - the Nitinol diaphragm. The nickel and titanium driver balances out the smooth and harsh sonic properties of these metals to deliver a sound unlike that of any other driver. While expensive to manufacturer, we decided to use two of these revolutionary drivers, one for the lows and mids, and the other for the highs, to maintain coherency and smooth transition in the tonal balance.

While expensive to manufacturer, we decided to use two of these revolutionary drivers, one for the lows and mids, and the other for the highs, to maintain coherency and smooth transition in the tonal balance. The 9mm driver imparts a deep and powerful bass and smooth mids to highlight the vocal textures, while the 8mm driver resonates transparent and crystal clear highs that shines every detail within the music. Unlike other TWS earbuds, we specially engineered the acoustic cavity of the T2000 to create life-like imaging of the sound that will perfectly unify the sounds from the two drivers. Every thought and effort was poured into the acoustic design of the T2000 to ensure an uncompromising Hi-Fi music experience.

 

We've improved upon our own high standards of manufacturing from the T-series in-ear monitors. Our team has worked tirelessly to guarantee the finest build quality to make sure your T2000 is durable for any terrain and long-lasting. 

 

Beyond the drivers themselves, a great High-Fidelity audio requires a Digital to Analog chip to power the speakers. This is why we have implemented the latest CSR DAC chipset into the T2000, thus delivering an immersive and ultra-clear sound. The latest RTL8763BFP Bluetooth 5.0 chipset further ensures a latency-free seamless listening experience.

 

 

The T2000 Charging Case with Fast Charge and built-in UV Light System also serves as a housing for the included MMCX cable. Our team has worked hard to design an all-inclusive case for the T2000 that is still in a practical and convenient size. The T2000 case fits into any pocket and is a perfect fit for any occasion!

 

 

We have tested many designs for the T2000. Due to its wireless design, we knew we had to make the fit perfect to prevent any drops, worries, and discomforts. The shape of the T2000 was taken from molds of the human ears to make sure every curve matches perfectly with the contours of the ear. Whether you are walking around, running, or dancing, the T2000 will stay comfortably in your ears - worry-free. Now, you can enjoy your music all-day, without thinking twice about your earbuds. 

 

 

 

 

 

As sophisticated components are equipped in the earphone set (including both earbuds and ear case), please follow the safety instructions carefully,

  • Do not expose earphone set to excessive heat.
  • Avoid dropping the earphone set. 
  • Do not allow your headphone sets to be submerged in water.
  • Power off before cleaning. Do not use any cleaning agents containing alcohol, ammonia, benzene, or abrasives. You may use a soft dry cloth to clean the dust. The cloth can be damped wet with a minimum amount of water if necessary. 
  • The integrated battery shall not be exposed to excessive heat such as sunshine, fire, or the like.

 

 

 

The original idea of TinHifi T2000 started in the mid of 2019. During the years of finalizing the TINHIFI T2000, the world and we all witness the Ebola, MERS, and the following outbreak of COVID-19 pandemic. All these looks like a reminder, which is calling everyone to recall how important health is.  We are all in this together, and we want to take our own way to help. Although the COVID-19 pandemic keeps challenging the factories, logistics, and specially highering the cost in every aspect, we manage to bring the TINHIFI T2000 to each and every of you to share a small amount of hope and musical joy. 

We did not compromise on the surging cost. Instead, we still persist in providing the best sonic performance by adopting the new revolutionary drivers. Moreover, we even lower the price of Tin Hifi perks just for inviting more individuals to enjoy a clean and crystal clear listening session.  We encourage everyone to work from home, stay safe, and stay healthy with the TINHIFI T2000.

story:
Says who? EarStudio is the world’s first and only 24bit Bluetooth receiver designed to deliver studio-quality sound through your ears WIRELESS - using your existing wired headphones, earphones or even speakers.

 

This thumb-sized gadget packed with technologies supports Qualcomm’s aptX HD codec, which allows you to stream 24bit hi-res music wireless. Unluckily for the iPhone users, the aptX HD codec has never been of their interest - but don’t you worry. EarStudio automatically enhances 16bit music into 24bit sound. Meaning, whatever device you are using(iPhone or Android), whatever the source is(from Spotify streaming to hi-res music files), you will be able to enjoy 24bit sound through EarStudio.   

 

EarStudio places the most focus on the sound quality along with convenience and affordability. We use CSR 8675 Qualcomm Chip and 2x DACs of AK4375a. 

  • Noise free, jitter free. 

To brief you through the journey of EarStudio’s operation, EarStudio reproduces the sound over Bluetooth into 88.2KHz/24Bit through Radsone’s patented DCT technology which reduces subtle digital noise and cleans the jitter from Bluetooth streaming.

  • Dual DACs with analog volume control

EarStudio has optimized circuit architecture, proprietary DualDrive technology, using 2 independent Hi-Fi DACs and Amplifiers. Unlike other dual DAC audio systems, the fully differential audio signal path directly goes to the output jack, with NO switch components in the way, delivering pure signal without any loss or distortion, and with enough power. Moreover, 2 selectable operating modes support 2x current or 2x voltage, as needed by depending on the type of connected headphones. Then, we took a further step for details by adopting an analog volume control. Digital volume adjustment has the downside because it scales down PCM audio sample before the D/A conversion, resulting in harsh sound and the loss in sound detail, SNR, as well as THD. EarStudio offers analog volume control to keep the optimal audio performance even at low volume level using Programmable Gain Amplifier (PGA) which is the best way to control the volume.

  • Full Balanced and single ended output

EarStudio offers two outputs: A single-ended/double current 3.5mm jack and full-balanced/double voltage 2.5mm Jack.

 

 

 

 

  • The Overview 

  • How to use

 

 

  • World's first studio-quality 24bit sound playback through Bluetooth

EarStudio supports the Qualcomm aptX HD codec, which allows you to receive 48KHz/24bit audio via Bluetooth. What’s even more special about it is that it will reproduce 24bit sound from any music streaming through over 16bit codec such as SBC, aptX or AAC. The magic behind it is Radsone's patented technology called DCT which big names in the industry(LG, Audio Technica, Astell&Kern etc) have adopted in their latest products.

As an official member of Qualcomm’s CSR eXtension program, we are one of the few R&D teams in the world with the capability of handling CSR Digital Signal Processor, especially CSR8675. EarStudio is a total assembly of our technologies, algorithms and years of dedication for high-quality Bluetooth audio streaming.

  • DCT(Distinctive Clear Technology)

DCT technology solves fundamental digital audio problems by eliminating the subtle digital noise inherent in all digital sound. The longer you listen, DCT, a kind of advanced dithering will be done for a natural pattern, and it improves the masking curve associated with audio signals to virtually eliminate quantization errors. Meaning, DCT makes the sound more precise and natural, and users will be able to listen in detail. This technology is patented including USA and Japan.

DCT eliminates quantization errors, thereby generating analog-like natural patterns

Spectrogram after DCT demonstrates improved masking curve with noise suppression. Details are emphasized while maintaining the overall shape.

Click to experience DCT through the Android Radsone music app now!

Click to experience DCT through the iOS Radsone music app now!

  • DCT Blue

DCT Blue is a newly developed version of DCT specialized for Bluetooth streaming. Of course, EarStudio is the first product in the world to showcase the technology - its proprietary precise Sample Rate Adjustment scheme enables jitter-free wireless audio streaming as shown below. 

 

EarStudio is the first Bluetooth receiver in the world equipped with 2 external Hi-Fi DACs. Our proprietary DualDrive technology doubles the given HW performance by using 2 external DACs(Asahi Kasei AK4375a), pure-balanced 2.5mm port and a customized 3.5mm port. This improves the dynamic range for headphones, especially in the bass band.

 

EarStudio’s 350mAh battery provides 14 hours of continuous playback. You could literally listen to music all day without charging! 

Typical Bluetooth receivers usually have much shorter playback time, mostly under 10 hours. Even with its extensive battery life, EarStudio only weighs 20g, lighter than one AA battery (24g)!

 

EarStudio provides a regular single-ended 3.5mm jack and a pure-balanced 2.5mm jack that doubles the output power and cancels out unwanted DC offset and noise from analogue component.

Single-ended, 2x current mode fits low impedance headphones and full-differential, 2x voltage mode fits high impedance headphones. Meaning, EarStudio effortlessly drives ANY type of low/high impedance headphones you own.

 

The digital volume control operates on a fixed-bit field; in that case, the DAC cannot make the fractional part of the number and degrades sound quality especially in low level.

When adjusting the analog volume down to a certain level with EarStudio, the signal peak is decreased as well as noise floor; resulting in no loss in SNR as shown above. The EarStudio supports analog volume control(when controlling the volume via the app or the buttons on the device) which maintains the sound quality.

 

EarStudio also offers a USB port through which you can play lossless music even while charging. 

 

Unlike most other devices, we will be supporting Device Firmware Updates for your EarStudio. This means that our further updates, optimization and bug fixes will be done at your home in a matter of seconds, not having to send the actual product to us. Keep your EarStudio software fresh for the rest of your life!

 

All EarStudio backers will have free access to the EarStudio iOS/Android mobile application! Through this app, the users will have detailed control over the sound and hardware. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  •  DEMO

Sharing with you all an incredible sound from the EarStudio demo unit through 2.5mm full balanced output, connected to FOCAL active speaker full balance input. EarStudio is connected to iPhone 7, playing through Bluetooth AAC codec. EarStudio works as a preamplifier with analog volume control capability. The FOCAL active speaker has a built-in power amplifier with +4dBu (Vpp 3.472V) professional line level input specification, which can be driven by EarStudio effortlessly. This demonstration shows that EarStudio shares a role of a preamplifier for any power amplifier with professional line level input specification. 

(This demo was recorded in the Radsone office - not in a professional recording studio)

  • Audio Precision Test

Audio Precision is one of the most credible devices for audio performance measurement. In this test, we have used Audio Precision 2722 equipment full balanced input, then connected EarStudio through USB with PC and played a 1KHz tone. This is to measure THD+N and output voltage. Our primary goal is to provide the best sound quality, and we have gone through continuous improvements.

 

 

  • Our Story

We, Radsone, are the first mover in commercializing high-quality Bluetooth audio technology. We have provided solutions for most aptX HD supported audio devices out in the current market including Audio-Technica, Astell&Kern, LG, etc. 

However, some of you may recognize our name from the Radsone music player app. And yes you are right - we had developed the app a couple years back which topped the charts in 47 countries and currently has 1.4 million downloads across the globe.

  • Our Partners

We currently hold 8 registered patents including DCT technology which eliminates the chronic micro noise in the digital audio. Millions of audio products with DCT technology have already been released in the market and this time, we are about to shock the world with the tiny yet mighty Bluetooth receiver packed with our own technologies.

story:
To The Point

Here is a little bit about me personally, and the whole lot of a difference you can make by donating:

  • My name is Matthew DiGiaimo, a third generation film maker who will be attending the New York Film Academy in the fall.
  • This film brings awareness to the very grey area that is treating mental diseases. With endless variations of mental diseases, there is no one size fits all solution. Hopefully by bringing more awareness to the subject, we will be one step closer to finding a better solution for these people.
  • Contributors will help immensely with feeding large amounts of people on massive shoot days, like for dance numbers, as well as clothing and musical equipment for the actors.
story_txt:
To The Point
Here is a little bit about me personally, and the whole lot of a difference you can make by donating:

My name is Matthew DiGiaimo, a third generation film maker who will be attending the New York Film Academy in the fall.
This film brings awareness to the very grey area that is treating mental diseases. With endless variations of mental diseases, there is no one size fits all solution. Hopefully by bringing more awareness to the subject, we will be one step closer to finding a better solution for these people.
Contributors will help immensely with feeding large amounts of people on massive shoot days, like for dance numbers, as well as clothing and musical equipment for the actors.

story:
Jamstik: Studio MIDI Guitar & Guitar Trainer

Jamstik is a brand of portable, app-connected MIDI guitars that have revolutionized the guitar learning experience while opening up musical possibilities for guitarists and producers. 

Whether you're looking to learn guitar or already play—there's a Jamstik for you.

The Studio MIDI guitar was built for producers, guitarists, and songwriters alike. A formidable travel-size guitar with two humbuckers featuring a coil tap switch, three-way switch and standard 1/4'' out; the true groundbreaking features come on the MIDI side. A precision mounted Hex Pickup sends signal to our onboard processors which perform algorithmic pitch analysis & MIDI conversion in near realtime. Speed and accuracy being our foremost goals - you'd forget it's not analog if not for the impossible sounds you'll play.
 

Studio MIDI Guitar Specs
 

Size: 24 Frets, Compact 3/4 Body Size, 32.5'' Length, 5.5lbs

Scale Length: 25.5"

Pickups: 2 Humbuckers—Coil Tap for Single Coil Use, Hex MIDI Pickup
 


Product Features

MIDI Connectivity & Charging:

• USB C for MIDI Out & Charging

• 3.5mm TRS-MIDI Out Option

• Bluetooth Wireless Connectivity

• Battery: Lithium ion rechargeable (8+ hours playtime)
 

Analog Guitar Features:

• Standard 1/4'' out: Plug into amps, interfaces and otherwise as usual.

• Pickups: 2 Humbuckers—Coil Tap for Single Coil Use

• 3-Way Switch between humbuckers. 

 

The Jamstik 7 Guitar Trainer is the ultimate, go-anywhere guitar instruction tool bundled with apps and software that take the guesswork out of learning to play. The new 2020 edition features an updated tactile d-pad, matte finish and spring loaded strings for a more realistic feel. See your fingers on screen in real-time in an easy to use system that will have you playing your first guitar chords in minutes. At just over 18 inches, you can practice anywhere with the Jamstik. 

Jamstik GT Specs:

Finger-sensing Technology:

Sensors in the Jamstik Guitar Trainer's fretboard provide realtime feedback in our teaching apps.

The Jamstik Guitar Trainers are powered by patented FretTouch™ Finger Sensing Technology and Infrasense™ Optical String Pickups supporting an enhanced digitized guitar learning experience. See your fingers on the screen in real-time & take the guesswork out of learning to play.

Jamstik Software

All Jamstik apps and plugins are proudly developed in-house.

Creation Software

The Jamstik Creator VST/AU plugin is designed from scratch to harness the performance capabilities and dynamic nuances of the Studio MIDI Guitar. With 125+ customizable presets and high quality audio samples painstakingly recorded to perfection, you’re sure to stumble on something that will pique your interest!

Learning Software

The Jamstik Portal is the official learning platform for the Jamstik controllers available for iOS and Google Chrome web browser (Mac, Windows, Chromebooks). Learn your first chords in minutes with realtime feedback. Progress through AI generated skill drills & set high scores as you play full songs with interactive scrolling tabs.​ A unified login system allows you to save any progress you make across devices—practice on your iPhone, then pick it up later on your Mac. 

Both models are also fully compatible with 100s of other Mobile Apps, Learning Tools & Music Production DAWs (Digital Audio Workstations).
 

Now Shipping

 

From the team that brought you the Award-Winning Jamstik+ Smart Guitar

Zivix builds innovative electronic instruments and connected software to inspire, educate and empower musicians and creative professionals. 

Our decade-long history has finally brought us to the point of offering our 3rd generation Jamstik model, and we couldn't be more excited to have our new players right here with us as the story unfolds. We have set out to educate the next generation of guitar players with the JS7 and give back program, and this is your chance to be a part of that story.

The team outside of our Minneapolis, MN, USA offices
 

Thank you so much for joining our movement!

Visit our social channels and follow #Jamstik to see what our community of artists, players, and learners have been creating!

 

Sales & Distribution Inquiries: sales@jamstik.com

Media Inquries: meredith@jamstik.com

Press Kit: jamstik.com/press

story:
UPDATE 02/28/2017

We are proud to announce the addition of two new earphones to join our family alongside the Finder! Introducing our entry level "Traveler" ($99) and new flagship IEM the "Nomad" "$399", an evolutionary next step in our mission to bring world class portable audio products at exceptionally reasonable prices. Pre-order your Traveler and Nomad today at our website, www.echoboxaudio.com. 

UPDATE 10/03/2016

The Explorer DAP is no longer on IndieGoGo, but is available for pre-order on our website. If you haven't picked one up yet, or you wanted to grab an extra for family or friends, head over to our pre-order page and reserve yours today! 

http://www.echoboxaudio.com/explorer/

 

UPDATE 4/10/2016

The Finder X1 earphones and Explorer Hi-Res Audio Player are NO LONGER AVAILABLE to purchase through IndieGoGo! If you would like to purchase them still, please head over to our website (www.echoboxaudio.com) and grab one (or more!). 

 

Thank You!!!!

 

With the support of our amazing backers, we finished our campaign at $66,504...

266% of our original $25,000 goal! 

 

The Story

Echobox is a company founded and run by music-lovers and audio geeks. We’ve been watching the personal audio industry for years, researching and analyzing everything from the types of music people listen to, how and where we listen, and, most importantly, the quality of audio that we’ve become accustomed to.

What we’ve seen has excited, confused, and disappointed us, all at once.

Portable audio has revolutionized the way we listen to music, and has transformed the types of products we use. Smartphones and the introduction of music streaming services have made music available to anyone, anytime, anywhere.
There are a lot of fashion-oriented headphones and  audio players out there. Most sound mediocre, are built like dollar store toys, or are just way, way too expensive. 

But…  

There can be no denying that the quality of what we hear when we plug earbuds into our phones is not what we really feel like we should be hearing, and it certainly doesn’t make us feel the same way we feel when we hear live music, or listen to it on a high quality sound system.

Or all three.

We’ve founded Echobox to help personal audio evolve to a level that does justice to good music. We plan on making good sounding audio products that are well-built and available at prices that are affordable to anyone who is passionate about music. Our first two products, the Explorer and the Finder, are designed to make real high-fidelity audio affordable.

The Making of Echobox

 

 

What the Press is Saying

 

 

Headfonia - Echobox Finder X1 - New Values

http://www.headfonia.com/review-echobox-finder-x1-new-values/              

"I've heard that the X1 will go for about $200. That's ridiculous. Utterly. These things are so well engineered that I would expect more." - Nathan

ListHunt - 9 New Gadgets You Need on November 17th

https://t.co/m28cPwFI70            

"Explorer is a high-fidelity portable audio player that runs on Android and is designed for all music lovers. The design will look familiar, and that's because when something fits and feels right, theres no reason to change it. And the sound? Explorer delivers natural, detailed sound, far better than any smartphone. " -Arlo Q

PC Mag - Tidal's iPod?

http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2490693,00.asp       

" I put on some Beyerdynamic DT-770 Pro headphones to listen to the player; George Gill pointed out that many devices don't have an amp powerful enough to drive massive headphones, but the X1's 300mW amp has no problem doing so. Uncompressed music sounded deliciously well-rounded with bone-warming bass and easily distinguishable cymbals." -Sascha Segan

 

What the People Are Saying

 

HeadFi.org - Finder X1 Review/Impressions/Discussions Thread

 

The Explorer

 The Explorer comes stock with four different color options:  Mahogany - Maple - Zebra Wood and Ebony

Along  with our earphones, we’ve been developing the Explorer, a high-fidelity portable audio player that runs on Android and is designed for all music lovers. The design will look familiar, and that’s because when something fits and feels right, there’s no reason to change it. And the sound? Explorer delivers natural, detailed sound, far better than any smartphone.

The reason for this is simple: smartphones have to be thinner, faster, and lighter, and to do all of the things we’ve come to expect from them without a hitch. That takes a lot of creativity and ingenuity on behalf of the engineers that design them, but it also makes a smartphone a “jack of all trades, master of none”. Sound quality is not the first priority — if it’s a priority at all.

The Explorer, on the other hand, is a custom-built portable listening device. It’s got all the good parts needed to make great sound — stuff that just won’t fit into a phone. Explorer’s also got enough power to make any kind of headphone really kick. Or, as George would say:

"Nearly half of the PC board inside the Explorer is stacked with dedicated audio circuitry. The high-quality TI / Burr Brown PCM1792 chip is the same DAC that has been sourced for ultra-high-end audiophile desktop DACs and CD players, some of which cost well over $1,000. It delivers natural, detailed sound that is far more realistic than anything a smartphone is designed to produce. The Explorer’s powerful dedicated amp section gives it the ability to drive not just popular “studio” or “prosumer” headphones, but real, professional music production-grade headphones that normally require a dedicated amplifier - the type that are actually used in studios for mixing and mastering.”

The Explorer has its versatile side, too. By running our player on Android, we’ve given it more than just high-quality sound — we’ve made it a streaming device. We give our users the option of using stock Android or our proprietary, easy-to-use User Interface (UI),  and we’ve included support for TIDAL and other key Android apps in both the UI and stock Android OS.

Have your own HiFi music library that you want to bring with you onto the Explorer? No problem! The Explorer is designed to be fully compatible with most digital file formats, including WAV, AIFF and FLAC. It also comes standard with 64GB of internal memory, and has a MicroSD slot that allows you to upgrade to a total capacity of 192GB.

 

We’re really proud of the Explorer, and even thought about making this campaign all about it. Between its amazing sound  and unique design, we already know everyone is going to love it.

But we have big ambitions, and a Hi-Fi player needs a listening companion... 

The Finder X1

 

 

The Finder X1 is our titanium-housed earphone, and it is ridiculously durable. The solid titanium housings, thick shielded cable, and unique internal strain relief design all combine to make the most durable earphone in existence. We’re so confident about how tough these mothers are that we’re providing a no-questions-asked 3 year warranty — they’re really that tough. Click here to watch them get run over by dozens of cars during LA rush hour traffic — they survive with barely a scratch, and still sound just like they’d been pulled fresh from the box.

Speaking of sound, the Finder uses a unique new driver — that’s the little speaker-thingie — to deliver the most detailed and ALIVE sound of any dynamic-driver earphone on the market. The driver is built from German-made PEEK (Polyether Ether Ketone), a super-strong polymer, so they can be incredibly thin, but still durable.

Head audio-geek George says: 

“This makes them ultra-responsive, enhancing the detail and fidelity of the sound they produce, and allows them to reproduce more impactful deep sub-bass, adding to the realism of the sound, while preserving a clean midrange and detailed treble, and avoiding the muddy, bloated mid-bass of many trendy headphones — the Finder’s bass is powerful and rumbly, but doesn’t cloud the rest of the sound, leaving the mids and treble to shine through.”

In other words: they sound like live music, and kick ass.

 

Where You Come In

The Finders are ready to go. We’ve already begun mass production and have a few hundred units ready to ship. We’ve finished our design of the Explorer, and are almost ready to put it in your hands. We need your support to work out the last few details of our user interface, and help move the product into mass production. By launching these two high-quality audio products on Indiegogo and selling them at a reasonable retail price, we hope to help spread the love of music, worldwide.

 

Doing Good Through the

Power of Music

We founded this company because of our love for music, and that passion has pushed us to have plans beyond just making these products. We are a company with a global vision — a vision of a future where everyone can appreciate music the way it’s meant to be appreciated, both by listening and playing. We want to use our products, and all of our resources, to spread the love of music to as many people as possible.
 

As a first step, we’ve partnered with Seattle Music Partners for our campaign. SMP is a locally-funded, grassroots program serving the city of Seattle by providing free music lessons to underprivileged children. These kids grow up in the heart of Seattle, a budding and prosperous city, and yet they have limited access to instruments and instruction.

We believe in Seattle Music Partners, the power of music, and our products. We want to harness the power of music to unite people and do good for the world. If that sounds naïve and new-agey, we’re sorry. This is very real for us.

If you feel as we feel, please support our campaign — we give you our word that we’re not here just for handouts. We plan on giving you far more than your money’s worth, both in this campaign and in the years to come.

 

Thanks so much for reading this, and thank you for your support! Any questions or comments can be directed to our support staff at team@eboxaudio.com

story:
After finishing the trail-production, we are now moving to the next stage — MASS PRODUCTION. Can't wait to share this exciting news with you all. By starting it now, we are able to START SHIPPING FROM JUNE 1! 

We also upgraded the packaging box, for better preventing the transportation damage.

 

Run, Swim, and Live Confidently – with High-Quality Stereo Music in Your Ears!



 

In the past several months, testing as many wireless earbuds as we could, we struggled to find a pair of true wireless earbuds that were affordable and could be used in any environment.

Through our testing, we discovered that most TWS earbuds still have some limitations. Most earbuds on the market are struggled with signal interference, exceeding the Bluetooth range, and have the issue with the music will be automatically stopped.

Additionally, most market earbuds are highly dependent on the proximity of the device. Ultimately, most current market earbuds cannot be used without a device present.
 

Traditional TWS Earbuds

vs.

Sportfy Internal Storage Earbuds

That's when we decided to create an earbud that is truly device free and unimpeded by distance. One that works independently but still provides premium sound quality at an affordable price. Sportfy allows you to be free from limitation and listens to music anytime any place.
 

 

Leave Your Phone Behind

Sportfy earbuds double as media players, so you can leave your phone behind! Offering 512MB internal storage, upload your favorite workout playlist and exercise device-free. Helping you to concentrate on what you are doing and keeping you entertained.


 


 

While other devices over-complicate the pairing process, thus driving up the prices and lowering the durability of their products, the Bluetooth 5.0 compatibility in Sportfy means that pairing is never difficult.

  • 2.5x Faster Transmission
  • 10x Potential Data Volume
  • IPV6 Low Energy Protocol
  • 4x Connectivity Range
  • Resistant to Interference
  • Increased Security

 

Our team has spent thousands of hours and tested nearly 100 different drivers with the best audio engineers available, to push the boundaries of audio technology in the creation of Sportfy.

Premium technology means premium sound: Experience Sportfy’s top-shelf sound quality and bask in its incredibly powerful bass, crisp mid-highs, and crystal clear vocals.

 

In addition to premium sound quality, our earbuds receive calls in both earbuds which is different from conventional market models. Plus our noise-canceling technology ensures your private calls stay private.

 

IP67 Waterproof

These waterproof earbuds feature a water-repellent mesh in the open ports, keeping all the gears and moving parts dry and fully functional, so you don't need to worry about a little water getting in the way of your tunes.

 

The Italian national swimmer — Matteo Milli
Loves Sportfy and use it in training every day! Let’s see what he says.

 



 

 

With Sportfy, you will no longer suffer by the short battery life. The earbuds have an astounding 30 hours of battery life, but with its powerful charging case you can get up to 10 hours of battery life on a single charge!

For a single charge, Sportfy can keep you entertained with 10 hours constant music. Never be without your tunes!

 

 



 

Our ergonomically designed earbuds come with three different size ear covers, so whatever your ear size or shape, you know they will fit.

Similar to a brand new pillow, these earbuds provided a comfortable and tight fit so these earbuds will never fall out, even during the most intense workouts.
 


 

 

 

Manual Control

Sportfy manual control buttons are right on the earbuds, allowing you to take your listening experience into your own hands! This is musical control done right!

  • When earbuds are disconnected from Bluetooth, locally stored song(s) will start playing automatically, and all controls remain the same.
  • Both the left and right earbuds are equipped with manual controls, to allow the user maximum freedom.

 

Upload your songs

Sportfy earbuds have 512MB internal storage. Just connect the charging case (with earbuds in it) to the computer and drag your music files into it, then begin your journey!


Instant Pairing

Pair Sportfy with your device once (in a couple of easy steps) and then forget about it! Sportfy will take care of the pairing from there on out.

 

Bluetooth Range

You will get instant, reliable connections through Bluetooth 5.0, giving you the most freedom while listening to your music, up to 15m(49ft) in range. Don't let your devices tell you how to live your life. When you use Sportfy, you are in control!

 

 

Hands-on Review by BackerLand


Hands-on Review by TechMundo


 

Sportfy Earbuds In Pool Real Footage 

 

Having sold TWS earbuds on Amazon for nearly two years, we have generated lots of positive feedback. Confidently shop with us, knowing that all our products are well-tested, professionally engineered, and come highly-rated among Amazon users.

 

 

If you love our project, please do share to your friends/families:-D  


 

You get to choose from three different earbud sleeve sizes, all of which come with your earbuds. We have also packed in a USB cable! Don't worry: everything is snug and secure for shipping.


 




 


 

To us, Newmsnr is a work of passion. Although we are engineers and tech pros by vocation, we are dreamers at heart. Our goal is to make people's lives better anyway that we can. As we designed our cutting-edge earbuds, we were always thinking of you, our valued customers. We want you to feel like these are the last and only earbuds you will ever need (or want!)

A year ago, we started manufacturing TWS(true wireless) earbuds. We found most of the TWS earbuds designed for sports were not really suited for sports enthusiasts. Thus we started thinking why can't we create one? Therefore, after a year's worth of research and development, we finally made our own TWS earbuds which are affordable, easy to use, and ideal for everyday use or intensive sports activity.
story_txt:
After finishing the trail-production, we are now moving to the next stage — MASS PRODUCTION. Can't wait to share this exciting news with you all. By starting it now, we are able to START SHIPPING FROM JUNE 1! We also upgraded the packaging box, for better preventing the transportation damage. Run, Swim, and Live Confidently – with High-Quality Stereo Music in Your Ears! In the past several months, testing as many wireless earbuds as we could, we struggled to find a pair of true wireless earbuds that were affordable and could be used in any environment.Through our testing, we discovered that most TWS earbuds still have some limitations. Most earbuds on the market are struggled with signal interference, exceeding the Bluetooth range, and have the issue with the music will be automatically stopped.Additionally, most market earbuds are highly dependent on the proximity of the device. Ultimately, most current market earbuds cannot be used without a device present. Traditional TWS Earbuds vs.Sportfy Internal Storage EarbudsThat's when we decided to create an earbud that is truly device free and unimpeded by distance. One that works independently but still provides premium sound quality at an affordable price. Sportfy allows you to be free from limitation and listens to music anytime any place.  Leave Your Phone BehindSportfy earbuds double as media players, so you can leave your phone behind! Offering 512MB internal storage, upload your favorite workout playlist and exercise device-free. Helping you to concentrate on what you are doing and keeping you entertained.  While other devices over-complicate the pairing process, thus driving up the prices and lowering the durability of their products, the Bluetooth 5.0 compatibility in Sportfy means that pairing is never difficult.
2.5x Faster Transmission
10x Potential Data Volume
IPV6 Low Energy Protocol
4x Connectivity Range
Resistant to Interference
Increased Security
 Our team has spent thousands of hours and tested nearly 100 different drivers with the best audio engineers available, to push the boundaries of audio technology in the creation of Sportfy.Premium technology means premium sound: Experience Sportfy’s top-shelf sound quality and bask in its incredibly powerful bass, crisp mid-highs, and crystal clear vocals. In addition to premium sound quality, our earbuds receive calls in both earbuds which is different from conventional market models. Plus our noise-canceling technology ensures your private calls stay private. IP67 WaterproofThese waterproof earbuds feature a water-repellent mesh in the open ports, keeping all the gears and moving parts dry and fully functional, so you don't need to worry about a little water getting in the way of your tunes. The Italian national swimmer — Matteo MilliLoves Sportfy and use it in training every day! Let’s see what he says.   With Sportfy, you will no longer suffer by the short battery life. The earbuds have an astounding 30 hours of battery life, but with its powerful charging case you can get up to 10 hours of battery life on a single charge!For a single charge, Sportfy can keep you entertained with 10 hours constant music. Never be without your tunes!   Our ergonomically designed earbuds come with three different size ear covers, so whatever your ear size or shape, you know they will fit.Similar to a brand new pillow, these earbuds provided a comfortable and tight fit so these earbuds will never fall out, even during the most intense workouts.    Manual ControlSportfy manual control buttons are right on the earbuds, allowing you to take your listening experience into your own hands! This is musical control done right!
When earbuds are disconnected from Bluetooth, locally stored song(s) will start playing automatically, and all controls remain the same.
Both the left and right earbuds are equipped with manual controls, to allow the user maximum freedom.
 Upload your songsSportfy earbuds have 512MB internal storage. Just connect the charging case (with earbuds in it) to the computer and drag your music files into it, then begin your journey!
Instant PairingPair Sportfy with your device once (in a couple of easy steps) and then forget about it! Sportfy will take care of the pairing from there on out. Bluetooth RangeYou will get instant, reliable connections through Bluetooth 5.0, giving you the most freedom while listening to your music, up to 15m(49ft) in range. Don't let your devices tell you how to live your life. When you use Sportfy, you are in control!

story:
Hey everyone,
 Blake here and I'm super excited to share my new music with you!!!  It's been a long time coming, My 4th full length album is set to be released on May 10th. WANDERLUST UNKNOWN is mixture of Classic Jazz, Hiphop & with a little bit of Soul.  I went back to what I love, what I grew up listening to and what inspired me to become the vocalist and beatboxer I am today. 

 From Hiphop like The Roots, A Tribe Called Quest & J Dilla, I explore those nostalgic 90's era grooves with beatbox as a foundation. This is my first time producing my entire album and I am super proud at the way it's sounding.  To get that Classic Jazz feel I started creating with my dear friend Luca Pino who is an amazing Gypsy Jazz guitarist and has come up with so many amazing parts for me to sing over. We would jam, just beatbox, guitar and vocals, coming up with some beautiful melodies and laying them down in my studio to start each song. Very raw and organic! You can here a bit of that in the Pre-Order video. 

 The artwork was created by Seattle artist Ten Hundred, who I've been following for years and he took my vision to the next level.  I want the listener to be transported somewhere they have never been. To imagine they are some place foreign or tropical when listening and Ten Hun did just that with the design.  There's an entire time lapse of him creating the album cover while I supply a fun freestyle here: WANDERLUST UNKNOWN TIME-LAPSE

  I would like to personally thank each and everyone of you for always supporting my creativity! By pre-ordering this album you are helping me get this mixed by a professional. My skills only go so far and with your help, you are making this album sound the best it can be! WAHOOO!!! I really feel this album sounds like the most "me" it ever has. By taking the reigns and producing this myself it's been really fun, rewarding and challenging. Your support means the world to me and I can't wait for you to hear it. 

THANK YOU!!!

LOVE & HAPPINESS - Blake

story:
Just as everyone's fingerprints are unique, so is everyone's hearing profile. What sounds great to one person, might sound terrible to another.

SnowOwl delivers audio matching your unique hearing profile. It can also be used as a listening companion, even in the most noisy places. SnowOwl is great for people that occasionally have issues understanding speech-in-noise. For example on public transportation, busy streets, in restaurants and bars. And because of its directional microphones it is perfect for listening to someone giving a speech or a lecture. 

SnowOwl can be worn on your wrist, placed on a table and clipped on your clothes. SnowOwl and the wristband both have a magnet, which allows you to rotate the device 360 degrees.

SnowOwl can turn any wired earphones into wireless earphones and improve the quality of direct audio input (TV, music, movies) with personalized audio.

SnowOwl helps you protect your hearing from damaging over-exposure to loud noise, while keeping speech clear and comfortable. It provides environmental sound control via directional audio, eliminating so called 'cocktail party noise', reducing background noise, and personalizing and equalizing the audio environment.

There are more than 20 functions contained within SnowOwl, and at present those functions are each sold mostly as separate pieces of hardware. SnowOwl is both an incredible value and an important innovation, perfect for anyone who wants to hear more or hear better. Our team of audio researchers, hearing aid professionals, earphone professionals, and PSAP professionals is confident that we have a world-class product on our hands.

The SnowOwl is unique in its class because of its capability to deal with speech in noise, the large (and continuously growing) number of full app controlled features, its ability to be programmed, upgraded and updated and the large variety of connectivity options. 

Built on our unique Audio platform, the SnowOwl can be updated, upgraded, full settings control, and collaborate with other products, like earbuds or hearing aids. The SnowOwl mobile app (Android/IOS) also offers a large variety of services for testing, programming and connecting to a qualified health professional for remote services.
 

SnowOwl has 8 acoustic preference settings for the left ear and right ear, separately. You can choose the optimal setting via the app and program it into the SnowOwl.

There are multiple ways to self-select settings. One way is via a self-administered hearing screening in the App. Another way is via a connected qualified health provider who can do a full clinical hearing test. The App also allows you to manually enter any audiogram that you might have.

For users that suspect they may have a hearing loss, acquiring a proper diagnosis from a qualified health expert is the best path to take. Products like the SnowOwl, and other products integrated with the Audio platform, are intended to bring the new generation of affordable hearables and wearables into qualified  health offices. This allows providers to assist you with their expertise in health and optimal hearing. In time, your hearing condition might change, and being in the good care of a qualified health provider means that you can receive optimal assistance whatever your hearing situation requires.

SnowOwl is compatible with the revolutionary Line-1 noise-suppression system. This is a true and patented innovation that originates from a team of top audiological researchers at the famous VU University of Amsterdam and our partner Speechlab, a VU university spin-off.

Line-1 has proven scientifically to offer most people (regardless if they were tested for a hearing loss or not) a drastic improvement in their ability to understand speech in noisy situations. Some users have described it like “putting a blanket over the noise while preserving the speech”. It even works at distances of over 10 feet, sometimes even up to 30 feet away (in noise).

Snow Owl can be used with wired earbuds, earphones or headphones or with Bluetooth wireless sets. It uses Bluetooth 4.2 Low Energy with the special aptX low-latency add-on.

The many different audio functions are all accessible via the app:

-              Volume and Balance control
-              Directionality & Noise Suppression control
-              Equalizer control
-              Bluetooth connectivity control
-              Remote microphone control
-              Audio streaming control
-              Noise suppression setup
-              Personal profile setup
-              Audio compression setup
-              Output limiting setup
-              Bluetooth connectivity setup
-              Remote microphone setup

 

Our Audio platform is freely available for consumers by way of downloading the App in the IOS or Android app stores. Via this app, you can easily connect your SnowOwl device. After it installs the appropriate and latest version of firmware, you can choose settings and update or upgrade your SnowOwl (via over the air firmware upgrade capability), control device functions, and setup audio streaming.

We have designed our platform so that it gives consumers all the tools they need to easily create, store, and apply audio. This allows them to optimize their speech reception performance under challenging conditions and more generally to deal with high noise levels, regardless of their hearing ability (limited to mild-moderate hearing losses).

Giving consumers tools for self education, tools to assess and manage loudness exposure, and tools to assess audio profile/hearing capability are an important part of what we call our “system-approach”. It allows consumers to make better informed decisions on their hearing care and offers them total freedom of choice. In this vision, we also feel that consumers should have the option to ask assistance/counselling of a caretaker or health care professional. Therefore, the platform also has capability to remotely fine tune devices (only with permission).

Our main goal of noise reduction is optimizing the understandability of speech.  When there is more noise in the environment, everybody automatically talks louder. However, normally-hearing people only increase their volume to a level where normally-hearing listeners can just understand them.

For hearing-impaired listeners that means that the speech levels are always a handful of dB too soft for them and they miss out in the conversation. Our aim is to give them back those 4 to 6 dB, so they can partake normally in the conversation again. Therefore, we reduce the noise by 5 to 6 dB, instead of reducing it as much as possible.

In addition, it is crucial to apply a noise reduction scheme that does not damage the speech. The noise reduction scheme applied here is the result of research executed at the VUmc Medical Center in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
It is not just based on the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR), but on the SNR of signal fluctuations, as speech is an ever changing signal and it are those changes that carry much of the information. This results in the SNR in the modulation domain. So, we want to boost the fluctuations in the speech-noise mixture as appropriately as possible. 

The applied LINE-1 noise suppression scheme is covered by multiple US patents. This noise suppression scheme is a single channel noise suppression scheme that we have applied for the left and right audio channels independently. This enable the brain to keep using the spatial information. It was developed at the VUmc Medical Center in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, and is based on the comparison of the actual frequency spectrum of an audio frame to the estimated frequency spectrum of the noise. It has proved to enhance speech perception in hearing tests in both normally-hearing and hearing-impaired listeners.

SnowOwl is intended for listening to your environment through a combination of ear buds and the wearable. The ear buds dampen the surrounding sounds, while the hearable presents an improved version of those sounds through those ear buds. By applying a microphone array and the aforementioned noise-reduction scheme, this results in a lower noise volume and clearer speech.

To accommodate for mild and moderately impaired listeners, one of eight different hearing profiles can be chosen to optimize their perception. Suggestions for the choice can be based on estimates of pure-tone sensitivity, on the results of selective speech-in-noise tests, or simply on the experiences of the listener. Profiles can be replaced very easily, so also a trial-and-error method can be used. For normally-hearing users, a flat profile will be used. It is the combination of noise reduction and hearing profiles that optimizes the listening experience when using our hearable to make conversing under noisy conditions easier.

 

 

Right now, we are looking to you for help raising $25,000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing SnowOwl on a wide scale. As a thank-you, we plan on sending out SnowOwl at a discounted rate to anyone who contributes at least that dollar value to this campaign.

If you are a hearing provider interested in carrying this unique next generation wearable into your practice, you can order one of the provider packages. One of the many things that let the SnowOwl stand out is that you can service those products via in-store or remote services. 

SnowOwl is not a Hearing Aid. It is intended for everybody that has a need for improved speech in noise capabilities. For people who are struggling with mild or moderate hearing problems, a whole new generation of hearable and wearable are getting on the market that have some speech-in-noise improvement capability. Our Audio platform and the SnowOwl are bringing this to a totally new level.. SnowOwl is a device that assist in many challenging situations, for a wide variety of audio profiles. Everybody can think of situations where they are in need of this handy high quality tool that makes parties, festivals, restaurants and other high-noise environments easier to navigate.

The biggest risk with our project is in finding the right manufacturing partners. Our Audio platform 2.0 has not yet been released, however the core audio features are all fully developed and tested. Because of the sensitivity of SnowOwl, we need to work only with people who are reliable and who understand the importance of what we are doing. We intend to choose our partners very carefully.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing beforehand, the smoother the SnowOwl launch will go.

We appreciate all contributions, monetary and non-monetary, and we extend to you, our supporters, our deepest gratitude.

story:
Everyone wants the best music listening experience with wireless earbuds, but high-quality sound usually means an expensive price. That is why we created Dripp Dropp, the most affordable ergonomic TWS earbuds with Qualcomm technology built-in. For only $39. Dripp Dropp provides users with a premium sound experience at an affordable price. Born for sound, enjoy your freedom.

 

Check this review from Vicnal. Thanks so much for this awesome work!

 

 




 

To achieve true performance, we built Dripp Dropp around the latest Qualcomm® technology, the leading wireless protocol in the industry.  Designed to deliver superior audio quality, stable transmission and super low latency. Your music listening experience will be the best it can be.

 


 


 

    Qualcomm TrueWireless™ Stereo technology eliminates the need for wires between the media source and the earbuds. Helping users to enjoy wire-free stereo audio experience and audio innovators create brand-new hearable use cases

     


       


       

      The output is enhanced from the built-in moving coil speaker unit and the polyester film diaphragm. Qualcomm® aptX Adaptive combines robust premium audio quality, low-bit rate audio transmission, scalability and the opportunity for low-latency to create the ultimate seamless wireless listening experience, even in the most challenging of radio frequency (RF) environments.
       


       


       

      Qualcomm® cVc™ noise cancellation technology brings Dripp Dropp advanced audio enhancements and noise suppression and provides packet loss and bit error concealment. In combination, this delivers the best possible call quality on Bluetooth earbuds.

       


       


       

      Based on ergonomic cochlear morphology design, Dripp Dropp is lightweight and secure. The advanced design prevents the earbuds from slipping out even during strenuous exercise and is comfortable for all-day use.

       


       

      Dripp Dropp is designed to endure your toughest workouts. It has achieved nano-level anti-sweat test water resistance. So release yourself, go ride bikes, take HIIT classes, or complete a marathon. Live without limits, with a dependable true fit.

       





      Place the earbuds in the sleek case and they will automatically charge. The earbuds can play music for up to 12 hours on a single charge and the charging case can provide an additional 2 full recharges for a total of 36 hours of listening time. Faster charging and longer battery life let music accompany you all day.

       




       

      After an initial pairing, the earbuds will seamlessly connect to your devices. Simply open the charging case and the earbuds will be activated and automatically connect to the last paired device. When you put them back into the charging case, the earbuds begin charging automatically. Both headphones have a built-in MIC.

       


       


       

      Dripp Dropp uses intuitive Touch controls to play and pause, switch music control calls. Any task you need is just a TAP away.

       




       

      Your personal voice assistant. Whether it's asking Siri to make calls, send messages or act as your personal DJ, all you need to do is speak your command to Dripp Dropp.

       

       



       

      The product shown on the campaign page is a prototype. The final product will be more perfect.
story_txt:
Everyone wants the best music listening experience with wireless earbuds, but high-quality sound usually means an expensive price. That is why we created Dripp Dropp, the most affordable ergonomic TWS earbuds with Qualcomm technology built-in. For only $39. Dripp Dropp provides users with a premium sound experience at an affordable price. Born for sound, enjoy your freedom. Check this review from Vicnal. Thanks so much for this awesome work! 

 
 To achieve true performance, we built Dripp Dropp around the latest Qualcomm® technology, the leading wireless protocol in the industry.  Designed to deliver superior audio quality, stable transmission and super low latency. Your music listening experience will be the best it can be.   Qualcomm TrueWireless™ Stereo technology eliminates the need for wires between the media source and the earbuds. Helping users to enjoy wire-free stereo audio experience and audio innovators create brand-new hearable use cases   The output is enhanced from the built-in moving coil speaker unit and the polyester film diaphragm. Qualcomm® aptX Adaptive combines robust premium audio quality, low-bit rate audio transmission, scalability and the opportunity for low-latency to create the ultimate seamless wireless listening experience, even in the most challenging of radio frequency (RF) environments.   Qualcomm® cVc™ noise cancellation technology brings Dripp Dropp advanced audio enhancements and noise suppression and provides packet loss and bit error concealment. In combination, this delivers the best possible call quality on Bluetooth earbuds.   Based on ergonomic cochlear morphology design, Dripp Dropp is lightweight and secure. The advanced design prevents the earbuds from slipping out even during strenuous exercise and is comfortable for all-day use.  Dripp Dropp is designed to endure your toughest workouts. It has achieved nano-level anti-sweat test water resistance. So release yourself, go ride bikes, take HIIT classes, or complete a marathon. Live without limits, with a dependable true fit. 

Place the earbuds in the sleek case and they will automatically charge. The earbuds can play music for up to 12 hours on a single charge and the charging case can provide an additional 2 full recharges for a total of 36 hours of listening time. Faster charging and longer battery life let music accompany you all day.  After an initial pairing, the earbuds will seamlessly connect to your devices. Simply open the charging case and the earbuds will be activated and automatically connect to the last paired device. When you put them back into the charging case, the earbuds begin charging automatically. Both headphones have a built-in MIC.   Dripp Dropp uses intuitive Touch controls to play and pause, switch music control calls. Any task you need is just a TAP away.  Your personal voice assistant. Whether it's asking Siri to make calls, send messages or act as your personal DJ, all you need to do is speak your command to Dripp Dropp.  



 The product shown on the campaign page is a prototype. The final product will be more perfect.

story:
www.brutalist-lab.com

BRUTALIST-Lab Titan is the new breed of wireless loudspeakers! Sleek enough to display in your home and handmade enough to feel personal. Each piece is crafted just for you with concrete that last for a lifetime.

 

Handcrafted brutalism

Our vision is to create an interesting mix between brutalist, industrial design and wireless sound technology. A speaker that is a beautiful piece of your home, representing your unique taste for handcrafted goods. We prefer "one of a kind" instead of "mass produced in china". We decided to create speakers for those, who are looking for something unique and one of a kind.

Concrete

Are you not bored of plastic speakers? We are!!! Our speakers made of special concrete, which is a 10 times stronger material, than an average cement based concrete. It provides an outstanding low resonance enclosure that leads to no sound coloration. What you get is crystal clear highs and solid, focused bass.

 

Color & Texture

Our basic color is "pigeon grey". As it is made one by one, there will not be be two of the same BRUTALIST-Lab speaker ever. This makes each a unique loud­speaker in terms of the grain, texture and shade. One unique texture just for you. We like to play around with colors and pigments to create interesting shades and gradients, so if you have anything in mind, just let us know and We'll make it for you!

Each speaker is photographed and double checked with you, just to make sure you like the texture and color shade before shipping!

Pigeon grey

 

Limited Edition Milky Way

 

Specifications

 

Perks

Why we need your support

After a year of designing, developing, prototyping, tuning and testing, we are proud to finally present our first model, BRUTALIST-Lab Titan to you all.

The next step would be to get our workshop ready for more effective production. What we need your help for:

  • to expand the size of our workshop / rent a bigger place
  • Tools - concrete mixer, drill, sander, rack drill, professional workbenches
  • Materials - concrete, pigment, silicone, wood
  • to make more molds
  • Amplifiers, speaker drivers, cables

 

The Team

 The Team

story:
Our mission was to create a Bluetooth speaker, that sets itself apart from the crowd. A product that rises above the average. With this is mind we created AD'OM. Now, we truly believe, that through our work, the speaker design is set to change, forever.

Kalium Sound Heroes are the most futuristic Bluetooth speakers that have ever existed. Every angle of our speaker is polished manually giving it a polygonal design complemented with sharp edges.

It's also a wireless charging dock for your phone, a wi-fi range extender, and a subwoofer.

Immerse yourself in an alternate universe with this otherworldly piece of art as it illuminates your room with over 16 million color variations of ambient light. Create the perfect atmosphere with the smoke effect that surrounds the speaker and the ambient light reflected perfectly on the polygon shape of your Sound Heroes speaker.

 

 

The video below is a DEMO with the most important features of the Premium dock as they are currently being developed and tested for the final production stage.

 

Our inspiration for colors has come from luxury cars. The color of your car indicates a lot about what feelings you consider important and how you perceive yourself. We have combined the best quality paint to reach the perfect balance between elegance and style.

Each color is applied using a three-step process for a long-lasting and resistant finish. The process includes a white base layer, multiple layers of our custom-blended colors, and a 30% thick UV layer for an ultra durable finish. Every sound hero has a rich stunning hue that grabs the attention of everyone in the room.

 

Make your Sound Hero the center piece of your home.

It will give personality to everything.

It also fits perfectly with your gaming setup.

 AD'OM is a complete sound experience.

 

The K Sound Heroes comic book and game are the elements that binds the concept and the story. It creates a universe that we invite you to be a part of.

 

 

 

 

This is SUB Hero, a stand alone sub woofer you can connect to any of your Sound Heroes. You can easily pair it with AD’OM via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi.

The App allows you to interact with your K-Sound Heroes speaker in so many ways:

  • Use it to set up your speaker as an alarm clock
  • Change the ambient light colors and intensity to create your own atmosphere
  • Make your K-sound Heroes talk with different voice synthesizer
  • Build your army by pairing up to 12 K-Sound Heroes
  • Be part of the community by interacting with other Sound Heroes users
  • Unlock new features by playing the Sound Hero game.
 
 

DJ Testimonial

 
Artist testimonial

 

Production Documentation

Our factory has more than 10 years experience when it comes to production of complicated shapes of electronic products. There are four different factories working together to produce the components necessary for production. Each process and component is taken care of with an experienced technical team. Our main engineer has more than 10 years worth of industrial working experience.

Our factory can produce up to 10,000 pieces each month in the main factory.

Identification of the electronic devices will be according to the standards set by different countries e.g. ROSE, CE etc. Materials used to make the products are eco-friendly and under the management of quality control. Age testing and function testing is also done by the quality control team to make sure everything is perfect.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

AD'OM Prime and AD'OM Premium are nearly complete. We’re currently ramping up at our factory and are ready to meet the estimated delivery times.

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan.We have eight years experience with manufacturing in China. We’ve learned a lot during this time, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

 

Supply Chain Risk

We’ve spent the past year building a very capable team who work hard to ensure smooth delivery of all our products. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

 

Terms and Conditions

Backers that are not satisfied with our product and want to return it, have to pay for the shipping costs.
