story:
Note: we are having issues with our current site and will be moving to www.hubwirelessearbuds.com. We will be developing our site at a later date. Thank you!

Be among the first to experience Hub’s amazing sound and countless capabilities. Reserve yours today and get it at exclusive, insider-only prices.

Having an IPX5 rating means Hub meets a stringent standard of water resistant performance after multiple rounds of rigorous lab testing. While most earbuds and headphones can’t handle even the slightest spill, Hub exceeds other brands by being able to withstand higher than average wet conditions.

Wherever you take your Hub, feel better knowing they'll keep up - through rain, snow, or a spontaneous water gun fight.

Let Hub provide the soundtrack to your next big adventure. It was made to last long, with durability that adheres to the highest international standards, so you don’t have to be afraid to take these with you wherever you go.

 

Even with a tight seal that efficiently blocks out background noise, in ambient sound mode, the Hub can allow sound to pass through, letting you hold full conversations and stay alert of your surroundings without having to take out your earbuds. 

Enjoy your music on the go while staying safe - Hub’s ambient noise feature still gives you an immersive listening experience but keeps you aware of your surroundings, making it the perfect companion while cycling or jogging.

With Hub, your music never stops. The earbuds have an astounding 8 hours of battery life, but with its powerful charging case you can get up to 100 hours of battery life on a single charge.

Hub’s battery life is so impressively long, you might not even remember you still need to charge it.

With its 8 hours of initial playtime and up to 12.5 full charges from its charging case, Hub will keep you entertained for hours on end.

 

Hub is a product of expert engineering, bringing high-performance sound that disrupts industry standards and exceeds expectations by a couple of octaves. It features a 7mm driver that delivers deep-cutting bass and crisp highs in a tightly sealed, noise-cancelling environment. What you get is unparalleled listening you’d have to hear to believe.

 

The charging case also serves as a handy power bank that can give your mobile phones or tablet a full charge when you need it.

Not only are Hub earbuds truly wireless, the Hub charging case can even be charged wirelessly.

Once initially paired with your device, Hub automatically pairs to your device every time you take them out of its charging case. Pairing is done easily in just a couple simple steps.

We spent thousands of hours and went through dozens of prototypes to to perfectly engineer the Hub to naturally fit into the human ear canal. After scanning hundreds of ears from internationally, we finally did it. Relax knowing that your Hub can go with you from your office right to the gym or hike.

With a simple touch, access Siri or Google Assistant to get things done while on the go.

Control your tracks without taking out your phone. You can pause, play, and more just by tapping the earbud.

With a firm commitment to amazing quality, our engineers have blended pristine audio with unparalleled Bluetooth 5 that results in a seamless connection between your device and Hub. Not only will you be immersed in high-definition sound, watching videos will be a stunning experience with perfect sound synchronization.

The stereo call feature allows you to fully listen in both ears during a call - something that even the most notable wireless earbuds are unable to do. Our dual beamforming microphones and the latest CVC noise cancellation technology also ensures that whoever you are talking to hears you crystal clear as well.

Hub is specially designed for optimum sound, comfort, and convenience, featuring custom magnetic technology to keep each earbud securely in place whenever you put them away.

Bring the earbuds close to their charging port and let the force do the rest - the built-in magnet makes storing the earbuds a breeze.

Hub’s unique design helps ensure that you don’t easily lose your earbuds.The magnet keeps the earbuds securely tucked away while the charging case’s “sliding door” keeps them safely stored and protected.

One of our favorite parts about Hub that makes it so different from other earbuds is where it’s housed. This special case captures the “hub” character we love that distinguishes Hub from its competitors. It’s sleek shape carries unique functionality.

Let Hub’s completely wireless earbuds take your listening to the next level. Leave behind wires and cords and let nothing stand between you and your music.

We skip the nonsense and get straight to the point. We order from the manufacturer and ship it right to you. You're welcome.

Just as Hub is made with the highest quality materials to produce the best possible listening experience, our team is made of the world’s best engineers to produce one of the world’s best audio products.

We designed Hub with a passion for great sound, unique capabilities, and advanced performance. We wanted to take our dream of an amazing pair of earbuds not currently available on the market and bring it straight to you, minus all the nonsense. We’re doing it. Hub was the product of our dreams that’s now stepping in to real life. With Hub already in production, we’re ready to bring this dream to you.

We're an experienced manufacturer with award winning sound engineers that have worked for the likes of Harman Kardon, Bang & Olufsen, Bose, and more.

More than a year in the making, the Hub has had thousands of R&D man-hours put into it to give all of our early supporters the best and most utilitarian earbuds on the market today. The Hub is ready to go - we've had a production ready model ready to go for months now. Cut the cord with Hub today.

With Hub already in production, we’re ready to bring this dream to you.We're an experienced manufacturer with award winning sound engineers that have worked for the likes of Harman Kardon, Bang & Olufsen, Bose, and more.More than a year in the making, the Hub has had thousands of R&D man-hours put into it to give all of our early supporters the best and most utilitarian earbuds on the market today. The Hub is ready to go - we've had a production ready model ready to go for months now. Cut the cord with Hub today.

story:
ORA-X: Headphones Reimagined

ORA-X are more than a pair of headphones -- they are a wearable tablet. These smart headphones work on the flexible Android platform, so right out of the box they are ready to use and personalize based on your favorite apps, or ready to load new programs of your own creation! With an average eight hour battery life, ORA-X’s technology can be utilized throughout the entire day in a variety of ways. Whether you’re a certified technophile or a music lover who wants to take their audio experience to the next level, our headphones will revolutionize the way you interact with and create media.

“After all, even the biggest technophobes out there probably feel pretty comfortable throwing on a pair of headphones. ORA-X turns one of the most commonplace gadgets on earth into something futuristic and exciting.”
-- Jacob Kleinman, TechnoBuffalo
“...it's not simply an extension of your phone like the Apple Watch but a fully-functional complimentary device.”
-- Andrew Tarantola, Engadget


This is the next step in headphones.

The future of augmented reality packaged in a pair of sleek, high end noise isolating headphones with 50 mm drivers for full rich bass. ORA-X headphones enhance and expand the listening experience in order to create an interactive visualization of whatever you’re hearing. You can watch new music videos, see notifications about your favorite artists and much more.  

“...the ORA-X is an over-the-ear style headphone that features a flip down display. With this, the display becomes optional, so when you don't want to use it you can move it out of your direct line of view.”
-- Jared Dipane, Androidcentral

Proven pioneers in augmented reality.

We’ve been working on augmented reality hardware for over 8 years and have 13 patents on our core technology. With the ORA-1 AR Glasses we proved we were up to the challenge of designing, building and delivering advanced augmented reality hardware. With the ORA-X we’ve taken the ORA-1’s patented technology and created an entirely new device category.

“Optinvent…[has] been working on AR glasses for a long time, and they really know what they are doing when it comes to wearable transparent display.”
-- Eliane Fiolet, Ubergizmo


Designing the future.

For the developer, this isn’t just a pair of headphones. This is your chance to design the future. We’re creating a community for developers to build apps of their own creation on the open source, Android platform. We have two different developer’s kits that will put you in the mix with our staff and automatically enrolls you hackathons, giveaways, and more.

“Just as Pebble built an audience of developing enthusiasts when it first launched, so Optinvent hopes to do the same for the ORA-X.”
--Chris Davies, Slash Gear



Engadget: The ORA-X Smart Headphones include a flippable AR display

Ubergizmo: ORA-X the AR Headphones with Heads Up Display

Androidcentral: The ORA-X Android powered smart Headphones

Slash Gear: Smart AR Headphones aim to reboot Glass with audio focus

TechnoBuffalo: ORA-X Augmented reality Headphones hit Indiegogo


How does ORA-X work?

You can interact with the ORA-X through a touchpad or via voice commands to play music, launch applications, navigate menus, and take pictures or video.

The ORA-X is an Android computer in the shape of stylish headphones and includes a retractable see-through projection display.

The virtual video content will be overlaid on the environment, AR style.  The ORA-X is not an immersive device that will block the outside world.

It is a mobile device that lets you enjoy audio and video content and run applications wherever you go.


 

Two Modes

ORA-X AR Headphones have an adjustable display and camera that can be placed in front of the eye or pivoted up and out of the way changing them into a traditional Headphones.

Furthermore, the display arm rotates 180° so you can use the ORA-X on the right or left side.  



ORA-X Features Overview


What can ORA-X do

The ORA-X is an Android device and there are already millions of applications that you can download from the Google Play store.

That means it's ready to use out of the box!  We are also going to build the applications listed below, but the most exciting prospect is that we're building the ecosystem of developers to create the next generation of apps for the ORA-X. If you're a developer and want to get in on this, there are two special dev. kit perk just for you!


Music Videos



"See Your Music" with the ORA-X!  Not only can you enjoy a great listening experience with the high fidelity sound of the ORA-X, but you can watch music videos on the go either directly stored on the device using the built in memory, streamed from your mobile phone, or over the internet via Wi-Fi.  You can also watch YouTube, News, or any other types of video on the ORA-X's large virtual display.


Gaming


The ORA-X is a portable game console!  With its large virtual display, trackpad, and 9 axis position sensor, you can play Android games on the device that are available for download on the Google Play store anytime on the go!

We even have a Scouter App that shows power levels :-)
Actual footage shot through the display:


Here's actual footage of Ingress, an augmented reality game, being played.

Pokemon Go is next!
Actual footage shot through the AR display:


Social Media


The ORA-X comes equipped with a 5 Mpixel camera with autofocus and 1080p HD video recording capability.  Capture those great moments instantly and share them on social media quicker than the time it takes to pull out your mobile phone!

Messaging


The ORA-X can be used as a notification and messaging device.  Listen to your music, get your notifications, and send quick messages without interruption using the touchpad with the special EyeSpeech UI or vocally.  The ORA-X supports voice commands through its integrated microphone.


Entertainment wherever you go

ORA-X is the perfect companion for music lovers on the go.  Not only can you listen to your favorite music with high fidelity audio wherever you are, but you can also watch visual content on the go, see notifications, and much more with the see-through AR display and Android OS. ORA-X is a new platform, its applications will grow, helping and entertaining in ways we haven’t yet imagined.



Experience ORA-X

This is how people react to the ORA-X when they try it.  Results guaranteed ;-)

Shot at TechCrunch Disrupt in SF on the 21st of September:



The Details

We’ve designed the ORA-X to handle the most challenging augmented reality applications with ease. Powered by a dual core processor with GPU, it features a capacitive touchpad, camera, microphone, and inertial and ambient light sensors. Integrated Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and GPS last for hours thanks to its high capacity rechargeable battery.




Impressive Tech & Design at an Affordable Price

Early birds will be the first to get the ORA-X for nearly half off the retail price.  The other pledge levels also offer a great savings over what the ORA-X will sell for in retail.  This is our way of saying thank you to our Indiegogo backers.  The MSRP of ORA-X is planned to be around $600 when it launches. The special Luxe edition features a fashionable color scheme in white, aluminum, and blue/gray leather and comes complete with its own docking stand for charging and linking the ORA-X.  A total value of $700 that we're offering to our Indiegogo backers for $549.  That's a savings of $150!



Where We’re At

With the industrial design and first electronic board complete and manufacturers in place, we are ready to go to production once we have your support. Right now, we are looking to build up our developer community, design easy to use, ready to go apps for the ORA-X and launch a terrific app store. The most exciting part about supporting this campaign? You’re helping to revolutionize the future of  augmented reality because we want your input! Your contributions will help fund:

  • Production tooling

  • Large component ordering

  • UI/UX development

We’ve already demonstrated a working prototype to the press and with your backing we’re ready to being manufacturing.


The Team

Optinvent is run by a talented group of experienced engineers and experts who are passionate about design and industrialization of cutting edge products.


  KAYVAN MIRZA - FOUNDER & CEO

Passionate entrepreneur with 20+ years in consumer electronics, hardware, and wearable tech.  He likes to work on vintage bikes, collects and repairs mechanical watches, loves tech, electronic music, and is a huge sci-fi fan.  He also designs leather jackets for PegasusJackets.com!


  KHALED SARAYEDINE - FOUNDER & CTO

Khaled holds a PhD in Physics and Optics. He's the main inventor behind Optinvent's proprietary display technology.  Khaled likes to read science books in his spare time and is interested in cutting edge technology.

  FREDERIC LINTZ Eliumstudio - DESIGNER

Leading product designer at Eliumstudio. He has designed many award winning consumer products such as the Activité smart watch among others for Medissimo, Rowenta, Panasonic etc.  Frederic is an aesthete and and avid audiophile.  He has been nominated for designer of the year by GQ magazine.


   ARNAUD CHANCIBOT - MECHANICAL ENGINEER

Arnaud is a mechanical wizard and has been expressing his creative magic for over 20 years in the industry. He has several patents under his belt in fields such as medical, nautical, and electrical equipment.  His inspiration comes from the world around him and he is passionate about historical and fantasy comic books.


  JULIEN BLIN - ADVISOR

Julien is a network guy.  He's very well known and respected in the wearable tech circles.  He is founder of Gizworld Conferences that bring together the wearable tech industry.  He helps start-ups who want to achieve their full potential and is a huge fan of wearable tech and technology in general.  Julein is currently advising Optinvent in a business development role.

  ROGER CRAIG - ADVISOR

Roger is a 3 time Superbowl champion for the San Francisco 49ers.  He's a living legend and a very well respected person in the SF Bay Area.  He loves the ORA-X and is currently advising Optinvent on the sports and fitness related aspects of the product and mentoring the team on many other issues.


A Closer Look at Manufacturing and Supply Chain Partners

Optinvent’s manufacturing partners have ISO 9001 certified production facilities. Certain key components will come from our long term optical components partner who have state of the art injection molding machines capable of producing the proprietary high precision optics necessary for the ORA-X.


Optics Manufacturing in Japan


Our partner for final assembly has years of experience and already manufactures hundreds of thousands of headphones per year.  They will assemble and test 100% of the ORA-X headphones to our rigorous quality control standards. 

Final Assembly and Test in Shenzen




Risks & Challenges

    • While bringing a new product to market is never a small feat, we think we’re up to the challenge. Our team has years of experience in product design and development and we are seriously committed to delivering you the most advanced headphones in the world.

    • There’s no doubt that the ORA-X is a complex piece of technology - we’re integrating optics, acoustics, electronics, and mechanics into a gorgeous, state of the art package. But working with an industry leader in high-end audio and combining their experience with our already developed core technologies for the ORA-1, we are ready to go.


Other Ways You Can Help
Please spread the word about the ORA-X by clicking the share links on this site.  Help us by posting on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media sites.  Word of mouth are what makes campaigns. We are very passionate in our belief that it is a revolutionary product.  We need your help to make it a reality.


Frequently Asked Questions


How can I reach you?

You can send us any questions, concerns, or ideas directly through Indiegogo or email us at contact@optinvent.com


Where will you ship to?

We ship worldwide!


What’s the battery like?

A 2000mAh battery powers the ORA-X, and the battery life will vary based on how it’s used--just like any other mobile device. Camera, WiFi, and GPS will consume battery when left on, but we estimate the average battery life to be eight hours.


How do I re-charge the ORA-X?

The standard ORA-X recharges with a micro USB, and the Luxe edition comes with a docking stand.


Will the ORA-X display hurt my eyes?

The ORA-X is not different from any other monitor or projection device -- ideal use is not recommended.


What if I have a vision problem?

The ORA-X compatible with most eyewear so you can use it while wearing your own glasses.  Contact lenses are of course no problem.


How do I type on the ORA-X?

We’re developing a program called EyeSpeech with partner called Telepath Eye. The program will type using a corousel input method with the touchpad to allow for more fluid text input.


What is “pass through mode”?

As a user, you can choose to employ this mode so that you’re not isolated from the environment. The ORA-X uses the microphone to take in ambient, environmental sounds to keep you safe.


What version of Android does the device run and how do firmware updates work?

Our prototypes are currently running on Android 4.4.2.  This may or may not be upgraded by the time we launch.  If we do upgrade the firmware after launch, we will notify you and send instructions on how to update the firmware easily.  Currently we don't have OTA firmware upgrade capabilities but this may be possible in the future.


Can I get a refund?

Your contribution and pledge to our campaign is non-refundable and binding. We will abide by Indiegogo’s policies in case of conflict.


Why did your funding goal change?

We had quite a few people ask us if we would still make the ORA-X if we didn’t reach our funding goal.  In order to dispel those concerns we asked Indiegogo to change our funding goal and they agreed to do so. The goal does not in any way affect our ability to manufacture ORA-X or fulfill your perks. It should just gives more confidence to existing and new backers that we are dedicated to making the ORA-X a reality. We chose to run a “Flexible Funding” campaign, meaning everyone will get their perks with or without a goal.
story_txt:
ORA-X: Headphones ReimaginedORA-X are more than a pair of headphones -- they are a wearable tablet. These smart headphones work on the flexible Android platform, so right out of the box they are ready to use and personalize based on your favorite apps, or ready to load new programs of your own creation! With an average eight hour battery life, ORA-X’s technology can be utilized throughout the entire day in a variety of ways. Whether you’re a certified technophile or a music lover who wants to take their audio experience to the next level, our headphones will revolutionize the way you interact with and create media.
“After all, even the biggest technophobes out there probably feel pretty comfortable throwing on a pair of headphones. ORA-X turns one of the most commonplace gadgets on earth into something futuristic and exciting.”-- Jacob Kleinman, TechnoBuffalo
“...it's not simply an extension of your phone like the Apple Watch but a fully-functional complimentary device.”-- Andrew Tarantola, Engadget

This is the next step in headphones.
The future of augmented reality packaged in a pair of sleek, high end noise isolating headphones with 50 mm drivers for full rich bass. ORA-X headphones enhance and expand the listening experience in order to create an interactive visualization of whatever you’re hearing. You can watch new music videos, see notifications about your favorite artists and much more.  “...the ORA-X is an over-the-ear style headphone that features a flip down display. With this, the display becomes optional, so when you don't want to use it you can move it out of your direct line of view.”-- Jared Dipane, Androidcentral
Proven pioneers in augmented reality.
We’ve been working on augmented reality hardware for over 8 years and have 13 patents on our core technology. With the ORA-1 AR Glasses we proved we were up to the challenge of designing, building and delivering advanced augmented reality hardware. With the ORA-X we’ve taken the ORA-1’s patented technology and created an entirely new device category.
“Optinvent…[has] been working on AR glasses for a long time, and they really know what they are doing when it comes to wearable transparent display.”-- Eliane Fiolet, Ubergizmo



Designing the future. 
For the developer, this isn’t just a pair of headphones. This is your chance to design the future. We’re creating a community for developers to build apps of their own creation on the open source, Android platform. We have two different developer’s kits that will put you in the mix with our staff and automatically enrolls you hackathons, giveaways, and more.

“Just as Pebble built an audience of developing enthusiasts when it first launched, so Optinvent hopes to do the same for the ORA-X.”--Chris Davies, Slash Gear







Engadget: The ORA-X Smart Headphones include a flippable AR display
Ubergizmo: ORA-X the AR Headphones with Heads Up Display
Androidcentral: The ORA-X Android powered smart Headphones
Slash Gear: Smart AR Headphones aim to reboot Glass with audio focus
TechnoBuffalo: ORA-X Augmented reality Headphones hit Indiegogo


How does ORA-X work?
You
can interact with the ORA-X through a touchpad or via voice commands to play music, launch applications, navigate
menus, and take pictures or video.

The ORA-X is an Android computer in
the shape of stylish headphones and includes a retractable see-through projection display.
The virtual video content will be overlaid on the
environment, AR style.  The ORA-X is not an immersive device that will block the
outside world.
It is a mobile device that lets you enjoy
audio and video content and run applications wherever you go.
 Two ModesORA-X AR Headphones have an adjustable display and camera
that can be placed in front of the eye or pivoted up and out of the way changing them into a traditional
Headphones.Furthermore, the display arm rotates 180° so you can use the ORA-X on the right or left side.  


ORA-X Features Overview








 
What can ORA-X do

The ORA-X is an Android device and there are already millions of applications that you can download from the Google Play store.


That means it's ready to use out of the box!  We are also going to build the applications listed below, but the most exciting prospect is that we're building the ecosystem of developers to create the next generation of apps for the ORA-X. If you're a developer and want to get in on this, there are two special dev. kit perk just for you!

Music Videos






"See Your Music" with the ORA-X!  Not only can you enjoy a great listening experience with the high fidelity sound of the ORA-X, but you can watch music videos on the go either directly stored on the device using the built in memory, streamed from your mobile phone, or over the internet via Wi-Fi.  You can also watch YouTube, News, or any other types of video on the ORA-X's large virtual display.


Gaming



The ORA-X is a portable game console!  With its large virtual display, trackpad, and 9 axis position sensor, you can play Android games on the device that are available for download on the Google Play store anytime on the go!We even have a Scouter App that shows power levels :-)Actual footage shot through the display:

Here's actual footage of Ingress, an augmented reality game, being played.
Pokemon Go is next!
Actual footage shot through the AR display:





Social Media


The ORA-X comes equipped with a 5 Mpixel camera with autofocus and 1080p HD video recording capability.  Capture those great moments instantly and share them on social media quicker than the time it takes to pull out your mobile phone!
Messaging




The ORA-X can be used as a notification and messaging device.  Listen to your music, get your notifications, and send quick messages without interruption using the touchpad with the special EyeSpeech UI or vocally.  The ORA-X supports voice commands through its integrated microphone.

Entertainment wherever you go


ORA-X is the perfect companion for music lovers on the go.  Not only can you listen to your favorite music with high fidelity audio wherever you are, 
but you can also watch visual content on the go, see notifications, and much more with the see-through AR display and Android OS. ORA-X is a new platform, its 
applications will grow, helping and entertaining in ways we haven’t 
yet imagined.












Experience ORA-X


This is how people react to the ORA-X when they try it.  Results guaranteed ;-)
Shot at TechCrunch Disrupt in SF on the 21st of September:





The Details

story:
Short Summary

I am James Boblak, owner, producer, and engineer at Artspoke Recording Studios and Skeptical Records in downtown Berkeley, California.  After a seven year run in Albany, I moved the studio to its present location.  I've been here for nearly seven years as well, and most of the original equipment, especially the mixers, have started to make the transition from "vintage," to "garbage."

Having recently had the opportunity to work extensively with the Behringer X32 mixing console, I realized the potential value this piece of equipment could add to my client projects.  The backbone of this Studio Retool plan is to replace both of my mixing consoles with either the Behringer X32, or perhaps its bigger, studio version, the Midas M32.  If funded, this campaign will begin a complete rewire of the studio, with one of these cutting-edge consoles at its heart.

As many of my clients are mid-project right now, I didn't want to raise my rates and force this update.  So I am offering blocks of studio time at a discounted rate, to be used to complete and existing projects or even start a new on on the new gear.

There was one goal when I started Skeptical Records and Artspoke Recording Studios almost fifteen years ago in the Northern California East Bay.  That goal was, and still is, to bring the power of the recording studio to independent musicians, building on my musical and technical nature, training, and experience.  My clients have provided the motivational and financial support that has brought the studio to where it is today.  It is my hope that  sharing this opportunity to be involved with the upgrades in the studio will continue to provide me and my clients with the  most bang for our buck.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm pre-selling studio time, in discounted blocks, to upgrade the studio's mixing console.  If funded, the studio will close down for several days in early March of this year to facilitate the wiring in and commissioning of the new mixing console and potential support gear.

The first goal to hit is $3500.  This would provide enough money and time to remove my existing 1979 Tascam M520 mixing console, and purchase the Behringer X32 and the proper cabling and connectors to wire it into the studio.

Should we hit the second goal,  $5000, I will purchase and commission the Midas M32 instead, which would provide similar recording and mixing support as the Behringer X32, but is made of higher quality components, and has some additional functionality.

Goal 3 is $7000.  This will allow enough time and budget for me to remove my 1979 Soundcraft Series 2400 mixing console as well, and convert that area of the control room to a more tailored sound creation and video editing suite.  Additional new gear at and above this goal amount will include a 4k display as well as other dedicated audio samplers and computers, and maybe some new chairs!

The Impact

Moving forward in the spirit of retooling the studio, I am adjusting my role to focus more on my responsibilities with my label, Skeptical Records.  Not only will these discounted blocks of studio time help you save money on studio time, it should also help us take a bigger picture look at your project.  It can be difficult to judge how much time and money an independent project will need.  Please take this opportunity to streamline a production plan that will give us a working budget and maybe even a deadline.  Both can be extremely motivating!

To help repay the expense, studio rates will be going up once the Retool is complete.  Having these blocks of discounted studio time on credit can help offset, or ideally completely circumvent the new rates.  And don't forget we'll be working on a brand new, state of the art mixing console, so our process will be more efficient, and our sounds bigger and better than ever.

To me, your contribution to this campaign means an even bigger commitment to the music we make together.   I am so thankful to have such a diverse and talented morass of artists and friends with which to create, and truly hope there is real value for all of us here.  The studio is continually dedicated to all of you.

Risks & Challenges

The job of the recording engineer is to provide a seamless translation between an emotive musical artist and "the gear".   As a tech and the owner of  dozens of pieces of vintage and space-age electronic equipment, my primary goal in making this upgrade to the studio is to add some horsepower to the heaviest lifting components, starting with the mixing console.  A new one means a 38-year leap forward in time and technology!  It will also replace my ADA converters, and has many other super powers that 1979 was just dreaming about.

The rewiring will be no small feat.  I have personally rebuilt and commissioned both of my vintage mixers more than once, and am the last to finally admit that their warmth and charm have honorably graced enough recording and mixing.  It will be emotionally difficult, for sure, but it will also represent more than a simple set of engineering challenges.   The M520 isn't too heavy, but most of the hundreds of connections coming to and from it will have to be rerouted and changed.  I will store it in my garage at home until I have the time to rebuild and sell it.  I have a separate business plan brewing to cut the Soundcraft into mic pre's and Eq's and sell them as individual "lunch boxes", but that's another story.

These two digital mixers, the X32 and M32, share the same Operating System, which is downloadable in the form of an application that runs on any computer.  This software is the same that controls every detail of every setting on the mixer, and save as many as you like to a thumb drive, which can then be uploaded into the mixer itself.  The software is available for free -- I have already downloaded and installed it, and created what will soon become my initial setups for the board, including color-coded, named channel strips, EQ and compression, and even headphone routing!  The very first thing I will do after unboxing the new mixing console, will be to plug in a thumb drive with my setup file, and set the entire console my way.  :)  I have a few presets already.  One is for testing all the new analog wiring connections!

Other Ways You Can Help

At this time, I'm not really looking for new clients.  However, studio time will be available on a first-come, first-served basis, so new clients are of course welcome!  I do plan to change the way I do business once this retool is complete, and will need everyone's help implementing changes in booking, scheduling, billing, funding, and accounting.  Odoo.com is a San Francisco company that provides amazing online project management tools, to which I will subscribe in March.  This will allow every project to keep its accounting, credits, and goals in check.

Studio time can be booked as soon as it's pledged, or you can wait to try and book time later.  Discount blocks from this campaign will only be valuable for studio time between March 15 and December 15, 2017.  Any discounted time block can be toward any single session, but only one block can be used toward any single session.  So if we have a 4-hour session, you could use one 3-hour block toward the session, and then just pay for the one other hour - and, the blocks will cover the more expensive/later hours.  More on the new studio booking and billing policies (including a 4-hour session minimum) to come . . .

Maybe sharing this with your friends and family will give them an opportunity to provide you with some studio time as a gift.  There are some simple indiegogo.com sharing tools here, which wouldn't hurt to learn about just in case we use them for YOUR indiegogo!!

Thank you for your continued support, and for checking this all out,

-James

Having these blocks of discounted studio time on credit can help offset, or ideally completely circumvent the new rates.  And don't forget we'll be working on a brand new, state of the art mixing console, so our process will be more efficient, and our sounds bigger and better than ever.To me, your contribution to this campaign means an even bigger commitment to the music we make together.   I am so thankful to have such a diverse and talented morass of artists and friends with which to create, and truly hope there is real value for all of us here.  The studio is continually dedicated to all of you.Risks & ChallengesThe job of the recording engineer is to provide a seamless translation between an emotive musical artist and "the gear".   As a tech and the owner of  dozens of pieces of vintage and space-age electronic equipment, my primary goal in making this upgrade to the studio is to add some horsepower to the heaviest lifting components, starting with the mixing console.  A new one means a 38-year leap forward in time and technology!  It will also replace my ADA converters, and has many other super powers that 1979 was just dreaming about.The rewiring will be no small feat.  I have personally rebuilt and commissioned both of my vintage mixers more than once, and am the last to finally admit that their warmth and charm have honorably graced enough recording and mixing.  It will be emotionally difficult, for sure, but it will also represent more than a simple set of engineering challenges.   The M520 isn't too heavy, but most of the hundreds of connections coming to and from it will have to be rerouted and changed.  I will store it in my garage at home until I have the time to rebuild and sell it.  I have a separate business plan brewing to cut the Soundcraft into mic pre's and Eq's and sell them as individual "lunch boxes", but that's another story.These two digital mixers, the X32 and M32, share the same Operating System, which is downloadable in the form of an application that runs on any computer.  This software is the same that controls every detail of every setting on the mixer, and save as many as you like to a thumb drive, which can then be uploaded into the mixer itself.  The software is available for free -- I have already downloaded and installed it, and created what will soon become my initial setups for the board, including color-coded, named channel strips, EQ and compression, and even headphone routing!  The very first thing I will do after unboxing the new mixing console, will be to plug in a thumb drive with my setup file, and set the entire console my way.  :)  I have a few presets already.  One is for testing all the new analog wiring connections!Other Ways You Can HelpAt this time, I'm not really looking for new clients.  However, studio time will be available on a first-come, first-served basis, so new clients are of course welcome!  I do plan to change the way I do business once this retool is complete, and will need everyone's help implementing changes in booking, scheduling, billing, funding, and accounting.  Odoo.com is a San Francisco company that provides amazing online project management tools, to which I will subscribe in March.  This will allow every project to keep its accounting, credits, and goals in check.Studio time can be booked as soon as it's pledged, or you can wait to try and book time later.  Discount blocks from this campaign will only be valuable for studio time between March 15 and December 15, 2017.  Any discounted time block can be toward any single session, but only one block can be used toward any single session.  So if we have a 4-hour session, you could use one 3-hour block toward the session, and then just pay for the one other hour - and, the blocks will cover the more expensive/later hours.  More on the new studio booking and billing policies (including a 4-hour session minimum) to come . . .Maybe sharing this with your friends and family will give them an opportunity to provide you with some studio time as a gift.  There are some simple indiegogo.com sharing tools here, which wouldn't hurt to learn about just in case we use them for YOUR indiegogo!!Thank you for your continued support, and for checking this all out,-James

story:
We are the world's first to use DECT technology in Hi-Fi grade audio. You can follow our previous campaigns:

ONEclassic: 4K DECT speaker that sound 200K setup

ONEmicro: The most natural audiophile speaker, big sound in small body

Introduction

Many people are looking for see-through speaker to fit their home décor. 2 well-known brands (Waterfall and Crystal cable) use glass to build see-through audiophile grade wired speaker, price is extremely high (USD50-100K) that most of us can’t afford.

We don’t like glass because of its brittle sound, pale green edge and risk of breaking down. Glass might even cause danger in shipping. Therefore, we use an expensive and safe material, Acrylic, to make the speaker cabinet, making them more like pieces of art instead of boxes of wood. ONEclassic2 blends in your interior, revealing your exclusive taste for innovation and design.   

They love us

Affordable see-through speaker

1. Crystal Shiny
We use laser to cut 12mm acrylic panel with a 45° cutting edge. Each cutting edge is carefully polished to high gloss. Joint edges are single and create a multi-reflection of light, shining brightly under the sunlight. ONEclassic2 is both a pleasure to look at and listen to.  

2. Purely colourless and fully transparent
Acrylic is high quality material with 100% colourless, perfect match with any colour while glass is always tinted with pale green. Acylic is 360° fully transparent with shiny edge. You can see it straight through even from the narrow edge. For glass, you could not see what is behind the edge. You can easily fit ONEclassic2 into any house as an elegant décor.

3. Neat wireless design
Extra cables would only detract the elegant look and do little for the sound. Inside the speaker, you can clearly see the secret part, PCB, which is set firmly on the aluminum plate. Outside the speaker, there are no heat sink and bulky interconnection speaker cables.

4. Safe and durable
Glass speaker with sharp corners may cause danger, if knocked over could shatter. Acrylic is not fragile as glass. You can place your ONEclassic2 anywhere you like, no need to worry about breaking up into heaps of sharp pieces by your children or pets.

Acrylic panels are bonded together by soften welding which softens the acrylic surfaces so that they merge to one piece. This chemical bond formed by soften welding is much stronger than the physical bond by gluing, giving them more than 20 years life span.

5. High internal damping, reduce resonance
The 12mm acrylic is very suitable to make a speaker enclosure as it has high internal damping, sound wave hitting the acrylic panel is absorbed and sound wave reflection is stopped, making the mid-low frequency clean. Different materials have different resonance frequencies, resulting in different sound characters. Glass speaker has a natural tendency to ring, giving overly bright balance and the brittle sound. Acrylic speaker has great density which gives a non-resonant enclosure. The sound character is naturally warm, similar to peer wood. ONEclassic2 sounds like a high-end speaker with a spacious and involving sound.  

News: Innovative 5.1 TRUE WIRELESS SURROUND

We just launch a new campaign: World's only 5.1 surround without speaker wire & power cord of wireless personal surround theatre.

This system use the same DECT wireless technology of ONEclassic speaker, if you want to get some more than stereo enjoyment, you may go there for details.

Production version

ONEclassic2 is our production version of see-through speaker. The acrylic enclosure is produced in our factory. 

          

1st campaign: draft by hand; 2nd campaign: 3D drawing using software

After that, the speaker is assembled and calibrated by our engineers in our Hong Kong office.

DECT Excellent sound

Our Hi-Fi grade wireless speaker can perform better than wired speaker. What is the secret behind?

Wireless speaker always suffers from channel synchronization problem. None of them can reproduce music sound stage until NOW.

We use DECT technology to solve this timing problem, redefining the wireless sound.

1. Unbeatable accurate sound stage
ONEaudio is the world’s first to apply DECT technology in HiFi grade audio product. DECT is TDMA protocol, it has high accurate timing characteristic, offering perfect synchronization between left and right channel. It gives you a very precise sound stage and front to back layering. You will feel you are actually there with music coming from three dimensional space.

2. Excellent imaging 
ONEclassic2 gives excellent imaging which would embarrass many conventional speakers. Powerful dual DSP help us to use high precision linear phase FIR filter in speaker crossover process. It guarantees overlapping frequency band at woofer and tweeter is coherent. With good imaging, you can ‘see’ sound object position, size and outline.

3. Clean, clear and pure music
ONEclassic2 uses all-in-one firmware loaded in a single chip. Signal flow is the most simple with only a few external components in the circuit board. Audio interface with amplifiers is digital, making sure no noise and no cross-talk on the path. Sound is clean and clear, background is silent, music is pure and natural.

4. Well balanced sound 
Natural balance exists in everything in the world. Sound should be also well balanced for the best experience. Too much bass or treble will destroy music truthiness. The ONEclassic has well-balanced sound which is suitable for all kinds of music, from instrument to orchestral, from vocal solo to rock band.

5. Rich and full bodied vocal
2-ways speaker usually get a problem in woofer and tweeter crossover point at mid frequency range. This frequency range is most sensitive in human listening, especially in playing vocal sound. Our engineer spent long time to tune the crossover point, make sure frequency response is flat. Result that ONEclassic has a full bodied vocal, female voice is sweet, male voice is rich.

6. 4 sound profiles fit your favor 
Everyone has their favor of sound. We designed 4 types of sound profile to fit for your need. We have warm, nature, clarity and dynamic profile. You can change anytime depend on your mood. Sound profile is implemented in lower level of sound construction. We change filter type, amplifier loop gain and upsampling coefficient, that can totally retain sound quality, just shift the sound character to get sound effect. 

7. In-room tone balance 
Different room size, shape and absorption furniture will affect high frequency tone balance. We introduce 7 steps, from -3 steps to +3 steps, for you to adjust the speaker in your room.

Select sound profile by simple operation.

How does it actually sound? 

You can listen to some recordings of our ONEclassic compared with a 200K high end setup, please go there. ONEclassic2 performs even better, recordings are just for your reference.
You can also see how our previous backers said about their ONEclassic: 

 “I received them shortly after KS was over and to be totally honest, the sound is nothing short of spectacular! Not only are they beautiful to look at but the sound they produced through my iPhone, the wife's Android and my laptop using their dongle is nothing short of amazing.” David Upshaw 

 “...the difference is astounding. I have had various setups over the years ranging from $5k to $20k and these speakers beat them all. I don't think I have listened to anything better at the HiFi stores either." Sunny Smith 

 “I can say that these speakers perform better than anything else I own, including a $15k setup.” Byron Dubow 

 “The setup is simply plug and play, it run without Glitch. The sound is awesome as what Kenneth said before.” Gary Ocampo 

 "I am so astonish after enjoying such rich music and crystal songs diffuse from a pair of transparent DECT speakers. Simple setup but bottomless content." Clarence 

 "As a Hi Fi enthusiasm for over 20 years, I have never experienced such a good quality of reproduction of music from a Hi Fi system at this price tag." Leo   

Full backer comments

Modern features

1. All-in-one, Simple and easy
There is no more amplifier or CD player. All you need is just a small USB dongle which streams high quality audio from PC or mobile device. Now, you can simply play audiophile music from your smart phone. Spend less time setting up speakers and more time listening.    

2. More than stereo  
Not only HiFi quality, DECT technology can also support multi-channels concurrent transmission. ONEaudio successfully developed the world’s first true wireless 5.1 surround. This can be formed by combining the ONEclassic2 and any models of ONEaudio wireless speakers.    

3. Firmware upgrade
A USB port is equipped in ONEclassic. You can use your WIN/PC to upgrade the speaker through the USB port. We will provide free upgrade for forward compatibility and sound improvement.

What’s new in ONEclassic2 

You might like to know more about ONEclassic before you look into new design in ONEclassic2.  For more details about ONEclassic technical aspect and design concept, please browse ONEclassic campaign .

1. Improved structural design, a sense of art 
Every acrylic piece is cut at 45° by laser, then polish each cutting edge to give crystal shinny outline. Every cabinet is handmade by our craftsman and every single edge is carefully polished to ensure a smooth edge and shininess. 

2. Powerful amplifiers, more accurate sound
Powerful amplifiers with higher current output are used to improve the damping factor. Higher damping factor helps ONEclassic 2 to deliver a fast and solid bass, perfect for jazz and classical music. 

3. Audio grade adaptor, clean and silent background 
Quality of power supply is critical to sound quality. We upgraded the power adaptor to audio grade, having lower noise level and higher instant current. With the audio grade adaptor, ONEclassic 2 has more silent and clean background.

4. Improved power circuit, better punching bass 
We doubled the capacitance of power reservoir to give higher instant current supply to amplifiers. We used more metalized capacitors on each group of power line. We re-layout PCB to achieves power feeding lines have equal sharing of power.

5. New tweeter
ONEclassic 2 features a silk dome tweeter. The silk dome has low distortion and higher frequency response. The tweeter is covered by anti-magnetic shielding to reduce electromagnetic emission.

6. New firmware
We did lot of changes to improve the DECT audio sound: more accurate timing, more precise filters, higher resolution signal depth, more reliable wireless connection, more routing flexibility, lower current consumption result of lower spurious emission, and some minor changes. 

7. Longer communication range 
Our radio engineers redesign antenna matching circuit, communication range is improved by 20% range up to 30m. 

Specification

Radio band : 1.9GHz DECT 
Channel Air codec : OPUS 480Kbps lossless 
Drivers : Celestion 6.5" paper cone woofer Heco 2" silk tweeter 
Cable : ϕ3.5mm 120 strands pure copper wire ϕ2.5mm 20 strands silver coated wire 
Size : 350 (H) x 200 (W) x 285 (D) mm 
Weight : 10.5kg (23lbs) per speaker 
Adaptor : 24V6A 150VA with PFC, input 110~220V 
Output power : 120W (80W woofer, 40W tweeter) per speaker 
Freq. response : 55-38000Hz 
Crossover freq. : 3.2KHz, 3.6KHz, 4.2KHz, 4.4KHz 
Distortion : Amplifier output 0.007% @1KHz Acoustic output 0.1% @1KHz, 0.06% @10KHz 
Power consumption : Standby power 0.25W Playing 120% of power output @Po>40W 
Audio mode support : Stereo, surround 
Transmitter support : 3   

The team

Press kit

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0AjtvTudGvdZk1zblo5aFpYTVU

Risks and challenges

1. ONEclassic is handmade product, it might have deviation on workmanship, we will keep it at highest standard.

2. Qualification process is completed, major components are ready, only have a very low risk of shipment delay.

3. The recipient is the importer of the shipment and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of Hong Kong may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; ONEaudio has no control over these charges, nor can we predict what they may be.

4. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; backer should contact your local customs office for more information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our original delivery estimates. However, ONEaudio is happy to provide any assistance wherever possible.

FAQ

General: a. What are included in the speaker kit ?

A pair of ONEclassic speaker, USB dongle for stereo play, 2 pcs 150W adaptor (110-220V) white colour and 2 pcs 1.5m power cord (you can choose of US, EU or UK plug)

General: b. Which countries does DECT cover ?

DECT covers 110 countries. Generally, DECT has 2 major regions: DECT6 for US, and EU DECT for Europe. Other countries like South America, Asian and Australia are supported. J-DECT is under development. Please specify your country in the order.

General: c. How is the warranty ?

We offer 15 months warranty from the date of shipment. We cover normal fail claim. You can ship back us at your expense, or we can send you spare parts for replacement.

General: d. How durable is ONEclassic ?

Acrylic is a highly durable material. It can last for 20 years. Long-time exposure in strong sunshine may destroy its transparency and extremely high humidity (>90%) may shorten speaker driver life span.

Operation: e. How can I use ONEclassic to setup surround system ?

Surround is setup by 5 pcs of speakers and subwoofer. If you start with ONEclassic, you can place it as front speaker. Then, turn on 3 more speakers, any models of ONEaudio speaker. You can use our wireless subwoofer, or use a LFE receiver (ONEbox.bass) to connect its output to your active subwoofer. Then pair all speakers to a surround mode dongle or ONEaudio console box.

Operation: f. What size of room does ONEclassic fit for ?

ONEclassic fits for room size 8-40m2. Perfect size is 10-20m2. Different room size results in different character in tone absorption and reflection. You can use tone balance selection to control treble level. Generally, larger room needs more treble.

Operation: g. Do I need to burn-in the speaker ?

ONEclassic needs 100 hours burn-in to reach its steady state. 24 hours burn-in is done on our side. For each operation, ONEclassic needs about 10 minutes to warm up, sound will go smoothly afterward. Power off (by press power key) mode or standby mode does not affect warm up time. Please don’t plug out the power adaptor, you will need further 6 hour to warm up the adaptor.

Operation: h. How do I manage volume control to get the best sound quality ?

Player (eg. Window Media Player and iTune) volume is controlled by attenuate signal level; bit resolution is lost. Please keep player volume to maximum to retain full resolution.Use computer speaker volume (mixer volume)to do volume control. This is a volume command sent to speaker to change amplifier gain, bit resolution is kept unchanged. ONEclassic has volume up/down keys which control amplifier gain, bit resolution is also kept unchanged.

Operation: i. What kind of music file is recommended for ONEclassic to play ?

Raw wave file 44.1KHz 16bit ripped from CD is good enough for playing high fidelity music. We strongly advise not to use cooked file with sound processing, e.g. XRCD, LPCD or K2HD. Sound processing is added to high-resolution music files by up-sampling technique to generate a spread sound stage, good for headphone but bad for speaker. Stream audio (Youtube, Spotify) has high data compression, strong sound effect is being added to compensate detail lost in compression.

Operation: j. How does the play device affect the sound ?

Generally, play device, like WinPC and iMac, should play music at the same quality. Only a bit difference in sound character : Win PC will play sound balance and full detail, iMac will play sound soft and comfort. Smart device (iPhone or Android phone) may play in a bit low quality,sound quality mostly depends on USB audio clock stability.

Operation: k. How should I place the speakers ?

Don’t put speaker on soft plane or hollow cabinet. Speakers should be put 1.2-2.0m apart, ear level height, at less 0.2m away from the rear wall. Use of speaker stand is prefect, metal speaker stand will have bright treble, wooden speaker stand will have soft mid bass.
We tailor made a 24” speaker stand for ONEclassic. It is made of 25mm acrylic plastic of 21Kg each.Its sound character is in between wooden and metal stand. Please visit our web site for ordering.

Operation: l. Can ONEclassic have more connections ?

ONEclassic supports up to 3 transmitters, dongle or console box. Console box is a multi-input device to bridge up the speakers. Choice of input: WiFi, USB, Toslink and local RAM server. Console box is in the final stage development, it will be launched in December 2016.

Others: m. Why does the conventional bi-wires speaker still have phase error problem ?

Bi-wires speaker still have passive crossover filter inside. The only difference from single pair wire speaker is that HF and LF filter is separated. Those filters will induce phase error. Even if you use bi-amplifiers to drive the speaker, phase error problem cannot be removed.

Others: n. Why does ONEclassic use Class D amplifier ?

Class D amplifier is not commonly used in audiophile grade product. Class D amplifier has excellent power efficiency, high damping factor (new generation closed loop Class D amplifier), low microphonic pick up and low sensitivity to power supply quality. Class D has ‘straight’ transfer character.Slightly distorted signal going to amplifier results in very poor sound. We need to make sure signal is perfectly undistorted so as to deliver clean and pure sound.
