Because manufacturing factories and times are already
secured, we anticipate that Luxury and
Precision will be able to deliver on the promotion very quickly.
We hope to start shipping out to backers by the end of April
but if we experience higher-than-anticipated demand or unforeseen manufacturing difficulties, the schedule may be pushed
out further to meet the team's rigorous quality expectations.

story:
As seen on:


About this project

 It's finally time to say goodbye to tangled wires and bulky headphones. The Truebuds team has developed a breakthrough wireless in-­ear headphone that fits comfortably in your ears and lasts 6 hours on a single charge, which is currently the longest battery life in the market. Use the portable charging case and get another full charge in only 45 minutes. 

In early market testing, the two main pain points of current wireless earphones on the market were size and battery life. We took that to heart and optimized Truebuds to both be the smallest in the market and to have the longest battery life, in order to make the best completely cordless earbud out there.

The small size doesn't mean you should expect little in terms of sound quality. Here's what makes Truebuds sound great:

  • Use of balanced armature audio transducers which offer very low noise distortion, and which are optimally tuned to specific frequency ranges.
  • Use of the AptX codec ensures that the sound you hear over Bluetooth is CD-like quality. AptX uses special bit rate reduction techniques to offer Bluetooth sound that is indistinguishable from corded headphones.
  • A proprietary-designed module creates ultra-low latency between both Bluetooth earbuds, so you hear exactly the same thing in both ears with no difference whatsoever.
  • An ambient noise cancelation module is included to make sure that when your Truebuds are in your ear, the music is all you can hear.

Truebuds were designed with fashion and comfort in mind. They are the smallest Bluetooth earbud, which makes them fit inside your ear without any extra bulkiness. The metallic finish gives them a cool, futuristic look, so people will be asking you where you got those cool earbuds.

Connect in seconds using Bluetooth

Connecting Truebuds is just a matter of a few clicks. Truebuds connects with any device that has Bluetooth, including iPhones, Android phones, and most mp3 players. It works the same way any Bluetooth-enabled audio device does, so it's simple and ready to go out of the box.

Below is a full proposed technical specification of our product. Note that these are subject to change by new input and guidelines received from both the backer community and the product design team. We will be updating the community as we continue to scale up manufacturing for the product, and will be conducting polls throughout the process to make sure we are giving the backer community exactly what you want.

Truebuds are fully prototyped, and we need your help to scale up manufacturing so we can bring them to market

A full working prototype has been created. We are also experimenting with various fits, materials and more to give you the best quality when we deliver the product.

We come from technical product design and engineering backgrounds and have been creating electronic devices for over a decade. We're also working with experts who have manufactured headphones for the biggest consumer brands out there, so we know how to bring these types of devices to market.

Here is a snapshot of the Truebuds team working to make this project a reality.

We need your help to make Truebuds a reality for everyone who needs a small wireless earbud with long battery life and great design. By supporting us, you will be part of our journey from the current version to full production. Your voice will be heard, and we will implement changes, stretch goals and more with your help.

Your contribution will be used to:

  • Finalize product design
  • Fund mechanical tooling of the product 
  • Compliance testing – FCC, UL, CE.
  • Order components
  • Pay for production, manufacturing & shipping costs of the first production run of Truebuds.

We appreciate every action you take to make Truebuds a reality. Help us out by sharing our project with social media or email. We greatly appreciate any of your involvement. Thank you.

Check out our founder, Eric, getting interviewed by Digital Trends Magazine. The article and video answer the tough questions - why will Truebuds be different than others who have tried before? What technology are Truebuds using? Check out the interview to find out all you wanted to know.

Digital Trends also interviewed Eric on their weekly Podcast. Hear about the technology behind the long battery life, and how Truebuds will be scaled up to production. Interview starts at 13:09.

We got covered in Details magazine' Style Syndicate section as one of the coolest new fashion accessories.

We were the staff pick at Gadget Flow this past week, and we were also featured onTechPicks and Gadgetify too.

We also made it to Japanese media recently, and according to Kickstarterfan.com, Truebuds in Japanese are called Peabazzu (ペアバッズ). 

Risks and challenges

Developing consumer electronics is challenging. Having several complex assemblies and components lead us to sourcing from several suppliers. With that there are two primary risks.

The first risk is on time delivery of components used in the product and the second risk is receiving quality components that pass our high internal quality standards. Both these risks may potentially result in a delay in the delivery to our backers.

We will reduce these risks by using multiple suppliers when possible along with tight oversight and management of the entire manufacturing process. We appreciate in all the people that believe in our product and will perform our hardest to ensure on time delivery of the product.
story_txt:
As seen on:About this project






 It's finally time to say goodbye to tangled wires and bulky headphones. The Truebuds team has developed a breakthrough wireless in-­ear headphone that fits comfortably in your ears and lasts 6 hours on a single charge, which is currently the longest battery life in the market. Use the portable charging case and get another full charge in only 45 minutes. 
In early market testing, the two main pain points of current wireless earphones on the market were size and battery life. We took that to heart and optimized Truebuds to both be the smallest in the market and to have the longest battery life, in order to make the best completely cordless earbud out there.
The small size doesn't mean you should expect little in terms of sound quality. Here's what makes Truebuds sound great:

Use of balanced armature audio transducers which offer very low noise distortion, and which are optimally tuned to specific frequency ranges.
Use of the AptX codec ensures that the sound you hear over Bluetooth is CD-like quality. AptX uses special bit rate reduction techniques to offer Bluetooth sound that is indistinguishable from corded headphones.
A proprietary-designed module creates ultra-low latency between both Bluetooth earbuds, so you hear exactly the same thing in both ears with no difference whatsoever.
An ambient noise cancelation module is included to make sure that when your Truebuds are in your ear, the music is all you can hear.

Truebuds were designed with fashion and comfort in mind. They are the smallest Bluetooth earbud, which makes them fit inside your ear without any extra bulkiness. The metallic finish gives them a cool, futuristic look, so people will be asking you where you got those cool earbuds.




Connect in seconds using Bluetooth
Connecting Truebuds is just a matter of a few clicks. Truebuds connects with any device that has Bluetooth, including iPhones, Android phones, and most mp3 players. It works the same way any Bluetooth-enabled audio device does, so it's simple and ready to go out of the box.





Technical Specs
Below is a full proposed technical specification of our product. Note that these are subject to change by new input and guidelines received from both the backer community and the product design team. We will be updating the community as we continue to scale up manufacturing for the product, and will be conducting polls throughout the process to make sure we are giving the backer community exactly what you want.


Truebuds are fully prototyped, and we need your help to scale up manufacturing so we can bring them to market
A full working prototype has been created. We are also experimenting with various fits, materials and more to give you the best quality when we deliver the product.
We come from technical product design and engineering backgrounds and have been creating electronic devices for over a decade. We're also working with experts who have manufactured headphones for the biggest consumer brands out there, so we know how to bring these types of devices to market.
Here is a snapshot of the Truebuds team working to make this project a reality.






We need your help to make Truebuds a reality for everyone who needs a small wireless earbud with long battery life and great design. By supporting us, you will be part of our journey from the current version to full production. Your voice will be heard, and we will implement changes, stretch goals and more with your help.
Your contribution will be used to:

Finalize product design
Fund mechanical tooling of the product 
Compliance testing – FCC, UL, CE.
Order components
Pay for production, manufacturing & shipping costs of the first production run of Truebuds.

We appreciate every action you take to make Truebuds a reality. Help us out by sharing our project with social media or email. We greatly appreciate any of your involvement. Thank you.



Media Center - Look who's talking about Truebuds
Check out our founder, Eric, getting interviewed by Digital Trends Magazine. The article and video answer the tough questions - why will Truebuds be different than others who have tried before? What technology are Truebuds using? Check out the interview to find out all you wanted to know.

Founder Eric Tsoi interviewed by Digital Trends
Digital Trends also interviewed Eric on their weekly Podcast. Hear about the technology behind the long battery life, and how Truebuds will be scaled up to production. Interview starts at 13:09.

Check out our founder in Digital Trends' Podcast
We got covered in Details magazine' Style Syndicate section as one of the coolest new fashion accessories.
We were the staff pick at Gadget Flow this past week, and we were also featured onTechPicks and Gadgetify too.
We also made it to Japanese media recently, and according to Kickstarterfan.com, Truebuds in Japanese are called Peabazzu (ペアバッズ). 


Risks and challenges
Developing consumer electronics is challenging. Having several complex assemblies and components lead us to sourcing from several suppliers. With that there are two primary risks.
The first risk is on time delivery of components used in the product and the second risk is receiving quality components that pass our high internal quality standards. Both these risks may potentially result in a delay in the delivery to our backers.
We will reduce these risks by using multiple suppliers when possible along with tight oversight and management of the entire manufacturing process. We appreciate in all the people that believe in our product and will perform our hardest to ensure on time delivery of the product.

story:
ONE OF A KIND HEADPHONES

Woodgrain is as unique as fingerprints, making each pair of 99Classics a one of a kind.



PREMIUM SOUND DESIGNED FOR THOSE WHO KNOW

We're taking headphone design to a new level by combining modern with hand crafted design, using natural materials and focusing on delivering the best premium sound. 


Our aim is to change the perception of headphones as technical devices or as cheap plastic accessories and create a mature product to fall in love with.


Headphones with a technical hint that are very elegant and wearable at the same time.


Headphones for those who already have a good sense of self, know what they want and expect to be treated accordingly.


Set the trend by becoming one of the first to pre-order a one of a kind pair of 99Classics headphones.


You will love the feeling of listening to music while showing off this modern classics.


CRAFTED WITH LOVE

Each wooden ear-cup of the 99 Classics is precision carved on a CNC machine and then hand finished and polished.

It takes about 45 days to get one perfect, just for you.


PROBLEMS & SOLUTIONS

In terms of functionality, Meze identified the top 3 issues users face with headphones in the long term:



Discomfort: Meze's solution - A headband that delivers even pressure for any head size.



Artificially tweaked frequencies: Meze's solution - Tuning a balanced natural sound.

Sound isolation: Meze's solution - using soft memory foam in ear-pads.


DESIGNED TO LAST

You will love how they feel in your hands. Sturdy build and precise assembly.



HONEST DESIGN

There are no parts in this assembly that serve as decoration only. They are all functional structural elements that are then styled. So we did our own headphones teardown for you to see:

The soft parts that come in contact with you are memory foam covered in soft PU leather.

The metal hardware is cast zinc and manganese spring steel.

Internal components are made of durable ABS and silicone parts.

 The ear cups have a satin finished wood grain.


SOUND QUALITY

We had the IFA show in Berlin where we got amazing feedback from hifi-ers and general public alike. Most notable was  Head-fi.org founder Jude Mansilla testing our new 99Classics headphones. His reaction: priceless!



INSPIRATION

Precious items handed down from generation to generation are the objects you fall in love with. Why should electronics be any different? They can also be high quality, beautifully crafted objects that acquire personal meaning for the user over time.



ACCESSORIES



FULLY SERVICEABLE


Besides the usual warranty everybody is offering we guarantee that the 99's are endlessly serviceable if any parts would ever need to be replaced because we  built these headphones to last. 

No glue, just nuts and bolts.


DEVELOPMENT PROCESS

No plastic here for you to see or touch: It was a real challenge to produce the headphones just the way it was designed and without any compromises. 


We did exhaustive research in order to find the right material and technology for each component and to get a precise and durable assembly between wood, zinc and spring steel. 


Meze aimed for perfection in every component it designed. CNC carved wood ear cups, cast zinc alloy hardware with electroplated coating, stamped manganese spring steel headband, memory foam, soft PU leather are the materials your hands and eyes will get to enjoy.

TECH SPECS


TEAM


REWARDS

Put them on, sit back, and enjoy your favorite sound of plucked strings, upbeat grooves or thumping beats while still looking classy.

T-SHIRT
Just before shipping out we will write all backers to confirm the size of the t-shirt.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This project has been in the works for 2 years now and most details and manufacturing issues have already been sorted out. The tooling has already been paid so the funds raised trough this campaign will go towards manufacturing costs and placing initial order for all parts and components.



The very reason why we have been developing the 99Classics over two years and why we have first launched OEM/ODM headphones in 2010 was to familiarize ourselves with all aspects of development, manufacturing, shipping and customer service.

Or to say it otherwise: we are not beginners in this field. We have been selling headphones since 2010 and developing our own line since 2012. So you are in safe hands: the headphones will be everything we promised them to be.

Also: the headphones you see in our pictures and video are not just mock-ups or prototypes. They are real, functioning pre-production samples. 


FAQ

0.How do I choose the color of the headphones (GOLD or SILVER version) or the size of my T-Shirt?

Just before shipping out we will write all backers to confirm their shipping addresses and the color of the headphones they wish or the size of the t-shirt.

1.What is the sound quality like?

The sound quality of the 99 Classics has been described as crisp and clear. Non distorted and balanced sound.

2.Do they come in different colors?

Yes, the 99 Classics come in Gold and Silver versions.

3.Do they come with a case?

Yes, the headphones come in a beautiful EVA hardcase specially designed  to fit the 99 Classics.

4.Are they noise canceling headphones?

The 99 Classics’ earcups offer very good passive noise cancellation but no ANC (active noise cancellation).

5.Is there a MIC included?

Yes, a microphone is incorporated in the fabric cable of the 99 Classics together with a play/pause button.

6.What is the type of wood used?

We use Walnut for the 99 Classics Gold and Maple for the Silver model. All wood comes from sustainable sources.

7.What's the weight? Do they feel heavy?

Although the 99 Classics use real wood and are sturdy, they are not heavy. The headphones weigh 290 grams (approx. 10.3 ounces). This is an average weight between full sized headphones.

8.What's your refund policy?

Products purchased from our website can be returned within 30 days of purchase date. The package must be unopened and without any visible damage. To be eligible for a refund from Meze Headphones the product must have been purchased directly from Meze Headphones. If your product was purchased from other retailers you must contact that specific retailer.

If the product you received is defective from Meze Headphones or when purchased through any other authorized dealer; you may request an exchange under our warranty policy.

9.Can I buy Meze Headphones online?

Yes, you can buy the Meze Headphones online from our website www.mezeheadphones.com The 99Classics model is only available for preorder at this point.

10.What is the expected delivery date?

The estimated shipping date is November 2015.

story:
In the world of high-intensity FPS, TPS and fast-paced racing games, you need a competitive advantage to take down your enemies. Meet GAMO, the world’s first exclusive gaming earpiece with 3D ReCutting™ Audio. With GAMO, you can truly hear your surroundings for the first time. 
 

GAMO is revolutionary because it tracks and locates critical sound details and delivers this information to your ears with a powerful dual-driver system. These details will help you find enemies, accelerate your decision-making and improve your chances of winning.


With other game headsets, you have a general idea of which direction your enemy is, but you couldn’t accurately locate them based on sound alone. Unlike the others, GAMO is the first game headset to utilize cutting-edge technology to take your audio experience to the next level. Forget about finding enemies based on estimation and instead pinpoint them with extreme accuracy.

 

With GAMO’s advanced technology, feel like you’ve entered the digital world and truly immerse yourself in the game for the first time. Hear everything on the X, Y, and Z axis and hear everything even things outside your field of vision.



 




This 3D virtual algorithm is based on two sound sources – the left and right earpieces.

Although the traditional virtual algorithm is based on seven (or five) sources, your headphones can only pump out two of these fields (left and right), making it impossible to sense direction accurately.

Sound positioning is cranked out imprecisely by only separating the low, mid and high frequencies. This misses all of the essential frequencies you need to hear for an immersive experience.  









The algorithm individually processes different sounds into genres including footsteps, gunshots, and surrounding sounds.The system renders the rich details of the game world and creates a virtual audio space, allowing you to pinpoint every sound with dynamic accuracy. You will hear better, further, even differentiating the change of distance of your enemies.
 

Most gaming headsets only use single driver technology. This essentially makes them one-trick devices and will fail to deliver the user an immersive, multi-directional sound. 

Dual drivers are the superior setup because they offer detailed layer separation, can produce sound at high volumes without distortion, and provide a dynamic range. In addition, audiophiles tout dual-driver headphones for their efficiency as the drivers work to separate different frequencies to each driver, resulting in an immersive, three-dimensional sound experience. If you demand the best quality sound in your games, you need a dual-driver system.
 

GAMO features a novel game-changing material, graphene driver diaphragm, which is of unparalleled pliability and thinness. With GAMO’s graphene-drivers, you hear everything and every frequency on the spectrum. This means that the low-end sounds are punchy, the midrange sounds are clear, and the high frequencies are sharp without any tininess.

 

GAMO is the perfect all-in-one audio solution for anyone that takes their games seriously but also consumes other forms of media. Built into GAMO are three modes: 3D Game Mode, 3D Movie Mode, and Music Mode. Switch between the three modes on the fly for the perfect listening experience.

GAMO gives you an edge on knowing where and what your enemies are doing. Allow your ears to pick out even the slightest details from footsteps to gunshots and environmental noises.

With 3D Cinema Mode, immerse yourself in your favorite movies and rediscover hidden audio clues you’d never heard before.

Once you hear your favorite songs with GAMO, you'll never want to use another pair of earbuds again.

 

With GAMO, you don’t need to purchase a Bluetooth receiver or deal with clumsy over-ear headsets.

GAMO is designed to work with the Nintendo Switch, VR, Xbox 360, Xbox One, One S, PS4, PS4 Pro, and any mobile device with a 3.5mm headphone jack. The 3.5mm audio adapter cable that comes in the box is required when used on a PC or Mac. Once you plug GAMO into your gaming system, it will convert the standard stereo sound into 3D surround sound – no extra software required.

 

If you’re tired of needing to yell just so your teammates can hear you, you need GAMO and its built-in i-TALK function. Experience crystal-clear communication and make sure that your team hears you loud and clear.
 

GAMO is lightweight, accounts for the physical anatomy, and is perfect for long-term use by reducing listening fatigue.
 

Whether waiting in line, at the airport, in the car or wherever you go, take the ultimate gaming audio experience with you.
 

GAMO is meant to be used for years and years to come. The cables of headsets are often criticized for emitting static electricity. GAMO doesn't receive this criticism because of the strict ESD (Electro-Static Discharge) test we put it through. The cable is also incredibly durable and will withstand your use and abuse over the years.


 

Plug GAMO into any 3.5mm device and switch to the desired mode via the 3D DSP Switch. Enjoy an unprecedented listening experience for 2 hours on a single charge. We include a 3.5mm audio plug and USB charger for you to charge your GAMO when it is out of battery. Even with a dead battery, you can still plug in and use GAMO as a dual-driver high-fidelity earphone.
 

Include:
①GAMO ×(1)
② 3.5mm audio plug and USB charger ×(1) 
③ Ear adapters of three sizes (S, M, L) ×(1)
④ Ear tips of two sizes (L, S) ×(1) 
⑤ 3.5mm Audio Adapter Cable (For MAC&PC) ×(1) 
⑥  Portable case x(1) - Unlock at $30,000 Stretch Goal

 

 

① 3D DSP unit －Patented algorithm

Proprietary HRTF software algorithm pinpoints the 3D locus of the sounds, processes game and background sounds and outputs analog audio signal.  

 

② Frequency Division Technology

Lows, mids and highs are distinctly split up through frequency division technology into punchy high pitch, soft mid range and thick bass. 

 

③ Dual Graphene Diaphragm Dynamic Driver

Graphene diaphragm is a high-quality acoustic material which outperforms in conductivity, sensitivity and fidelity.

 

④ Unique Acoustic Chamber Design

An original hardware design: volcano-like acoustic conduction system. Verified by acoustics studies and repeated experiments, this unique acoustic chamber design betters the sound quality to a breathtaking extent.

With expert-grade dual driver audio system, GAMO renders the sound to its full quality covering both bass and treble frequency range.

 

Typical single-driver earbuds and headphones can deliver up to 20kHz of sound, but can never reach this limit without distorting the audio. They also lack any distinct sound layers and listeners only experience one dimension of the sound. Dual drivers are the superior technology and will deliver more details with layer separation, which provides listeners with all three dimensions of sound.

 

Material: ABS + TPE + Silicone + Stainless steel

Port: 3.5mm

Cable Length: 1.2M

Battery: 150mAH/3.7 V

Charge to full battery: 1.5h

Battery Duration: 2h

RMS: 270mW

Drive unit: 16Ω,  Ø 6mm*4 

Frequency: 20Hz-20KHz

Connectivity: Aux

 

Before each unit ships out, we put it through extensive testing to ensure quality and safety.


At Baseus, we believe practicality and design can co-exist in a single product. We focus on providing users with games and gadgets that are thoughtful in design yet packed with innovative technology. We have developed several products for FPS and Open World games and have obtained the iF World Design Award, Red Dot Design Award, and IDEA Awards 11 times. Our team loves games and experiences the common problems with big-name gaming headsets. Headphones are bulky and expensive, while wired headsets have difficulty providing high-quality gaming audio experiences. We are uniting game enthusiasts and audio experts through the design by the award-winning product design team. GAMO is a product we are proud of – it is more than just a gaming earphone, it is the new mobile gaming experience.
 







After rounds of sample production, as of September, GAMO is now in the stage of bulk production.

Dear editors and supporters, feel free to share our GAMO story with your audience. Here is the press kit folder:http://bit.ly/2KDtE9v


1. Does GAMO support surround sound modes?

Yes. GAMO offers full 3D emulation with support for popular surround sound modes (7.1, 5.1, 5.0, 2.1, 2.0). In addition, the dual-drivers produces a fully immersive and three-dimensional experience.
 

2. I’ve been burned in the past with Kickstarter and Indiegogo projects that either were very, very late, or never even shipped. What is my risk with the GAMO?

Your risk is minimal because GAMO is beyond the research and development stage – GAMO is in the production stage! Currently, we are prepared to produce 5000 GAMO earphones and can only expect to produce more after the crowdfunding stage. The current prototype has been through 6 rounds of user-testing, and has begun the final stage of testing. Based on testing results, possible modification might be required. Additionally, while we fully expect to start shipments in November, we could experience some delays We are confident that you will experience GAMO very soon!


3. Does GAMO require additional plug-ins or softwares to deliver its 3D sound mode function?

Absolutely not! We understand that most gaming headsets or earphones make use of an external software or control unit for its surround sound function. That is why we worked very hard to produce GAMO, a pair of all-in-one gaming earphones that delivers top notch 3D sound quality.


4. Is GAMO compatible to all consoles and platforms?

If you play games on multiple platforms, you are in luck! Use GAMO with any device with a 3.5mm output, including Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS4, VR, and mobile devices. When you are using GAMO with PC and MAC, simply plug it in with the 3.5mm Audio Adapter Cable that comes with the box as part of the standard accessories pack.
 

5. Does GAMO work after its battery runs out?

If you are using it under the Music Mode, it does not require any battery. Only when GAMO is under 3D Game Mode or 3D Cinema Mode will it require battery. Even after the battery runs out, GAMO still functions as a pair of high quality hi-fi audio earphones.

 

6. What is GAMO’s warranty policy?

To ensure a great experience,  GAMO has a 1 year warranty policy, promising to repair your GAMO when necessary.

Once you hear your favorite songs with GAMO, you'll never want to use another pair of earbuds again.
 



With GAMO, you don’t need to purchase a Bluetooth receiver or deal with clumsy over-ear headsets.
GAMO is designed to work with the Nintendo Switch, VR, Xbox 360, Xbox One, One S, PS4, PS4 Pro, and any mobile device with a 3.5mm headphone jack. The 3.5mm audio adapter cable that comes in the box is required when used on a PC or Mac. Once you plug GAMO into your gaming system, it will convert the standard stereo sound into 3D surround sound – no extra software required.
 

If you’re tired of needing to yell just so your teammates can hear you, you need GAMO and its built-in i-TALK function. Experience crystal-clear communication and make sure that your team hears you loud and clear.  
GAMO is lightweight, accounts for the physical anatomy, and is perfect for long-term use by reducing listening fatigue.  
Whether waiting in line, at the airport, in the car or wherever you go, take the ultimate gaming audio experience with you.  
GAMO is meant to be used for years and years to come. The cables of headsets are often criticized for emitting static electricity. GAMO doesn't receive this criticism because of the strict ESD (Electro-Static Discharge) test we put it through. The cable is also incredibly durable and will withstand your use and abuse over the years.

 
Plug GAMO into any 3.5mm device and switch to the desired mode via the 3D DSP Switch. Enjoy an unprecedented listening experience for 2 hours on a single charge. We include a 3.5mm audio plug and USB charger for you to charge your GAMO when it is out of battery. Even with a dead battery, you can still plug in and use GAMO as a dual-driver high-fidelity earphone. 


Include:①GAMO ×(1)② 3.5mm audio plug and USB charger ×(1) ③ Ear adapters of three sizes (S, M, L) ×(1)④ Ear tips of two sizes (L, S) ×(1) ⑤ 3.5mm Audio Adapter Cable (For MAC&PC) ×(1) ⑥  Portable case x(1) - Unlock at $30,000 Stretch Goal
 


 



① 3D DSP unit －Patented algorithm
Proprietary HRTF software algorithm pinpoints the 3D locus of the sounds, processes game and background sounds and outputs analog audio signal.  
 
② Frequency Division Technology
Lows, mids and highs are distinctly split up through frequency division technology into punchy high pitch, soft mid range and thick bass.  ③ Dual Graphene Diaphragm Dynamic Driver
Graphene diaphragm is a high-quality acoustic material which outperforms in conductivity, sensitivity and fidelity. ④ Unique Acoustic Chamber Design
An original hardware design: volcano-like acoustic conduction system. Verified by acoustics studies and repeated experiments, this unique acoustic chamber design betters the sound quality to a breathtaking extent.


With expert-grade dual driver audio system, GAMO renders the sound to its full quality covering both bass and treble frequency range.
 

Typical single-driver earbuds and headphones can deliver up to 20kHz of sound, but can never reach this limit without distorting the audio. They also lack any distinct sound layers and listeners only experience one dimension of the sound. Dual drivers are the superior technology and will deliver more details with layer separation, which provides listeners with all three dimensions of sound.
 

Material: ABS + TPE + Silicone + Stainless steel
Port: 3.5mm
Cable Length: 1.2M
Battery: 150mAH/3.7 V
Charge to full battery: 1.5h
Battery Duration: 2h
RMS: 270mW
Drive unit: 16Ω,  Ø 6mm*4 
Frequency: 20Hz-20KHz
Connectivity: Aux
 



Before each unit ships out, we put it through extensive testing to ensure quality and safety.
At Baseus, we believe practicality and design can co-exist in a single product. We focus on providing users with games and gadgets that are thoughtful in design yet packed with innovative technology. We have developed several products for FPS and Open World games and have obtained the iF World Design Award, Red Dot Design Award, and IDEA Awards 11 times. Our team loves games and experiences the common problems with big-name gaming headsets. Headphones are bulky and expensive, while wired headsets have difficulty providing high-quality gaming audio experiences. We are uniting game enthusiasts and audio experts through the design by the award-winning product design team. GAMO is a product we are proud of – it is more than just a gaming earphone, it is the new mobile gaming experience. 

After rounds of sample production, as of September, GAMO is now in the stage of bulk production.

Dear editors and supporters, feel free to share our GAMO story with your audience. Here is the press kit folder:http://bit.ly/2KDtE9v
1. Does GAMO support surround sound modes?
Yes. GAMO offers full 3D emulation with support for popular surround sound modes (7.1, 5.1, 5.0, 2.1, 2.0). In addition, the dual-drivers produces a fully immersive and three-dimensional experience. 
2. I’ve been burned in the past with Kickstarter and Indiegogo projects that either were very, very late, or never even shipped. What is my risk with the GAMO?
Your risk is minimal because GAMO is beyond the research and development stage – GAMO is in the production stage! Currently, we are prepared to produce 5000 GAMO earphones and can only expect to produce more after the crowdfunding stage. The current prototype has been through 6 rounds of user-testing, and has begun the final stage of testing. Based on testing results, possible modification might be required. Additionally, while we fully expect to start shipments in November, we could experience some delays We are confident that you will experience GAMO very soon!
3. Does GAMO require additional plug-ins or softwares to deliver its 3D sound mode function?
Absolutely not! We understand that most gaming headsets or earphones make use of an external software or control unit for its surround sound function. That is why we worked very hard to produce GAMO, a pair of all-in-one gaming earphones that delivers top notch 3D sound quality.4. Is GAMO compatible to all consoles and platforms?
If you play games on multiple platforms, you are in luck! Use GAMO with any device with a 3.5mm output, including Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS4, VR, and mobile devices. When you are using GAMO with PC and MAC, simply plug it in with the 3.5mm Audio Adapter Cable that comes with the box as part of the standard accessories pack. 
5. Does GAMO work after its battery runs out?
If you are using it under the Music Mode, it does not require any battery. Only when GAMO is under 3D Game Mode or 3D Cinema Mode will it require battery. Even after the battery runs out, GAMO still functions as a pair of high quality hi-fi audio earphones. 
6. What is GAMO’s warranty policy?
To ensure a great experience,  GAMO has a 1 year warranty policy, promising to repair your GAMO when necessary.

story:
What is Sue's?

My name's Joe Pratt and over the past 8 years I've put on the Pawtuckaway Takedown Music and Arts Festival.  Early in 2017, I came across a craigslist add for a space that was oozing with potential.  My friends and I jumped at the opportunity and had our Grand Opening February 1st.  We named the space 'Sue's', after recently deceased superhuman Sue Russell.  Sue was a champion of constant volunteering and helping others achieve their dreams.  Her named seemed a perfect fit for the space we were trying to create.  Sue's is a place where people can work, entertain, and create with each other, all at a reasonable cost to everyone.

Our combined efforts will make a place where people from all walks of life can enjoy movies, theater, and music for next to nothing.  And if it sounds too good to be true, it's only because lots of people are working their tails off to make it happen.  Because this is a good thing.

As stated above, Sue's has opened and is operational.  This campaign will serve to boost the already solid foundation we've built.  Members of the space have donated thousands of dollars in audio, visual, and lighting equipment as well as countless hours preparing the space.  What we're looking for now are funds to improve our audio setup.  I will emphasize now that this is a one-time campaign.  Our long-term plan is one of sustainability through donation-based events and memberships.  This campaign is just to give us a strong start.

What We Need 

  • A 50 foot, 16 Channel Audio Snake
  • Two monitors
  • Various Audio Cables
  • 3 microphones and 3 mic stands
  • 2 high powered light bulbs
  • Any funds beyond this will go towards paying touring acts who perform at Sue's

Other Ways You Can Help

- Like us on facebook! (https://www.facebook.com/Suesspace/)
- Come to our events! (https://www.facebook.com/pg/Suesspace/events/?ref=page_internal)
- Spread the word!  (Share this campaign, tell the good world about Sue's)

Thank you!
​

story:
From that information and direction, we are proud to launch the MIN660 and MIN628, two fantastic speakers that fit the lifestyle of our discerning audience. They are easy to use in virtually any environment and they look fantastic. This is yet another chapter in our effort to continuously improve MINFORT’s products and offerings to better serve our audience and give them the best audio experience as possible in a wide variety of situations and circumstances. We strive to make quality audio products that sound as good as they look, and that look incredible.


● Real 12mm solid hardwood in Teak, Oak, Walnut, and Padauk. (NOT veneered)  
● A powerful amplifier boasting main channel : 10W + 10W and 20W sub-woofer .
● “True Wireless”: Completely wireless speakers allowing for truly flexible, sonically perfect              placement whether close together or far apart.  
● The MIN628 offers 10+ hours of use per full battery charge (typical use case at mid-volume). 
● Original beautiful design with Hi-Fi quality sound.

 

The MIN660 is designed to be used as your primary indoor speaker. Hi-Fi quality, powerful sound that is convenient, flexible, and beautiful in virtually any indoor space.
The MIN660 has 3 distinct sound chambers designed to reduce interference of sound between the main speakers and subwoofer. By reducing the interference, the sound is remarkably clear while distortion is minimized even at high volume. You’ll have to hear it to believe it.

The subwoofer is located at the bottom of the speaker which is elevated from the underlying surface by gold-plated pyramid feet providing stability and clarity of low-frequency tones and a stylish accent to the design.

Single adjustable subwoofer / Reflex enclosure

The reflex speed of the speakers is paramount for powerful bass that doesn’t distort or reverberate. To ensure tight and punchy bass, the MIN660 has a reflex enclosure which allows for a quicker, more precise, powerful output.

Powerful bass isn’t for everyone or every situation. Jazz or classical music listeners may prefer a subtle bass level. Hip hop or funk listeners may prefer it to be more pronounced. The MIN660 features a single knob that allows for control of the 5.25 inch subwoofer to fit the listener’s preference.

Above is a visual of the MIN660’s adjustable subwoofer located at the bottom of the speaker with a large 5.25” diameter.

Demonstration MIN660 / Please adjust to high quality

Demonstration patented thumping bass/ Please adjust to high quality

The Combination for a Thumping Bass

MIN660 embeds an amplifier board chips to power the 40W 2.1 stereo system. The unique 3 sound chamber design reduces interference between the subwoofer and main speaker, making the sound crisp and clear.

Antenna to boost Bluetooth signal

Bluetooth speakers offer convenience and flexibility. The problem with many devices is when the source goes out of range. The connection cuts  in and out and ruins the listening experience.

That’s why we’ve added a Bluetooth antenna jack to boost the Bluetooth performance. This means the connected device will stay solidly connected at a range up to approximately 60 feet (20 meters) without interruption or drops.

The speaker operates perfectly fine without the antenna with a similar range to other Bluetooth devices as well, but the ability to increase the range is there if you want or need it.

Half the size of the MIN7

Minfort’s MIN7 is a powerful speaker beloved by our customers and the predecessor of the MIN660. However, the MIN660 replicates the same performance level of the MIN7 at near half the size of the MIN7. Small but mighty!

The MIN660 packs the same punch as the MIN7 at half the size with the iconic design styling for which MINFORT is known.

 

The MIN628 is designed as a high-end portable option. The stylish bronze handle makes it easy to carry anywhere you want to go. For those who want the quality of a high-end system in any environment, this is the speaker for you.

The MIN628 is made to travel anywhere, but it sounds and looks good enough to be your primary indoor speaker. Plug it in and enjoy your favorite music in any room. When it is time to get outside, premium sound can come with you wherever you go.

Demonstration sound quality / Please adjust to high quality

The MIN628 also features a single knob that allows for control of the 3 inch subwoofer to fit the listener’s preference.

With two distinct sound chambers, the different components are separated allowing the MIN628 to achieve a superior sound quality for a portable speaker.

Iron bronze handle

The portability based on the size and convenient bronze handle makes it the perfect speaker to bring anywhere whether it is to the office, on vacation, or just outside with some friends.

Replaceable battery

The MIN628’s 1000mah lithium battery allows for 10+ hours of play on a single battery charge (when plated at mid-volume). That’s enough time to get through a whole day out with friends or through a night of partying without worrying about the speaker going dead. If there’s ever an issue with the battery, it can easily be replaced.

True wireless paring min660 and min628​

MIN660 and MIN628 can be connected by Bluetooth, which makes any movie scene more immersive.

Most speakers need cables to connect. The MIN660 and MIN628 can easily connect wirelessly to the same source. You can combine multiple MIN660’s, multiple MIN628’s, or you can mix and match providing an immersive superior listening experience in virtually any environment.

Handcrafted in Taiwan/ Elegant yet Simple/4 Wood Options

The speaker housings are handcrafted by the honorable senior carpenter, Master Shifu, who has over 30 years of carpentry experience and unparalleled skill. The product assembly, testing, and packaging are all done by hand in-house to ensure quality and care at every step.

The housing is made from joined solid hardwood panels (12mm x 20 – 30mm width). Since we use real hardwood, each speaker has a unique pattern that is one of a kind, like a fingerprint.

When designing the speakers, we had a very specific look in mind. One that would look elegant and cozy in the home. Our team and Master Shifu determined the best way to create a rich and glossy appearance that was also water and scuff resistant was to use a special transparent protective coating. This not only makes the appearance of the speaker more luxurious, but also ensures it will last and look great for years to come.

（color for reference only）

Teak 

A noble wood from Southeast Asia. It has high tensile strength, high oil content, and tight grain, which make it a durable and highly weather-resistant hardwood. It makes for an attractive option to house the speaker at the mid-range of the hardwood color palette.

Walnut 

Walnut generally has a relatively straight grain that becomes wavy towards the root. The color can range from dark brown to an almost rich purplish-brown. It is resilient, decay resident, and holds its shape exceptionally well. These characteristics make it ideal for use in high-end furniture and cabinetry and make it an excellent choice for speaker housing.

Oak

Oak is a heavy, strong hardwood with a light coloration and a mostly straight wood grain. It becomes especially rich when finish is applied. It has a classic course texture and is highly durable, strong, and resilient with a beautiful appearance.

Padauk     (color for reference only)

Padauk is moderately heavy, strong, and stiff with exceptional stability. It has a unique dark reddish-orange hue which darkens to a rich reddish-brown color. It is extremely resistant to decay and is regarded as notoriously durable among the woodworking community.

All the hardwood options are exceptionally durable and long-lasting. The choice comes entirely down to your taste and preference. There are no wrong answers!

New "600 series" of MB design by William and Travis.

The 600 series, including the MIN660 and MIN628, each contains 2 amplifier board chips that power the 40W 2.1 stereo system, a powerful amplifier with 10W + 10W tweeters & woofers and 20W subwoofer. The system utilizes Digital Signal Processing (or DSP) to enhance vocal processing. The result is loud, clear vocals that audiophiles crave.

 

The MIN660 and MIN628 each have 2 silk dome tweeters, 2 paper cone woofers, and 1 subwoofer. These 5 drivers make for the loudest and clearest sound possible.

  • The silk dome tweeters give a crystal-clear sound on the high-range frequencies
  • The paper cone woofers produce loud, clear, and warm mid-range frequencies that allow for clear and discernable vocals with rich detail.
  • The polypropylene cone subwoofer creates powerful bass with low distortion. It is injection-molded with rubber yielding a high-strength bond between the cone and its surroundings.

Each driver types deliver different ranges of frequency. Though a woofer could produce a low frequency like that of a subwoofer, it would be of an inferior quality. Each driver is tuned specifically to deliver within the ideal frequency range for which it was designed. The combination of these three drivers makes for the perfect mix of components for the best clarity, accuracy, and overall audio experience.

If you’ve ever heard a song on a sub-par system and then heard that song on a nice pair of headphones, you likely noticed a difference. Much of this difference has to do with the fact that high-end headphones are calibrated accurately to ideally project the various frequencies.

Calibrating is an important process. If even slightly off, the sound quality will be noticeably disappointing. Many headphones and speakers on the market today are not calibrated accurately or even calibrated at all. That is why many have inconsistent and unpleasant performance that can sound wrong.

  • The high-frequencies are often too sharp, which can often feel piercing to the eardrum and generally unpleasant.
  • The bass is often too strong making the music sound generally distorted and difficult to hear clearly as the bass masks the other frequencies.

For this reason, we have experts tune our speakers so that all the rich detail of the music can be discerned and experienced. Nice, smooth, strong, punchy, and clear. That’s the listening experience from our well-calibrated speakers.

 

 

 

Specs for MIN 660:

• 2 x Tweeter 1” 6Ω

• 2 x woofer 3” 4Ω

• Subwoofer 5.25” 4Ω

• 40 watts amplifier

• Bluetooth 4.2 version

• USB player / flac, wav, mp3 files

• Line in and out

• Weight : 2.27lb

• Dimensions:  12mm wooden panel (oak/teak/walnut/padauk)

• Amplifying chip (put what chipset you used)

Specs for MIN 628

• 2 x Tweeter 1” 6Ω

• 2 x woofer 3” 4Ω

• Subwoofer 3” 4Ω

• 40 watts amplifier

• Bluetooth 4.2 version

• USB player / flac, wav, mp3 files

• Line in and out

• Weight : 1.36lb

• Dimensions: 12mm wooden panel (oak/teak/walnut/padauk)

 

        We, Travis and William, are the co-founders of MINFORT. We’ve been designing and developing audio products since 2014. We’ve been guided by 4 years of audience research and feedback and develop products based on what our audience wants. From that information and direction, we are proud to launch the MIN660 and MIN628, two fantastic speakers that fit the lifestyle of our discerning audience. They are easy to use in virtually any environment and they look fantastic. This is yet another chapter in our effort to continuously improve MINFORT’s products and offerings to better serve our audience and give them the best audio experience as possible in a wide variety of situations and circumstances. We strive to make quality audio products that sound as good as they look, and that look incredible.

MINFORT FACEBOOK : https://www.facebook.com/Minfortforlife/
MINFORT Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/minfort_audio/ 
MINFORT Official Website : www.minfort.com

1) Does MIN660/MIN628 connect to other speakers?

Yes,BOTH has output function. You can use AUX/Line output to connect other amplifiers or active speakers to play music.

2) Is MIN660/MIN628 waterproof?

Solid wood are used on MIN660/MIN628 for its cabinet. Each wooden cabinet was varnished carefully with waterproof paint. However, liquid spills on the electronic parts might cause damage.

3) Can MIN660/MIN628 connect to TV?

Yes, you can use TV’s aux out or headphone jack to connect TV to MIN660/MIN628.

4) Do you offer a warranty?

Yes, we provide a 2-year warranty and the shipping fee if you need to exchange product or material. (battery is for one year warranty)
If you need full refund, you just only need to send back the item to our company. (we do not pay the return shipping fee)  

5) Will you supply the correct plug type for destination countries?

Yes, we will provide the correct power cords to our backers according to their shipping countries.

The high-frequencies are often too sharp, which can often feel piercing to the eardrum and generally unpleasant.
The bass is often too strong making the music sound generally distorted and difficult to hear clearly as the bass masks the other frequencies.
For this reason, we have experts tune our speakers so that all the rich detail of the music can be discerned and experienced. Nice, smooth, strong, punchy, and clear. That’s the listening experience from our well-calibrated speakers.   Specs for MIN 660:• 2 x Tweeter 1” 6Ω• 2 x woofer 3” 4Ω• Subwoofer 5.25” 4Ω• 40 watts amplifier• Bluetooth 4.2 version• USB player / flac, wav, mp3 files• Line in and out• Weight : 2.27lb• Dimensions:  12mm wooden panel (oak/teak/walnut/padauk)• Amplifying chip (put what chipset you used)Specs for MIN 628• 2 x Tweeter 1” 6Ω• 2 x woofer 3” 4Ω• Subwoofer 3” 4Ω• 40 watts amplifier• Bluetooth 4.2 version• USB player / flac, wav, mp3 files• Line in and out• Weight : 1.36lb• Dimensions: 12mm wooden panel (oak/teak/walnut/padauk)         We, Travis and William, are the co-founders of MINFORT. We’ve been designing and developing audio products since 2014. We’ve been guided by 4 years of audience research and feedback and develop products based on what our audience wants. From that information and direction, we are proud to launch the MIN660 and MIN628, two fantastic speakers that fit the lifestyle of our discerning audience. They are easy to use in virtually any environment and they look fantastic. This is yet another chapter in our effort to continuously improve MINFORT’s products and offerings to better serve our audience and give them the best audio experience as possible in a wide variety of situations and circumstances. We strive to make quality audio products that sound as good as they look, and that look incredible.MINFORT FACEBOOK : https://www.facebook.com/Minfortforlife/MINFORT Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/minfort_audio/ MINFORT Official Website : www.minfort.com1) Does MIN660/MIN628 connect to other speakers?Yes,BOTH has output function. You can use AUX/Line output to connect other amplifiers or active speakers to play music.2) Is MIN660/MIN628 waterproof?Solid wood are used on MIN660/MIN628 for its cabinet. Each wooden cabinet was varnished carefully with waterproof paint. However, liquid spills on the electronic parts might cause damage.3) Can MIN660/MIN628 connect to TV?Yes, you can use TV’s aux out or headphone jack to connect TV to MIN660/MIN628.4) Do you offer a warranty?Yes, we provide a 2-year warranty and the shipping fee if you need to exchange product or material. (battery is for one year warranty)If you need full refund, you just only need to send back the item to our company. (we do not pay the return shipping fee)  5) Will you supply the correct plug type for destination countries?Yes, we will provide the correct power cords to our backers according to their shipping countries.

story:
UPDATE: The campaign has ended! Thank you all again for the amazing support! We have teamed up with Brookstone to manufacture and deliver the headphones to everyone. For all future customer support and questions, please e-mail AxentWear@Brookstone.com

We will be posting new images and videos of the headphones in development in August. Stay tuned!

_________________________________


Axent Wear was started by two UC Berkeley alumni with an idea. An idea for some really great, unique headphones that had never been pioneered before. Or at least, not like this. 

Presenting Axent Wear, glowing, badass headphones that let you blast your music and express your style. Help us make these into a reality by donating to our campaign. We need your support. Without you, none of this would be possible. 


Who We Are

Axent Wear was created by UC Berkeley Alumni, Wenqing Yan and Victoria Hu, who both have a passion for art and creative technology. 

Wenqing was inspired to design these cat ear headphones while working on a whimsical and quirky animation. Music plays a huge part in everyone's life and it would be great to share that music with your friends and family in a unique and creative way. With that in mind, Wenqing and Victoria set out to create the perfect headphones that would fulfill both functionality and style. 

We have worked tirelessly over the past year to bring these headphones from mere drawings to a real life prototype. Thanks to the amazing public support and feedback, we were able to fine tune the prototype and make the adjustments that everyone wanted. While we are a brand new company, we will do our very best to bring everyone the coolest headphones!


What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $250,000 to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce these headphones. The donations you give us will be used to fund the molding, casting, production, packaging and shipping of the product. Every penny will be used to pay for making these headphones into a reality.

In return, you will get the coolest and most unique headphones. Each pair will come with fully functional external cat ear speakers, awesome LED lights, detachable cord, comfortable over-the-ears cushioning, rechargeable batteries, and much more! With your generous help, we'll be able to make these headphones as high quality as possible. 


The Impact

We are a small and brand new company and without you, we cannot make it. Every donation matters to us, as this campaign determines whether or not we can continue working on these headphones or not. Without your contributions, we cannot afford to pay for manufacturing on our own, so please donate! With your help, we can bring cat-eared headphones into the world and make the universe a happier place. 

    Risks & Challenges

    We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but we will prioritize quality. Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no surprises.


    Frequently Asked Questions


    • Can you turn on and off the cat ear speakers and LED lights?

    Yes! Both the external speakers and the LED lights have switches to turn them on or off when you want. 


    • Is there a mic included?

    Yes! The mic is attached to the cord of the 3.5mm jack.

    • I accidentally ordered the wrong color/ put in the wrong address/ want to upgrade my perk. What do I do?

    Please e-mail our customer service at AxentWear@brookstone.com with your full name, address, Indiegogo account name, and the details of your issue. We will put you in a special list to make sure you get what you intended to order. 

    • Will the headphones be wireless or have Bluetooth? Will it have changing RBG LED lights? What about as stretch goals?

    Probably not. We asked everyone what extra features they most wanted to see in the headphones and the top requests were over-the-ear cushioning for comfort, removable cord so the headphones can still be used if the cord ever gets damaged, and a mic for gaming. We've already included these features in the headphones that were originally supposed to be stretch goals only. We decided to go the extra mile and give everyone the features they wanted whether we reached our stretch goal or not.
    Wireless and Bluetooth were not popular requests, however a lot of people asked for RBG LED lights. We originally wanted to add this as a stretch goal, but during prototyping tests, we noticed several issues that would make changing LED lights a bad feature to add. With single colored headphones, the clear plastic over the lights can be color tinted, so even in bright sunlight, the headphones will have vibrant color accents. With color changing LEDs, the clear plastic must be translucent white to allow different colors to shine through, but that also means the colors will be easily washed out in daylight. Adding more power to the LED doesn't help much since sunlight is extremely bright, and it will drain the battery very quickly. We can't just put in bigger batteries either, since the battery must power both LED lights and external cat ear speakers. Too many batteries will cause weight issues in the headphones and make them too top heavy. In the end, we decided it's best to have one single color per headphone that looks great no matter where you are versus many colors that will get washed out the moment you go outside.

Will the headphones be wireless or have Bluetooth? Will it have changing RBG LED lights? What about as stretch goals?

Probably not. We asked everyone what extra features they most wanted to see in the headphones and the top requests were over-the-ear cushioning for comfort, removable cord so the headphones can still be used if the cord ever gets damaged, and a mic for gaming. We've already included these features in the headphones that were originally supposed to be stretch goals only. We decided to go the extra mile and give everyone the features they wanted whether we reached our stretch goal or not.
Wireless and Bluetooth were not popular requests, however a lot of people asked for RBG LED lights. We originally wanted to add this as a stretch goal, but during prototyping tests, we noticed several issues that would make changing LED lights a bad feature to add. With single colored headphones, the clear plastic over the lights can be color tinted, so even in bright sunlight, the headphones will have vibrant color accents. With color changing LEDs, the clear plastic must be translucent white to allow different colors to shine through, but that also means the colors will be easily washed out in daylight. Adding more power to the LED doesn't help much since sunlight is extremely bright, and it will drain the battery very quickly. We can't just put in bigger batteries either, since the battery must power both LED lights and external cat ear speakers. Too many batteries will cause weight issues in the headphones and make them too top heavy. In the end, we decided it's best to have one single color per headphone that looks great no matter where you are versus many colors that will get washed out the moment you go outside.

story:
New "Smoke" color GoDuo

 

 

 

 

 

Our goal was to design an uncompromising high fidelity stereo experience that offers stunning audio at an affordable price. We're only working with the best in the business. Our speakers have been tuned by the former Director of Acoustic Engineering of Philips with the EQ tested and adjusted in the same audio lab that manufactures for SONY and Samsung. 

GoDuo’s high fidelity drivers give clean, crisp sound, while built-in Subwoofers give robust, deep bass.

Designed by our Reddot & iF award-winning industrial designers, the speakers have a unique look and are outstanding from the regular portable speaker styles. Choose from a variety of colored covers to mix and match with your speakers. They don’t only give personality to your speakers but protect them from impact, scratches, and normal wear and tear..

Connect to the speakers using Bluetooth

OR plug your device using an aux cable.

 

Built-in Microphone

We wanted the GoDuo Speakers to work for any occasion, so we tested the design to withstand any extreme situation you can dream of.

Pick a perk become a backer, and help us bring these new products to life. To say thank you, we offer the lowest possible price and deliver to you before anyone else. 

 

 

Bluetooth Version: V4.2 + EDR 

Dimensions:

  • Single speaker - 3.6in x 2.4in x 2.4in
  • Two speakers combined - 7.2in x 2.4in x 2.4in
  • Cover - 9.1in x 2.6in x 2.6in

Weight:

  • Single speaker - 212g
  • Cover - 106g
  • Total (2 speakers + cover) - 530g

Battery Capacity: 1200 mAh each

Battery Life (each or paired):

  • Music play -  up to 18 hours (at medium volume)
  • Phone call -  up to 18 hours
  • Standby - 2 weeks

Battery Charging Time: 2-3 hours

Speaker Output: 5W each

Speaker Impedance (Ohm): 4

Bandwidth (Frequency Range) (Hz): 20Hz - 20kHz

Speaker Driver Size (mm): Ф45mm

Water Resistant/Waterproof Level: IPX-5 certified

Voice Prompts: English, Spanish, mute (disable)

New "Smoke" color GoDuoUse them separately for stereo sound or magnetically combine them for optimal sound quality. Great battery life, loud volume, and a bumping bass at an affordable price. 
Together = Ultimate Portable Audio Solution 
Separated = Optimal Stereo Sound Quality 
Individual = Versatility and Freedom 
Encased = Ideal Outdoor Audio Solution 
 

Traditional wireless stereo speakers have wire between the left unit and the right unit, while our technology enables the pair to work with no visible string attached. Because our speakers are truly wireless, they can cover both big open spaces or small room flexibly with optimized true stereo sound.

The speakers can be used together to provide stereo sound up to 50 ft (15 meters) without any wires.
You can choose to link your GoDuo to play distinct synchronized stereo or have each speaker act as an individual device. Have complete flexibility and control over your sound.

story:
中文介绍页面丨中文购买指南


This Cantilevered Speaker is way cooler than your Jambox. ——WIRED

That's cool. Also from "certain angles" the whole speaker can look like it's floating. ——THE VERGE

The Gravity, then, is a symbol of Meizu's heritage of design and music. ——Engadget

Seeming to hover midair, Meizu's Gravity is the David Blaine of speakers.——YAHOO!TECH

 

The design story about "Missing Design", told by Designer Kosho Tsuboi. The video was shot in Japan.

If you can't see the video, you can also watch the video here.

  • High quality acrylic glass guarantees a clear display and a low weight.


  • Aluminum body for superior texture.


  • Polyester fiber specially designed for high-end speakers. It's dust-proof and won’t diminish the transmitting of sound.


The acrylic glass was thoroughly polished to ensure smoothness and an ideal reflection effect.

The aluminum panel went through atomization to align its color with that of the mesh, which is wrapped tightly on the body, making it hard to tell the difference between these two materials.


For an artistic speaker like Gravity, excellent sound quality is crucial.

The unsymmetrical design has the support and display on one side of the speaker. To balance the structure, we added weight to the body, which created difficulty for the acoustic structure.




To produce a powerful and hifi quality sound from a small body has always been a problem in this industry. We worked with our engineers, who have 13 years of experience in audio products, our supplier, who is also supplier for Bose and JBL, and our partner acoustic experts Dirac from Sweden. We worked very hard to come up with the ideal solution for Gravity.

  • Customized speaker units that improves the sound performance in limited hardware.
  • Passive double resonant diaphragms + dual drive units = enhanced bass.
  • Reduced distortion rate, made possible by the most advanced chip from Texas Instruments.
  • Re-creating the original music scene, made possible by Dirac Power Sound of Sweden.


The team and the product story.
If you can't see the video, you can also watch the video here. 







[Specifications]

Power amplifier chip

TAS5754M

Bluetooth/Wi-Fi

AP6212 WIFI BT “Two－in－one modular”

Operating system

Android 4.4.2

Play modes

App Music & Cloud music

Network support

Wi-Fi b/g/n2.4G  BT 2.4G

Audio out

6R/10W X2

Buttons

VOL+, VOL-, NEXT, PLAY\STOP

Power on/off automatically

Supported

AirPlay/DLNA

Supported

system updates 

Network upgrade

Length, width and height

262mm*58mm*47mm

Weight

1033g




[FAQ]


1. How to contact your team?

You’re welcome to contact us: mzsd@meizu.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/meizu

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MEIZU

Google+: https://plus.google.com/+MEIZUofficial


2. When will my order arrive?

It's in production now. We'll keep you updated on the shipping information and make sure that your order will be delivered ASAP.


3. What comes inside the box?

Power adapter with a 110-240v, 50/60Hz (15V/3A) operating frequency that can be used in most countries；

Wireless speaker；

Instruction manual


4. Do I need internet access when I use Gravity?

No, in addition to the Wi-Fi connection, you can use Bluetooth or AUX-in to play music which has already been downloaded to your phone.


5. Does Gravity work without power adapters.

No, there are no batteries in Gravity, you need to use power adapters to let GRAVITY work.


6. Does Gravity support Stereo output?

Yes, the Gravity speaker supports 2.0 Channel Stereo output.


7. When will my order arrive?

The speakers are being made now. We’ll keep you updated and make sure your order will be delivered as soon as it is ready.

-
