story:
The Sphere™ system consists of a high precision dual channel microphone, which when paired with the included Sphere DSP plug-in (UAD, VST, AU, AAX Native) accurately models the response of a wide range of mics, including transient response, harmonics, proximity effect and three-dimensional polar response.

Join us to see how this unique product can revolutionize the way you record audio.

For other questions contact us at: igg-inquiries@townsendlabs.com

We were lucky enough to get a pre-production Sphere L22 microphone in the hands of James Ivey at Pro Tools Expert and he did a very in-depth review of the product.

 

Bios: Joe Chiccarelli, Chuck Surack, Matt Hepworth, James Ivey

Breakthrough Microphone Modeling Technology

Sphere’s three-dimensional approach captures the spatial nuances, proximity effect and off-axis frequency response of a wide range of microphones, which until now was not possible with any other product.

Dream Collection

Access some of the most prized microphones of all time,
including a 47 (with VF14 tube), a 67, an M49, and a C12.

Sphere L22 Microphone

The Sphere system employs the high-resolution, dual-channel L22 large-diaphragm condenser microphone, custom designed to capture the three-dimensional soundfield with exacting detail. Manufactured to extremely tight tolerances, the L22 ensures that modeling is consistent and accurate.

Realtime UAD Processing

With Universal Audio Apollo, achieve extremely low latency (approx. 1.6 ms round trip at 96 kHz) for guaranteed real-time performance. Also supports native AAX, VST and AU.

Polar Pattern Modeling

Because Sphere captures the three-dimensional response of target microphones, it precisely emulates the polar patterns and other off-axis characteristics of vintage microphones which are essential to their unique sound.

 

Re-Mic Sphere Tracks

Select mic type, polar pattern and other settings both before and after tracking.

 

  

Adjustable Proximity Effect

No need to move a microphone solely because of too little or too much bass due to proximity effect. Great for punching in a vocal where distance from the mic varies from take to take.

Dual Mic Models

Dual Mode in the Sphere plug-in makes possible phase-coherent mixing of multiple virtual mic models from the same physical microphone, before or after tracking. It's also possible to adjust the relative phase alignment of the two mics with the Align control.

Record In Stereo (With One Mic)

With just one Sphere L22 mic it’s possible to make coincident stereo recordings, and even have different mic models on the left and right channels, using the Sphere 180 plug-in.

Axis Shift

Virtually rotate the axis of the mic to give a more off-axis sound before or after tracking.

Off-Axis Correction™

Create more accurate polar patterns to reduce bleed and room coloration before, or after, tracking. For more information see the Off-Axis Correction chapter in the Sphere Hardware and Software User Guide.

Polar Meter

The Sphere plug-in features a visually informative (and very cool) Polar Meter that dynamically displays the direction and level of sound being picked up by the microphone, as well as the currently selected polar pattern.

Low Noise

The microphone hardware has a self-noise level of 7dB-A SPL, well below most vintage microphones and comparable to many of the best modern microphones.

High SPL Handling

The L22 can handle in excess of 140dB SPL before clipping and is remarkably rugged. It won’t be damaged by high SPLs or air blasts as some vintage microphones can be.

Using a dual-capsule microphone with dual-outputs makes it possible to more completely capture the soundfield—including the directional and distance information otherwise lost with a conventional single-channel microphone. This allows the Sphere system to precisely reconstruct how different microphones respond to the soundfield.

In contrast, other microphone modeling technologies apply EQ to filter the sound from what is essentially a conventional microphone. This is fundamentally no different from using EQ to process a recorded track.

The Sphere L22 microphone modeling system comprises this precision dual-channel microphone, plus an audio plug-in for your DAW. The software plug-in does all of the DSP processing used to create the microphone models. Using a plug-in, instead of DSP processing built into the mic, has the major advantage of allowing the user to change all of the modeling settings, such as mic type and polar pattern, after the audio is recorded.

For more information about the technology behind Sphere take a look at the Sphere™ Technology Whitepaper.

(NOTE: Hi-res audio files can be downloaded by clicking on the "down arrow" in the Soundcloud player.)

Audio Comparisons with Vintage Mics

We have also created Sphere L22 A/B comparison tests, which directly compare the Sphere microphone models and the original microphones the models are based on. Each set of audio files comes in an "A" version and a "B" version, where the model and the original are randomly assigned to A or B, so that the test is blind.

Head over to our website to find out more and to download the files.

Precision Microphone

  • Sphere L22 Microphone – high precision, dual-capsule, large-diaphragm condenser studio microphone, which can be used with or without modeling
  • Bundled Accessories
    • 10 Foot (3 Meter) Breakout Cable
    • Shock Mount
    • Hard Mount
    • Hard Carrying Case
    • Velvet Mic Bag

Sphere Plug-in

  • Sphere™ DSP algorithms – accurately models a wide range of the most sought-after microphones in the world.
  • Re-Mic technology – allows the user to change the mic type and polar pattern even after tracking.
  • New patented features – including Off-Axis Correction™, which can produce more accurate polar patterns for reduced bleed, room coloration, and feedback.
  • Supports a wide range of plug-in formats – including UAD, VST2, VST3, Audio Unit, and AAX Native on Mac and Windows.

A fully featured beta version of the native (AAX, VST, AU) plug-in is available from www.townsendlabs.com, so you can try Sphere out for yourself using pre-recorded audio material made with the Sphere L22 microphone. The audio clips cover vocals, acoustic guitar and electric guitar.

You must register on our site to download these files, but all we ask for is your name and a valid email address, so it's super easy.

Register and Download Sphere Now

To install download and double click on the corresponding Sphere installer file. Follow the instructions in the installer software. Then restart your DAW.

Next, download the demo audio and unzip the files. If you are using Pro Tools, Logic, Studio One or Cubase you can try the supplied demo sessions, which are already setup with the plug-in and audio.

Sphere L22™ Microphone

  • Equivalent Noise Level: 7 dB-A
  • Max SPL at 0.5% THD: 140dB (with -20dB pad engaged)
  • Pad Attenuation: -10db and -20dB
  • Sensitivity: 22 mV/Pa
  • Output Connector: 5-pin male XLR
  • Breakout Cable: 10’ 5-pin female XLR to dual 3-pin male XLR
  • Output Impedance: 200 Ohms
  • Recommended Load Impedance: >1000 Ohms
  • Phantom Power
    • Voltage: 44 to 52 V per channel
    • Current: 5 mA per channel typical, 8 mA at max SPL

Sphere™ DSP Plug-In

  • Supported Formats:
    • UAD
    • AAX Native
    • VST2
    • VST3
    • Audio Unit (Mac only)
  • Supported Operating Systems:
    • Native (AAX, VST and AU):
      • Mac OSX 10.8.5 and above
      • Windows 7 and above
    • Apollo Interfaces and UAD-2 hardware (AAX, VST, AU, and RTAS)
      • Mac OSX 10.9.5 and above
      • Windows 7 and above
  • Current Microphone Models:
    • LD-47
    • LD-49
    • LD-67
    • LD-87
    • LD-12
    • SD-451
    • RB-4038
    • DN-57
    • Sphere Linear
    • Sphere Linear Diffuse

The Townsend Labs product team has a combined experience in pro audio of over 30 years. We have plenty of first-hand experience with audio product development, including what can go wrong and how to keep projects on track.

The design phase of the project is complete, so most of the risk areas are behind us. The software plug-in is nearing the end of the beta testing phase and we are close to shipping the final version. The hardware design is complete and we have production prototypes in hand, which meet our stringent requirements.

The main tasks left in front of us are to work with our contract manufacturer to build large quantities and get the product to customers. Manufacturing always involves some risk that the product won't be delivered on time or up to spec, but we feel that is manageable.

Chris Townsend, CEO and CTO

In a previous life, Chris worked at Avid (parent company of Digidesign and M-Audio) for 13 years doing DSP programming for Pro Tools and related software plug-ins. He also developed the Eleven guitar amplifier modeling and the ReVibe room modeling technologies. His years of experience modeling a wide range of vintage audio equipment have been a key factor in enabling the development of Sphere™ technology.

Erik Papp, President, and General Manager

Erik led Summit Audio for ten years as CEO and owner before the company was acquired by Blue Microphones. Summit produces mid- to high-end mic preamps and other outboard gear. At Summit, Erik also launched and distributed various products including the Lauten line of microphones and the Bricasti reverb.

Why does the Sphere L22 microphone output have two channels even when I just want to model a mono microphone?

Having a two-channel microphone makes it possible to capture directional and distance information from the soundfield, which allows the DSP algorithms to reconstruct the three-dimensional response of a wide range of microphones.

Can I use the Sphere L22 microphone without DSP plug-in processing as I would with a conventional mic?

Absolutely! The Sphere microphone is a very high quality mic in its own right. One output of the mic is a forward facing cardioid and the other is a rear-facing cardioid. You can just connect the front output and use that as a conventional cardioid microphone, leaving the rear channel disconnected.

Is the Sphere L22 microphone digital or analog?

The Sphere microphone hardware is entirely analog. The Sphere modeling technology occurs in the digital domain using an audio software plug-in, which supports UAD, VST2, VST3, AU and AAX Native. The UAD version can run on a Universal Audio Apollo with guaranteed low latency processing.

Can I use the Sphere microphone with any preamp I want?

Yes, as long as it has 48V phantom power and two available channels; although we have some recommended guidelines which will generally produce the best results. We strongly recommend using a preamp with precision-matched gain controls, to make setting levels super easy.

Audio recording interfaces with digitally controlled preamps, such as the Universal Audio Apollo series (excluding Apollo 16), RME Fireface UFX, and the Apogee Duet or Quartet, are a great choice for use with Sphere. With these interfaces the gain between two channels can be linked, so equal level will always be maintained.

Pure analog designs with stepped attenuators, such as a Neve 1073 or a Millennia HV-3D, can also work very well, as long as they are not overloaded and are instead used in their linear range.

If the preamp has adjustable input impedance, we generally recommend using the highest setting, which in some cases can provide slightly better gain matching between channels.

Visit the Recommended Preamps page for a list of over 250 preamps and audio interfaces that have precision matched inputs.

Can I use the Sphere plug-in on material recorded with some other microphone?

While there is nothing stopping you from doing that, the results will most likely be extremely poor. The Sphere microphone is specifically designed and calibrated to work with the plug-in. There are very tight tolerances on frequency response and polar response of the Sphere L22 microphone, so that the modeling is consistent from mic to mic. But even more importantly, the microphone is dual-channel, which encodes the directional information for the plug-in which would be entirely lost with a single channel microphone.

Does the included Sphere plug-in use copy protection?

No copy protection is used.

How accurately are Sphere microphones matched?

Generally, any two Sphere microphones are extremely well matched and can be used, with excellent results, as a stereo pair or for other critical applications. Nonetheless, for Indiegogo only, we are offering matched sets with even tighter matching that goes above and beyond what is normally available.

How accurate is Sphere microphone modeling?

The Sphere microphone uses a large diaphragm condenser capsule, and is optimized to model large diaphragm mics most accurately. For vintage large diaphragm condenser microphones, in particular, our target is to meet or exceed the accuracy of currently available reissues, clones or other modern versions of the corresponding mic. In most cases we achieve or surpass that standard of accuracy.

For other types of microphones, such as dynamics, ribbons, and small diaphragm condensers, the models are generally accurate when used on-axis. Beyond about 45 degrees off-axis the models may deviate substantially, but still maintain the same overall polar pattern. Generally this means that for these models close miking will be more accurate than distant miking.

The Sphere microphone uses a capsule with very tight tolerances, so that the models will sound consistent no matter what mic hardware is used. These tolerances are typically much tighter than most current or vintage microphones.

Does Sphere technology model nonlinear distortion of microphones?

Yes, it models the subtle harmonic characteristics of tube and FET mics, but it does NOT model the full overload characteristics. The Sphere microphone is designed to have a large amount of headroom and dynamic range, so it can handle a very soft and very high sound pressure levels. Our approach provides maximum headroom even if the original microphone being modeled doesn’t have as much headroom. We believe this is a major benefit of the technology, since an overloaded microphone is rarely a desirable thing.

Does Sphere technology model the noise and hum of microphones?

No. The Sphere microphone is designed to have a very low amount of noise. This approach provides the user with the lowest noise possible, even if that is substantially lower than the original mic being modeled.

What kind of cable does the mic use and is it included?

The included 10 foot cable has a 5-pin XLR female connector, which connects to the Sphere microphone, and a dual 3-pin XLR on the other side, which connects to your preamp. Equivalent cables are available from various other manufacturers.

I want to record in stereo. How can I do that using a Sphere microphone?

With two Sphere microphones you can record stereo using any standard miking technique, such as ORTF, XY, or spaced pair, just as you would with two conventional microphones. But it is also possible record a 180 degree coincident stereo arrangement from a single Sphere microphone. You can even have the front of the microphone have one model and the rear have a different mic model.

For more information see the Stereo Recording chapter in the Sphere Hardware and Software Guide, which can be found in the “Doc” tab.

Do you plan on modeling additional microphones?

Definitely. Some are already under development.

Will there be charges for plug-in updates, such as for additional mic models?

We have no plans to charge for software updates for the bundled Sphere plug-in, but we are considering releasing other plug-ins as separate products.

I already have a great microphone collection. Why should I buy Sphere?
  1. Even the best mic collection has its limits. What if you want multiple U47s or U67s for different sources? Unless you are Ocean Way, most studios are lucky to have one U47 or U67.
  2. Vintage mics of the same type can sound very different depending on age, condition, and original production. For example, there are a number of distinctly different sounding flavors of U47s, such as those with an M7 capsule, an original K47 capsule and a later production K47 capsule with plastic diaphragm mounting ring. With Sphere you can have them all.
  3. Auditioning and switching between mics can be tedious, and might tire a vocalist.
  4. Don’t risk trashing your vintage U47 by putting it on a guitar amp or kick drum
  5. Don’t risk blowing out a ribbon mic with a plosive or a loud source
  6. Adjust the polar pattern and mic type while tracking and after recording!
  7. You can actually adjust the amount of proximity effect of the microphone
  8. With Off-Axis Correction™ you can greatly reduce bleed from other instruments
  9. Use the mic in adverse acoustic environments, such as a hotel room. With Off-Axis Correction you can reduce the influence of poor acoustics.
  10. Take it with you on the road, leaving your irreplaceable vintage mics at home.
  11. When paired with an Apollo or Apollo Twin you have access to a complete world-class vocal or instrument signal chain at your fingertips, all with ultra-low latency processing.
  12. Has a substantially lower noise floor than virtually any vintage microphone, and most modern ones as well.
  13. Requires far less time and money for microphone maintenance (VF-14 tubes are expensive if you can find one)

When will the Sphere L22 be available for delivery? 

We began shipping the L22 to many happy Indiegogo contributors in the first quarter of 2017. Availability now depends on our keeping up with demand. We are in production and shipping on a regular basis. 

 

 

Sphere product page at townsendlabs.com

 

 

Sphere Hardware and Software User Guide

Extended FAQ at townsendlabs.com

Sphere Technology Whitepaper

Sphere technology is patented and only available from Townsend Audio Inc. If you really want to understand the gory details of how it works, you can read the patent at the following link. But be warned, it’s really long and dense! https://www.google.com/patents/US8666090
 

All modeled product names are trademarks of their respective owners, which are in no way associated or affiliated with Townsend Labs Inc. These product names and descriptions are provided for the sole purpose of identifying the specific products that were studied during Sphere’s sound model development.

The Sphere™ system consists of a high precision dual channel microphone, which when paired with the included Sphere DSP plug-in (UAD, VST, AU, AAX Native) accurately models the response of a wide range of mics, including transient response, harmonics, proximity effect and three-dimensional polar response.Join us to see how this unique product can revolutionize the way you record audio.For other questions contact us at: igg-inquiries@townsendlabs.comWe were lucky enough to get a pre-production Sphere L22 microphone in the hands of James Ivey at Pro Tools Expert and he did a very in-depth review of the product. Bios: Joe Chiccarelli, Chuck Surack, Matt Hepworth, James IveyBreakthrough Microphone Modeling TechnologySphere’s three-dimensional approach captures the spatial nuances, proximity effect and off-axis frequency response of a wide range of microphones, which until now was not possible with any other product.Dream CollectionAccess some of the most prized microphones of all time,including a 47 (with VF14 tube), a 67, an M49, and a C12.Sphere L22 MicrophoneThe Sphere system employs the high-resolution, dual-channel L22 large-diaphragm condenser microphone, custom designed to capture the three-dimensional soundfield with exacting detail. Manufactured to extremely tight tolerances, the L22 ensures that modeling is consistent and accurate.Realtime UAD ProcessingWith Universal Audio Apollo, achieve extremely low latency (approx. 1.6 ms round trip at 96 kHz) for guaranteed real-time performance. Also supports native AAX, VST and AU.Polar Pattern ModelingBecause Sphere captures the three-dimensional response of target microphones, it precisely emulates the polar patterns and other off-axis characteristics of vintage microphones which are essential to their unique sound. 

Re-Mic Sphere Tracks
Select mic type, polar pattern and other settings both before and after tracking. 

 

Adjustable Proximity Effect
No need to move a microphone solely because of too little or too much bass due to proximity effect. Great for punching in a vocal where distance from the mic varies from take to take.

Dual Mic ModelsDual Mode in the Sphere plug-in makes possible phase-coherent mixing of multiple virtual mic models from the same physical microphone, before or after tracking. It's also possible to adjust the relative phase alignment of the two mics with the Align control.Record In Stereo (With One Mic)With just one Sphere L22 mic it’s possible to make coincident stereo recordings, and even have different mic models on the left and right channels, using the Sphere 180 plug-in.Axis ShiftVirtually rotate the axis of the mic to give a more off-axis sound before or after tracking.Off-Axis Correction™Create more accurate polar patterns to reduce bleed and room coloration before, or after, tracking. For more information see the Off-Axis Correction chapter in the Sphere Hardware and Software User Guide.Polar MeterThe Sphere plug-in features a visually informative (and very cool) Polar Meter that dynamically displays the direction and level of sound being picked up by the microphone, as well as the currently selected polar pattern.Low NoiseThe microphone hardware has a self-noise level of 7dB-A SPL, well below most vintage microphones and comparable to many of the best modern microphones.High SPL HandlingThe L22 can handle in excess of 140dB SPL before clipping and is remarkably rugged. It won’t be damaged by high SPLs or air blasts as some vintage microphones can be.Using a dual-capsule microphone with dual-outputs makes it possible to more completely capture the soundfield—including the directional and distance information otherwise lost with a conventional single-channel microphone. This allows the Sphere system to precisely reconstruct how different microphones respond to the soundfield.In contrast, other microphone modeling technologies apply EQ to filter the sound from what is essentially a conventional microphone. This is fundamentally no different from using EQ to process a recorded track.The Sphere L22 microphone modeling system comprises this precision dual-channel microphone, plus an audio plug-in for your DAW. The software plug-in does all of the DSP processing used to create the microphone models. Using a plug-in, instead of DSP processing built into the mic, has the major advantage of allowing the user to change all of the modeling settings, such as mic type and polar pattern, after the audio is recorded.For more information about the technology behind Sphere take a look at the Sphere™ Technology Whitepaper.(NOTE: Hi-res audio files can be downloaded by clicking on the "down arrow" in the Soundcloud player.)Audio Comparisons with Vintage MicsWe have also created Sphere L22 A/B comparison tests, which directly compare the Sphere microphone models and the original microphones the models are based on. Each set of audio files comes in an "A" version and a "B" version, where the model and the original are randomly assigned to A or B, so that the test is blind.Head over to our website to find out more and to download the files.Precision Microphone

story:
True Wireless Earbuds Like

Nothing You've Ever Seen Before! 

 

The World's First And Only True Wireless Earbuds With Signal That Never Drops!

CSR By Qualcomm / 3 Hours Playtime / Portable Charging Case

 

It'll never make you stop your workout and adjust your earbuds position 

And . . .

It will NEVER FALL regardless of your ear shape and size 

What You’ll Receive

  • True Wireless Earbuds
  • Silicone Jackets—3 Sizes (S, M and L)
  • Silicone Ear Tips—3 Sizes (S, M and L)
  • Foam Ear Tips—3 Sizes (S, M and L)
  • Portable Charging Case
  • Charging Cable For The Case

  • 3 Hours Playtime
  • 6 Recharges using the portable charging case
  • Portable Charging Case with 2500mAh
  • Wireless charging
  • Full Recharge in 60 minutes

Industry Leading Designers 

Adjustable Hook To Fit All Ear Sizes And Shapes

Each set included 3 different sizes of silicone jackets + 3 different sizes of ear tips so you'll definitely find the best combination for you. 

With 9 different size combinations, you will definitely find the best fit for you, regardless of your ear size, shape or sports activity you plan to do with it.

 

One of the most important things to us while creating your Axum earbuds was the fit and to make sure it will NEVER FALL OUT OF YOUR EARS, what's the best way to do it? TEST, TEST, and TEST few more times. 

So in the last months, we've been trying almost any sports activity that you can think of, such as crossfit , lifting, cycling, parkour, running and more ...

 

  • 2 x Built-In microphones, 1 in each earpiece ( Left & Right )
  • Can be used as mono and stereo
  • Omnidirectional Microphone - Cancelling background noises (wind, street noise, etc )

Running low on audio juice? No worries—charging our Bluetooth, True Wireless earbuds is as hassle-free as possible. To charge them, simply place them in their Charging Case. There’s a designated space for each bud, but even if your placement is off, magnets bring the earbuds into place so timely charging can begin.

 

  1. Up to 10 meters range

  1. Will never drop signal
  2. put your phone in the pocket, in your bag or on your armband

 

  1. Dynamic Driver
  2. CSR Apt-X Codec
  3. 10mm Speaker Driver

 

Axum Gear: True Wireless Earbuds for Extreme Athletes

Whether pumping iron at the gym or pushing both your body and sanity to the limits at a nearby skate park, extreme athletes are motivated to the max. They expect only the absolute best from themselves. Likewise, the gear they use must perform on a similar level—this is where Axum Gear’s True Wireless earbuds come alive.

 

Sweat is the stuff of grit, determination and personal resolve, but to make it to the top, you’ll need all the help you can get. Kick tangled wires, poor sound quality and bulky, ill-fitting headphones to the curb. Axum’s take on earbuds was not only designed for extreme athletes, but by extreme athletes. No corner-cutting, here …

 

 

When we say “True Wireless,” we mean it. Using Bluetooth 4.1 Technology, our buds allow for complete freedom of movement—no strings (or wires) attached.

 

 

Though total domination is the end goal for all fitness gurus and fearless athletes, each is unique. Our earbuds’ Adjustable Hook makes Universal Fit a reality.

 

 

You put your body through hell to transform it. Traditional headphones weren’t meant to tag along—our earbuds are small and compact enough to do so.

 

Quit fumbling with wires—having strategically placed magnets in each charging port, our innovative earbuds fall into proper place and immediately take in energy.

 

Remember that “charging port” of which was previously made mention? It’s conveniently the case, giving you 4 hours of playtime, and 4 hours of playtime in the case.


 

Maximizing your athletic output means sweat—lots of it. Liquipel’s Nanotech Waterproof Coating, means your earbuds won’t throw in the towel.

 

Along with a waterproof nano-coating, our state-of-the-art Silicon Jackets make for the perfect one-two punch. Trust us—these earbuds aren’t falling out anytime soon.

 

No matter how long you’ve given your mind and body all you’ve got, life happens. Should a call come in, use our Built-In Microphone to keep up.

 

 

 

 

Technology & Performance Without Wires

Wires are for 90s home phones—not your go-to pair of competitive earbuds. Using the power of Bluetooth 4.1 Technology, our fast-paced audio enhancers are optimized for low-battery use and perform flawlessly within a 10-meter range. 

 

Under The Hood 

  • Noise Cancellation
  • Bluetooth 4.1
  • Up to 10 meters range
  • Built-In Mic
  • Magnetic Hassle-Free charging
  • Waterproof double nanocoating

Battery

  • Battery 90mAh
  • Playtime 4 hours
  • Recharge fully in 60 min

Sound

  • Dynamic Driver Speaker
  • AptX coded CSR
  • 20Hz – 20kHz
  • Impedance 16 Omh
  • 10mm speaker

The Making Of Axum

 

What's the secret sauce ? to work with the best !

 

Axum earbuds designed by the industrial design legends BebopDesigners , leading agency that created some of the best earphones out there today . Got many awards for their work and few of their recent crowdfunding campaigns become world’s best sellers .

 

Axum’s Innovative Team

We want to know about you—your passions, goals and exactly what you’ve done to get to where you’re at today. For now, though, it’s our turn to introduce ourselves …

Share To Support

We Need Your Help

 

Here at Axum Gear, we recognize that we’re part of a larger community of extreme sports enthusiasts. It doesn’t matter if you lift weights, run marathons, skate, snowboard or surf. As fully committed athletes, we’re in this together—we push, grind and make the most out of what we’re given. While others might call it quits, we press on …

Currently, we find ourselves at an important stage in our company’s progression. Without the necessary funding, we’re stuck. With your support, however, tenacious athletes from all over the world will have access to our one-of-a-kind earbuds. Here on Indiegogo, we kindly ask that you back our project—anything helps.

Lift Where You Stand

To make our unprecedented earbud project a reality, we’ll need your help with funding, but we’ll need something else, too—social promotion. From Facebook and Twitter to Instagram and Snapchat, each and every one of us is active on at least on social network.

So, using the link to this page, please share our project with family, friends and other devoted athletes like you. Together, we’ll not only make audio history, we’ll be elevating our commitment to the very athletic passions that drive us each and every day.

Feel free to include us in your posts, tweets and stories …

        

FAQs

 

Q - How long does Axum’s battery last?

A. Playtime is 4 hours, with an additional 4 hours in the portable charging case.

Q - Can Axum’s earbuds be used under a helmet?

A. Yes, thanks to Axum’s compact design, you’ll be able to use our earbuds under your helmet. Keep in mind, however, that you’ll need to press the earpiece to answer calls, so when wearing a helmet, keep your smartphone within reach.

Q - Can these earbuds be used in a single-mono setting?

A. No, our earbuds can only be used for stereo listening. Also, both the left and right earbuds must be worn for maximum audio enjoyment.

Q - Can I use these earbuds to answer phone calls?

A. Yes, there’s a built-in mic for phone calls, Siri, Google Now, etc.

Q - What’s the standby time like?

A. Standby time is about 200 hours.

Q - How many recharges can a fully-charged case provide?

A. You can recharge our earbuds 5 times before needing to charge the case again.

Q - When I decide to take out my earbuds, where can I store them?

A. There’s a leash included with the case we send our customers, in case you want to take out your earbuds to speak with someone.

Q - What devices will Axum’s earbuds work with?

A. Our earbuds work with any Bluetooth 3.0 device and up, so you shouldn’t have an issue connecting them to any electronic device manufactured after 2011.

Q - Can these earbuds connect to 2 devices at the same time?

A. No, they can only be paired with 1 device at a time.

Q - Are these earbuds waterproof?

A. Yes, they’re waterproof. However, we don’t recommend swimming with them.

Q - What’s Axum’s product warranty like?

A. Our earbuds come with a 2-year warranty. This warranty starts when you receive your earbuds, not when an order is placed.

story:
Totally original in its design, Ark is a two-piece speaker system that combines a detachable mini Sound Bar and a powerful ported subwoofer Bass Station. Ark’s clever dual speaker design works seamlessly together to bring a new dimension to your music, movies and gaming. 

Regular portable speakers have average sound power, but poor bass, and regular home speaker systems have good sound power, but are not portable. Ark is your perfect balance of portability and power. The dual parts can be connected into a single speaker unit that uses our Magnatec wireless charging technology, or positioned separately while still working in unison. You can even add any number of additional subwoofer Bass Stations to your Ark speaker system to bring unmatched customized levels of sound quality across a single room or your entire home.

Ark is not just about flexibility; it was built to deliver superior sound. Two speaker drivers, passive radiators and a 3.5” ported subwoofer come together to deliver a new dimension to your audio and music.

Build out your Ark system with extra Bass Stations to bring unmatched, customized levels of sound quality across a single room, or your entire home. You can have an unlimited number of Bass Stations in the same room for ultimate sound intensity or you can have one in different rooms and take the Sound Bar with you to each room. Give some Bass to your Bluetooth!

Ark’s Magnatec technology provides wireless charging for the Sound Bar with inductive charging and dual mode sync. Inductive wireless charging mobile phones are also compatible, and can be charged by simply placing your handset on top of the Bass Station. Most importantly, Magnatec syncs the Bass Station and Sound Bar so they’re ready for playing your music and audio in super-rich sound across the full acoustic range.

Ark can also be your super portable, anytime, anywhere Bluetooth speaker. Cruze has a lithium battery inside, charged by either Ark’s Bass Station or USB. Fully charged, it will play music for 8 hours. Comprised of 2 speaker drivers and passive radiators, it is a superb, super portable speaker. 

Ark houses a 3.5” circular subwoofer in its Bass Station. The Bass Station subwoofer enclosure runs off a standard mains supply and is ported, which means the subwoofer cone has greater freedom of motion. The port redirects sound from the rear of the cone and adds it to the sound coming from the front, making the bass louder.

Quick and simple connectivity. Ark remembers your mobile media device after the first pairing so they automatically connect every time they are in range of each other. The first pairing can be made using the simple Bluetooth NFC touch and pair feature, by effortlessly touching your NFC device and Ark together, they connect and pair automatically. 

When your phone is paired with Ark for music, it is also automatically paired for hands-free calling. Should your phone ring, you can take the call and use Ark as your hands-free microphone and speaker.

Connect to Ark using any Bluetooth-enabled device, and Ark will supersize your music with playback in any size room. Two speaker drivers, passive radiators and a 3.5” ported subwoofer come together to deliver a new dimension to your audio and music experiences.

Get all the music on earth with access to your favorite streaming music services, and over 100,000 Internet radio stations from around the world, and your personal music library on your device, of course. All the music you get access to on your Bluetooth enabled device can be enjoyed with deep and powerful sound quality on the Ark.

Immerse yourself in your favorite video game by using Ark for your audio. You can locate the Sound Bar near you or by your TV, while the Bass Station can be neatly tucked away behind your sofa for an incredible sound experience. 

Use Ark to play audio from your favorite movies or TV programs. Ark’s dual speaker design allows you to adapt to any room’s individual layout and acoustics. 

Cruze, Ark’s portable Sound Bar, allows you to supersize your music on the go with a built-in lithium battery that lasts up to eight hours. The battery is charged wirelessly by Ark's Bass Station or alternatively via USB. Constructed with two speaker drivers and passive radiators, it is a superb portable speaker with a rich and unbeatable sound.

Output power: 10W + 25W 

S/N: >85dB 

Frequency range: 20Hz-20KHz 

Power supply: Lithium battery (Sound Bar) or AC adaptor (Bass Station and Sound Bar) 

Audio source: iPhone, iPad, smartphone, notebook, MP3, MP4, television, gaming console 

Inputs: Bluetooth, microphone, line-in 

Bass Station size (length x depth x height): 300mm (11.8inches) x 145mm (5.7inches) x 170mm (6.7inches) 

Bass station power adaptor for wall socket with interchangeable plugs enabling international use 

Cruze Sound Bar size (length x depth x height): 200mm (7.9inches) x 65mm( 2.6inches) x 60mm (2.4inches) 

Rechargeable lithium battery inside Sound Bar can be charged by USB cable or Ark’s Bass Station 

Bluetooth operating range: up to 10 meters

Six years ago, Bill Mei founded Cowin in China after finding success in making wireless speakers and headphones for other companies. Mei eventually partnered with his cousin, James, prompting them to expand the Cowin brand outside of China. The men later partnered with Nathan Kalaher, Co-founder of The Just Brand, and his team to help engineer and launch new audio products suitable for consumers worldwide. Together, they were able to create the Cowin Ark speaker system.

The next step for Cowin is to go global! Ark has been designed, developed, engineered, pro-typed and pre-production is complete. We’re excited to share Cowin Ark with you! Now, meet the team behind the action here:

     

We are coming to Kickstarter because we want to build a trusted and sustainable backer community of early adopters who appreciate real product innovation. Our vision is to continue the journey we have started of becoming a global player within the home and portable audio market.

Kickstarter community, we see you as playing a significant role in our vision and future, your commitment and feedback will help us reach our goal and beyond... With your help we can put our revolutionary, tried and tested, Cowin Ark speaker into mass production.

So if you are ready to experience a speaker revolution, please support our campaign. It could be a little, or it could be a lot, but every supporter takes us one step closer to our goal, and one step closer to you having an Ark of your own.

Replay with sound









Play with  sound

Mei eventually partnered with his cousin, James, prompting them to expand the Cowin brand outside of China. The men later partnered with Nathan Kalaher, Co-founder of The Just Brand, and his team to help engineer and launch new audio products suitable for consumers worldwide. The next step for Cowin is to go global! Ark has been designed, developed, engineered, pro-typed and pre-production is complete. We’re excited to share Cowin Ark with you! Now, meet the team behind the action here:

story:
Superior built earphone offering impressive sound for true music fans at an affordable price

 

What people are saying about TUNAI PIANO:

*In the interview, we compare TUNAI PIAO (Retailed at $59.99) with British audio brand RHA model T10i (with more than 100 reviews and 4 stars rating on Amazon & 8/10 rating at CNET; retailed at $199.95)*
 

Experience clean, unadulterated sound with our top-class ceramic driver:

TUNAI PIANO is built just like high-end earphones, only without the $100+ price tag. TUNAI PIANO uses one dynamic driver plus one ceramic driver to create nicely layered presentation with excellent timbre.

Our ceramic driver, usually only featured in higher-end earphones, comes with excellent sound details, providing less distortion in extended high frequency and a natural tonality. TUNAI PIANO produces excellent clarity and airiness with sharp and focused notes, enabling you to capture every little detail in your playlist.

 

The 13mm dynamic driver is larger than the drivers featured in products within the similar price range. The result is clean, clear, detailed mid-range and refined instrumentals. The large dynamic driver is also able to produce a solid, but not overwhelming, bass with superb texture and punchiness. TUNAI PIANO offers a balanced and immersive sound experience that is comparable to high-end earphone that is priced between $100-$200.

 

Improved Noise-Cancellation Performance

Continual testing and improvement allows us to achieve superior passive noise cancellation of up to 30dB (compare to normal earplug of 18dB). Listen to the clip below to hear the difference:

 

Bonus Feature for True-to-Life Audio Experience:

1. Comfort & Ergonomic design

Similar to our previous Drum earphone, TUNAI PIANO is available in four sizes of silky soft earbuds to ensure that every ear gets a snug fit. A great fit helps to ensure that outside noise won’t interrupt your music. Pop cover on and off easily for convenient washing - keep them (and your ears) clean!

L-shaped plug design provide a more robust and durable solution by putting less stress on the jack. Gold plated plug delivers superior electrical conductivity, low impedance and anti-oxidization for better performance and longer life time.

2. Excellent conductivity with extra durability:

Higher density copper provides a lower resistance pathway for the audio signal for an authentic, optimized audio experience. Unlike most of the budget earphones, which feature a 99% OFC wire, we use 99.9% oxygen-free copper wire for our TUNAI PIANO earphones..

 

Colours available: 

3 colours available - Rose Gold, Polar Blue, and Sterling Silver on the side piece. 

 

PACKAGING & WHAT’S IN THE BOX:

 

Frequency Response:

 

Technical spec:

Reward Package:

To thank you for your support, we are offering TUNAI PIANO earphone alone, or together with our best-selling DRUM earphone and TUNAI SQUARE, our bluetooth headphone receiver that transform all wired headphone wireless. All with more than 25% discount.

Bundle Products:

1. TUNAI SQUARE

TUNAI SQUARE is a Bluetooth headphone receiver that works with any headphone to make it wireless. 

TUNAI SQUARE delivers CD quality audio and reduces the noise floor thanks to its highest spec standard (aptx & AAC support + discrete audio DAC with 114db SNR)

It also supports aptx low latency to solve the lip-sync delay issue by keeping video and audio synced - a perfect match for TUNAI PIANO.

This convenient device also comes with a built-in microphone for calls. It can also be used as a remote to control music, volume, answering phone calls or triggering voice assistants.

TUNAI SQUARE has a long range (164ft or 50m) with an extended battery life of 7hrs+ for continuous playback. Built-in cord management is also available to seamlessly and easily organize the wires.

For more  information, please visit our website at http://www.tunaicreative.com/wp/zh_TW/square/

 

2. TUNAI DRUM

TUNAI DRUM is a hi-res certified bass enhanced earphone that was another crowdfunding project on Kickstarter in September, 2018. It is currently available on Amazon.

See for yourself why our backers, Amazon customers, and reviewers love TUNAI DRUM!

TUNAI DRUM uses a large 13mm size dynamic driver to create power bass, extremely wide soundstage and precise sound positioning. While powerful bass usually impacts the clarity of mids and highs, DRUM balances the impact by using an ultra-thin 8um aerospace grade diaphragm. The result is an earphone with powerful bass, extremely wide soundstage, and good mid and highs.

For more information about TUNAI DRUM, visit our webiste:
http://www.tunai-creative.com/wp/zh_TW/drum/

THE VERGE : 7.5/10 
Funkykit : Editor's Choice
BCCHardware : Editor's Choice
Amazon : 4.4 star rating
Kickstarter campaign : 177% reached in 3 days

 

What We Need & What You Get

We’re TUNAI – a company founded with the belief to bring the best gadgets to consumers at an affordable price. Started by a group of friends with diverse backgrounds, from IC design to fashion, TUNAI solved the problem of finding the tech gadget you need at a price you can actually afford. Founded in 2014, we have delivered various supporter-backed projects to happy customers around the world.

After a successful launch of our TUNAI DRUM, the High-Resolution Bass Enhanced Audiophile Earphones crowdfunded on Kickstarter (we reached 100% of the funding goal in just 3 days and have more than 10,000 happy customers), we decided to launch TUNAI PIANO to deliver a more balanced sound quality for classical and acoustic enthusiasts. We have worked hard with a team of audio experts in Taiwan and Europe and our factories based in Taiwan, which manufacture some of the best audio products in the world, to develop a special solution that incorporate the special ceramic drivers to deliver crystal-clear and lively sound quality at a reasonable price.

We have already tested a small part of production for our backers based in Taiwan and with GREAT results. This means, you won’t have to wait long for your TUNAI PIANO earbuds to be delivered straight to your doorstep. We’re confident that all touch-points, from orders to delivery, will live up to the hype.

Our goal of $10,000 will help us continue to produce TUNAI PIANO on a larger scale. Help us reach our goal so that we can continue to innovate and bring incredible high-performance tech products at an affordable price.

Everyone who helps us see TUNAI PIANO to the finish line will get it at less than 75% the retail price. Not to mention, they will be the first to receive exclusive and premium perks, including early bird exclusives for our website launch and all future projects.

 

Project Timeline:

 

Risks & Challenges:

Like any hardware project, there are risks and challenges associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics. 

Our production manufacturers are all Taiwanese companies; some of our component suppliers have factories based in China. We specifically looked for suppliers based in Taiwan so that it’s easier for us to mitigate and react quickly to the issues that rise with manufacturing the products. However, as part of our components are sourced from China based factory, there are still risks with sourcing and overall quality control. Overall, both TUNAI and our manufacturing partners have successfully managed the production and logistic issues so far with our other products in the past, so we believe we will be able to deliver PIANO to you on time.
story_txt:
Superior built earphone offering impressive sound for true music fans at an affordable price


 
What people are saying about TUNAI PIANO:

*In the interview, we compare TUNAI PIAO (Retailed at $59.99) with British audio brand RHA model T10i (with more than 100 reviews and 4 stars rating on Amazon & 8/10 rating at CNET; retailed at $199.95)*

 

Experience clean, unadulterated sound with our top-class ceramic driver:
TUNAI PIANO is built just like high-end earphones, only without the $100+ price tag. TUNAI PIANO uses one dynamic driver plus one ceramic driver to create nicely layered presentation with excellent timbre.
Our ceramic driver, usually only featured in higher-end earphones, comes with excellent sound details, providing less distortion in extended high frequency and a natural tonality. TUNAI PIANO produces excellent clarity and airiness with sharp and focused notes, enabling you to capture every little detail in your playlist.

 
The 13mm dynamic driver is larger than the drivers featured in products within the similar price range. The result is clean, clear, detailed mid-range and refined instrumentals. The large dynamic driver is also able to produce a solid, but not overwhelming, bass with superb texture and punchiness. TUNAI PIANO offers a balanced and immersive sound experience that is comparable to high-end earphone that is priced between $100-$200. 

 

Improved Noise-Cancellation Performance
Continual testing and improvement allows us to achieve superior passive noise cancellation of up to 30dB (compare to normal earplug of 18dB). Listen to the clip below to hear the difference:

 

Bonus Feature for True-to-Life Audio Experience:
1. Comfort & Ergonomic design
Similar to our previous Drum earphone, TUNAI PIANO is available in four sizes of silky soft earbuds to ensure that every ear gets a snug fit. A great fit helps to ensure that outside noise won’t interrupt your music. Pop cover on and off easily for convenient washing - keep them (and your ears) clean!
L-shaped plug design provide a more robust and durable solution by putting less stress on the jack. Gold plated plug delivers superior electrical conductivity, low impedance and anti-oxidization for better performance and longer life time.

2. Excellent conductivity with extra durability:
Higher density copper provides a lower resistance pathway for the audio signal for an authentic, optimized audio experience. Unlike most of the budget earphones, which feature a 99% OFC wire, we use 99.9% oxygen-free copper wire for our TUNAI PIANO earphones..

 
Colours available: 
3 colours available - Rose Gold, Polar Blue, and Sterling Silver on the side piece. 


 
PACKAGING & WHAT’S IN THE BOX:



 
Frequency Response:
 
Technical spec:

Reward Package:
To thank you for your support, we are offering TUNAI PIANO earphone alone, or together with our best-selling DRUM earphone and TUNAI SQUARE, our bluetooth headphone receiver that transform all wired headphone wireless. All with more than 25% discount.




Bundle Products:
1. TUNAI SQUARE

TUNAI SQUARE is a Bluetooth headphone receiver that works with any headphone to make it wireless. 
TUNAI SQUARE delivers CD quality audio and reduces the noise floor thanks to its highest spec standard (aptx & AAC support + discrete audio DAC with 114db SNR)
It also supports aptx low latency to solve the lip-sync delay issue by keeping video and audio synced - a perfect match for TUNAI PIANO.
This convenient device also comes with a built-in microphone for calls. It can also be used as a remote to control music, volume, answering phone calls or triggering voice assistants.
TUNAI SQUARE has a long range (164ft or 50m) with an extended battery life of 7hrs+ for continuous playback. Built-in cord management is also available to seamlessly and easily organize the wires.
For more  information, please visit our website at http://www.tunaicreative.com/wp/zh_TW/square/

 
2. TUNAI DRUM

story:
Spark is a powerful speaker that sounds amazing, adapts to wherever it’s playing and, together with streaming services, gives you instant high quality access to all online video and audio content. Plus, with Spark's compatibility with Alexa and OK Google, you have on-demand voice assistance.

 

Spark combines leading voice technologies, top content providers, and premium audio to create the smartest home device available. A wireless Hi-Fi speaker, tablet, TV box, and digital photo frame in one.

This beautifully designed, compact speaker provides incredibly full, rich audio.

Spark has strong specs and capabilities, AND is affordable. Everything you want in one incredible smart speaker.

 

 

Just ask or dial, and stay connected by video chat between two Sparks or between most any smart device and Spark.

Use built-in Alexa or OK Google voice assistants, you can play music, find recipes, catch up on the latest news, and even control smart home products.

Spark retro-modern design can serve as the perfectly connected home display. Use it as a digital photo frame and showcase your memories with its 7-inch 2K Full HD display for all your photos and videos.

 

 


Stream videos and music with your favorite apps, the possibilities are endless.

 

Seamlessly connect to popular smart home integrations, such as IFTTT, Hue, Nest, and more.

 

Spark in Action: 4K Display Output via HDMI
 

Spark in Action: Ok Google Voice Demo

 
 
 

 

 

 

Set-up has never been easier – just plug-in, charge, and start enjoying Spark.

Our designs have been tested and proven. We have been working on perfecting the technology to get it ready to bring home.

 

Clazio Spark is our next generation speaker created based on our past Clazio speaker user feedback. With over 20 years of experience in consumer electronics and acoustic technology, we strive to provide an extraordinary sound experience with excellent design. We’ve employed industry professionals and sound tuning masters to refine the audio quality of Spark. We can’t wait for backers, such as yourselves, to share your great ideas and feedback. With your help, we’ll be able to create the world’s best smart speaker designed for everyone.

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

 

We plan to ship the product in December 2017*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

 

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Spark speakers off the line plus exclusive access to prices never to be seen again.

 

 

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

 

 

Please contact hello@clazio.ai with further questions or inquiries about bulk orders and discounts.

 

What is it? Clazio Spark combines leading voice technologies, top content providers, and premium audio to create the smartest home device available. Uncompromising audio & video quality – a wireless Hi-Fi speaker, internet radio, and android tablet in one.
Who created it? Pan Sea Co., LTD. 
Why should we use it? Spark is a powerful speaker that sounds amazing, adapts to wherever it’s playing and, together with streaming services, gives you instant high quality access to all online video and audio content. Plus, with Spark's compatibility with Alexa and OK Google, you have on-demand voice assistance.
How much does it cost? MSRP $269
Where can we buy it? Indiegogo
What do we get when we order? SPARK speaker, charging cable, user manual, and 1 year free warranty. 
Why are you crowdfunding? 1.Introduce you a better way to use speaker, 
2.Challenge the traditional cognition of speakers, 
3.Get bucks to launch the new product, 
4. Share with different experience with affordable price.

What features are available? 1. Built in Amazon ALEXA and Ok Google compatibility
2. Powered By Android 7.0 Nougat OS 
3. 7 inch 2K Full HDTouchscreen;
4. Bluetooth and WiFi connected 
5. Portable and Rechargeable 
6. Endless apps to download from Google Play store
7. 5MP front camera 
8.Octa-core processor 
What colors do you offer? Charcoal Black and Mint Green 
What sizes do you offer? One size
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet? We've designed Clazio Spark to be stylish and comfortable to use.
Which option is best for me? Clazio Spark can be enjoyed anywhere in your home, and is great for all ages.

What is the uniqueness of the technology? Touch Screen Android Speaker compatible with Amazon Alexa and Ok Google. Powered By Android 7.0 Nougat OS.
What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge? Li-Poly 4,800 mAh battery. Support up to 5 hours of Music play back and 4 hours for video.
What are the dimensions and weight? 7.59" x 7.48" x 4.33" (193mm x 190mm x 110mm), 1.763 pounds (0.8kg)

Where can I use it? Clazio Spark can be enjoyed just about anywhere in or outside of your home.
Is it safe? Yes
How durable is it? Clazio Spark is a durable product, but like any product should be handled with care.

When does shipping begin? December 2017
Where does it ship? We're proud to ship Clazio Spark worldwide. Free shipping to the US and Canada, $10 for rest of the world.
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Please email us at clazio@pan-ocean.com.cn if you're a retailer interested in distribution.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Yes, customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of the China may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; PAN SEA has no control over these charges.

Is there a warranty? Up to one year after shipment.
What is your refund policy? Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.
What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign? See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.
How do I choose more than one reward? To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? For general inquiries, please contact: clazio@pan-ocean.com.cn
For support inquiries, please contact: clazio@pan-ocean.com.cn
For press inquiries, please contact: clazio@pan-ocean.com.cn

story:
Enjoy your audio with your friends with the DoublePods Shareable Bluetooth Headphones. DoublePods seamlessly and wirelessly syncs to another set so you can hear the audio simultaneously. On the side of the DoublePods Headphones is an activation button. A single click will open the connection with another pair of DoublePods. This revolutionary click-to-share technology effortlessly saves you the hassle of sharing cabled earbuds. Now, you and a friend can watch the same film, hear the latest music, and even take calls while having the privacy of headphones.

In addition, each set of headphones has its own individual volume control to suit everyone. With a 20-hour battery life, the DoublePods Headphones will last and last. Even if you do run out of battery, you can still use the 3.5mm audio jack to get the same high definition sound.

 

 

 

The Problem: Look Familiar?

For so long, the only way to share music with your friend is to either share your earbud or use an audio splitter.

 

The Solution: DoublePods Click-to-Share Bluetooth Headphones

Now, there is a better way to easily sync and share your music wirelessly: Meet DoublePods. Now you can listen to music together or watch videos together, all with a click of a button!

 

 

 

 

 

Slim, sexy and powerful. This business card-sized powerbank, wrapped in genuine leather, fits neatly into any pocket and recharges your DoublePods or your phones in an instance. Available in two colors to go along beautifully with your DoublePods.

 

Ultra-slim, scratch-resistant leather carry case designed exclusively for DoublePods. The padded soft microfiber interior offers extra protection for your DoublePods. The snappy magnetic clasp closure lets you quickly and easily access your DoublePods.

story:
Music moves you. Admit it: nothing compares to how the right song touches your soul while your heart matches the beat perfectly. It’s the universal language we all speak no matter our age, nationality or profession. Music. Makes. Life. Better. 

When you feel great, you want to show it off by also looking your best. 

With KAT you are the hero of your own story. A speaker that’s extremely powerful for its size and so versatile, you can truly bring it along wherever life takes you. From a get-together with friends to a yoga class to a bike ride, KAT is your perfect partner, always ready for any adventure!

 

Feeling like you want to jazz up your outfit and be memorable? KAT is a stylish wearable speaker and has a whole line of super cool accessories, especially designed for you. Show off your unique fashion signature with refined lanyards, snazzy keychains and even a retro fanny pack that will make you the envy of everybody! 

 

Have you seen a speaker this small before? Probably not. KAT is seriously tiny. Despite its ultra compact size, it packs some serious punch, with soaring highs and deep bass. 

 

Listening to your favourite tunes with KAT can be so intense, you won’t know what hit you. KAT is the loudest speaker of its size and delivers powerful sound that fills up any room. The sound quality stays incredibly crisp and clear, even at full volume.

 

 

And if you want to really crank up the volume, bring a second speaker into the mix. Connect 2 KATs to the same device and experience a rounded, stereo sound. 

 

Put yourself and your friends at the centre like never before. Music plays simultaneously from both speakers so you can hear and feel a sound that’s twice as full. Now that’s next level sh*t.

Whether you’re off living an adventure or just enjoying some chill time, having balance is super important. With KAT, you have the best charge time to play time ratio ever!

 

Have fun blasting rich, full of life music for up to 4 hours. Take a quick break and repeat. KAT re-charges faster than it takes you to shower and change clothes, with a super fast charging time of only 20 minutes.

 

Wirelessly stream high quality sound right from your phone. But when you’re having fun, time is of the essence. That’s why high quality Bluetooth 4.1 pairs KAT with your phone in seconds. Every single time. 

 

You have enough space to dance your heart out while keeping your device connected to KAT thanks to the wide range of 10m (32ft). Even when you’re connecting 2 KATs to your phone!

 

 

 

Get free accessories and win a KAT simply by sharing KAT with your friends!

1 referral, you will get a free Lanyard or Case!

3 referrals, you will get a free KAT!

How to share:

  1. First, back KAT
  2. Once you are a backer, log in your Indiegogo account
  3. Copy KATs campaign link
  4. Share your unique link with your friends!

How to check your referrals:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page
  3. Select the “My Profile” option
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
  5. Count the number of funders

Want to get some cool accessories for your KAT? You can add 1 of each you wish to have in 4 easy steps:

1. Choose your desired perk from the right hand side of the campaign page. Accept the Terms of Use and click the "Continue to payment" button.

2. On the next screen, under "Perks you may also like" you can see a list of available add-ons for your selected perk. Use the arrows on the right side to see all the add-ons.

3. Select the one you wish to add and click "Add perk". Repeat until you add all the extras you want.

4. Fill in your payment details and submit your payment. You're done!

 

We're a young yet experienced team, passionate about music, design and fashion. We combined them all and created KAT, a wearable speaker with a futuristic shape that can be customised with the right accessories to fit your every mood, outfit or activity.

NoVanilla was founded in 2019 as a perfect collaboration between unique fashion, functional design and great value, all coming together to help you make a powerful statement. It challenges conventionality and creates contrasts between textures and materials.

It's dedicated to give you an intense experience every time you wear a NoVanilla accessory and to help you express your cool & trendy self. The pieces created for KAT are simple yet intricate, each telling its own story with emotion and beauty.

Transforming an idea from concept to reality is a complex process and we got to learn all about it in the past 12 months while working on KAT. 

We’ve already invested the necessary funds in order to manufacture a handful of prototypes to test the quality and functionality of the product and do our best to make sure manufacturing runs smoothly. 

However, bringing this amazing product to a large audience through traditional channels is a challenge. That is why we’re here on Indiegogo, the place where you support creative ideas so they can come to life. 

We’ve already found the perfect manufacturer for our project. We are confident we can deliver the results of this project to all our backers, having communicating and working with them for months. 

That being said, we understand that as with everything in life, tackling projects that are worth the effort comes with some challenges and some of these may not always be within our control. 

We have done our best to think ahead and we will have members on the ground at our manufacturer’s facility to personally inspect every single pledge before we ship it out to you.

You can trust that we will maintain full transparency in our communication with all our backers, during and post-campaign. It’s important to us that you can always be aware of our progress along the way.
story_txt:
Music moves you. Admit it: nothing compares to how the right song touches your soul while your heart matches the beat perfectly. It’s the universal language we all speak no matter our age, nationality or profession. Music. Makes. Life. Better. When you feel great, you want to show it off by also looking your best. With KAT you are the hero of your own story. A speaker that’s extremely powerful for its size and so versatile, you can truly bring it along wherever life takes you. From a get-together with friends to a yoga class to a bike ride, KAT is your perfect partner, always ready for any adventure! Feeling like you want to jazz up your outfit and be memorable? KAT is a stylish wearable speaker and has a whole line of super cool accessories, especially designed for you. Show off your unique fashion signature with refined lanyards, snazzy keychains and even a retro fanny pack that will make you the envy of everybody!  Have you seen a speaker this small before? Probably not. KAT is seriously tiny. Despite its ultra compact size, it packs some serious punch, with soaring highs and deep bass.  Listening to your favourite tunes with KAT can be so intense, you won’t know what hit you. KAT is the loudest speaker of its size and delivers powerful sound that fills up any room. The sound quality stays incredibly crisp and clear, even at full volume.  And if you want to really crank up the volume, bring a second speaker into the mix. Connect 2 KATs to the same device and experience a rounded, stereo sound.  Put yourself and your friends at the centre like never before. Music plays simultaneously from both speakers so you can hear and feel a sound that’s twice as full. Now that’s next level sh*t.Whether you’re off living an adventure or just enjoying some chill time, having balance is super important. With KAT, you have the best charge time to play time ratio ever! Have fun blasting rich, full of life music for up to 4 hours. Take a quick break and repeat. KAT re-charges faster than it takes you to shower and change clothes, with a super fast charging time of only 20 minutes. Wirelessly stream high quality sound right from your phone. But when you’re having fun, time is of the essence. That’s why high quality Bluetooth 4.1 pairs KAT with your phone in seconds. Every single time.  You have enough space to dance your heart out while keeping your device connected to KAT thanks to the wide range of 10m (32ft). Even when you’re connecting 2 KATs to your phone!   Get free accessories and win a KAT simply by sharing KAT with your friends!1 referral, you will get a free Lanyard or Case!3 referrals, you will get a free KAT!How to share:
