 Mutrics GB-30 uses open-ear audio technology to transfer stereo sound to your inner ear without the use of earbuds. Superior to other headphones, playing video games with Mutrics GB-30 for prolonged periods does not make your ears feel any discomfort or soreness. It leaves your ears unplugged so you are still able to hear and interact with the world around you when playing video games. Mutrics GB-30’s cutting-edge near-field surround sound system transforms your game experience to virtual 5.1 on your mobile devices, delivering you rich, immersive and true-to-life sound. You are able to capture the slightest changes in the surrounding sound and pinpoint the enemy’s position with great ease to dominate the most intense, fierce matches.3Mutric GB-30’s unique look makes you stand out from other gamers. Its retro design embodied in the color, texture and buttons is reminiscent of the classic video game console, and is a tribute to the complex of many seasoned video game players.The comfortability is further enhanced through its ergonomic design. Their temples are forged from ultra light and durable materials which are only 33g (1.16oz) in weight and 6mm (⅕ inch) in thickness, the slimmest in comparison to others. The components are evenly distributed and meticulously molded to avoid nose pinching and behind-the-ear hurting.Mutrics GB-30 comes in two sets of resin (high-quality spectacles’ material in the eyewear industry) replacement lenses with a 100% protection against UV 400 rays. One set is colored gradient and the other is transparent anti-blue light.The lenses are easily swappable to a variety of different styles, whether they are prescription, sunglasses or plano, for a look that best expresses your own unique taste. Liberate yourself even further with Mutrics GB-30’s Qualcomm Bluetooth 5.0 connection that remains strong at a distance of up to 20 meters. No noticeable latency is present either, which makes the Mutrics GB-30 ideal for playing video games and watching videos.You can control the volume, play/pause/skip soundtracks, accept a call or trigger Google Assistant/Siri/Alexa with buttons on the side of the right arm. There is no need to take out your cell phone and touch the screen.The embedded microphones pick up your voice clearly for the other end of the call or a virtual digital assistance.Rated IP55 waterproof, Mutrics GB-30 is your perfect companion to endure sweat, splashes and drizzles on any adventures ahead.Mutrics GB-30 has 4 hours of music playback, which is longer compared to equivalent devices thanks to its solid battery and ultra-low consumption of the speakers. It can be easily recharged via the discreet magnetic PIN underneath the left arm and should be enough for a day’s casual use.* Blue LEDs also serve as an indicator of charging status when charging. Mutrics is a company engaged in the field of AI+IoT.  The name Mutrics is combination by Music+Entropy+Glasses. We are thinking music is an energy which could bring people more positively impact. Mutrics want to build up a new IoT device for future.The first product focus on smart audio glasses started from Sep 2017 and launched at CES 2019. Totally already shipped almost 10k smart glasses worldwide. The Mutrics product already available on Amazon, Walmart.com and Bestbuy.com. Also the company has successfully achieved crowdfunding on Makuake Japan and ZecZec Taiwan in 2019, people are super love the product. Mutrics GB-30 Audio glass is our second generation product. Its striking design, open-ear audio and anti-blue light lenses combine to deliver gamers immersive personal sound experience as well as ear and eye comfort and protection during extensive gaming.

story:
Pandora Headphone the Headblower is a retractable, pocket-sized headphone that adds an additional “oomph” to your mobile device. However, it is a unique accessory as it is the only one with a built-in speaker. So not only will you kiss tangling cords goodbye, you will be able to enjoy perfect sounds whether privately or with friends.


What is Pandora Headphone?

Pandora Headphone the (Headblower) is the ultimately funky solution to tangled headphone cords. The ear buds easily retract into the pocket-friendly cute panda-shaped structure when not in use. However, that isn’t what makes Pandora Headphone  unique. The accessory also comes with a mini speaker system that streams high quality sound whenever you want to share your music and sounds with others. Plug it to your iPhone, iPod, iPad or any mobile device and rest assured of the perfect entertainment experience. You can even keep PandoraHeadphone (the Headblower) attached to your cellphone or tablet to gain glances of approval (or envy) for your stylish yet practical addition.
Note: 10% from the sale of each headphone will go to various charities around the world.


Our vision was to develop a headphone that was not only outstanding in sound and fashion, but to create a headphone that would allow consumers to enjoy music and convenience in more comfortable ways. We wanted to develop a headphone that would separate our company from the many other companies in the market today. To do so, we had to think outside of the box.


What will the funds be used for ?


Pandora Headphone ( the Headblower ) will be using the contribution from backers for manufacturing. Here is a basic list of the manufacturing process that your funds will help us achieve. 


1. PCB board manufacturing


2. Plastic mold injection and painting


3. Assembly of headphones


4. Quality testing


5. Packaging and shipping 


Why Pandora Headphone?

For starters, you will never waste a music-less minute fighting to untangle your headphone’s cords! In addition, our pending patent brings you the chance to share your sounds with those around you through a high quality speaker system that conveniently fits in your pocket. To make this deal even sweeter, Pandora Headphone  comes in an attractive package that will make everyone go “cool” or “aww”.

Specs

• Retractable Ear Buds

• Pocket-sized Panda Shaped Headphone Case

• Built-in Powerful Speaker

• Compatible with Leading Cellphone and Tablet Models

• Size: 2.5 inches in diameter

• Width: 1 inch thick

• Weight: 8 grams (approx.)

• Connector: Typical 2.5mm Gold Connector

 Speaker: 40mm

You may not forget your smartphone when you leave the house, but your headphones are another story. Even if you do tag them along, you’d be so busy untangling them that you’d reach your destination unrelaxed and hardly refreshed. However, both of these annoying scenarios can be a thing of the past with Pandora Headphone.

Pandora Headphone is a stylish set of headphones that comes in a compact, panda-shaped case. Just push the nose and pull the earbuds out for sounds that match the quality of expensive headphones at a fraction of their price. When you’re done, the headphones automatically retract into the panda-shaped case, so you don’t have to worry about suffering without your music. But that’s not all! Pandora headphone the (Head blower) can turn into a miniature speaker system with a surprisingly strong sound. The speakers located in the panda’s eyes allow you to share your music and movies with those around you.

The idea behind Pandora headphone is simple and logic... If you always gonna have your music, video or your favorite shows and movies why not have a great product along with you... A product that looks nice and very useful... You wanna share it with your friends no problem Pandora headphone got you .. Just switch it to speakers... You wanna keep it private what you hearing no problem.. Pandora Headphone got you... Switch it to earbuds...you don't like tangling cordes it bothers... No problem Pandora Headphone got you... You can retract your earbud... You don't wanna keep your headphone away from your cell phones no problem Pandora Headphone can sit on top of your cellphone or tablets as long as you want to.. Most case scenario our product makes your cellphone or tablets looks better and also can fit in your pocket or purse along with your cellphone...

So, what are you waiting for? Contribute in making Pandora Headphone ( the Headblower )a reality right away.


Estimated delivery: May 2014


We’re doing all we can to make Pandora headphone as awesome as possible. We would love to hear from our supporters about additional features they would like to see so we base our stretch goals on that feedback. What would you suggest for stretch goals? Leave us a comment!

About the Inventor

Living in Burlington, Massachusetts, Stanley Frederico is a  Boston-raised inventor, marketer and entrepreneur. A computer science alumnus from Mount Ida College, he worked as a music producer, which is what drove him to appreciate great headphones that offer high quality sound. In his pursuit for the perfect pair of headphones, Pandora Headphone were born.

Offering the same quality of world-renowned brands like Dr. Dre Beats, Bose and Sennheiser, Pandora Headphone is dedicated to music lovers and those who appreciate the best quality in everything. However, We have priced this unique headphones at an affordable price and we will donate 10% of each headphone sold to numerous charities around the world. 


Share our campaign!


It may seem like a small thing, but sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, etc, will allow us to see the response of our intended audience and hopefully get us closer to getting the project funded.


The more people know about it, the more feedback we get and the better Pandoraheadphone will be.


Indiegogo has some awesome tools that let us (and also you we think)  know how much your referrals have contributed to our campaign (Look in your Indiegogo account menu, under My Contribution -> My Impact)


These are registered every time you share our campaign using the share buttons on the campaign page underneath the video, while being logged in, and people use those links to come here and contribute. By sharing this way, everyone with an Indiegogo account gets perk credit for Pandoraheadphone worth 5% of your referrals' total contribution.


For instance: If your referrals have contributed 100 USD total you get 5 USD perk credit for Pandora headphone (that you can use when the campaign ends).


If your referrals contribute to our campaign 1000 USD total, you get  50 USD perk credit for Pandora Headphone and so on.

story:
Headphones that revolutionize the world of music.The world's first modular earphones. You no longer need to buy several pairs of headphones. Just take this set. You can create a handset in any colors. Headphones you can connect via a cable or bluetooth wireless technology.


Parameters:
• dynamic principle
• frequency response 8 Hz-35,000 Hz
• transducers 40 mm Titanium-Mylar
• Impedance 30 ohm
 • 96dB SPL
 • sound pressure 5.2 N

Idea:
We want to create a modular headphone. Now you can make your own headphone in the selected color package...Different color headband, another speaker and another cable... It's just your choice. Dead batteries can kill your vibe. Sounds Of Colour Headphone  comes with a built-in rechargeable battery that lasts 16 hours when using wirelessly and 24 hours when you do decide to plug in. 


Why we need a contribution:
We want to carry out professional tests. We also want to get a certificate of quality and safety. 


Technology:
Headphones made from high quality plastic, covered with a nice touch colored Velvet... 

Available colours:

  • BLACK
  • WHITE
  • BROWN
  • YELLOW
  • ORANGE
  • RED
  • PINK
  • GREEN
  • BLUE
  • PURPLE


Risk:
Huge market competition.

story:
Short Summary

  • Hello we are from Amplify and we live in a small town in Croatia called Zadar.
  • My idea started when I began seeing how stagnate portable music industry is. That's when I decided to reimagine the core function of bluetooth speakers.
  • With our device you will be able to get big sound in a small package.

Specification


Audio input:

  • Bluetooth v4.Stereo input various versions of the Bluetooth connection
  • Aux input 

Output impedance:

  • 8ω(best), 4/6/8/16ω impedance can drive speakers 
  • Output power: add pre-5532 output foot
  • powered 25V
  • 6ω impedance output 2x50w 
  • 8ω impedance output 2x40w dual-channel 
     

What it is & how it works

  • It is a portable amplifier that can potentially make any speaker portable. You just plug in your speaker and you are good to go.

How it works:

  • Do you know that big thing that sits under your desk? It's called an amp and we figured out a way to make it smaller...a lot smaller, while keeping it's power! Our product has an integrated battery so you can take it places you never imagined you would bring your amp to. It uses new technology that eliminates the need for a big amp. It takes the best of both worlds: The power and the quality of a home speaker and the portability of a bluetooth speaker but instead of costing 200$, like regular bluetooth speakers, you only pay 80$ for a much greater experience.  
  • Here are some pictures of a prototype:

 

         

Sidenote:

  • this prototype is made of aluminium and has wooden texture on top. That's how all amplify devices will be made except V.I.P. model which will be made of wood not aluminium      

Here are some sketches of the final product:

What We Need & What You Get

  • We already have a working prototype of our product. we just don't have enough money to start manufacturing it. You can see our prototype in the video below
  • So here are the distributions of funding:

Now the perks:

The Impact

  • It will make a huge difference in the portable music industry. Because to me its kinda silly to have two speakers, one portable, one not. With our device you have both devices in one
  • Believe me it's even more exciting once you try it. Even as a prototype I bring it everywhere I go! Once you try it you will start wondering how you spent all your life without it. It's so natural and it fits in any kind of lifestyle.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

 

Testing speaker with & without Amplify

Here is the video:

 

Video Of Working Prototype

This is our current prototype hooked up to a phone and a bookshelf speaker. As you can see the results are pretty amazing:

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have enough money to contribute or you already contributed, please share this campaign as much as you can, all across the digital spectrum using the IndieGoGo share tools.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
You have asked - you get it...

As the campaign has successfully ended, you can now order the Nixielyzer direct from
www.Nixiekits.eu
 


 

And so here it is: The IN-9 Nixielyzer reloaded

The IN-9 Nixielyzer reloaded is offered as a ready assembled plug-and-play device and only on request a fully DIY kit might be available.
And the Nixielyzer is designed, developed and handcrafed in Germany !
 


 

What is the IN-9 Nixielyzer ?

The IN-9 Nixielyzer is an analog audio spectrum analyzer, based around an analog bandpass filter set. It offers the display of six selective audio bands: 63 Hz, 150 Hz, 330 Hz, 1 kHz, 3.3 kHz and 10 kHz.

As an extra feature, you can mix the signal of a build in microphone to the display, to use the IN-9 Nixielyzer as a  stand-alone device when no audio source is connected.

The IN-9 Nixielyzer operates with six IN-9 Nixie Bargraph tubess and has two RCA stereo in- and outputs (for easy daisy chaining the device within an existing audio path) and also two 1/8" TRS jacks for simple connecting your MP3 player, mobile phone plus headphone for listening etc.

Both signals (RCA and 1/8" TRS are only internal mixed via an electronic zero ohms node and do not affect each other.
 


The IN-9 Nixielyzer uses no digital signal processor or FFT (Fast Fourier Transformation) or any other digital circuities within the audio path; so the display is stepless and fully in realtime. Furthermore a modified dbx compandor ciruity was included to enhance the dislayed dynamic range.
 

Silvery or coppery or black enclosure ?

You'll be asked for your "personal" colour when commissioning your order.



What is an audio spectrum analyzer ?

You surely know a VU meter, which shows the level of an audio signal, often build with LEDs on the DIY market. 

The IN-9 Nixielyzer now separates this audio signal into six selective bands and show their special audio level within this frequency range:

  • 63 Hz = Low Bass (e.g. Bassdrum)
  • 150 Hz = Mid Bass (e.g. Bassguitar)
  • 330 Hz = Low Mid (near concert pitch of the most musican instruments)
  • 1 kHz = Mid of voice frequency (e.g. the "beep" sound for indecent words in interviews)
  • 3.3 kHz = Presence (e.g. "sch" in the word Schedule or the imitated sound of a steam locomotive)
  • 10 kHz = Heights (e.g. "sssss")


LED spectrum analyzer DIY kit found on the internet


And as an absolute unique feature, the IN-9 Nixielyzer displays the level not on "ordinary" LED display or VFD display or on a computer screen or even in an App of your mobile phone but on six IN-9 Nixie Bargraph tubes made in the end of the 80's in USSR as a surplus.



Features

  • 15 VDC power supply included with mains adaptor (if necessary)
  • Very low self generated heat
  • Only 2 VA idle power needed
  • Can be powered on continously without any issues
  • Stereo RCA in- and outputs for easy daisy chaining in an existing audio path.
  • Two 1/4 TRS stereo inputs as an alternative for MP3 player, mobile phone, headphone etc.
  • Selectable audio channel (right / both / left) for display.
  • Build-in microphone signal can be mixed.
  • 63 Hz, 150 Hz, 330 Hz, 1 kHz, 3.3 kHz and 10 kHz audio spectrum level are displayed.
  • Very long lifespan of the Nixie tubes (10++ years)

 

Argon or Neon filled tubes ?
 

You'll be asked for your favourite tube when commissioning your order.

Oh, what are "Nixie tubes" ?

The word "Nixie" was formed from the words Numeric Indicator eXerimental No. 1  and first introduced 1954 by Burroughs Corporation from USA as a brand name for numeric displays. Nixie tubes were used until the mid of the 1970's as displays in measuring devices, calculators, TV sets and the very first computers. The evolution of modern style display types like Numitron, VFD, LED and LCD, which have a very low supply voltage (battery power supply) eliminated these Nixie tubes from the market, and they are not produced anymore. In the former USSR Nixie tubes were produced as surplus in vast quantities until the beginning of the 90's –  and from this sources are these tubes.  But even these supplies are soon running short. And when they're gone, they're gone. The tubes are taken from "NOS", what means New Old Stock. They were never used before and spent their first thirty or more years forgotten in some warehouse. The principle of the Nixie tubes is based on a "cold cathode discharge" and it is used today a million times e.g. in small neon bulbs of illuminated mains power switches.

A simple russian IN-9 mains voltage meter, found on Ebay

The IN-9 Bargraph tubes in the IN-9 Nixielyzer are a specialized construction of such a neon bulb, it can produce a current depending variable glow hight lenght when a current regulated voltage of around 140 V is applied, and it was used in the USSR for example as a simple device to monitor the mains voltage range.
 

DIY kit for the electronic specialists...

When you have good electronic and soldering skills you can also order a DIY kit version.

330 Hz = Low Mid (near concert pitch of the most musican instruments)
1 kHz = Mid of voice frequency (e.g. the "beep" sound for indecent words in interviews)
3.3 kHz = Presence (e.g. "sch" in the word Schedule or the imitated sound of a steam locomotive)
10 kHz = Heights (e.g. "sssss")

LED spectrum analyzer DIY kit found on the internet
And as an absolute unique feature, the IN-9 Nixielyzer displays the level not on "ordinary" LED display or VFD display or on a computer screen or even in an App of your mobile phone but on six IN-9 Nixie Bargraph tubes made in the end of the 80's in USSR as a surplus.

Features

15 VDC power supply included with mains adaptor (if necessary)
Very low self generated heat
Only 2 VA idle power needed
Can be powered on continously without any issues
Stereo RCA in- and outputs for easy daisy chaining in an existing audio path.
Two 1/4 TRS stereo inputs as an alternative for MP3 player, mobile phone, headphone etc.
Selectable audio channel (right / both / left) for display.
Build-in microphone signal can be mixed.
63 Hz, 150 Hz, 330 Hz, 1 kHz, 3.3 kHz and 10 kHz audio spectrum level are displayed.
Very long lifespan of the Nixie tubes (10++ years)

 
Argon or Neon filled tubes ? 

You'll be asked for your favourite tube when commissioning your order.
Oh, what are "Nixie tubes" ?
The word "Nixie" was formed from the words Numeric Indicator eXerimental No. 1  and first introduced 1954 by Burroughs Corporation from USA as a brand name for numeric displays. Nixie tubes were used until the mid of the 1970's as displays in measuring devices, calculators, TV sets and the very first computers. The evolution of modern style display types like Numitron, VFD, LED and LCD, which have a very low supply voltage (battery power supply) eliminated these Nixie tubes from the market, and they are not produced anymore. In the former USSR Nixie tubes were produced as surplus in vast quantities until the beginning of the 90's –  and from this sources are these tubes.  But even these supplies are soon running short. And when they're gone, they're gone. The tubes are taken from "NOS", what means New Old Stock. They were never used before and spent their first thirty or more years forgotten in some warehouse. The principle of the Nixie tubes is based on a "cold cathode discharge" and it is used today a million times e.g. in small neon bulbs of illuminated mains power switches.

A simple russian IN-9 mains voltage meter, found on Ebay
The IN-9 Bargraph tubes in the IN-9 Nixielyzer are a specialized construction of such a neon bulb, it can produce a current depending variable glow hight lenght when a current regulated voltage of around 140 V is applied, and it was used in the USSR for example as a simple device to monitor the mains voltage range. 
DIY kit for the electronic specialists...

When you have good electronic and soldering skills you can also order a DIY kit version.

story:
Campaign Summary

Linux in the Ham Shack is a podcast, a state of mind and a phenomenon. Originally begun in 2008 to help amateur radio fans and everyday computer users move from proprietary computer operating systems and applications to Linux and Free Software, the show has broadened its scope.  Through a bi-weekly audio podcast, live streaming Internet radio show, community event sponsorship and general outreach, Linux in the Ham Shack (LHS) exposes users to Free Software, and amateur radio to everyone.

Since 2010, our co-hosts have received donations from listeners in order to purchase booth space at the Dayton Hamvention.  Hamvention attracts more than 25,000 people, so it is the perfect place to provide our community outreach.  The co-hosts give out free advice and technical support to convention goers, free informational materials about Free and Open Source Software, ham radio software and Linux, and free DVD copies of Linux distributions.  All expenses other than the booth rental have been covered out-of-pocket by the hosts of the program.

What We Need & What You Get

We hope to continue our tradition of outreach by providing these benefits at no charge to attendees of Hamvention, but the current economic climate does not allow us to foot the bill personally anymore.  However, with crowdfunding, we could provide even more benefit to the community than ever before.  With a successful fund-raising campaign, we could:

  • Provide more comprehensive informational and instructional materials for attendees to take with them when they leave the show.
  • Provide everyone who visits our booth with a free copy of Linux on USB stick (see below).
  • Give back directly to the community with future donations to worthy projects like the GNU Software Foundation and Accessible Computing Foundation.

We need $1,100 to fully fund our venture to Hamvention in 2014.  This will cover all expenses, including the booth rental and all travel costs.  Any donations received beyond the initial $1,100 will be used for educational materials and for the media and time to create free copies of Linux to give away.  If we achieve $2,000 in funding, we will give a USB drive with Linux to all Hamvention attendees who visit our booth (up to 250).

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that in times like these some people simply can’t contribute monetarily, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!

Getting the word out to your friends and families is one of the best ways to make sure that our campaign is funded successfully.  Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools and your own social media subscriptions to let everyone know about our fund-raising effort.  The more people who hear about us, the more likely it is that we'll achieve our goal.  Thank you for taking the time to look at our campaign, and we hope to see everyone at the Dayton Hamvention in 2014!

story:
Introducing Plugfones Liberate

Patent Pending

Noise-isolating earbuds are far from novel, but the Plugfones Liberate flips a common equation on its proverbial ear: we’ve engineered a product that’s earplug first, earbud second. Building on what we’ve learned for the past 6 years producing WIRED Plugfones, we’ve SEVERED the cable with Plugfones Liberate.

These Bluetooth 4.0 earplugs offer the same top-notch aural quality as our wired Plugfones, but without the hassle of a 3.5mm connector.

Each Liberate headset has a Bluetooth 4.0 antenna, a fully sweatproof design, a noise-reducing inline microphone for voice calls, ruggedized play/pause, volume up, and volume down buttons, song progression buttons, and a water resistant USB charging connector. You can expect the battery to last 8 hours on a full charge, enabling you to easily get through extended shifts without having to source power.

Get Your Project Funded Today!

 Specifications

  • Bluetooth 4.0 
  • Compatible with all Bluetooth enabled devices 
  • 8 hour battery life 
  • Available in two colors: Yellow /Dark Blue* (Long Model) or Black/Grey (Short Model) You will pick your color option after the campaign ends. $99 MSRP
  • 18-inches from earplug tip to earplug tip (Long Model), 14-inches from earplug tip to earplug tip (Short Model)
  • 7.5-inches from earplug tip to the case (Long Model), 5.5 inches from earplug tip to case (Short Model)
  • 4.5 ounces (total weight with earplugs installed) 
  • Noise Reduction Mic, placed on the right side lead 
  • Inline Remote: center button is a universal button for Power On/Off, Bluetooth Sync, Play/Pause, Answer/End Call 
  • Left and right buttons are Volume Control (short press), Song Progression (long press) 
  • Sweat and water resistant
  • *Yellow/Dark Blue (Long Model) Does not come with a mic

Two Models Available

Yellow Model for music only.

Black Model for music and calls.

Our roots

Plugfones were initially dreamed up after Shaun, our co-founder, found himself too preoccupied with his own thoughts while working tirelessly in a glass factory. After searching in futility for a set of earplugs that would also play music, he began scraping together funds to assemble prototypes in his garage. By testing them himself and on colleagues, he made the requisite changes to produce a product that perfectly straddled the line between earplug and earphone.

We’ve been doing this for nearly six years, and count the likes of Goodyear, La-Z-Boy Manufacturing, and Tyson Foods as customers.

Changing the mold

Conventional earbuds, even those designed to cancel noise and costing hundreds of dollars, aren’t comfortable for all-day use. Plugfones were engineered as earplugs first, which means that your ears won’t fatigue after wearing these on a 12 hour shift or while shooting your AR-15.

Even if you aren’t working in the field or in a factory, having a set of earplugs makes everyday scenarios far more tolerable: riding the subway, sleeping alongside a snoring partner, maintaining focus in the gym, mowing the lawn, or keeping outside distractions at bay while gaming. Or, for the crazy ones, skydiving!

The issue, of course, is that typical earplugs are boring. Really boring. Plugfones Liberate enables you to enjoy the spoils of an earplug without going insane. While your ears are being protected, you’ll be treated to top-notch aural excitement. Beyond streaming music, you’ll also be able to take incoming calls without having to expose your ears to unsafe levels of loudness even for a moment.

Certification process

The Liberate, just like our existing wired Plugfones, have been tested by a Nationally Recognized Testing Laboratory (NRTL). A third-party firm, Michael & Associates, Inc., was employed to rigorously test our products according to U.S., E.U., and Australian standards. Our new Liberate headset received an ANSI certified NRR (Noise Reduction Rating) of 26.

As you’d expect, we’re big advocates of protecting your hearing. It’s an element of our lives that we often take for granted, and it’s difficult to recognize small but meaningful diminishment to how acutely we’re able to hear. 

If you commute daily on a subway, are exposed to loud machinery, or routinely find yourself in noisy environments, it’s not enough to simply drown out the external world with loud music. Liberate works to reduce your ear’s exposure to loudness, enabling you to enjoy music at lower volumes while protecting one of the most important senses you have: the ability to hear.

Plugfones in the Media

"I was able to head out onto the busy CES show floor and hear nothing except for the sweet sounds of U2." - Reviewed

“I could have used a pair of these when I lived in the Lower East Side of Manhattan and drunken NYU students were screaming at each other at 3 in the morning.” -David Goldman, CNN Money

Technically Speaking

Because Liberate is designed to be worn for extended periods of time, we’ve designed the earplug tips to be user-replaceable. We recommend silicon tips be swapped out every four weeks, and foam tips every one to two weeks. We toss in four total sets of tips (two silicon and two foam sets) with each Liberate. Replacement sets in quantities of ten are available on our website for $7.99.

Seating a Plugfone in one’s ear canal is fundamentally different than seating a conventional earbud. If you’re an avid earbud wearer, remember to seat the Plugfone Liberate more deeply than you normally would -- it’s an earplug, after all! 

We generally recommend to seat the Liberate without music already playing. Once you seal out external noise, then turn on your music. If you can hear the low-end resonate, you’ve successfully seated your Liberate!

Design

Designing a product like the Liberate requires months of planning, tooling, re-tooling, and if we're honest, another round of re-tooling. We're big fans of exploring prototypes and getting behind the scenes tours of our favorite gadgets, so we wanted to share a few initial drafts, drawings, and renditions that we generated en route to a finalized product.

 Plugfones Timeline

Thank you!

-The Plugfones Team

Share with Your Friends!

www.facebook.com/Plugfones

www.twitter.com/Plugfones

www.instagram.com/Plugfones

Notes

We’re eager to get Plugfones Liberate into as many ears as possible, but shipping outside of the United States and Canada may bring additional duties, taxes, or fees to the user. Backers ordering for shipment outside of these countries will be responsible for paying those fees. In the event that we cannot ship to a certain country, your pledge will be fully refunded.

Risks and challenges

We’ve been doing this product manufacturing thing for a long while, and we’re well-versed in how it all operates. Since 2009, we’ve manufactured wired versions of Plugfones and have shipped them all over the globe. We have a full-time employee that lives in Hong Kong, speaks fluent Mandarin, and works one-on-one with our partners to make sure every granular aspect of our products match our standards before they’re shipped out.

We showcased a near-final Plugfones Liberate unit at CES 2016 and received positive feedback from the likes of CNNMoney and Reviewed. We are finalizing the Liberate right now, and will have units out to our initial backers in June 2016.

We’re beyond thrilled to cut the cord on Plugfones and bring this product to a sector that’s producing a staggering amount of innovation year in and year out. We can’t wait to see the Liberate in use all over the globe!

Thanks so very much, 
Shaun, Tyler, James and the entire Plugfones Team

story:
It looks like a regular case, but it has two crazy speakers tucked behind the iPad. Through acoustic channels, the sound travels to front, delivering stereo HD sound 3x louder than iPad does.


Ampple was created to ensure that harmony between what you see and what you hear on your iPad. With Ampple you will have access to killer sound and iPad protection, built right in your iPad case.


Ampplify Your iPad



The core of our team is comprised of an entrepreneur, a tech guy and a highly skilled designer. We have the perfect team.



Ampplify Your iPad



What versions of iPad does it work with?
It currently works with  iPad 2, 3 & 4, iPad Air and iPad Air 2, iPad Mini and iPad Mini 2, 3, 4, and the iPad 9.7-inch Pro.

Is there a version that it doesn't work with?
Currently, it is not compatible with the Original iPad and 12.9 inch iPad Pro.

How much louder does Ampple make my iPad?

Up to 3x times louder, with HD stereo sound.

In what frequency range does Ampple work?

Ampple delivers non-distorted and rich sound from 200Hz – 20kHz

How long the battery of Ampple will last?

This will heavily depend on the loudness level, but Ampple is made to last for at least 10 hours at an average movie watching volume.

How does Ampple protect the iPad?

Ampple is made of durable industrial plastic that encases your iPad to protect it from external shocks.

Is Ampple water/splash proof?

No.

Will Ampple be able to re-charge my iPad?

Ampple doesn’t charge your iPad, and is itself charged separately.

What is CONEQ?

It’s a powerful sound correction algorithm. CONEQ is pro-grade signal-processing filter that undistorts sound over the whole audible range.

Does it cover up any buttons or the camera of the iPad?

No, Ampple was painstakingly designed to work in harmony with the iPad.

What are the Ampple dimensions?

Ampple is 254mm (10 in) X 177.47mm (7in) X 18mm (~11/16 in). It adds only 12mm (~1/2 in) to the thickness of your iPad.

How much does the Ampple weigh?

Ampple weighs under 1 lb - slightly less than the iPad itself.

Is Ampple available for iPhone?

Not yet, but we're working on it.

When should I inform you of my color preference?

After the campaign, we will be in touch with all contributors to confirm their color selections, as well as choice of Ampple model size.

How do I get the limited edition Indiegogo pink color?
All perks are available in the standard three colors (mint, inferno, night), however, if you would like to get your hands on the limited edition "magenta" Indiegogo color, you will need to  to purchase the perk "Ampple Indiegogo Edition". This color will only be available during the Indiegogo campaign.

Does the cost of the perk cover taxes and tariffs?

No, the perk cost only covers the cost of the item itself. Shipping is separate and is added during checkout. The buyer is responsible for any additional taxes or tariffs imposed.

Why Ampple has selected flexible funding plan?

When compared to fixed funding, flexible funding option allows wider payment method selection for our backers. We want to make your backing experience as flawless as possible and assure you that we will treat the funding goal as a binding promise for funding, as it would be a fixed plan.

How do I get in touch with Ampple team?

You can message us here or email us at ampple@ampple.com 

How do I upgrade my perk?

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?

Email support@indiegogo.com.

I would like a refund. How do I do this?

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

Does the cost of the perk cover taxes and tariffs?
No, the perk cost only covers the cost of the item itself. Shipping is separate and is added during checkout. The buyer is responsible for any additional taxes or tariffs imposed.
Why Ampple has selected flexible funding plan?
When compared to fixed funding, flexible funding option allows wider payment method selection for our backers. We want to make your backing experience as flawless as possible and assure you that we will treat the funding goal as a binding promise for funding, as it would be a fixed plan.
How do I get in touch with Ampple team?
You can message us here or email us at ampple@ampple.com 
How do I upgrade my perk?
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...
I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?
Email support@indiegogo.com.
I would like a refund. How do I do this?
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

story:
What? Why no black AirPods, you say? PaMu Slide is not another so called AirPods alternatives, it is AirPods Killer!!! PaMu Slide is upgraded AirPods 2 with better sounds and longer battery life.

Yes! PaMu, the legend of Indiegogo, is back-upgrade with new features! With $4 Million+ raised and 80,000+ backers recommended, PaMu Slide perfect the sound quality, battery life, signal stability, comfort level and everything you're looking for. It will redefine what Bluetooth earphone should be. There has never been a better time to upgrade your listening gears! 

Are you ready to rock again?

Psst... if you are reading this, you may still have a shot at the super discount up to 70% off. Limited offer!

Check it out at

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pamu-slide-b...

 

 

 

 

 

INTRODUCING PAMU

PaMu is the closest thing to what people have always wanted in a sports earphone – a pair of lightweight and compact earbuds that stay connected, stay in, and sound amazing. You can call it a technology-packed solution!

 

 

Exclusively marketing with Meltpartners

Contact: hugheshou@meltpartners.com

 

Backers' Thoughts

Our campaign is not normal campaign, we are continuously shipping out PaMu earphones even our campaign is not end. Your positive and encourage comments are our best motivation!

Major Medias Give PaMu Thumb Up

Read the full article on 9 to 5 toys

Read the full review article on Digital Trends

Read the full review article on ChipChick

MajorHiFi, a professional earphone and headphone review site, just featured PaMu earphones due to our powerful functions and great price! Check the article out.

PaMu at Shows

PaMu is exhibited on HK Global resource electronic shows (April 11 ~ April 14, 2018), many backers just visit us and try PaMu earphones!

PaMu is not only a prototype, it is ready for mass production. And people just love it at CES 2018! 

PaMu wins the "INNOVATIVE PRODUCT 2018" award

PaMu won Indiegogo's prestigious Innovative Product 2018 award after it was tested and evaluated by Indiegogo engineers.

Fitness Guru and Audio Expert Reviews

Senior audio gear reviewer, fitness guru, Zoe Hawkins gave PaMu thumb up, check out the full review article

Reviewed and tested by Winsor Dobbin, a senior journalist with over 30 years experience on gadgets, sports. travel and wines. click here to read full review article

Grant from Sunshine Coast Daily worked with fitness guru Amanda, tested PaMu and give PaMu thumb up, check the full review article

Reviewed and Tested by Mybeerbuzz, click here to read full review article

Reviewed and Tested by Impulsegamer, click here to read full review article

Reviewed and Tested by Yorkshire Evening Post, click here to read full review article

Reviewed and tested by Cairns Outdoor, click here to read full review article

 

AVAILABLE COLORS

CORE TEAM

Our product engineers have more than 10 years developing Bluetooth hardware, and have worked in Qualcomm as a product development manager. Our audio tuner has more than 20 years in tuning experience. He is a master tuner and tunes audio devices and entertainment venues, with experience in quality testing and debugging. Our design team has won many awards and has provided many headphone designs for big buyers like Brookstone.

 

 

FAQ

1) Why is the Super Early Bird so cheap? It is too good to be true. What discounts can be expected after the Super Early Bird?

First of all, please trust the quality of PaMu. Our team, Padmate, has worked in the audio industry for more than 17 years! We develop and fabricate for major brands including Monster, Intel, Huawei, and Xiaomi. Padmate has top tier engineers to develop these innovative audio products for you! We also own the best factories in the audio industry all over the world! We have done a lot of OEM and ODM programs, but now we want to go directly to our customers because we have the dream of developing the best audio devices for all of our customers.  This is why we can and want to offer an amazingly low price for our early bird perks.  We cannot cover the cost at this low price, but it will be super good to do our branding and benefit our first batch fans. Of course, these discounts are so big that we can only offer limited quantities at this price. Once the cost reaches the budget, the early bird discount will be gone. The Super Early Bird perk is the best discount you will get – back the PaMu now before it sells out!

2) When is the expected delivery?

We planed to start shipping in March, however, Pamu is much more popular than we expected. We are already in the process of production, and the expected shipping time will be in early April. We will ship in batches.

3）What’s the IP rating of these earphones? Can I take a shower with your earbuds?

By using a water-repellent sealing design, we keep the inside dry and fully functional. These earbuds aren’t afraid of sweat or rain or a shower. Here is the PaMu water proof testing video

Test conditions: Water flow rate 10L/minutes, last for 30 minutes. The distance between PaMu earphones and stream nozzle is 0.5 meter. Normal IP 5 condition is 5 minutes, we tested it for 30 minutes, they works well. So, you can definitely wear PaMu to take a shower.

PaMu earphones are more than IP 5, but our team usually make conservative statements. PaMu will definitely bring a lot of more surprises to you!!!

4) Are there plans for more colors to be offered?

We plan to designing more colors for our PaMu fans to choose from in our future products. Now we have only two colors available.

5) What version Bluetooth does PaMu use?

PaMu uses Bluetooth 4.2 because there are far less devices that can connect to Bluetooth 5.0. We are considering Bluetooth 5.0 in our next product.

6) What is the warranty policy if I receive a defective set?

We value our users, and we blieve in our products. If there is a problem due to manufacturer's defect, we will replace your PaMu.

7) How do I get my Order ID?

You can find your Order ID by logging into your Indiegogo account and clicking on ‘My Contribution’.

8) Why does it take 2 hours to charge the battery case？

Two hours is the maximum charging time with lower current chargers, such as charging from your PC's USB port.  Most of the time, you will need less than 2 hours to get both the earbuds and the charging case fully charged.

9) What type of antenna do you use?

We use LDS, and we chose the only mobile device that uses typical vmlinux. Although the cost of the LDS antenna is higher, it is of better quality, performance, and stability for the Bluetooth connection.

10) Can you hear calls through both earpieces, and can one be used at a time while the other can charge?

When you answer a phone call, only one earbud will hear the phone. The two earbuds can be used separately only when each earbud is far away from each other.  If the two earbuds are within range of each other, they will automatically pair.

11) How can I change the color from white to black？

Indiegogo does not allow you to change the selected color - please email us with your Order ID and colour choice and we will update the color for your order.

12）What’s the IP rating of these earphones? Can I go swimming with your earbuds?

By using a water-repellent design, we're able to keep the inside dry and fully functional. Pamu is IP 5. These earbuds aren’t afraid of sweat or rain! But it can’t be submerged in water for a long time.  So, this means it can’t be used during swimming.  We will design a new generation of earbuds that can be worn while swimming in the future.

13）What’s the PaMu’s advantage of bass effect compared to other earphones？

Our 10mm dynamic audio driver is Biodiaphram cell. It is designed to deliver sound of balanced deep low bass without saricficing the mids and the highs. So PaMu has a special technique for bass effect.

14）How does the noisy cancellation work? Is there a switch?

Our NC means Passive noise reduction, not Active NC.Our earplugs are patented in-ear design, not only can block noise but also comfortable.

15) Does PaMu can  reach the decode  level of APTX?

Our earphones can reach the decoding level of SBC and AAC. At present, the rf signal of the APTX decoding scheme in the market is not stable now, so we need to balance the stability of rf signal and the clear effect of audio decoding. PaMu will give fans a great sound experience.

16) Bluetooth 4.2 TWS earbuds usually have dropout issues when there are a lot of interference (other 2.4Ghz devices broadcasting/sending/receiving). How will you avoid this issue with BT 4.2 used to communicate between the 2 earbuds? 

2.4GHz is vulnerable to be interfered in an environment of intense human interference, and our RF engineers are aware of this and have tested it accordingly. After a lot of actual testing and improvement .Now compared with SONY\ APPLE and other brand headphones, PADMATE in the TWS peer RF interference ability is among the leading.

17) Does it have charging cables and other appendix?

This item included one pair PaMu earbuds with a charging case and one charging cable, an instructions book and 3 pair ear-tips of S, M, L size.Thanks!

18) Does your  products have sound delay?

We use the latest technology and pass multiple tests to solve the problem of bluetooth connection delay. In normal useing, there will be almost no bluetooth delay or broken line.

story:
Here at VOZA, we trust quality and innovations more than just branding.  We know that music is an essential part to many, but not many have got what they paid for. 

VOZA is the creation of a group of music enthusiasts made up of sound engineers,  physicists, and audio aficionados who shared a common belief that true lossless music should be heard by everyone and that cost should never be a determining factor.

Knowing that the IoT smart living is just around the corner, we take one step further and create seamless lifestyle, attaching great quality music to Smart IoT Living.  Music is life, and at VOZA we simply make life better!

The center idea of creating the AD510 is to elevate your music listening experience by keeping what you have on-hands without you spending extras.  Moreover, we are bringing more fun and smart living applications through Amazon Alexa AVS, in which we've worked with the Amazon AVS Lab over the past 6 months, to your everyday life. 

 

 

We love music and to many of us an iPhone Earpods is satisfying enough - We are sorry to inform you that we will be changing the way you listen to music simply by offering you somethings that other audio makers couldn't in this smaller than palm-size IoT Dongle.

  • Auto-enhance all your music to 192K Hi-Res quality
  • a Built-in 56mW amplifier dedicated in driving high impedance headphones
  • Amazon Alexa AVS built-in that turns all your audio wears to Smart IoT Devices
  • Convert all your audio wears into Wireless Bluetooth Connecting-able!
  • Professionally tuned Sound EQ:  Music, Gaming, Movie sound scenario    

ALL of these great features and more in Palm-size, and under 18.5g in weight!  

(*Notes:  The AD510 Alexa AVS Enabled Dongle is the result from our engineering team working directly with the Amazon AVS lab over the past 6 months.  It is an ALL NEW creation under different product category from our audio amplifier, the VOZA BD210 on Amazon.com.  This means that no one else is making them, and there is nothing like this in the current market except from us!) 

 

THE World's 1st Amazon Alexa Music Amplifier

On-the-Go

 

 

Pair Your Audio Gears with Amazon Alexa and
Enjoy Around-the-Clock Assistant, EASY!

 

Once you step out the front door of your house, you disconnect from your favorite  Alexa Echo or Echo dot.  With the VOZA AD510, stay connected with the Amazon Alexa service with one simple click.  Even better, the VOZA AD510 turns your car audio, headphones, earphones, and audio system to wireless and Alexa-ready!

 

 

Not Just “In-Home Convenience”, but

“Anywhere-Convenience.”

The Amazon’s Alexa-controlled Echo speakers are great products.  It makes sure that we get one step closer to living the smart-home environment. The VOZA AD510 Alexa built-in wireless amplifier take it one level up offering both indoor and outdoor convenience accessing the Amazon Alexa service.

 

 

 

Not Just Home-Smart.  Everywhere-Smart.  

 

 

3-Easy-Steps to be Alexa-Ready

 

  • Step 1. Search and Download VOZA Alexa app on your smart phone
  • Step 2. Login to your Amazon account
  • Step 3. Connect your smart phone with the VOZA AD510
  • Now Amazon Alexa’s got your back!

 

 

The Amazon Alexa Has Never been so Clear Before

 

Music is daily-life-essential to us.  This is why we combine our audiophile-grade sound technology with the Amazon Alexa service.

 

 

Experience the World’s 1st Smart 
+
 Hi-Res Stereo System

 

  • Voice Command and Access your favorite stream Music, Amazon Music, or Radio stations. 
  • Turn all your audio system Amazon Alexa enabled in Wireless Mode.
  • Revitalize your outdated audio system in receiving Hi-Res quality music. 
  • Doesn’t matter the audio source, All music enhanced to 192K Hi-Res quality. 

 

 

18.5g in weight, Huge in Performance 

 

 

  • Hi-Res Wireless Music Anywhere You Go!
  • 56mW Power Output Sufficient to Drive Your Stereo System
  • Turn All Input Audio to Hi-Res 192K Quality​    

With the 56mW audio output power, the VOZA Alexa Built-in AD510 ensures that you'll have enough juice to drive the high impedance headphones as well as your home stereo system.

Have you ever wonder why the headphones you’ve invested a tons did not sound as good as they promised?

In order to increase phone time, mobile phone is constrained to have audio output limit to only 15mW.  With the 56mW output power the VOZA AD510 bring out the best performance and sound clarity of your outdated headphones. 

 

 

Does Hi-Res Audio Matter?

 

 

 

VOZA Audio Engine 
All Audio Input Free Upgrade to Hi-Res 192K

- Hear More Details -

 

 

With the VOZA sound processing technology, any input audio source will turn into true 
Hi-Res quality, wired and wireless! The VOZA VAE audio enhance engine automatically 
upgrades the input audio signal to 192K / 24bit Hi-Res quality. Experience Hi-Res quality 
music straight from your MP3 folders or from your favorite stream music service provider.
No more Hi-Res file converting work and never spend extra on purchasing  those Hi-Res 
music on-line.  

 

Sample Set-Up

2 hours charging = 12 hours of Play-time.

 

 

Product Specifications

Product Data Sheet

 

 

V.S. B Brand QC Series II(AMA)

 

 

 

Products Descriptions

The VOZA AD510 is available in two configuration models:  the AD510-A1 & the AD510-P1.

Both of the models are with the following two major technology and principle in product design,  1) Wireless Bluetooth for DATA, MUSIC, VOICE, and MESSAGE Transfer in between Master Transmitted and Slave Received, and 2) Audio signal processing & Digital Analog Conversion & Headphone Amplifier.

 

  • Design Principle for the AD510-A1: 

The reason we use the AIROHA 1526P (merged by MediaTek company) Bluetooth IC Chip is mainly for its less power consumption at 10mA-12mA running time with the most optimized digital audio I2S output quality for 192K sampling rate with 24-bit  Hi-data rate.  The specification as BT decoding capability was quite standard as many other makers, but the digital audio output for 192K sound quality for Hi-Res audio are very promising to reach the HIGHEST audio quality with best performance DAC.  Since we offer only the best solutions without any second thoughts we go for the best DAC available in the market, the ESS 9118C with its 384K/32bit  DAC from the world #1 BEST DAC maker. (ESS USA company)  When backward compatible to 192K /24 bit signal the result is:  Even better audio SNDB than 384K audio we consider this solution the perfect match to pari with Hi-Res Audio. 

We believe that when pairing with the AD510-A1 Alexa AVS Enabled Hi-Res Amplifier, with its superior DAC, amplifier, and audio components, it overpowers any of the high-end wireless BT headphones, earphones, car audio, home stereo and more.

Try and witness how this World's 1st Alexa AVS Enabled Hi-Res amplifier can change the quality of your music listening experience instantly by pairing with our Hi-Res ADD-ON Items:  The VOZA Headphones SuperSet (V100S+V90MW-40D) package, or the Hi-Res Special Edition Boom Box.

REF : DESIGN Block diagram & design schematic 

  • Design Principle for the AD510-P1 : 

The AD510-P1 is built-in with the industry leading Wireless Bluetooth IC chip, the CSR8675 aptX HD. (Qualcomm, USA company)  As the best Wireless BT solution today, the CSR8675 aptx HD provides high quality digital audio for  192K / I2S output and USB Digital audio streaming decode.  The CSR8675 aptX HD is widely recognize for its top performance on wireless Bluetooth technology, at the same time fulfilling all the industrial protocol and decode of capabilities.  One of the unique features of the aptX HD includes the High Bit rate Bluetooth transfer pattern (owned by QUALCOMM) in which this specification will built-in Qualcomm next generation smartphone IC chip.  The AD510-P1 is adapted to this advanced technology by working with the world biggest #1 smartphone IC chip maker.

AD510-P1 :  Best for Gaming audio device through USB audio input from PC, Notebook, OTG enabled smartphonesNotebook, or OTG enabled smartphone for the best gaming sound experience.

The CSR 8675 aptx HD chip provides USB audio interface to PC, Mobile phones, Notebook and supports the PCM data and DSD streaming data.

Besides of offering Hi-Res clarity sound in Gaming audio and supporting digital streaming audio, the USB audio also provides low latency audio signal comparing to the Bluetooth or analog signal.  The low latency factor is critical and is mandatory to most of the professional gaming players when it comes to gaming audio it was most care factor  by Gaming player required .

 

AD510-P1:  The World First and No.1  Wireless BT Alexa AVS Hi-Res Dongle with MUSIC - GAMING - MOVIE 

To make the best out of your Hi-Res Audio devices we take no compromise and use only the top performance DAC - the ADI 1672 audio chip to satisfy the various applications we put into the AD510-P1.   

With the highly integrated functions and its full audio process algorithm, the VAE engine of the VOZA AD510-P1 is built with its own software and logical to fulfill most DSP (Digtal signal processing ) with DAC control and headphones amplifier power system.

In plain words there has not been any products that come even close to the VOZA AD510-P1 in which the AD510-P1 uses only industry leading audio components, combines IoT A.I. Alexa AVS with Hi-Res Audio,  provides professional sound stage tuning - Music /Gaming/Movie EQ, adapts to gaming audio in providing immersive 3D and  low latency audio experience, and of course with powerful built-in 56mW amplifier!

 

   

Upgrade your music experience or gaming experience to Hi-Res quality sooner rather than later, and get one step ahead than others to the real IoT world with the VOZA AD510 Alexa AVS Enabled, Hi-Res Audio Amplifier.

Try and witness how this World's 1st Alexa AVS Enabled Hi-Res amplifier can change the quality of your music listening experience instantly by pairing with our Hi-Res ADD-ON Items:  The VOZA Headphones SuperSet (V100S+V90MW-40D) package, or the Hi-Res Special Edition Boom Box.

 

 

YOUR AWARD at a glance

 

 

 

Products Technology

 

 

 

Development Status

 

 

 

 

Major Components:  Batteries 300mA (Tooling Done)

 

Major Components:  Front / Rear Covers (Tooling Done)

 

Major Components:  Key Pads

Major Components:  Holders (Tooling Done)

 

PCB Protection EVA (Tooling Done)

 

SEMI-FINAL PRODUCTS

 

FINAL PRODUCTS

 

Bluetooth Test Fixture

 

 

Production Flow Video 

 

BETA Testing Video

 

 

 

Development Partners

 

 

 

Brand Story

 

Seamless Lifestyle – Music Attaches Smart IoT

 

VOZA, originated from the word in Japanese meaning “the Throne”, may be a fresh name in the audio world, but it will be the Word’s first brand to combine A.I. smart living with Hi-Res sound technology.  

VOZA is the creation of a group of music enthusiasts made up of sound engineers, physicists, and audio aficionados who shared a common belief that true lossless music should be heard by everyone and that cost should never be a determining factor.

The unique audio technology alone with the numerous of our worldwide patents 
distinct ourselves from others in this competitive audio market.  What we’ve developed and invested over the past 10 years on sound and smart IoT technology allow us in delivering better and greater Hi-Res music experience to all music lovers.  
At the same time, we understand that we’re only half-way up the hill in which 
we are in this industry for a greater purpose.  
We believe that the smart IoT living is just around the corner, and the voice enabled device, as well as the voice input service will be the trend of tomorrow’s.  

In VOZA, we bring back true colors of music by making Hi-Res standard audio an essential requirement for your listening experience.  Most important of all, we connect people to the IoT World by enabling voice service on all VOZA audio-wear offering smart IoT living combining great quality sound anywhere you go.

Risks and Challenges

  • Shipping:

While we try our best to spread the good sounds world-wide, please do understand that some countries may have higher shipping charges than others specifically on the tracking enable courier.  Local import taxes and duties may vary from regions to regions and custom clearance & process fee may occur depends on local regulations.  As we are doing everything we can to make this new technology affordable to everyone, we will not be able to cover the charges and expenses mentioned above.

In recent years the regulations toward shipping electronics with batteries have become an issue for delayed or returned shipments.  In case of a returned shipment due to this reason, we will try and work out the best solution for you.  While we do everything we can to ensure your order is delivered in a timely manner, we will not be liable for any loss or damage incurred by any person as a result of delay caused by our carrier that we have no control over or by any event which is out of our reasonable control or foresight including but not limited to any delay caused by an incorrect delivery address being provided to us.

  • Delivery Schedule:

We endeavor to keep our promise to fulfill the product(s) delivering schedules to all our backers. Please provide your correct address and contact number (if required) for us to make a timely manner delivery.  From our own factories to our design teams we never stop pushing the quality of our products toward perfection.  For this reason we cannot completely eliminate any risk of delay as we'd like to present the products at their best.  However looking at the current status of the trial and testing samples we are very positive on making the delivery on schedule.      

  • Refund Policy:

The aim for us to start this campaign is  to share with more people with our new Hi-Res sound technology and the Smart IoT dongle.  The discounted prices including the shipping cost and fee subsidized reflect on our efforts to make the products "sound" world-wide disregard the cost of making it. This is why we are unable to accept any refund for the perk(s) you have purchased after this campaign ended or after we've locked the order for fulfillment.​  However, if the product(s) you received is defected not by human damaged or improper handling, we may accept product(s) exchange with one way shipping cost on us.

story_txt:
Here at VOZA, we trust quality and innovations more than just branding.  We know that music is an essential part to many, but not many have got what they paid for. VOZA is the creation of a group of music enthusiasts made up of sound engineers,  physicists, and audio aficionados who shared a common belief that true lossless music should be heard by everyone and that cost should never be a determining factor.Knowing that the IoT smart living is just around the corner, we take one step further and create seamless lifestyle, attaching great quality music to Smart IoT Living.  Music is life, and at VOZA we simply make life better!The center idea of creating the AD510 is to elevate your music listening experience by keeping what you have on-hands without you spending extras.  Moreover, we are bringing more fun and smart living applications through Amazon Alexa AVS, in which we've worked with the Amazon AVS Lab over the past 6 months, to your everyday life.   We love music and to many of us an iPhone Earpods is satisfying enough - We are sorry to inform you that we will be changing the way you listen to music simply by offering you somethings that other audio makers couldn't in this smaller than palm-size IoT Dongle.
Auto-enhance all your music to 192K Hi-Res quality
a Built-in 56mW amplifier dedicated in driving high impedance headphones
Amazon Alexa AVS built-in that turns all your audio wears to Smart IoT Devices
Convert all your audio wears into Wireless Bluetooth Connecting-able!
Professionally tuned Sound EQ:  Music, Gaming, Movie sound scenario    
ALL of these great features and more in Palm-size, and under 18.5g in weight!  (*Notes:  The AD510 Alexa AVS Enabled Dongle is the result from our engineering team working directly with the Amazon AVS lab over the past 6 months.  It is an ALL NEW creation under different product category from our audio amplifier, the VOZA BD210 on Amazon.com.  This means that no one else is making them, and there is nothing like this in the current market except from us!)  THE World's 1st Amazon Alexa Music AmplifierOn-the-Go  Pair Your Audio Gears with Amazon Alexa andEnjoy Around-the-Clock Assistant, EASY! Once you step out the front door of your house, you disconnect from your favorite  Alexa Echo or Echo dot.  With the VOZA AD510, stay connected with the Amazon Alexa service with one simple click.  Even better, the VOZA AD510 turns your car audio, headphones, earphones, and audio system to wireless and Alexa-ready!  Not Just “In-Home Convenience”, but“Anywhere-Convenience.”The Amazon’s Alexa-controlled Echo speakers are great products.  It makes sure that we get one step closer to living the smart-home environment. The VOZA AD510 Alexa built-in wireless amplifier take it one level up offering both indoor and outdoor convenience accessing the Amazon Alexa service.   Not Just Home-Smart.  Everywhere-Smart.  
  3-Easy-Steps to be Alexa-Ready
 
Step 1. Search and Download VOZA Alexa app on your smart phone
Step 2. Login to your Amazon account
Step 3. Connect your smart phone with the VOZA AD510

Now Amazon Alexa’s got your back!
  The Amazon Alexa Has Never been so Clear Before
 Music is daily-life-essential to us.  This is why we combine our audiophile-grade sound technology with the Amazon Alexa service.  Experience the World’s 1st Smart + Hi-Res Stereo System
 
Voice Command and Access your favorite stream Music, Amazon Music, or Radio stations. 
Turn all your audio system Amazon Alexa enabled in Wireless Mode.
Revitalize your outdated audio system in receiving Hi-Res quality music. 
Doesn’t matter the audio source, All music enhanced to 192K Hi-Res quality. 
  18.5g in weight, Huge in Performance 
  
Hi-Res Wireless Music Anywhere You Go!
56mW Power Output Sufficient to Drive Your Stereo System

Turn All Input Audio to Hi-Res 192K Quality​    

With the 56mW audio output power, the VOZA Alexa Built-in AD510 ensures that you'll have enough juice to drive the high impedance headphones as well as your home stereo system.Have you ever wonder why the headphones you’ve invested a tons did not sound as good as they promised?In order to increase phone time, mobile phone is constrained to have audio output limit to only 15mW.  With the 56mW output power the VOZA AD510 bring out the best performance and sound clarity of your outdated headphones.   Does Hi-Res Audio Matter?
   VOZA Audio Engine All Audio Input Free Upgrade to Hi-Res 192K
- Hear More Details -  With the VOZA sound processing technology, any input audio source will turn into true Hi-Res quality, wired and wireless! The VOZA VAE audio enhance engine automatically upgrades the input audio signal to 192K / 24bit Hi-Res quality. Experience Hi-Res quality music straight from your MP3 folders or from your favorite stream music service provider.No more Hi-Res file converting work and never spend extra on purchasing  those Hi-Res music on-line.   Sample Set-Up
2 hours charging = 12 hours of Play-time.  Product SpecificationsProduct Data Sheet  V.S. B Brand QC Series II(AMA)
   Products Descriptions
The VOZA AD510 is available in two configuration models:  the AD510-A1 & the AD510-P1.Both of the models are with the following two major technology and principle in product design,  1) Wireless Bluetooth for DATA, MUSIC, VOICE, and MESSAGE Transfer in between Master Transmitted and Slave Received, and 2) Audio signal processing & Digital Analog Conversion & Headphone Amplifier. Design Principle for the AD510-A1: The reason we use the AIROHA 1526P (merged by MediaTek company) Bluetooth IC Chip is mainly for its less power consumption at 10mA-12mA running time with the most optimized digital audio I2S output quality for 192K sampling rate with 24-bit  Hi-data rate.  The specification as BT decoding capability was quite standard as many other makers, but the digital audio output for 192K sound quality for Hi-Res audio are very promising to reach the HIGHEST audio quality with best performance DAC.  Since we offer only the best solutions without any second thoughts we go for the best DAC available in the market, the ESS 9118C with its 384K/32bit  DAC from the world #1 BEST DAC maker. (ESS USA company)  When backward compatible to 192K /24 bit signal the result is:  Even better audio SNDB than 384K audio we consider this solution the perfect match to pari with Hi-Res Audio. We believe that when pairing with the AD510-A1 Alexa AVS Enabled Hi-Res Amplifier, with its superior DAC, amplifier, and audio components, it overpowers any of the high-end wireless BT headphones, earphones, car audio, home stereo and more.Try and witness how this World's 1st Alexa AVS Enabled Hi-Res amplifier can change the quality of your music listening experience instantly by pairing with our Hi-Res ADD-ON Items:  The VOZA Headphones SuperSet (V100S+V90MW-40D) package, or the Hi-Res Special Edition Boom Box.REF : DESIGN Block diagram & design schematic Design Principle for the AD510-P1 : The AD510-P1 is built-in with the industry leading Wireless Bluetooth IC chip, the CSR8675 aptX HD. (Qualcomm, USA company)  As the best Wireless BT solution today, the CSR8675 aptx HD provides high quality digital audio for  192K / I2S output and USB Digital audio streaming decode.  The CSR8675 aptX HD is widely recognize for its top performance on wireless Bluetooth technology, at the same time fulfilling all the industrial protocol and decode of capabilities.  One of the unique features of the aptX HD includes the High Bit rate Bluetooth transfer pattern (owned by QUALCOMM) in which this specification will built-in Qualcomm next generation smartphone IC chip.  The AD510-P1 is adapted to this advanced technology by working with the world biggest #1 smartphone IC chip maker.AD510-P1 :  Best for Gaming audio device through USB audio input from PC, Notebook, OTG enabled smartphonesNotebook, or OTG enabled smartphone for the best gaming sound experience.The CSR 8675 aptx HD chip provides USB audio interface to PC, Mobile phones, Notebook and supports the PCM data and DSD streaming data.Besides of offering Hi-Res clarity sound in Gaming audio and supporting digital streaming audio, the USB audio also provides low latency audio signal comparing to the Bluetooth or analog signal.  The low latency factor is critical and is mandatory to most of the professional gaming players when it comes to gaming audio it was most care factor  by Gaming player required . AD510-P1:  The World First and No.1  Wireless BT Alexa AVS Hi-Res Dongle with MUSIC - GAMING - MOVIE To make the best out of your Hi-Res Audio devices we take no compromise and use only the top performance DAC - the ADI 1672 audio chip to satisfy the various applications we put into the AD510-P1.   With the highly integrated functions and its full audio process algorithm, the VAE engine of the VOZA AD510-P1 is built with its own software and logical to fulfill most DSP (Digtal signal processing ) with DAC control and headphones amplifier power system.In plain words there has not been any products that come even close to the VOZA AD510-P1 in which the AD510-P1 uses only industry leading audio components, combines IoT A.I. Alexa AVS with Hi-Res Audio,  provides professional sound stage tuning - Music /Gaming/Movie EQ, adapts to gaming audio in providing immersive 3D and  low latency audio experience, and of course with powerful built-in 56mW amplifier!    Upgrade your music experience or gaming experience to Hi-Res quality sooner rather than later, and get one step ahead than others to the real IoT world with the VOZA AD510 Alexa AVS Enabled, Hi-Res Audio Amplifier.Try and witness how this World's 1st Alexa AVS Enabled Hi-Res amplifier can change the quality of your music listening experience instantly by pairing with our Hi-Res ADD-ON Items:  The VOZA Headphones SuperSet (V100S+V90MW-40D) package, or the Hi-Res Special Edition Boom Box.  YOUR AWARD at a glance

   Brand Story
 Seamless Lifestyle – Music Attaches Smart IoT VOZA, originated from the word in Japanese meaning “the Throne”, may be a fresh name in the audio world, but it will be the Word’s first brand to combine A.I. smart living with Hi-Res sound technology.  VOZA is the creation of a group of music enthusiasts made up of sound engineers, physicists, and audio aficionados who shared a common belief that true lossless music should be heard by everyone and that cost should never be a determining factor.The unique audio technology alone with the numerous of our worldwide patents distinct ourselves from others in this competitive audio market.  What we’ve developed and invested over the past 10 years on sound and smart IoT technology allow us in delivering better and greater Hi-Res music experience to all music lovers.  At the same time, we understand that we’re only half-way up the hill in which we are in this industry for a greater purpose.  We believe that the smart IoT living is just around the corner, and the voice enabled device, as well as the voice input service will be the trend of tomorrow’s.  In VOZA, we bring back true colors of music by making Hi-Res standard audio an essential requirement for your listening experience.  Most important of all, we connect people to the IoT World by enabling voice service on all VOZA audio-wear offering smart IoT living combining great quality sound anywhere you go.             Credentials
